1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+yas mdzam hA tan+d+ha rA dza nA ma/ dang
1b2(rgyud): ngo byar sa so 'o
1b3(rgyud): skad du/ dpal go sang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
1b4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
1b5(rgyud): ra/ re re/ re ste lo
2a1(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
2a2(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i bru ga la bzhugs so// brjod
2a3(rgyud): kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang
2a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
2b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sem
2b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang byang
2b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang /
2b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang
3a1(rgyud): #/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a2(rgyud): chen po gzugs rdo rje dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri
3a3(rgyud): rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang
3a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
3a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
3a6(rgyud): pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa la/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
3b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba dang / de dag la
3b2(rgyud): sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
3b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu gang bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
3b4(rgyud): cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin
3b5(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs
3b6(rgyud): su mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to// de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu ya la ni mA ma kI lta bu/ la la ni gos
3b7(rgyud): dkar mo lta bu la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma lta bu la la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bul la ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu la la ni dri'i nga bo lta rul la ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu la la ni reg gi ngo bo lta bu
4a1(rgyud): s+yA sa sa smra/ sma/
4a2(rgyud): pa TIgs pa gyig chen po dkyil 'khod du med gru rji byin gyis brlabs ni/ gsal ma / rna rgyogs gzun pa kyi gru rgyasagyis su tu chug
4a3(rgyud): zer 'tho ba mang po la zug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dung
4a4(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i bdag pod/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
4a5(rgyud): dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi
4a6(rgyud): sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
4a7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyems par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
4b1(rgyud): garnas par gyur to// dengasarnams 'ape byings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems san dri rnyed pa de dag thas cad rdo sems dpa byor gyi rlangs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa stsa
4b2(rgyud): bde ba dang med bde 'thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mtshig
4b3(rgyud): 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so//
4b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta bur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin
4b5(rgyud): gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub
4b6(rgyud): sems ni rab byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom
4b7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa smos pa de kho na nyid kyi dmatshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal
5a1(rgyud): nas 'das / 'dus pags su drug/ de sa /
5a2(rgyud): de nas paco 'das de 'i ga shegs pabyang chung kyi sems dordzas/ de bzhinag shegs pa thang cad la 'dzis ces pa/ 'phral to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag shenas pa rje ca kyims phyags
5a3(rgyud): so/ 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yinan/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi kyi smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
5a4(rgyud): mtshar du gyur/ rmang du gyur te/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i
5a5(rgyud): yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das
5a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba bgyi ba
5a7(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
5b1(rgyud): thudang / gas dang / thug sa rjo bzhin ga shegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa btub pa des khyen nas/ sa slod mdzo zhes byang 'i ting nge 'dzin la song su par gyugs
5b2(rgyud): rdzing gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi ming tha ma snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // badz+rarje// de nas 'di byung ma thug tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
5b3(rgyud): spu dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
5b4(rgyud): rdo rje la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gi rigs kyi mchog snying po'i snying po 'di
5b5(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dzi na dzAka/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rnam
5b6(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dkar po nag po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
5b7(rgyud): 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rjeng pa la zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi su dang
6a1(rgyud): nga/ / \u0f7f/ stso sa /
6a2(rgyud): ri chen dab kyi rgya rgya chen por snor bsanams pa'i gnas kyis/ ser ponapa po dgang po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca kyi sra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ste phyogs su dugs so//
6a3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rkyen 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i
6a4(rgyud): 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // a ro l-i ka/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i
6a5(rgyud): skyes bu de nyid/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i
6a6(rgyud): rgyab tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig 'gugs
6a7(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pradzA d+h+r-i/ ka/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku/
6b1(rgyud): dang / gzung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes du rtsung pa gdon mi ba ba'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ ldang khra dung / nag po dang / dkar ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa 'angs cad kyi dang //
6b2(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yi bzhin nor bung ma tshig ste/ rigs lhur gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis// 'dod dang thar bar bsgru ba'o/
6b3(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog
6b4(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas 'di byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i
6b5(rgyud): skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
6b6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan
6b7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
7a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags pa byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin
7a2(rgyud): pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rA gar ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang
7a3(rgyud): thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsungs dang / thugs srung rdo rje
7a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+ra ra ti
7a5(rgyud): de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs/
7a6(rgyud): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog dam tshig phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
7a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khrobo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ya ma n+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan
7b1(rgyud): 'das ba'in gshegs pa thas cad kyi rung dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig du'i thus byung 'ang / de ba'adag shegs pa 'ang sa 'ardzes par byed pa'i dra dra gu rdzogs kyi nga smras smras
7b2(rgyud): lngar 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ma moms par drugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi kyi'il 'khor byi gyis rlob pa'i rjo rji po dri/
7b3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // prad+ha nA kr-ing / de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/
7b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig bsnyengs pa'i tshul du lce phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
7b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'tshang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma/
7b6(rgyud): thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi tshul du nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so//
7b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang
8a1(rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyubyung ngo // big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom
8a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi tshul du byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhug
8a3(rgyud): so/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyes par byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
8a4(rgyud): thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de/
8a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku dang
8a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // blan med pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
8a7(rgyud): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag ngos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa'ang thugs kyis martson
8b1(rgyud): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang / lus sems lta bu dang / sems tshig tu brjod pa lta bur skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyar nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched brjod do// e ma'o kun tu bzang po'i// skra dang gsung thugs/
8b3(rgyud): rdo rje can// skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spu dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
8b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med pas sgom pa med// bsgom par bya ba sgom pa
8b5(rgyud): mim de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so//
8b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
8b7(rgyud): so dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi
9a1(rgyud): rang bzhin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin
9a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam
9a3(rgyud): mkha' lta bur bdag med pa// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal
9a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid
9a5(rgyud): rnam par snangs// bdag med chos las kun tu byung // byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'i
9a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa che dpag tu med pa 'od par 'bar ba da ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la soms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// maskyes pas chos rnams la// dza na mdur
9a7(rgyud): slom me// rnam pa 'i tshul du myor ba'is// ngam po dag tur cu bslags// zhes bcom ldan 'das bzhin gi shegs cher pa da pa 'asus so// de nas bcom ldam 'as
9b1(rgyud): gshems parnang pa ma do mi nga ba'i gshegs pa mas cad pas gyis gnon pa dmazhes bya ba ba ting 'dzin pa 'ongs par nugs te/ cang chu sems 'di gsungs so// ros mas bzhi 'ong /
9b2(rgyud): gsal pa// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub tshul 'di bcan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa gdon gyi babs gsus
9b3(rgyud): so de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge thozos
9b4(rgyud): nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rlung du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma 'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che// yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems pa
9b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med pa yi chos las byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa// rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don//
9b6(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba// byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas byang chub
9b7(rgyud): rab ston pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems kyi le'u ste
10a1(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin
10a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba
10a3(rgyud): At+ma ko&haM/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam// 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab//
10a4(rgyud): kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag
10a5(rgyud): rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya// tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis// bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod pa yi rgya mchog
10a6(rgyud): dang / dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang // tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // thogs med grub pa'i rgya chen rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i
10a7(rgyud): kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lha// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tsugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/
10b1(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu 'khrigs// de yi phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom// marga ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas/
10b2(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen bsdams par sgoms// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'bar ba mnga'// rab 'bar phyag na pad+ma bsdams// 'dod
10b3(rgyud): chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dra'i sku// gdon mi za ba rdo rje can// zhi ba phyag nA ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
10b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
10b5(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA At+ma ko&haM/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu
10b6(rgyud): snyom rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yang mi spro// sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od// mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri
10b7(rgyud): mtshon chen 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gsal ba'i dkyil
11a1(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// pad+ma sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni/
11a2(rgyud): rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje/
11a3(rgyud): las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul 'thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
11a4(rgyud): gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
11a5(rgyud): dang / thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog
11a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/
11a7(rgyud): zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing
11b1(rgyud): dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso//
11b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum mchog ston papo// de bzhin gshegs bkun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rab tu nyams dga' bshad/
11b3(rgyud): de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// lus ngag sems ni bsgoms pa yis// shes rab can gyis
11b4(rgyud): thig gdab pa// thig skud gsar pa legs bkal ba// tshad ma rab tu mdzes pa yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khru ni bcu gnyis tshangad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// sgo bzhi par ni
11b5(rgyud): rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lon// rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// de nas las kyi cho ga ni// mthong bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de'i dbus rdo rje bring ni// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po
11b6(rgyud): rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// 'khor lo chen po shar phyogs su// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen chen po lho phyogs su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// bad+ma
11b7(rgyud): chen po nub phyogs su// pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// ral gri chen po byang phyogs su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// dbus su sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od// spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru br-i// ma mA kI yi rigs
12a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho phyogs su// pad+ma kha bye sdong bur bcas// nub phyogs su ni bri bar bya// ut+pal mdzes pa byang phyogs su// mthing kha sprin dang 'dra bar bri/
12a2(rgyud): tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba// shar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba// be con lho yi phyogs su bri// pad+ma 'bar ba 'od byed pa// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa
12a3(rgyud): rdo rje can// byang gi phyogs su rdo rje bri// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// bud med
12a4(rgyud): rab tu mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// dri dang me tog 'phreng brgyan te// yon tan ska rags mA ma kIr// shes rab can gyis byin brlabs la// de yi dbus su mnyes par bya//
12a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas spros pas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan// bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems
12a6(rgyud): dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
12a7(rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun
12b1(rgyud): mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to// rnam par mi rtog don las byung // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg pa mchog ni bla med pa'i// dngos grub rab mchog
12b2(rgyud): sgrub par byed// rigs ngan smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams// theg chen bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med
12b3(rgyud): la sogs pa'i// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho che// theg pa mchog ni 'di la 'grub// snying nas slob dpon smod pa dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yong mi 'gyur// srog
12b4(rgyud): gcod pa yi sems can gang // brdzun du sprul dga' ba dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod pa spyod gang dang // bshang gci zas suza ba ste// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/
12b5(rgyud): ma dang sring mo bu mo la// 'dod pa bas ni mnyes byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi// dngos grub rgya che des 'thob bo// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la// rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis//
12b6(rgyud): mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te// de ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur//
12b7(rgyud): rmad du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsungs zhes gsol to//
13a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gsan nas/ byang
13a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma zer cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// snying po chos kyi don las byung /
13a3(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs skrag nas
13a4(rgyud): brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
13a5(rgyud): skudang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
13a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs
13a7(rgyud): mamathag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to//
13b1(rgyud): denas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/ dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas/ chos kyi dbyings 'di skad ces gsungs so// ema'o chos ma ma chos / ema'o chos kyi don 'thung
13b2(rgyud): ba chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas// rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje'i skul phyag 'tshal
13b3(rgyud): 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // nam mkha' chen po dbyings gyur pa// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha'i sku las yang dag byung // nam
13b4(rgyud): mkha'i lam la gnas pa po// nam mkha'i thugs te chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa
13b5(rgyud): las kun tu spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje
13b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par/
13b7(rgyud): snang mdzad/ rdul dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom
14a1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa/ mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis nga'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di
14a2(rgyud): gsungs so// oM sarba tra thAg ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rdo rje gsum po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang // gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshan
14a3(rgyud): byas la// mchog rab 'di yis bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal/ ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags
14a4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA go Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
14a5(rgyud): par zhugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis/
14a6(rgyud): myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
14a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus
14b1(rgyud): dang ni// ngag dang yid kyis bskul nas su// yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par bya// sems la dmigs pa bdag med pa// ngag dang lus kyang rnam par sgom// nam/
14b2(rgyud): mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas// sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la// byang chub med cing sgom
14b3(rgyud): pa'ang med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ni mdor na rnam dpyad nas// sngags kyis brtag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin
14b4(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis// sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs
14b5(rgyud): rgyargyurgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la// ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtags
14b6(rgyud): sgom/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas gzhag go// hUM/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
14b7(rgyud): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la// rdo rje pad+ma rnam par sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// mchog gi sbyor ba nan
15a1(rgyud): tan gyis// de yi steng du yongs su sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro// 'khor yang khyad
15a2(rgyud): par dag tu spro// ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsan ka yi 'bru tsam la// 'dab ma brgyad ge sar bcas/
15a3(rgyud): sna'i rtse mor 'di shis te// bsgoms pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// sgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga'/
15a4(rgyud): byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni// de ru mdor na spro bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan ma yi// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
15a5(rgyud): 'dzin// de nyid don kun ston pa pos// spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug sgom// gsang ba'i de
15a6(rgyud): nyid mchod chen gyis// legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// zas su bshang gci zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa// yang dag bla med grub par
15a7(rgyud): 'gyur// zas su sha rnams za ba dang // sha chen dag ni rab brtags na// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// de bzhin dam
15b1(rgyud): pa khyi mi sha/ khas kyi phyir ni 'da' bar bya// bas gzhan dag ni ma thos na// byang chub sems dpa' blocan dang // sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// myung du
15b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten na// go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur// gtso bo gzi can stongs dang ldan// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba
15b3(rgyud): tsam gyis skul med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// lus ngag sems las
15b4(rgyud): 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
15b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag pos/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog
15b6(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'dri gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas myur du thob par
15b7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ji ltar 'dod par bsten bya ste// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas// bsten
16a1(rgyud): kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// slongs mo za zhing mi bzla ste// stong la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o//
16a2(rgyud): 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar
16a3(rgyud): nges par sreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// chos mchog mi g.yo brnyas pa yang // 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so// chags can
16a4(rgyud): ye shes 'dod pa yis// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnams bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod par byed pas
16a5(rgyud): mchod par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs
16a6(rgyud): rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// ro la rnam
16a7(rgyud): gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya/
16b1(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje nan/ mi spyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la/ rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs
16b2(rgyud): sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// 'du na de la sgom pa ni// rigs kyi tshul du rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor// chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa// rdo rje rjes su
16b3(rgyud): dran sgom pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams sgom// rigs ni rjes su dran par sbyor// khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa// lha ni rjes su dran par sbyor// bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ bud med
16b4(rgyud): gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la
16b5(rgyud): sogs par bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grungab thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang // aHdang phaT kyang rab brtag bya// 'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi//
16b6(rgyud): pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
16b7(rgyud): ji ltar sgom zhen/ b+hag la ni ling ga gzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// bsku rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas smin rnams s+ho// de la chos rjes su dran pa'i ltar sgom zhen/ b+hag
17a1(rgyud): la ni ling ga gzhag/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga
17a2(rgyud): gzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgrom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab
17a3(rgyud): tu sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro// de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ khro bo'i dbang po rab tu sgom// ba spu rnams kyi
17a4(rgyud): bu ga nas// mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bdag gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i thig pa yis/
17a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung /
17a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya// de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bdag kyang de dang
17a7(rgyud): 'drar gyur cig/ de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin// gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshigs kyang de 'dra ste// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig
17b1(rgyud): de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur// de la sems can
17b2(rgyud): rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig/ de la
17b3(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin// gsung gis sku yang rnam sgom pa// bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar/
17b4(rgyud): sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig/ de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad
17b5(rgyud): na/ dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// thams cad ma skyes zag pa med/
17b6(rgyud): byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med// de la skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// mtshan med mi 'gyur nam mkha'
17b7(rgyud): bzhin// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu dri meng nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/
18a1(rgyud): lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed pa// rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs
18a2(rgyud): dang ni// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub// gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te/
18a3(rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//
18a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
18a5(rgyud): po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che// nam mkha'i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/
18a6(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa
18a7(rgyud): gsum gyi lam la gnas// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// sku dang
18b1(rgyud): gsung thugs shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen
18b2(rgyud): 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung gzhon nu mig
18b3(rgyud): yangs pa// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed// byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am// rgyal nyid skyes
18b4(rgyud): zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa 'am// rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya// nu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang na
18b5(rgyud): rkang pa'i bar// lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya//
18b6(rgyud): bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying khar bsgom par bya// zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer 'dre/
18b7(rgyud): bas rnam par brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ut+pal
19a1(rgyud): dag dang // pad+ma rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// me tog kar+t+ti kA ra dang // mawi kA dang pU thi kA// me tog ka
19a2(rgyud): ra bI ra bsam// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas la// rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab
19a3(rgyud): tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad+mo rdo rje dang // ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas bsgom// dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa// gsal
19a4(rgyud): zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis gnas su bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mchod pa rgya mtsho ba tsam// rin chen na
19a5(rgyud): bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam pa mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs
19a6(rgyud): mchog gis brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la// dngos grub 'dod pas
19a7(rgyud): sbyin pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la// reg pa'i sbyor ba
19b1(rgyud): dngu bar grwa gnam sapa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par dra// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi smras/ tham ba shang da gcibs bachod// bzhin pa bzhin/
19b2(rgyud): tu mdzes pa yi// na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khru ba blangs nas bza'
19b3(rgyud): bar bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
19b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam
19b5(rgyud): mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi byed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes
19b6(rgyud): can gyi gsang // nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom
19b7(rgyud): bar bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rdo rjes bye mar brlag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyir
20a1(rgyud): brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// mi bskyod/
20a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste/ rigs thams cad rgya mtsho yin par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// mi shes thar pa/
20a3(rgyud): rab sgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa yi// yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor
20a4(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams
20a5(rgyud): thams cad phrog nas su// rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms na// nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang // thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu
20a6(rgyud): 'gyur// 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las// gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa// gsang ba
20a7(rgyud): dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas/
20b1(rgyud): rnams kyis thams cad dgang // bud med lta bur sbyar ba ni// dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog go// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/
20b2(rgyud): dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/ sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o// de nas rgyal
20b3(rgyud): po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
20b4(rgyud): bsgom par bya// rdo rje thogs med rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// rdo rje tshig gi brdzun sbubs// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams
20b5(rgyud): dang / rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa// ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad// 'di ni
20b6(rgyud): dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/ don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas// rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung
20b7(rgyud): ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag
21a1(rgyud): dgang // rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// bsten na ye shes thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//
21a2(rgyud): de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur cing / rmad du gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di
21a3(rgyud): skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
21a4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du/ 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
21a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub
21a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang / smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu'ang ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
21a7(rgyud): 'di lta ste / sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go// 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su
21b1(rgyud): song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang nam ma kha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o// chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi
21b2(rgyud): gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la'ang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi dbang de lta bu ma khyen cing / sems can rnams kyi
21b3(rgyud): bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de ltar nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
21b4(rgyud): na gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ mede'ang gtsub shing la'ang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la'ang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la'ang /
21b5(rgyud): mi gnas so// rigs kyi du de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur
21b6(rgyud): nas ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par ma rtog dag pa las// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar/
21b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas
22a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa spu dang / gsung dang
22a2(rgyud): thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar bsgrags// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog
22a3(rgyud): yang dgra bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang sems
22a4(rgyud): rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa// gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin
22a5(rgyud): pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
22a6(rgyud): cadami bskyed pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par mdzad de/ phyogs
22a7(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas klas pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang / de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ kye ma 'di
22b1(rgyud): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi chos rdzogs par gyur tosnyam nas spyan ras kyis mi 'tshe ste/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spun ras kyis btso ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
22b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang du sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ rab tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
22b3(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyi dmachog la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dmatshig la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam
22b4(rgyud): tshig la dmigs pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags sdug pa 'di lta bu gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/
22b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so//
22b6(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba
22b7(rgyud): bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs// drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtseg
23a1(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes// skyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje bsdus pa yin// rang sngags skyes
23a2(rgyud): ngur bsgoms nas ni// gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu sgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de
23a3(rgyud): la 'di ni rdo rje mchog gi gsang ba'o// snying kha'i dbus su phra mo yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig/ de yi dbus su bsam par bya// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/
23a4(rgyud): rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yis snying khar gdab byas te// lha rnams ji snyed bskul bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/
23a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs// rdo rje kyo ba rnam sgom zhing // snying kha ru ni bskul bar bshad// 'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun
23a6(rgyud): bar du byas na ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sku dang gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur// mchog stsol ba dag rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur
23a7(rgyud): pa'i// dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' bar byas na ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur//
23b1(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzim rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mchog 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gcos// gsung ni 'di ska dka' stsal to// sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/ rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzog
23b2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad bajug par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig sgom pa'o// rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab
23b3(rgyud): sgom zhing // chags la chags pas blta bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras// thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gcos/
23b4(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ji snyed yod pa kun// phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje
23b5(rgyud): 'dzin// sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// byang
23b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe des 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
23b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das su dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
24a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di
24a2(rgyud): gsungs so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom pa// byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// oM ni ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje'i sku ni thob
24a3(rgyud): byed pa'o// AHni byang chub bdag med pa// rdo rje gsung ni thob byed pa'o// hUM ni sku gsung thugs nyid de// rdo rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
24a4(rgyud): dang gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam// rdo rje sprin ni 'phro bskyed pa// de ru
24a5(rgyud): yi ge b+h+rUM bsam mo// de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o// b+h+rUM/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes bya ba rab tu sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge oM ni rnam par
24a6(rgyud): bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHni rab tu sgom// yi ge b+h+rUM gyis gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung /
24a7(rgyud): thugs ni mnyes byed pa// oM ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/ oM AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam// AHhUM ni ye shes thugs kyi 'jing // hUM byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
24b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chubar bsgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje sprul pa ste/ sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste// sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bslags// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'i
24b2(rgyud): dam tshig dag gis rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben
24b3(rgyud): zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te//
24b4(rgyud): rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed// yi ge oM ni snying khar gzhag/ 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu sgom// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur/
24b5(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje bskul pa gsum du gnas// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin
24b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu bskyed// Ani ngag gi lam
24b7(rgyud): bamasas// kha dog snga'is pa ma/ 'jig chen dbang mchog bsgobs pa yis// dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gi mtshig lnga yi mchog / chos kyi tshig gi las gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs
25a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs
25a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la// sems la/
25a3(rgyud): yi ge hUM gnas pa// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid ni// kha dog rnam lngar bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba// ye shes yon/
25a4(rgyud): tan rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskul pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
25a5(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya// lus rnams kun la khams dmigs na// rdo rje
25a6(rgyud): ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur// khaM/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // bskal pa gsum du dam tshig gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur//
25a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
25b1(rgyud): dbus su ni// rang sngags skyes bu rab bsams nas// snying khar rdo rje haM zhes pa// gzhag skye 'od zer rnam par sgom// haM/ 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la// su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/
25b2(rgyud): sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpar de 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge b+hi// nam mkha'i
25b3(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus ngag gis// rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// d+hI nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs
25b4(rgyud): rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//
25b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la// ye shes oM ni bsgom par bya// e rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur//
25b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang // gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod
25b7(rgyud): rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par mngon par 'byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus suni// sangs rgyas
26a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms la// rin chen oM ni bsam par bya// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur//
26a2(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dkon mchog dpal gyi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes gsang ba 'dir gnas 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
26a3(rgyud): dkon mchog dpal gyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rin po che'i dam tshig longs spyod pa rdo rje'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa
26a4(rgyud): bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM ni bsgom par bya// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis//
26a5(rgyud): 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// theg chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dpag/
26a6(rgyud): tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje pad+ma la bsgoms la// dam tshig oM ni rab tu sgom/
26a7(rgyud): oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gdon mi za bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can kun
26b1(rgyud): don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od zer gyi ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam
26b2(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la// su gsum mo ni rab tu bsgom// oM rdo rje mtshig gsum bsgoms pas/
26b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yis// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sku gsum mi byed srub byed 'gyur// bcom ldan
26b4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// lus dang / ngag dang / yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par dben pa'i ri bo
26b5(rgyud): dang / klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni// dur gyi khrod la sogs par yang // bsam gtan bsdus pa 'dri dag sdom// mi bskyed ye shes dag la sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam/
26b6(rgyud): mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/
26b7(rgyud): 'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga yi sbyor ba'is/
27a1(rgyud): rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas gnas dang /
27a2(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams la// sngags la rnam par shes pa sgom// 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems
27a3(rgyud): nyid du// gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa// yid bzhin dpal ldan lta bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu sgom//
27a4(rgyud): snying khar yi ge hUM bsgoms nas// sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// snying khar yi ge AHbsams te/
27a5(rgyud): rdo rje thig ler gyur par bzhag/ 'di ni dam tshig mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbying
27a6(rgyud): gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsams na de ni bskul par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor
27a7(rgyud): bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge AH// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi
27b1(rgyud): khas ngas nade ni dargal par gnas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// su dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i// rnal 'byor 'dir thar
27b2(rgyud): byin rlung ni// klog gam yang na sems kyang rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang bgasang ba 'dus pa las
27b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// bskyed
27b4(rgyud): paye shes mchog sgrub pa// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyar gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang
27b5(rgyud): bzhin dag pa las// rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grung thams cad
27b6(rgyud): bsdus pa sgrub// maM lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// lus dang ngag sems la spros pas// rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du//
27b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dag gis// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nams kyang mthong bar mi nus so// rdo rje 'jam pa
28a1(rgyud): mchog gi dam tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te// khar
28a2(rgyud): bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi phyed pa'i// thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms na// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od 'dra bar// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog
28a3(rgyud): can rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi//
28a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje kun gyi gnas
28a5(rgyud): yin par// bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yin// de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa//
28a6(rgyud): khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la// rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na chos dang
28a7(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// pad+mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
28b1(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan rab bsnyen na// bskal pa gsum du yun du gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od// rang gi sngags kyi rab
28b2(rgyud): gri zlor// mig yangs lag na thogs na ni// rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing // tshangs dbang ldan byub byas pa// stong gsum na ni gcig pu pa// mi mchog
28b3(rgyud): gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur// gang rnams 'dod dang bsams pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i thugs las rab tu byung // de lta bu yi dngos grub ster// ral gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes
28b4(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam sgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub
28b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ AHni ril pu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs//
28b6(rgyud): bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ hUM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i//
28b7(rgyud): 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur// mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i
29a1(rgyud): dbus gnas par// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// sangs
29a2(rgyud): rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing // ye shes 'di ni rangab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje rab bsgoms na//
29a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing // rdo rje'i mchog 'dri sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje drag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par/
29a4(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje rab tu sgoms// lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin po che yi rigs bsgoms nas// rin chen skur ni rab sbyor zhing // rin chen mchog 'di sgrub pa ni/
29a5(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na// pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+mo'i rigs chen bsgoms nas su//
29a6(rgyud): chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing // pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom// lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na//
29a7(rgyud): ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas// thogs med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing // dam tshig mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// rtse gsum ye shes lcags
29b1(rgyud): sogs rdo rje khyang par gyis bsgrubs ma/ sku gsung thubs kyi sgrub pa yi// bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos srung rdzorjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//
29b2(rgyud): lan gyi ba ni mdo'am shing gcig drung // mtshan ma gcig dang ni gnas su// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyi// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes pa/
29b3(rgyud): bsam// sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba btang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa// rdo rjes
29b4(rgyud): bkug nas nye bar spyod// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig dgug pa'i cho ga'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rdo rje pad+mo la sogs pas// rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// dam tshig
29b5(rgyud): dgug mchog kyo bas bya// khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// kyo ba la sogs
29b6(rgyud): rab tu sgom// 'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i sku ni rnam bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce bsgoms na// rdo rje'i gsung
29b7(rgyud): dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni// rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog
30a1(rgyud): mchod pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces
30a2(rgyud): gsungs so// sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis//
30a3(rgyud): mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur// rta sha dag gis dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ba lang sha yi dam
30a4(rgyud): tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sha rnams thams cad med na yang // thams cad bsam pas rnam par brtag/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlog
30a5(rgyud): rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa// dam tshig mchog
30a6(rgyud): gis bya ba ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya// dam tshig thams cad ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// lce yi dam tshig rdo rje mchog
30a7(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis hUM bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang // 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste// 'di lha du yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mi
30b1(rgyud): phyed 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/
30b2(rgyud): nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i
30b3(rgyud): bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod// dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas// thams cad dam tshig mchog tu
30b4(rgyud): 'grub// mi snang gyur pa thams cad la// stong khams dag ni snang bar byed// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum
30b5(rgyud): gyi gnas bzhugs pa// rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na// sgra bsgrags pa ni ji snyed pa// mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni// rna ba'i drung
