30b6(rgyud): na 'khod pa bzhin// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gi/ sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa yi// rol mo las byung sems rig 'gyur// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// 'khor
30b7(rgyud): bdag na gnas pa yi// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi lus// sangs rgyas srin la sogs brgyan pa// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye skad du//
31a1(rgyud): rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la mngon par shes pa lnga nI/ rdo rje'i spyan dang /
31a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i spyan dang / rdo rje'i thugs dang / rdo rje'i gnas dang / rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i/
31a3(rgyud): 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang // nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang // sgrub
31a4(rgyud): pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang // sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la// de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba// byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya//
31a5(rgyud): nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la// rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyad// sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis// sgrub pa'i tshe na bskul bar gsungs// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi
31a6(rgyud): gzugs// dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam// ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi dag/ thams cad du ni brtag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags
31a7(rgyud): kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // ngo bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
31b1(rgyud): grub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// yang na rdo rje ba zhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen pa bya// sra gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur ba// bsgoms na dngos chu bzod par gyug//
31b2(rgyud): dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas// blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar ni// ye shes rdo rje lig oM// bsgoms na sdom pa yin par bshad// zhag bdun dang ni zla byang dang // zlag cig rlung babyed da na/
31b3(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul ba// nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan// gsang ba mchog las byung ba la// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par
31b4(rgyud): gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te// rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya/
31b5(rgyud): mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de la sku yis mtshan pa mo// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/
31b6(rgyud): chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje gsang dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs brgyan bzhugs
31b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams// de la gsung las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul lo// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje ma phyed gsum
32a1(rgyud): 'byed pa// byed kyis brlabs kyi gnas smras te// rdugs dang ldan par / rdo mi rnye bya s+yA nongs pas// rlob su brgyan brnags sangs rgya snarangs//
32a2(rgyud): thugs las byung ba yis// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang ni chos kyi sems dpa' yang rung / mongs pas 'da' byar byed ni ni/ tshal pa
32a3(rgyud): 'gas par gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i
32a4(rgyud): mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sems can kun don yang dag 'byung // byang chub
32a5(rgyud): sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa don kun rdo rje can// ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// e ma'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang //
32a6(rgyud): e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog/ e ma'o chos kyi tshul re bzhi// e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag rig/ ye shes
32a7(rgyud): 'byung ba rab tu bshad// yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsum mi byed dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms/
32b1(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// rigs dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// gsang sngags zlos pa de ring gsungs/
32b2(rgyud): ye shes rgya mtshogasan pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das
32b3(rgyud): kyis bshad du gsol// de nas sbyin pa rdo rje 'dzin// nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung // byed snyed dam pa mchog gi gtses// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi don kun bzlas pa ni/
32b4(rgyud): rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni/
32b5(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes byas nini// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
32b6(rgyud): rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa// ye shes rdo rjes rab tu bya// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis// so so dag tu spro bar bya/
32b7(rgyud): sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa// ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro// brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi
33a1(rgyud): yin// sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad// de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad// gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs
33a2(rgyud): byang chub// sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa// gsung gi rdo rje zhes bshad de// de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad// thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa// thugs kyi rdo rje
33a3(rgyud): zhes bya ste// de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa ni// ngo bo nyid med bzang po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyad pa// de ni rin chen bzlas par bshad// sangs
33a4(rgyud): rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang // bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don// de ni thog med bzlas par bshad// khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis// rang gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
33a5(rgyud): grags// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa// kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'// sems can gti mug gnas la 'jog/ de ni gti/
33a6(rgyud): mug bzlas par bshad// 'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig/ lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can 'dod chags mtshor gnas bzhag/ de ni 'dod chags bzlas par bshad// zhe sdang rdo rje
33a7(rgyud): las byung sems// lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can zhe sdang gnas la bzhag/ de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// dbu ma dam tshig rdo rje can// de nyid
33b1(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje yi// bzlas pa ma ning zhes bya'o// 'dod chags de nyid doran sgom pa// rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad/
33b2(rgyud): rig pa chen mo spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa basbyin na 'grub// gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rje
33b3(rgyud): can ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa// dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/ sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub/
33b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi// 'khor lo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
33b5(rgyud): dbus gnas par// dbus su 'khor lo'i don sgom mo// ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi// rdo rje snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya/
33b6(rgyud): rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi// rin chen snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// pad+mo ye shes can rnams kyi// pad+mo snying kha'i
33b7(rgyud): dbus su sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mo'i sngags don bsgom par bya// ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi// ral gri snying kha'i dbus su sgom// dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus/
34a1(rgyud): gnas par// ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su// sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis//
34a2(rgyud): spron byang chub thob par 'gyur// sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba bya// lus kyis sku yi ngo bo nyid//
34a3(rgyud): sems kyis thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// ngag gis gsung gi ngo bo nyid// mchod nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis// rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya/
34a4(rgyud): dbus su bdag po bsams nas ni// sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs// rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la// snying
34a5(rgyud): khar sngags kyi don bsgoms na// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las// bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul/
34a6(rgyud): rgyas la rdo rje pad+mo can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba// sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste/
34a7(rgyud): bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o// ma dang smra ba'i sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang // rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
34b1(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bos bsad par bsams nas su/
34b2(rgyud): denas las rnams brtsam par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun+da dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgom// dus
34b3(rgyud): gsum dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che// lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams/
34b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su// rang gis lus la de dag gzung // sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can// slar yang spro bar rab tu bya// khro bas 'khrugs
34b5(rgyud): pa'i khro bo rnams// mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs// mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa// gsod pa'i don gyis don sems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam// gdug pa chen po
34b6(rgyud): gsod par byed// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol ba'o// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// nyi ma bdun du 'di byas na// sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rmongs pas grung ba
34b7(rgyud): mi ster ma/ 'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan
35a1(rgyud): rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni// rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can/
35a2(rgyud): de yi phyag nA bsdams par snyoms// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la gzung // spong rdo rje
35a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka'i yi 'khor lo rab
35a4(rgyud): sbyor ba// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi// zhig par 'gyur bar gdon mi 'tshal// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya
35a5(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// gshin rje'i gshed kyi 'khor lo che// rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sems
35a6(rgyud): dpa' rnams// sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dag/ gAshin rje'i gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba// slar yang sangs rgyas spro bar bya// dus gsum la bzhugs sems can dang // gdug sems can
35a7(rgyud): gyi dgra bo rnams// khros pas thams cad gsod par sgom// 'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
35b1(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'am// rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam// yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// sngags kun srung phyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/
35b2(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad ces stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las// drung ba'i
35b3(rgyud): sku gsum dam tshig dag/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// bsams nas gdan du de rang brtag/ mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam par sgom// rang sngags
35b4(rgyud): yi ge'i gnas ye shes// thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du// bsgoms nas slar yang rab tu bsdu// thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir// sku gsum la ni de dag gzung // rdo rje'i
35b5(rgyud): sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom// sangs rgyas rim bzhin bkod nas ni// chu yi steng du bcag par bya//
35b6(rgyud): rkang pa mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis// spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa sgom// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen dkyil
35b7(rgyud): 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag la// las kyi rdo rje rkang pa yis// de yi spyi bor gnon par sgom// mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
36a1(rgyud): rdo rje gsum mchog khro bo'i tshul// ge sar ser po'i mchog 'dra ba// thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar// bsams nas spyi bor rab tu sgom// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na// mi dbang
36a2(rgyud): la ni dogs pa med// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
36a3(rgyud): dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig gi/ bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di// sangs rgyas dag gis 'das na yang // 'gras par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad
36a4(rgyud): gsungs so// hUM las phur bu bsams pa ni// rtse lnga pa yi tshad du ste// rdo rje phur bu de yis ni// snying khar de ni rab bsgoms na// khros pas sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang // 'jig par 'gyur ba gdon
36a5(rgyud): mi za dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyor ba// nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang // 'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rtse
36a6(rgyud): mo lnga pa ni// bar snang dag la rab tu sgom// sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na// slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// spro ba dag kyang de nas bya// rin chen ming bzhin nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin ni
36a7(rgyud): bsgoms nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab tu sgom// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs
36b1(rgyud): rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang // rdo rje sems dpa' der spro bya// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon
36b2(rgyud): meng pa'o// nang thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsams gnas las byung dam bcas pas// gnas gang du ni yang dag spyad// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/
36b3(rgyud): gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bu rab tu sgom// me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhing rdo rje
36b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsams// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas// rang gi thugs kar 'dod pa gzhag/ spyan
36b5(rgyud): la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar sgom// bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis// nad pa la ni dbang par bya// ba spu'i bu gnas sangs rgyas// sprin rnams brtul
36b6(rgyud): zhugs can gyis spro// sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe// de la dbang bskur rab tu stsol// nang pa rdo rje dam tshig gis// skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig bkod pa'i
36b7(rgyud): sprin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsams// chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsams nas// snying khar 'dod pa gzhag par bya/
37a1(rgyud): mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar mo zhes byas rab tu dgang // 'od kyi gong bur bsdus nas ni// ying bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od// lus dang ngag dang sems
37a2(rgyud): gnas la// 'dod pa la de dbab par bya// ba spu'i bu gnas rin chen// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro// chos kyi sprin rnams bsgoms nas su// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje
37a3(rgyud): bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa de// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
37a4(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// rdo rje'i zla gam dkyil 'khor bsams// rdo rje nam mkha' chos mdun gzugs// 'dod pa snying khar gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis//
37a5(rgyud): nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gang // 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis// de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon// 'jam dpal gyi ni mdog
37a6(rgyud): dang 'dra// gnas las byed par de 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba ni dga' ston che// dgyes pa'i bdag nyid de stsol bas// bltas tsam skyed pa nyid kyis kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur//
37a7(rgyud): rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i rdo rje srin po ni// drag cing khro la rab gtum dang // wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang // bya rgod khyi yis gang bar sgom//
37b1(rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dgra bo rnams ni skrag par sgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas mnan//
37b2(rgyud): rgyu ma khrag dang rkang la sogs// thams cad drangs par rnam bsgoms te// bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang /
37b3(rgyud): zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa// ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog 'dra
37b4(rgyud): bsam// dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thor tsugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba'i thor tsugs dbu d+han
37b5(rgyud): can/ 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam// dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal// thor tsugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can// bsgoms na nges par
37b6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo che// g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsnams par sgom// rdo rje phyag drug mtshon cha ni// bzang po sna tshogs bsnams par sgom// sems can kun la phan bzhed ma/
37b7(rgyud): spyan ni zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po rab dmar ba// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu sgom// mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rtag par sgom// gnag dang dkar
38a1(rgyud): dang dmar ba'i tshul// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// chu skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rnam par sgom// dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba ste// kha dog
38a2(rgyud): mdzes par rnam par sgom// rig ma rdo rje ut+pal bsnams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs// ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen po
38a3(rgyud): gshin rje gshed// zhal gsum drag po'i 'od bzang ba// rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu sgom// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin pa/
38a4(rgyud): zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro ba rnam par bsam// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan// sbyor ba can gyis
38a5(rgyud): rtag tu sgom// rdo rje mi 'chi khro bo che// 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug/ drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che// zhal gsum pa ni
38a6(rgyud): 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog/ Tak+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// stobs po che ni rdo rje che// 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba// gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed/
38a7(rgyud): zhal gsum par ni rtag par sgom// khro bo chen po dbyig sngon can// khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung // 'bar ba rnon po can du sgom// rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo/
38b1(rgyud): che/ rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba// zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsdams// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gas ma skom// gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu 'gro// zhal gsum
38b2(rgyud): 'bar ba 'khor lo can// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa// 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'od 'phro can/
38b3(rgyud): bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal// gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can// dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyis// so so dag tu bsgom par bya//
38b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni dpag med pa// sngags rnams kyi ni bshad pa yin// khro bo dag ni re re yang // nam mkha'i steng du shin tu 'phags// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil
38b5(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bsams// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam// gsal zhing zhi ba zla ba bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od// me long lta bur yang
38b6(rgyud): dgra byung // khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsams na de yis byang chub mthong // bsam gtan rdo rje rabasgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag
38b7(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i
39a1(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam// khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra// 'bar ba sna tshogs mnyam
39a2(rgyud): pa'i 'od// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na// myur du rdo rje nyid thob 'gyur// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba/
39a3(rgyud): 'dis ni rdo rje bdag nyid che// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor/
39a4(rgyud): dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par sgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam
39a5(rgyud): par brgyan// 'od zer sprin gyi 'khor lo che// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// 'dri yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba// ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par brgyan/
39a6(rgyud): 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas
39a7(rgyud): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// spyan gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bud med sgyu
39b1(rgyud): ma'i mchog ldan pa/ khangs gsum dag ni dbang byed pa// ye shes mang grub par byed// 'khor mo yang bzhin nor du zer/ phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spun gyi dmatshig drug gi mchog
39b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od mchog can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab mchog
39b3(rgyud): sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog 'dra ba// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog rab sgom// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa/
39b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub byod pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pal sngo dmar phyag na bsnams// nam mkha' yum gyi rin po che// 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
39b5(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje chos ma rab tu sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i//
39b6(rgyud): sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa/
39b7(rgyud): chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pal dmar po phyag na bsnams// chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
40a1(rgyud): dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// sgrol ma'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs//
40a2(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od// bud med sgyu ma rab tu myos// rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las byung // sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// ut+pal ser po'i mdog 'dra ba'i// gsal
40a3(rgyud): pa phyag na bsnams par sgom// dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//
40a4(rgyud): gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar mche ba rnam par gtsigs// phyag na ral gri bsnams par sgom// snang mdzad dbu
40a5(rgyud): rgyan rnam bsgoms na// rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur// 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// gshin rje gshed kyi spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil
40a6(rgyud): 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gzhan gyis mi thub rabasgom pa// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can// sbrul gyis brgyan cing ska rags can/
40a7(rgyud): rdo rje dgyes pa 'jigs 'jigs lha// kha dog dkar po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsams na rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'di ni ye shes blo can gyi// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig go// gzhan gyis/
40b1(rgyud): ri thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rjerje ni rab tu sgom/
40b2(rgyud): khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag/ thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro// gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam// rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu rgyun la// bsgoms na
40b3(rgyud): can dag mnyes// 'di ni rdo rje ye shes can// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// rta skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i
40b4(rgyud): dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje mi 'chi rab tu sgrom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i sprin rnams kun tu 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang /
40b5(rgyud): mche ba rnon po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyun la// bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin mnyes 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyis// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba
40b6(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// Tak+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs
40b7(rgyud): gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur//
41a1(rgyud): 'di ni khre bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/
41a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// khros shing
41a3(rgyud): khros pa zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs chen bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kye// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/
41a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par sgom// khro bo 'jig
41a5(rgyud): pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs ni rab tu gnag la rno// rgya mtsho nag po skyed par byed// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i dbyig thogs bsgom par bya// mi
41a6(rgyud): bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje dbyig pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
41a7(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par bsgom// khros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis blta// 'khrugs pa ral
41b1(rgyud): gri zhags pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can du sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar
41b2(rgyud): dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings kyi dam tshig zhabs kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs
41b3(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu sgom// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur dam tshig/ rnam par 'gro ba rang
41b4(rgyud): tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// gtsug tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo
41b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sum+b+ha rab tu sgom// me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sgra/ rdo rje'i
41b6(rgyud): sprin ni rab tu 'phro// phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da'
41b7(rgyud): bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje'i dam tshig su rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'gog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo sten payis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams
42a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje dam tshig bkod
42a2(rgyud): bde kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
42a3(rgyud): bdag po// rdo rje 'dzin chen po zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
42a4(rgyud): dang rdza thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// 'byor pa kun la dgyes pa rnams// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes
42a5(rgyud): gyur nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi 'byung ba// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub cing // rdo rje'i dam tshig bskul mdzad ma// shi ba sos par byed par gsungs/
42a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig rdo rje khro ba/ dngos po dang dngos med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo
42a7(rgyud): mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM shaM kA re shAR+tsi ka re/ b+huH b+hur+tha g+hu ts+tshi ni g+hA ta ya ni b+hU ta ya/ g+hur+thi ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sku gsum
42b1(rgyud): dbye da rna ma// mashes pa'i spya ni gdangs nasas/ rdo rje drug rnaM sa smyarnas// rdo byung ba'i byor dul// las nas nas d+hAr babyung ba/ rdo rjechen po nas sa
42b2(rgyud): rdzobs byed par bshad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'ad chabs chen pa'i das cig la garigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa sems par 'gas nas chos te 'i btsur ro'i bdog dzi
42b3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM ka Te bi ka To ni ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams// mnyes nas bsam ga
42b4(rgyud): thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i chos ni rjes su dran// rtag tu chos rgyas stobs mdzad pa// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas
42b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
42b6(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM tA re tut+tA ra tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag che las skyes// mnyes shing ye shes thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sangs rgyas
42b7(rgyud): rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams ni ma lus pa// skad cig gis ni dran bzhin du// thams cad g.yo med dbang du byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
43a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin ga shegs pa/ dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sbyin rdo rje rjes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs
43a2(rgyud): nas/ rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA pa wA ka tsit+tabadz+rA NAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka
43a3(rgyud): a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hasta/ tsa tur b+hu dzA/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ Sharbu ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta prA na a hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+na g+ha ta ka/ bi kr-i ta A nan/ sar+b+ba b+hu tab+ha yaM ka ra/ an+taT+Ta hA sa nA dwin/
43a4(rgyud): byA g+h+ra tsar+m+ma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru sarba kar+m+ma Ni/ tshin+da tshin+da sar+b+ba man tA na/ b+hin+da b+hin+da ba ra mu dran/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba b+hU tAn/ mi tha ma tha/ nirma tha nirma tha sar+b+ba duSh+TAn/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya maiN+Da la ma d+h+ye/
43a5(rgyud): be ba swa ta/ dzI bI tAn+ta ka ra ma ma sar+b+ba kar+yaM ku ru ku ru/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi la ba mA bi la~M ba/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ hU~M hU~M phaT paT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho T+Ta ya/ sar+b+bA shA ba ri pU ra ka sad+hAn nA shA la ri b+hun/
43a6(rgyud): ka ra ka ra he he b+ha ga bAn/ kiny+tsi rA ya si / ma ma sar+b+ba sa dz+nyAn/ sAd+ha ya swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// 'jigs shing kun tu sreg gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su
43a7(rgyud): dran// thong pa mchag mags pa// gzugs mdzes yid 'angadi rnyed pa la/ rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya// mA ma kI 'am spyan yang rung // rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba// lan
43b1(rgyud): bsum dag tu brjod na mi// de ma thag tu nges par 'grugs/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang badzad// dmatshig gi 'od par gyu
43b2(rgyud): ngo'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khri ba ma'i chi ba'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // nams mar+tha kA s+'u Sh+TA Shid+d+ha badzAH/ namo ba d+ha mA/
43b3(rgyud): ma hA dab+h+yotakaN b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mus la par u pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mA~M ta kuN+Da li/ kha la khA hi khA hr-i tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ d+han+ta b+hAn+tu/ ha na sa na/ da ha ha/ garda gardza/ dze s+pho Ta yadzi s+pho Te ya Na sarba bi g+h+nAn/
43b4(rgyud): yakAn ma hA ga Na pa te dI bi tAn+da ka ra ya swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor
43b5(rgyud): ba dang // rdo rje bsnad pa'i las rnams la// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dag kyang // tshul bzhin byas na smod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes
43b6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'dri/ nyid kyi su dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsar+b+ba kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM dzi nA ri Tin+ya hUM hUM phaT baHswAhA
43b7(rgyud): de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun// 'jigs shing kun tu spag gyur te// byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// srin po ma rung sa gtum po dang / gi 'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang /
44a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems kyis rang sbyar na// las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med/ dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
44a2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ pad+mo 'byung ba rdo rje khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ka
44a3(rgyud): dz+wa li ta bi s+phu li gaM/ an+nan+ma hA sa/ ke sa ri sa Ta a To ba TaM kA ra/ badz+ra khu ra nir g+hA tA na tsa li ta ba su d+ha ta la/ ni shA sa mA ru to ta k+Shi pa ta d+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha Na an+tar+tha hA sa/ a ba ri mi ta ba la pa rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga/
44a4(rgyud): Na d+hI ta b+hU ta ga Na/ d+hu Shi ti/ b+hu d+h+ya d+hu d+h+ya / ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+t+ran/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra mu dra na/ sid+d+ha mi me di sha/ A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra pi shA tsa dA ni sarba gra he Sha a pra ti ha to d+ha ba
44a5(rgyud): badz+ra daMSh+T+rA kiny+tsi rA ya si/ i duSh+Tagra he duSh+Ta sarbaM bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar de mar da/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ maT maT/ b+han+da b+han+da/ dud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru shI g+h+ra~M ta/ ha la grI bA ya phaT/ badz+ra la phaT/ badz+ra gAd+tha
44a6(rgyud): ya phaTe/ badz+ra ne trA ya phaT/ badz+re daMSh+Ta la phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man+t+ra b+hi nA sha nA ya phaT/ sarba trai le kya b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba karme Shu a pra ti he tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san trA sa
44a7(rgyud): na paT/ hUM hUM hUM phaHphaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje cha mchog skyes// 'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur// shes rgyal po rjes su dran// mkha' dbyings dug gis 'ongs pas
44b1(rgyud): rdorje nga la nga la'i 'od// khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis/ dus rnams thams cad med par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi bar byu ba/ gdon me pa 'dam cib 'byung ba dang rjo/
44b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje brtson sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las drung ngo // namaHsa man+ta kA ra wa ka tsiH badz+rA d+h+waM/ oM e h+ye he/ rtag pa n+de/
44b3(rgyud): la badz+radat+ta tu ru tu ru ta hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bAn/ bA yu be ga na/ b+hU tAn shIg+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ha na ha nA/ pa tsa ba ts+yai/ ma tha mtha/ pA ta ya pAH/
44b4(rgyud): ya ma Ta maT/ mo nA pa ya mo nA pa ya/ sarba karbA Ne/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ a s+t+ri me dam a s+ya ru d+hi ra mad+hi me da ba sa ma d+ha r-i d+hi ra/ pri la me h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ sarba big+h+nA ni/ sarba dIr+ya nI/ sarba man+t+ra ni/ sarba
44b5(rgyud): d+hA nA / ma na/ / / du nga / sa rgya pa/ rjon gang ni / rgyu brdaphyu gas su na na pa na gyi 'jug
44b6(rgyud): rmed / dzi med// rje du myu gi// sum / badz+ra smra/ da smra sa
44b7(rgyud): / rje dang / de ba rna ma/ ban da/ badzi snan/ dengs 'dzin gsu ca gyis du 'i mtshag pa'i chung dum ga'ing ni mas sa mo//
45a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dran// khro bo'i rgyal ngo grogs chen 'di// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang // cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur/
45a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ kun nas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje stobs po che 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang
45a3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti nir nA da/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA ya
45a4(rgyud): swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ stobs po che yis klu rnams kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas// sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran// bzlas pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad
45a5(rgyud): sgrub par byed// than pa byung ba'i dus na yang // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
45a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi Tak+ki'i rgyal po khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis
45a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun// 'jigs shing dam tshig ldan gyur nas// rdo rje sku gsum rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// ling garkang pa g.yas pas mnan/ rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis/
45b1(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi 'phreng ba'i chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje gtu mdo'i dam tshig 'di
45b2(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsid+ha badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsaH/ nAn+ta nAn+ta/ man+ta mar+tha/ mo mor+tha/ shaT+Ta shar+b+ha/ tan+ta tan+ta/ ha na sa nA/ da ha draha/ mos mo hA/
45b3(rgyud): mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badz+ra hA sa ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta mar ma ra TA/ gardza gardze/ ha na ha na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A be sha/ ma hA man+ta/ pA la ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/
45b4(rgyud): dig+h+nAn mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dun+d+hA/ b+hak+Sha d+hak+Sha/ sar+b+baM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA bi Sha Na badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya~M/ hU~M hUM hUM/ tri bi lI ta raM/ gnaHka/ mAM A~M s+t+rai/ hAM hUM hAM/ a tsa laM tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/
45b5(rgyud): d+h+waM.a sa man+ti kA trU Ta/ me hA ba la shA ta ya/ sa ma ra nI/ b+ha ta ya s+pha ra sa ma la man traM/ U mA~M/ hUM hU~M maM/ shud+d+ho trai loka/ dud+d+hA tA badz+ri/ na mos+tha s+yA prA ta~M hata pra le b+h+ya/ dz+wA lA ya/ traT as han nAm/
45b6(rgyud): swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// lha rnams 'khor du bcas pa kun// brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis// lha chen dag la sogs
45b7(rgyud): pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur nas// kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje
46a1(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad kyi dmatshig khro bo gnod mdzes 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sum+b+ha ni sam+b+ha hUM/ gr-ig kri hUM/ grih+NA ba ya grIh+NA pa ya dz+nyA/
46a2(rgyud): A na ya ho b+ha ga wAM bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni// sla ba shig gos dang bral gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i
46a3(rgyud): zhabs kyis mnan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// bu mo rnams ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid
46a4(rgyud): 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
46a5(rgyud): las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// sangs rgyas sku gsung sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo chen po'i
46a6(rgyud): sbyor bayis/ rdo rje sems dpa' gyul byon// rtagatungs par zhugs par 'gyur/ mi byed rdo rje gsung bsgoms pas/ 'khor lo bad+hi che/ rdorje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis// sngags rnams thams cad dmam
46a7(rgyud): ba'i mchog / thams cang rdo rje'i dngos nib/ rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// mau'i bu ma mchog rnams kyi/ ming khar rjo kyo basbyor gdung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba'is ganges par rtag tu 'jugs par
46b1(rgyud): 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen sgrom// de na sha tsi gnas par bsam// rdo rje mi 'chi'i sbyor ba yis// lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par
46b2(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po// 'bar ba rdo rje 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni// nam mkha'i bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog/ khro bo rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rjes 'og gnas bdag / shUl
46b3(rgyud): rdo rje gyi ba'i gnas// lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i gnas// btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung // rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// blang gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// tshangs padrag po la
46b4(rgyud): sogs lha// rang gi ming rnams bris nas ni// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje
46b5(rgyud): gshed// rdo rje kyong rnam par das ma// bskal pa'i sreg pa'i 'khor lo che// bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dag spyad// kun gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang // yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur bud de sla bshig la/
46b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i tshul du gtsigs shing 'gyur// nang ngas ling ga mnanan ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jigs par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ khang sdong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mtshan gcig dang /
46b7(rgyud): ni shing gci brdung // mngon par spyad pa brtsam par bya// mi rus las byas pur du mi/ gsor brgyad payi tshang dag la/ bcwa rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te// dgra tho'i sgo bar sbas nini// sangs rgyas nubardzu
47a1(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa// zla ba byed ni tshun chad kyis// bskams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na thod pa gang bdag/ khyad par du ni ma bslabs btsal/
47a2(rgyud): der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te// rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya// dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu// sbas na nges par sdod par 'gyur// ta li'i lo ma 'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la// dgra
47a3(rgyud): yi grong ngam sgo dag tu// sbas na 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dpal rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
47a4(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di/
47a5(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn paT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/
47a6(rgyud): ya wA ka tsid+hi badz+ra kI lA ya hUM hUM hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun// brgyal zhing ra tu 'jigs gyur nas// nam mo ba'i rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur// mi rus las byas pur
47a7(rgyud): bu'am// yang na seng ldeng rtsi las skyes// lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag/ rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed// 'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam pa nag la// rdo rje sruni
47b1(rgyud): gsum gyi mthar// gzugs brnyan pasams nas sbyar bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nam// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// gshin rjeg shed kyi rgya chen drug/ bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gcom
47b2(rgyud): rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis// gdug cing khro ba cher bcang la// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin// snying kha nas ni rkad pa'i mthar// rdo rje bur bu rnam par sgom
47b3(rgyud): gong du'ang dam tshig de nyid bya// 'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul yin// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bur bus btab na
47b4(rgyud): myur du 'chi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po// sku rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i
47b5(rgyud): sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra tshin+da tshin+da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dap+ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du bya// mthe bong gzhi ni rab tu
47b6(rgyud): bsdam// rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che// rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur//
47b7(rgyud): yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug/ gsung rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung gi dam tshig tsham
48a1(rgyud): rnam gnon rdo rje'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM hrIHb+hur b+hu dzaHye shes pad+mo kha bye ba// rdo rje sor mongs par bzhag/ 'dod
48a2(rgyud): chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te// rdo rje'i phur bu nges par 'debs// btab ma thag tu rdo rje che// sku gsum dri med las byung ba// btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur//
48a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku
48a4(rgyud): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra rA dza hUM/ rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni// 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par sgom// rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur dus nges par
48a5(rgyud): gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che// rdo rje dri med gsum las byung // btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga legs par
48a6(rgyud): byas nas ni// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par// phur dus 'debs par gdon mig/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bur bu chen pos du skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas su gsum cho/
48a7(rgyud): sems can khams la ban mdzad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ e ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa// a ma'o/
48b1(rgyud): chos kyi gnas ni ba// e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms// bur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// phur bus gang ba pa yang dag
48b2(rgyud): bshad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// pur gang ba de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs ni mchog sbyin nga'i// sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang //
48b3(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'khrugs pa'i rnam par 'brel pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'i/
48b4(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sme sha can gyi bdag nyid cha/
48b5(rgyud): dran lo ngas bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtab tu sgrub// bshang gcing mo tshig la sogs pa// de ru chog bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor gru ba'i lham par bya/
48b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor spyom payis/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes/ rgyan rnams thams cad 'ongs rdzogs pa/ ngang bar bzhag nas rnam par sgom// dkyil
48b7(rgyud): 'khor lnga 'i 'khor lo yis// sangs rgyas rnams su rnam par sgom// sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' sgom// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/ rnam par snang /
49a1(rgyud): mdzad su chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba'is// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje sem srung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bsod+b+ha ga ma pan n+ti bdagu nyid che// rdum/
49a2(rgyud): ut+pal mthing kha'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'anga' dka'
49a3(rgyud): ba'o// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// gar mkhan
49a4(rgyud): bu mo rab mdzes shing // bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag/ sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin//
49a5(rgyud): mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog/ bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u'i rigs// dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya// 'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni//
49a6(rgyud): sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni// sgom pa'i mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// rdo rje
49a7(rgyud): sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// grub pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur// dpag tshad brgya'i khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang
49b1(rgyud): snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba thams cad durtsam par bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// ngam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje canan gyi grub 'dod na// nga shang
49b2(rgyud): bci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/
49b3(rgyud): sbyangs rgyas byang chub banas nog ngo nyid blan med pa 'grub/ bcon ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar du'i dmatshos rdo rdzas de skad ces bka' stsal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dmatshig rten/
49b4(rgyud): po'i rdo rje blo bau zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
49b5(rgyud): las phyung ngo // oM Sh+T+r-iHSh+T+rI wi kr-i ta A nan/ sarba sha d+hAn nA sha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar// lan tshwa ske tshe yungs mar te// khro zhing tsher ma'i me la bsreg/ bu mo'i ming dang /
49b6(rgyud): tshig tu bcas// nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na// 'di ni yong ye rab tu shes// shes rab can gyis gru gsum du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg/ bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya/
49b7(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang // de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin pa 'am// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni// de'i tshe na der zad 'gyur/
50a1(rgyud): bcu bzhi 'am yang na chos brgyad la// dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags btang na// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i// ngagra yi ga jam
50a2(rgyud): brnyan byas nas su// bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon miza// tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// pab ni nges par ltung bar 'gyur// hU~M ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas/ rdorje
50a3(rgyud): 'bar ba rab tu sgom// phyag ma rdo rje'i rigs dran te// gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas// skyes pa 'am bud med gzugs dris la// lag par ste re bsams nas su/
50a4(rgyud): mid pa bcad par rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa// 'di yis snang bar 'gyur ba'am// shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar
50a5(rgyud): ba me stag mang po'i drigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje bsams na ni// chu rnams mnan pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na// rlung la sogs pa drung na ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas
50a6(rgyud): gdug pa'i dgra ni dran par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang // mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
50a7(rgyud): sems dpa' dang // skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang // sngags 'dis skrag par byas ni ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaT/ ye shes sems
50b1(rgyud): dnga'i sbyor ba'is// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa yis gnas bani ru// bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya/ rgyun rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan rnams thams cad kyis
50b2(rgyud): mtshan cing // pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas// sngags 'di rnam par bsgom par bya// hUM/ 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje can gyi sbyor bsgom// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// bab na byang chub thob par
50b3(rgyud): 'gyur// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
50b4(rgyud): bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang // 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam/
50b5(rgyud): mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan// dzam+b+ha gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur// bshang bya'am yang na bza' ba 'am// sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi
50b6(rgyud): mthong // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// kham por sbyar mar gzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni// sangs rgyas nyi
50b7(rgyud): mas mi mthong ngo // khyi li sha dang rtsa sha dang // sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin// blangs nas sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni// zos na de yis mi mthong ngo // bshang dang lhan cig sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis
51a1(rgyud): dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // khyi li shwa dang sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/
51a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ba lang sha dang sbyor ba yi// ril bu
51a3(rgyud): lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // bshang ba las byung srog chags las// brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba/
51a4(rgyud): yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ga pur tsan dan sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // gi waM a ka ru sbyar
51a5(rgyud): ba'i ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro// ga pur gur kum sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyi
51a6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung // phyag rgya chen por byin brlangs nas// de ni de 'dra'i dpal ldan pa'i// stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur// dpag tshad skye/
51a7(rgyud): ba rdzogs pa yi// steng du rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// stong gsum bgrod pa'i dpal ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rig rtul zhugs/
51b1(rgyud): yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas rabang dgyes bdag
51b2(rgyud): sems la khrul yi la dbang ba rnams// ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gradangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma'o 'dir nga ngo mtshur che// mi ma'ogasang gnas mi 'gyur ba// e mra'i rlung
51b3(rgyud): kyis dag/ e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed pa byed pa mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos// rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba'is/
51b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad// khro bo'i nang
51b5(rgyud): na mchog ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal mo chos mchog rnams// dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par sgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// thams
51b6(rgyud): cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la/
51b7(rgyud): gshin rje gshed ni brtag par bya// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shis// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsam gtan 'khor lo
52a1(rgyud): de yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrub pa po la phan par gsungs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang /
52a2(rgyud): phyug sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal to// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben par ni// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba// bzlas dang sngags kyi
52a3(rgyud): sbyor bas so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas// gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du// las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi gzugs
52a4(rgyud): chen po// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go// dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni// byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub// bskul dang rengs dang lha
52a5(rgyud): chen po// 'phags lam bzhi po dag kyang ni// rdo rje grub padag gis bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma 'am// khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// mtshan nyid thams cad
52a6(rgyud): songs rdzogs pa/ bzung nas dbyab pa rab tu brtag/ chog thams cad byas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bslab par bya// rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni// khams gsub sto ngos dpyas par 'gyur//
52a7(rgyud): de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig 'di rnams so// hUM haHAdz+nye/ nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // chos pa'in/
52b1(rgyud): du byas na 'dug/ d+hAn rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ rtswa ni sumi rjong can/ A ni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste/ 'di ni gsang tshig bstan pa'o// d+honi sprul bar byed par bshad/ 'bul du dang ni gso/
52b2(rgyud): rin 'di ni skul ba thams cad kyi// gsang ba yin par 'di rang bshud// khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am// khru brgyad tsam mam lnga tsam du// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bskul na// 'jigs shing
52b3(rgyud): skrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba thob pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag
52b4(rgyud): bas/ gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // brtul zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya// sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba// gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o// dur
52b5(rgyud): khrod sol dang bub sogs las// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// skra ba shig gcer ngur byung nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed// dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis/
52b6(rgyud): dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// stong rdza brgyad du bzlas pas kyang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar gden mi za// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la// ba lang shi 'am rta yi sha// khyi yi shwa 'am sna tshogs
52b7(rgyud): kyis// rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen gyis ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje las byung 'jigs par bshad// 'di ni dgra rnams rnams cod kyi// 'jig pa shin tu mi bzang yin// dgra yi gzugs brnyan
53a1(rgyud): byas nas ni// bshang gci dag gi chos mchog can// tsher ma'i mel khros nas bsregs// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ chu bo'i 'gram gnyis su yis kyang // dgra yi gzugs
53a2(rgyud): brnyan byas nas ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dug las byung ba'i tsher ma yis// bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pas dgang // sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ske tshe lan tshwa 'dru mar dang /
53a3(rgyud): dug dang da du ra dag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad gsad pa la// 'di dag mchog tu gyur par bshad// sol khus gsher ba'i gos dag ni// gyon te sems ni khros nas su// rkang pas ling ga mnan na ni// srin
53a4(rgyud): bos 'khyer bar gdon mi za// rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis// gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang // myur ba dag tu 'khyer bar 'gyur// ske tshe bshang gci sbyar ba yis// ling gA
53a5(rgyud): yongs su gang bar ni// blugs la rkang pas rab mnan na// tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta
53a6(rgyud): badz+rat+taM/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+ThatiSh+Tha/ ban d+hA ban d+ha/ ha na han/ dahang ha/ pA tsa ba tsa/ gadz+ra bar+d+ha/ bi s+pho Ta ya bI s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAn bi nA ma kAn/ ma hA ga na pa ti dzI bit+tan+ta kA rA ya hU~M badz+ra/ sbyin sreg 'dzin
53a7(rgyud): bsam gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya// 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' khro ngo che// rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// sta re thob byagan
53b1(rgyud): bsdams// bsams nas bsam gtan rang tu bya// de la 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go// mkha' dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis// yongs su gang bar rang tu sgrob// gdug pa dri yis
53b2(rgyud): bsang par ni// bsams na de ma thag tu 'chi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni// gdug pa'i sems dpas bsad na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs
53b3(rgyud): rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams la// skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrug par ni// sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon miza// srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa// gtum zhing khro mi bang ngas/
53b4(rgyud): der ni skrag par byas bsams na// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// 'ug pa khwa dang bya rgod dang // mchu ring ba dang wa rnams te// de yis zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ sbrul nag rab
53b5(rgyud): tu khro ni// 'jigs padag kyang 'jigs par byed// dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni// dpral bar bsams na khyad 'phags pa'i// sbrul des zos par sa mas na ni// sangs rgyas ngag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu
53b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad la// yams sam gnod par byed pa rnams// 'jigs pa nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no// thob rab tu drag po yis// brtul zhugs can gyis sing khar brdeg
53b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// dgra bo'i srob ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje sta re la sogs pas// gshag cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag ngo'ang 'chi/ srung
54a1(rgyud): ba la sogs sngags rnams dang // lha rnams kyang ni pur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'anga' dka' ba'o// rdo rje drang pos ji tsam du// sems can dkyil/
54a2(rgyud): 'khor gnas pa la// bsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni// mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// bsam gtan
54a3(rgyud): sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po// thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs
54a4(rgyud): rgyas// ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// rgyal ba rnams kyi skye bar bstan// de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o//
54a5(rgyud): sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag po 'bar ba la drug cing khro// lce gnyis mche ba'i 'phreng can ni// rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bri// de la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying nge'o// khaM R+Sha mi bzad par ni 'gyur
54a6(rgyud): ba'i dug gi rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug par bsam// dug ni ha la ha la mtshungs// sreg pa'i me yi kha dog bzhin// bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon ming // de la 'di ni drug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying nge'o// hriHrnam pa
54a7(rgyud): sna tshogs las drug drug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun// de yis khyer bar bsgoms nas ni// 'bab par gyur par rnam par ngasam// de ni de mthag tu yang // mi bzang drug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur// reg ma thag
54b1(rgyud): tu skye bo kun// 'jig pa 'di la the tshom med// sdig pa rus sbrul la sobs dang // sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang // sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// chog bzhin du rab tu bya// de la 'dir
54b2(rgyud): drug thams cad 'ang ba'i snying po'o// oMd lnga brdo rje'i dug la sogs// gzhan yang mi bzod pa yi drug/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bsams na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren// bcom ldan 'das drug
54b3(rgyud): gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o// hUM rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di// kha dog dkar por rnam par bsam// 'od kyi sprin ni shin tu
54b4(rgyud): 'bar// zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil// gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lan gsum legs par sgom pa ni// skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na// nam mkha'i
54b5(rgyud): khams kun gang ba yang // de mthug tu dug med 'gyur// zhes de skad dka' stsal to// de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying pa'o// A ma'i bras dang po la mig 'brum bu dang / gang gzhan na/
54b6(rgyud): drubashang nga rnams// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po 'drab ma brgyad// zla ba bzhin du dri ma med// de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa// 'od zer lda ni/
54b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'o// sdud pa na ni ngam tshig gnag/ bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dra// bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di// ye shes dri ma gsang chen yin// de la 'di ni byi nang gi nang rnams gso ba'i rdo rje rtsing
55a1(rgyud): po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams so// dzi na dzi ka/ A ro li ka/ badz+ra d+hi// nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa// dad pas yon tan thong 'gyur ba// de 'jan
55a2(rgyud): gdugs ni bsgon par bya// dam tshig ste'u dang 'dra ba'am// yang na khyi las byung ba'ang rung // rang gi lus dag sems gnas las// byung ba dag tu rnam ngar bsam// 'khor lo'am ni rdo rje 'ang rung /
55a3(rgyud): bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams// des ni phye mar brlag par sgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// byin rlab go
55a4(rgyud): 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stso la// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nad las thar par
55a5(rgyud): rnam par sgom// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis// las
55a6(rgyud): skyes su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur// yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi//
55a7(rgyud): dang tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes kying 'od boche// 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje ches// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos rnams rmi lam lta du ste// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes
55b1(rgyud): shing // rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la/ kAl drul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung // bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson pa'i// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthog// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ nga bye ba rnam pa jis
55b2(rgyud): su mthong // de la 'di ni rmilam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te// byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas// sangs rgyas 'di ni bzang por mthong // sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa yi/ skur yang bdag nyid byur
55b3(rgyud): du mthong // sems can chen po khams gsum pas// mchod pa byed par des mthong ngo // ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra'i gzugs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha rnams kyis//
55b4(rgyud): rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong // rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang // grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher// rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/
55b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// lha'i bu mo yid 'ong dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na//
55b6(rgyud): de ni dngos grub 'thod par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong // thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang // chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol/ chos
55b7(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur// kun dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo
56a1(rgyud): sogs pas brgyam// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlangs pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang
56a2(rgyud): bskur mthong // rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// mchod pa byas par nges mthong ngo // yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i// rmi lam dri ma med mthong na// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/
56a3(rgyud): skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur// gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs// gal te rdo rje blos mthong na// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni rmi lam
56a4(rgyud): rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o// rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas// nam mkha' rdo rje'i gnas sems 'di// chos med chos nyid med pa'o//
56a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur// rmad du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dag / thugs kyi dang tshig gi the tsom gcod pa rdo rje sems
56a6(rgyud): dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags/ chos rnams ngo bo med pa la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// e ma'o ngo mtshar las byung ba// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom/
56a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so
56b1(rgyud): som na 'a ba mas byas sud+ma/ rnams pa sa pa nga bang ni ldan / na pa'ang ma mi ma/ rnams dre na chos pas du s+hos rna
56b2(rgyud): rjes su ban 'o mam du sesems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba zams cad kyi lasas bu dang / thal ba gying margyag las byung bar dus so rtogs par bya'o// skyes lda
56b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams cad/ 'di ltaste/ dper na num mkha' bcan tu med cing bskur mi snang bathob pa med pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa zlangs sung chos the sa
56b4(rgyud): cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos thams cad rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni/
56b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid do// lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing
56b6(rgyud): gnyis byar med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams la gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de'ang 'dod pa'i khams na
56b7(rgyud): gnas pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas pa'ang ma yin te/ chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med do// gang la skye ba med pa
57a1(rgyud): 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so// de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
57a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas byed pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de'ang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/
57a3(rgyud): sems la mi gnas so// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med do// 'di ni ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yin no// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rmi lam de ni
57a4(rgyud): bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du sems so// mi'ang bdag gis rmi lam mthong ngo snyam du mi sems so// khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lha bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba/ rmi lam/
57a5(rgyud): las byung ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / sems can ji med pa thams
57a6(rgyud): cang kyang zilam bdag med pa'i gnas skye rjes su tshogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zangs cad/ 'di saste/ dper na ming bzhin gyi nor du na po dza / rin po cha thams cad kyi
57a7(rgyud): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin mi thabs cad kyon tsha ba son tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/ sems can gang dag gis gser rab/ rin po che 'am/ dngum yang rung ste/ gang dgrangs
57b1(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad bsams patsam gyis 'byor par byed de/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la'ang mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la'ang gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de
57b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs
57b3(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'drang ba'i chos thams cad
57b4(rgyud): la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang ba de ngo mtshar to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la
57b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la
57b6(rgyud): gnas/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so//
57b7(rgyud): bcod ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad ni/ sru dang / gsung dang / thugs la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
58a1(rgyud): #cad sngags kyi dngos grubathams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bdag gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje la ni gnas so// lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje de dag
58a2(rgyud): kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems kyang lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag kyang sems la mi gnas
