58a3(rgyud): sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//
58a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas gnas byung / dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems las byung ngo // bcom ldan
58a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ sems gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ gang na'ang mi gnas so// de nas
58a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi spu dar 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
58a7(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i dus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas
58b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mang 'dus dar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshebs pa thams cad kyi s+yA dang / bsgra dang / thubs rdo rje de nga nag shebs byal/ de brji/
58b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so// de nas
58b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs
58b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba/ dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par
58b5(rgyud): rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya// gru ba'i lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// rdo rje'i tshogs bri bar
58b6(rgyud): bya sngags rnams kun gyi gsang ba mchog/ phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ grwa rnams
58b7(rgyud): kun tu dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas// mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/
59a1(rgyud): dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku yi rdo rje las dam tshig/ de bzhin
59a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
59a3(rgyud): nas/ gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni
59a4(rgyud): kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgom pas thig gdab bo// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni/
59a5(rgyud): zlum por kun tu bri bar bya// mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni// cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya rgya// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// rdo rje gnas mchog de nyid du// thams cad yongs su
59a6(rgyud): dgod par bya// yongs su gsal bar cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// 'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes// bshang gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis// mchod
59a7(rgyud): na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/
59b1(rgyud): bzhin sa skyegs pa bun d+has sbyin gyi chogs rje zhes du ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa sgoms par rnags nus/ rang thugasang pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang pa'adi/ da kyi dang / gsung dang / rlo
59b2(rgyud): las zung ngo // rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i// gzusas ni dbus su legs bris pa// de'i dkyil 'a khor gnas su 'gyur// gragasung thugs kyi gas las byung // 'di ni dbyin gshegs
59b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gnas ye shes gsang ba yin te rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjid bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'thung ba
59b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo //
59b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gdab pa'i yi ge'i gnas rnams so// oM AHhUM/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang // tshen rtsi dag ni dgye ba dag/ sngags kyi sems dpas mi bya ste/
59b6(rgyud): byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas// sngags kyi lha rnams phab nas su// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par brtag rgyal
59b7(rgyud): chen rnam par snang mdzad dang // yang na spyan ni dbab par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong // rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos mas dngab par bya// 'di ni
60a1(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu brtag pa yin/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mA ma kI yang dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ gsang ba
60a2(rgyud): rmad du byung ba'o// de ltar byas na byin rlob cing // yid la dbang po nyid gshegs te// rab tu dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba dag gis mchog kyang stsol// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags
60a3(rgyud): kyi sems dpas bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang ba rmang po che// khro bo'i rgyal pos bkug nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi/ dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa/
60a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul// bshang gci sha dang 'bru
60a5(rgyud): mar dang // sems las byung ba'i tsan dan dang // khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o//
60a6(rgyud): thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di// bdag nyid gang tshe spyod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom// yang na rdo rje mi 'chir grags// slob ma rdo rje 'od po che// sangs
60a7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi// las kyi go 'phang bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni// rdo rje'i thig srung dag la dgod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung
60b1(rgyud): ba'o// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par sgom// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa yin// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rdo rje hUM
60b2(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya// sku dang gsung dam tshig mchog/ gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar rtag tu byas na ni// rdo rje mi byed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs
60b3(rgyud): shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad// rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa ni// sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun gyi
60b4(rgyud): 'bras 'dod pa'o// sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya// bshang gtsi 'bru mar sha la sogs// sbyin sreg tu ni dngul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul/
60b5(rgyud): dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// dbang po gnyis kyi dam tshig gis// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
60b6(rgyud): cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rnam snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis// slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung // AHnI lus dang ngag sems la// bsgoms nas rdo rje gzung bar bya// rgyal chen rdo rje
60b7(rgyud): sems dpa' dang // grags chen rnam par snang mdzad dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu// byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu gsol// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go/
61a1(rgyud): AHkhaM bI ra hUM/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i snying po'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o//
61a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang ba rab tu sgom// rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis// sil snyan dri yi sprin rnams sgom// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// rdo rje sku gsung sngags kyis ni//
61a3(rgyud): nyung kar dag gis brdeg par bya// de la de yi tshe na ni// bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis/
61a4(rgyud): bzung bar mkhas pa dag gis sgom// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam// slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi
61a5(rgyud): gsang ba slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung // khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin// de la
61a6(rgyud): 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o// byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// nam mkha' rdo rje dang bdag
61a7(rgyud): stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad// lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying khar bdag po gzhag par bya// rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la/
61b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni brtan par khu// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya// khyod kyis srob chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang
61b2(rgyud): khyod kyis long // bud med dag kyang bsten par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sems can thams cad bskul bar bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig
61b3(rgyud): mchog tu rtag pa'o// sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis// de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba sbyin pa brtsam par bya// khu ba'am yang nu bshang ba'ang rung /
61b4(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du brgyus nas ni// rdo rje'i blos ni bza' bar bya// 'on tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang // sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs/
61b5(rgyud): sems can don spyang phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sngags kyis mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// sha chen dag kyang bza' bya zhing // sngags rnams
61b6(rgyud): kun la dngul bar bya// de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis// sngags rnams
61b7(rgyud): kun gyi yi ge mo// bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang // dam tshig chen po bsgrung pa dang /
62a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang // nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya// mi snang stongs dang brtson 'grus dang // rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang // rdo rje sku yi bka' bzhin du/
62a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'grub// bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams// cha ni mnyam par byas nas su// kham por sbyar mar bzhag na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'di skad
62a3(rgyud): ces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchog go// hrIHni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ngo po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas kun
62a4(rgyud): gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rnam par sgom// de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyis dbab par bya// de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin
62a5(rgyud): gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o// aHkhaM d+h+waMH/ phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang // phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang // gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas gzhag go// de la 'di ni
62a6(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te// 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis/
62a7(rgyud): thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul ba'o// AM mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che// lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul na// sangs rgyas
62b1(rgyud): byang chub rab tu 'grub// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang // chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi za// ri rab
62b2(rgyud): sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yis// de yi 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu// 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur//
62b3(rgyud): zab mo'i chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang /
62b4(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches// mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags
62b5(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi gnas so// dam tshig bskul pa dang / dam tshig gtong ba dang / dam tshig bod pa dang / dam tshig bcing ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni// chos rnams thams cad rnam
62b6(rgyud): par spangs// gong bu'i tshul gyis byed nga ni// rdo rje rmang byung gzugs can no// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//
62b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo// rdo rje 'jam pa stongs po che// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus
63a1(rgyud): su bsam// mnga' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni// dbu rgyan rtse mo yang dag spro// gnas lha dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje khro bos rab tu dang ba// sngangs shing ngargyal bar sgom pa
63a2(rgyud): ni byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du// gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba// rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs// sangs
63a3(rgyud): rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam pa// sngags kyi rdo rje hU~M la sogs// rdo rje gsum la sogs par sgom// oM ni mig gi dbus bsams nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du
63a4(rgyud): bstan// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni// sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong // bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che// sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal
63a5(rgyud): thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// bsams na don rnams thams cad 'byor// baM ni kha yi nang du sgom// oM ni lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas/
63a6(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste// zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel// ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
63a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo che ni po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ rdo rje sgom pa'i tshig gi mchog rdo rje'i gsung las phyung ngo // bI sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'ong bzang po/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i
63b1(rgyud): dbus su bsam/ rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis// bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// cung zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying // zhi bzor tshugs dbu rgyan can// bsams
63b2(rgyud): nus thams cad brtsam par bya// rdo rje dpa' bo rlabs kyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po
63b3(rgyud): sgom pa'i tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tsuM nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje gsum
63b4(rgyud): gyi grags chen ni// lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab// skul byed rdo rje ma snom mo// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkar mo rab tu sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsam la sngags
63b5(rgyud): kyi tshig dgod do// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ bsam pa thams cad rdo rje long spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
63b6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul 'dinyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dzaMHsangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
63b7(rgyud): su bsam/ sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje bsgom pas dbang par bya// dzam+b+ha la ni nor sgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa/ khror tsugs dbu rgyan
64a1(rgyud): rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug la dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis/
64a2(rgyud): dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang // gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig gi byag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom
64a3(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mo'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
64a4(rgyud): dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // k+ShiM/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu bzang // thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas// me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs// gnod sbyin mo ni
64a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings ni gang bar bsams// gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsams la// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab// gzugs ni gcig tu bsam par bya// lus gsum rdo rje bye brag gis/
64a6(rgyud): de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rdo rje 'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la ni khro bo sgom// snying khar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa
64a7(rgyud): nyid du gnas pa rnam pa'i rdorje nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byas nordo rjed bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje'i sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
64b1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub phra mo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // sru dang gsung thugs yang dag 'grub// sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang ngo // 'ja mdzu/
64b2(rgyud): chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang la sogs yang dag grub// 'jam pa'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che// rig 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur//
64b3(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba'i dngos grub rnams so// sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi// mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/
64b4(rgyud): mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur// gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// bcom ldan
64b5(rgyud): 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
64b6(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems sgom pa ni// rang tshul/
64b7(rgyud): nyid kyis de byas te// de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so// thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs// chen po kha dog
65a1(rgyud): dkar po 'dra// sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams// cho ga bzhin du thams cad du// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klungs// bzhin sdug mig gi
65a2(rgyud): dkyus ring ba// rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing // rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom par bya// phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes// sngags kyi rgyud rnams legs par
65a3(rgyud): bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi/
65a4(rgyud): bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya// 'on tang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gis de dag kun// gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing /
65a5(rgyud): bsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba dang // 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams// 'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo// yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kI// gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog
65a6(rgyud): la 'di ni rnam pa kun tu rigs// bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can// rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi bsam// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa/ mnyes par 'gyur ba gdon mig/ sgrub pa po ni blo
65a7(rgyud): brtan pas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang // kha zas bzang po bster ba dag/ de dag skrag nas ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum 'das nas// rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur/
65b1(rgyud): lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung // rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul
65b2(rgyud): chen yin// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes
65b3(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang
65b4(rgyud): chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi
65b5(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang
65b6(rgyud): ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi bdaga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zag
65b7(rgyud): rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje sul phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi tog nam ma'a' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pa rol byin pa brnyes
66a1(rgyud): rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyug
66a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni// de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/
66a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba// rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal to// oM ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge che// rang bzhin 'od gsal
66a4(rgyud): yongs su dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku
66a5(rgyud): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya// sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas/
66a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dam tshig
66a7(rgyud): bzhi po bsrung bar bya// gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches/ bshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'// 'di ni gsang ba rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/
66b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/ dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// khrag dang khung
66b2(rgyud): sbyar ba dag/ brtul zhugs bstan pas rtag tu bza'// su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'di// rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya/
66b3(rgyud): gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa'o// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
66b4(rgyud): bdag pos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas// sems can gzung
66b5(rgyud): ba'i ngang tshul te// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang
66b6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam/ byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin ga shes/
66b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bangag pos/ tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / zugs rdo rje las byung ngo // gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams/ byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa
67a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ drug po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
67a2(rgyud): gsung dang / thug rdo rje las phyung ngo // khams gsum dag na gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las byung rnams// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
67a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can las byung ji snyed pa// dbyer med sku gsum
67a4(rgyud): la gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang // bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang gi dam tshig rdo rje 'di/
67a5(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas
67a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dinyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khrag dang sha ni za ba dang // rtag tu
67a7(rgyud): gzhan gyi bung med spyod// dam tshig dga' ba 'od rnams kyis// rdo rje chen po mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mos / klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dmatshig 'di/
67b1(rgyud): nyid kyi su dang / gsung dang / thugs rje rje las byung ngo // 'o ma 'byung ba zlam can// de dag 'dod dang dril 'bang// dam tshig 'dis ni bsrung bar bya// gzhan dra nganges par 'on mongs 'gyug/ dunas phyag
67b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pos/ lham srin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi su dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // khro zhing rgyal bsing pas non// spos dang me tog spyod pa dgyes
67b3(rgyud): rdo rjes 'og dam tshig ste// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
67b4(rgyud): las phyung ngo // thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar dang // zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste// dag byed 'di ni don chen byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
67b5(rgyud): bos rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // bshang gci dang ni khrag dag bzag// chang la sogs pa'ang rtag tu btud/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba 'is/
67b6(rgyud): gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsang bya// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi
67b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang /
68a1(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje las ni byung bar bya// sems can khams ni thams cad du// rtag par sangs rgyas sku byed
68a2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi badrag pos/ ngag gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tshig gi las
68a3(rgyud): lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
68a4(rgyud): cad kyi bdag pos/ sems rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun// rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pas sgom/
68a5(rgyud): rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
68a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang
68a7(rgyud): rgyal nyan thos de bzhin de// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa
68b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// srub sbyang thags
68b2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags sgrub pa'i dam tshig
68b3(rgyud): dang sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // mdor na sems can khams rnams ni// bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchog
68b4(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / nye bar sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang /
68b5(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // rdo rje bshang gcis nam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su grang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul// dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o//
68b6(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje ma snang ba thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dus bzhir rdza
68b7(rgyud): ltar mchog bzhin du// rdo rje mo ni nyin re spyad// yang na rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog/ dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nam
69a1(rgyud): mkha'i rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dbu rgyan dag la bsam gtan bsam/
69a2(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste// khros pa rnams kyis mi thub bo// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid
69a3(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yi rdo rje kha zas la// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // mdo ga don cho ga'i bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje chos su bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid
69a4(rgyud): dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam
69a5(rgyud): par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab kyi rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
69a6(rgyud): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
69a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'
69b1(rgyud): rgyal to// rigs kyi drang bzhin gshegs pa mas cad kyis dang / gsung dang / thubs kyi bdag po 'di/ sgra dang / gadrung dang / thugs rdu rdzab ba byed dmigs su med pa'i pi ga'i tshig sa/ ngo bo nyid dang /
69b2(rgyud): ba'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa 'di snyam du gyur to// su ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs
69b3(rgyud): kyang mtshan ma med// nam mkha' rdo rje rdog las byung // log par gzung bas zin pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de
69b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ gsung rdo rje'i tshig la phyin ci log kun 'byung bar mi brtag tu gsol
69b5(rgyud): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid spyod par 'gyur ba gshegs pa dang byin pa'i rjes
69b6(rgyud): su 'gro'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshangs pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes
69b7(rgyud): nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ ci rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rdo rje'i de kho na nyid yongs su ma shes nas/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnams 'chang dam
70a1(rgyud): snyam du sems pa'ang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
70a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams lnga ci smos te/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba rnyed pa'ang sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi
70a3(rgyud): byang chub mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu sems can chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can
70a4(rgyud): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye ma sems can de dag ni sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi phyir/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes
70a5(rgyud): thob pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di
70a6(rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas med pa// rtog pa rdo rje las byung ba// smra bar byed pa sgra ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
70a7(rgyud): thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
70b1(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug/ gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
70b2(rgyud): dngos grung thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag/ rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyud kyi rdo rje la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
70b3(rgyud): slar gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang khams gsum thams cad gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
70b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub dang khams gsum pa thams cad ni
70b5(rgyud): nam mkha' la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ gang na'ang ma yin no//
70b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje// e ma'i rdo rje yi bshad pa// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru gzugs ni rnam par sgom/
70b7(rgyud): de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum mchog chen po mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rig pa'i skyes bu sgom pa yi// dngos grub kun ni bshad
71a1(rgyud): par mdzad// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu spyom// zhal gsum su gsum
71a2(rgyud): las byung ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na// byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis// gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan
71a3(rgyud): du rnam par bsgoms na ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che// mnyes par byed ma rnam
71a4(rgyud): bsams nas// rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa// khyu mchog des ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di dag sgom pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che ba'i//
71a5(rgyud): sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
71a6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// de nas phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi lus dang
71a7(rgyud): ngag dang / sems gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di/
71b1(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da' 'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/
71b2(rgyud): spang ba dag tu long mi bya// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'// gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
71b3(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // khams gsum dag gi lam mchog na// bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams// thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad// gsung gi rdo rje mi spad do// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes
71b4(rgyud): thugs kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa// dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// mgu zhing tshim pa
71b5(rgyud): ngag tu bya// thugs kyi rdo rje mi smad do// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/
71b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas lhur ni rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje'i skye mched
71b7(rgyud): nyid dag kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan zhes bya ba
72a1(rgyud): yin/ chu yi khams ni mA ma kI// dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba// me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrabs// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das
72a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang
72a3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs
72a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
72a5(rgyud): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la/
72a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub
72a7(rgyud): kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ slob dpon ni byang chub kyi sems dang mnyam zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu mdor bstan na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
72b1(rgyud): khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod cing 'tshol skyong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas yang dag
72b2(rgyud): pabar mchod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang 'gro zhing / ngag rdo rje'i yi ge'ang 'di skad du 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams
72b3(rgyud): cad kyi ma'o zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na ji
72b4(rgyud): snyed bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de bas kyang / slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig
72b5(rgyud): gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'o// skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa nas/ thams cad
72b6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bstod pa
72b7(rgyud): dang de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi ba bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snga
73a1(rgyud): mdzad rnams/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
73a2(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje'i ye shes las byung ba de rnams kyang / gsang
73a3(rgyud): ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon dang phrad na mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid ston pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes kyi bdag po 'i na pa'i phyir/
73a4(rgyud): ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
73a5(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub rnams ci la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang ba'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs ni/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus
73a6(rgyud): dang ngag dang / sems rdo rje la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje gang la gnas/ gang la'ang mi gnas so// de nas
73a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las
73b1(rgyud): bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bros te bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' khyed thams cad de/
73b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyon cig/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
73b3(rgyud): cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ nam mkha'i
73b4(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yi// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo
73b5(rgyud): can kun bzhugs par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying khar rab bsgoms nas// dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam
73b6(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la// dbang bskur ba yi gnas gsum gyis// thams cad cho ga bzhin du dbab// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// byang chub 'di yis
73b7(rgyud): 'bab 'gyur zhing // ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba bsam gtan
74a1(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba/ sru dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang //
74a2(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // hUM hri khaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par
74a3(rgyud): bya drag po mi sdug khros pa ni// ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga yi// phyag mthod pa bsnams par sgom// 'od zer lnga rnams yang dag byung // rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis sgom/
74a4(rgyud): bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis// khrag drang ba ni mchog yin no// rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang // phur bu drag po mchog dag gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab par bya/
74a5(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bza' ba'am btung ba gang cung zad// brtul zhugs can gyis gang
74a6(rgyud): bza' ba// bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog
74a7(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mchod pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yi// mchod pas de dag mchod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da'
74b1(rgyud): dka' ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
74b2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi khu ba la sogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
74b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyod pa lus dang / ngagra dang / sems kyi sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// dam tshig 'dzin
74b4(rgyud): pa'i ma rnams la// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje spyad// sdom pa 'di ni rmang po che// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
74b5(rgyud): rdo rje las byung ngo // lus dang ngag sems longs spyod kyi// gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes// bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya// 'dir ni yong ye 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag
74b6(rgyud): na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mtho gang tsam gyi dpags par ni// spyi bor dkyil 'khor brtag
74b7(rgyud): par bya// oM ni dbus su gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig dag gis gzi can 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems bder gnas
75a1(rgyud): par 'gyur bar 'di ni dog pa med// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
75a2(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya'o// de nas yang
75a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad 'byin pa 'am gnon pa dang 'dren pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
75a4(rgyud): oM 'od zer dkar po'i 'phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par gzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrig pa ni// ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gi/ sa don gsang
75a5(rgyud): gsum las byung ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus dang / ngag dang / sems bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang
75a6(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hu lu hu lutiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha / da ha da ha/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ gro ga la sogs 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas par// ha~M ni dbus su
75a7(rgyud): bzhag nas su// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// brgyan te rtag tu gzhag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas
75b1(rgyud): bsdus pa'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje any+dzana'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lam gyi bzhim/
75b2(rgyud): shing gcig drung // mame'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// de ru rdo rje any+dzan// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// tshil chen po dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / pad+mo'i skud pa dang / ar+tha'i
75b3(rgyud): skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la ches nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed na rdo rje e ldan dbab par bya'o// de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
75b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces
75b5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i
75b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de
75b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro//
76a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang
76a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan
76a3(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
76a4(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab
76a5(rgyud): tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas/ thub pa
76a6(rgyud): chen po 'od srungs mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don bshad pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can
76a7(rgyud): rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par
76b1(rgyud): byed do// pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma du ma skyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de/ gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub
76b2(rgyud): sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus
76b3(rgyud): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams mdu zhig/ sdug bsngal
76b4(rgyud): gsum la ma sgom zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar/
76b5(rgyud): mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi bsgom par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka'
76b6(rgyud): stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltare mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'
76b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang / rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thos shing mngon par sangs ma rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
77a1(rgyud): dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
77a2(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
77a3(rgyud): kyi bdag de rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/ sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/
77a4(rgyud): mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
77a5(rgyud): dang thugs kyi btsun mo mA ma kIs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis
77a6(rgyud): yang dag par bstod do// rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rjes su phan ston pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis
77a7(rgyud): bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi sku
77b1(rgyud): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/ khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse
77b2(rgyud): 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// rab dga'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad
77b3(rgyud): du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo
77b4(rgyud): rje 'dzin chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs
77b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur padag la dgyes par mdzad du
77b6(rgyud): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
77b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
78a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i
78a2(rgyud): dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg nas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
78a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to// de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
78a4(rgyud): dang rdzathugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de
78a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di//
78a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de/
78a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po 'di skad ces gsol to//
78b1(rgyud): klung 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzas su rtogs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
78b2(rgyud): kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam
78b3(rgyud): mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/ 'du shes kyi phung po ma yin/ 'du byed kyi drang po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma'in/
78b4(rgyud): khams ma yin/ skye mched ma yin/ de bzhin du 'dir 'dod chags ma yin/ zhe sdang ma yin/ gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
78b5(rgyud): cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis
78b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
78b7(rgyud): de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
79a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung zhig/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems
79a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku
79a3(rgyud): dang gsung dang / thugs zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
79a4(rgyud): cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa
79a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin
79a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang
79a7(rgyud): ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de bzhin
79b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shwad+d+ha ka ra rdzarma
79b2(rgyud): dang / zhu chen gyi lo cang dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pab pa/ rgya gar gyis ban po shrI dz+nyAn kar bas bshad nas/ zhu chen gyi lo tsab 'gros lngas btsas kyis nus
79b3(rgyud): gtugs g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o// 'dus pa'i rtswa rgyu de la lo chen gyis bskur ba mang du snang na'ang / 'gos kyis 'gyur bcos mdzad pa nyung bar snang la/ 'grel pa'i bshad pa 'gros 'gyur gyi
79b4(rgyud): steng nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'gog 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o// / de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin
79b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud
79b6(rgyud): nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag/ rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni//
79b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung // sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che/
80a1(rgyud): e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das// e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun// e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
80a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
80a3(rgyud): thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//
80a4(rgyud): e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin// rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud// spras pa de ni rtogs phyir dang // sems can rnams
80a5(rgyud): la phan 'dod pas// yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa// mgon po khyed la gsol bar 'tshal// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di
80a6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de// de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// yon tan 'byung gnas legs so legs// de nas byang chub
80a7(rgyud): sems dpa' kun// rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// 'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyi// 'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod//
80b1(rgyud): rgyud kyi 'grel pa ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi// de nyid rnam pa du ru ba shad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du// gsang rkyen zhes ni gang la bgyi// dam pa rnam du zhig mchis// byang
80b2(rgyud): chub sems zhes gang la bgyi// de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu ci// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces ci la bgyi// de bzhin dzi na dzi ka ni gang // de la rat+na d+h+r-ika ni gang // de bzhin A ro li ka ni ci// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces gang la
80b3(rgyud): bgyi/ rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags// mo hr-i zhes ni gang la bgyi// dwe Sha zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// rA gra zhes ni ci la bgyi// badz+ra sngags ni gang la bgyi// ra ti zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// pun
80b4(rgyud): sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags// ya mAn+ta krita don ni gang // de bzhin pradz+nyAn+ta krita tsi// pad+mAn+ta krita ming ji lta// de bzhin big+h+nAn+ta krita tsi// kun tu spyod pa gang ci lags// de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang //
80b5(rgyud): 'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags// rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi// chos 'byung ba ni ji ltar sgom// de bzhin sdom pa ji lta bu// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches// sems can don mdzad ji lta bu/
80b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi// phyag rgya'i dgod pa ji ltar lags// 'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags// mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad// ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// 'dir ni gnas shes
80b7(rgyud): gang la bshad// gamagon po bskul ba ji lta bu// gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi// bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar stsal// de bzhin rig pa'i brtul
81a1(rgyud): zhugs gang // bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags// dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu// de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu// de la thabs ni rnam pa du/
81a2(rgyud): de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi// bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi// las kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs
81a3(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad
81a4(rgyud): cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs// mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul/
81a5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lus ngag yid ni rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//
81a6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po// zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs/
81a7(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so// zhes gsol nas/ rang rang
81b1(rgyud): gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de/
81b2(rgyud): dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje tshon pa la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung
81b3(rgyud): thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba// tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad// lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang // bcu bdun pa dang bcu
81b4(rgyud): gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin// bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa// brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa// slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni// dngos
81b5(rgyud): grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa// drug spyod rjes su chags pa dang // nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang
81b6(rgyud): bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni// bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las// tshar gcod pan 'dogs spyod pa dag/ dul dang gdul
81b7(rgyud): dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel ba yi// bsnyen pa rdo rje cho ga bzhi// thun mong dngos grub 'brel ba yin// mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do//
82a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel ba yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun sum tshogs pa'o// bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni// slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// brdul zhugs bzang
82a2(rgyud): dang dbang bskur ba// rang gi slob ma bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// ston pas yongs su grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni
82a3(rgyud): bshad pa yin// gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste// thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags// rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te// gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin
82a4(rgyud): dang / mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba la// gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyun yin te// de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o// gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste// gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// rigs ni//
82a5(rgyud): lnga dang gsum drag dang // ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o// byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa// de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad//
82a6(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha ni gsang chen te// dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// dngos dang dngos med mi zad gtso// stong nyid snying rje mi byed pa// byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin//
82a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid// rigs dang lhan cig ldan pas na// rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// 'chang/
82b1(rgyud): ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste// rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ni rnam shes yin// yod dang med dang dbus las 'das// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung // sems can kun gyi lus yin/
82b2(rgyud): te// skye las rgyal bas dzi na dzika/ don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes bya// tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas// tshor ba rat+na d+h+r-ika tu brjod// mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis//
82b3(rgyud): kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni// A ro lika ces bshad pa yin// rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa// gang yin de ni shes rab ste// 'du byed sems pas 'dzin
82b4(rgyud): pas na// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya bar bshad// rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de// mi 'jig skye ba med gang yin// mgon po de ni yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas
82b5(rgyud): na/ rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bems pa bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad// bdag tu rlom pa'i ngo bo bas// tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad// dngos la chag+sas
82b6(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can// 'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du// 'dod
82b7(rgyud): chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad// dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yi// mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu// gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la// nga rgyal byed pa rmongs
83a1(rgyud): zhes bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni// zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad// mtshan nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin// ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad// dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog
83a2(rgyud): bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang // rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas// des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs// rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do// mi 'jigs padag
83a3(rgyud): nyid chos rnams ni// ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid// dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ste// de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do// rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni// don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid// sems kun gyi/
83a4(rgyud): ni dam tshig ste// des na rgyal ba shes mthar byed// brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med// chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed// mi
83a5(rgyud): rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dngos// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa// brjod du med dang rtog bral ba// sangs
83a6(rgyud): rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur// gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas// gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed// des na lus mthar byed pa ste// des na shes bya mthar byed
83a7(rgyud): 'gyur// nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas// nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed// des na sems ni mthar byed de// des na nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas//
83b1(rgyud): 'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed// des na 'dod chags mthar byed de// de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur// nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang // de bzhin las ni thams cad zad// sgrib pa/
83b2(rgyud): kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas// las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag
83b3(rgyud): 'gyur// gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang // rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung // 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug/ khro bo'i dbang por rnam
83b4(rgyud): par grags// dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bshad do// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rdo rje bdag po zhes
83b5(rgyud): bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung // thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags
83b6(rgyud): pas sbyor ba nges byas la// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la mi bya ci yang med//
83b7(rgyud): de bzhin mi bza' yod ma yin// smra bar mi bya cung zad med// rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog/ gang gis sems kun la spyod pa// kun tu/
84a1(rgyud): spyod pa zhes bshad do// dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid// yid de mAn zhes bya bar bshad// tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las rnam
84a2(rgyud): grol bar// gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste// rdo rje kun gyis bsrungs pa ni// sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do// rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid// snying po yid kyis rnams bsams te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye
84a3(rgyud): ba yis// zlos par byed cing spro zhing bsdu// sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu// byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med bzung // sna tshogs
84a4(rgyud): bzhin du sna tshogs spro// dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla// bzlas pa smra bar grags pas na// ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la// sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de// de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o// ji ltar
84a5(rgyud): thugs sogs byin rlob pa// ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang // de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o// rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i// rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang // bdag byin brlabs
84a6(rgyud): sogs de bzhin te// de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya// dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste// snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dag/ rang rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab bo// 'bras bus rgyu ni
84a7(rgyud): rgyas gdab cing // rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par// sgom gyis gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskal pa bye bar 'byung mi 'gyur// longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsu
84b1(rgyud): thugs kyi dbye ba yis// gru gsum du ni rnam par sgom// kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par sgom// rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu// ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung // 'gog
84b2(rgyud): pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing // mchog tu mdzes pa bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas// mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni// rang bzhin dri mame zhig// nga sgoms
84b3(rgyud): pas skad cig nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung // rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa// rim pa gnyis la yang dag brtan// bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// sgrub
84b4(rgyud): pa dang ni nan tan dang // dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams// sngar ni de kun rgyas par ni// rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni// bde sdug gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can//
84b5(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// rtag tu snying las skye bar 'gyur// chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung // rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes// 'dod pa de rnams
84b6(rgyud): dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med// kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid// bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang // spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag/ sa gsum du ni
84b7(rgyud): bskyed par bya// gsang ba dag la rgyas gdab cing // rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su// rdo rje drag pos bcom nas ni// ye shes
85a1(rgyud): can gyis bsdu// de ni spro bas bsdu byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// khams gsum po ni ma
85a2(rgyud): lus pa// gsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang // skad cig tsam gyis byed par ni// mngon du nus par the tsom med// gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// rgyan la
85a3(rgyud): sogs pa gang ci'ang rung // de dag thams cad rtag tu sku// gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho sgom// rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgang // gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis// sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'badra//
85a4(rgyud): rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par// rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid// sems kyi rdo rje brtan po yis// skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod chags
85a5(rgyud): 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod// dga' sdug bde ba rangs pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtsed mor rnam par 'phrul// de nas 'khor lo can kun
85a6(rgyud): langalha mo rab tu dbul bar bya// khams gsum ngag tu byung ba yi// lha dang lha min chung ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na// mi yi bud med smos ci dgos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang
85a7(rgyud): bskur dang // las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag/ nyams su len cing byin rlob pa// grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yin no// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor
85b1(rgyud): dang 'alus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs// phung po skye mched khams rnams ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o// de ni rtag par tu dgod/
85b2(rgyud): pa dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin// 'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo// lcags kyu dbyig pa rtse gsum dang // ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod// steng du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes/
85b3(rgyud): rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor lo sgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa'i sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor pa// me long pi wang dung dang ni// de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs ras// chos
85b4(rgyud): 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo// de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig/ rigs ni kha dog dag gis
85b5(rgyud): brtag/ lha mo dgu dang nam mkha'i khams// me tog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya// mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
85b6(rgyud): bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad// ye shes sems dpas gang reg pa// ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad do// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi de
85b7(rgyud): nyid ni// sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// 'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o// rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren pas// rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o// rdo rje can gyi
86a1(rgyud): gnas de yi// 'od zer gyis ni rdo rje kun// bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su// bcings pa bcing ba yin par bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs
