86a2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs kyis rgyas btab ste// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du// rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag/ bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/
86a3(rgyud): gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung // me tog bcas shing sa bon byung // blangs nas gsang ba'i
86a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad+mo'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu// sku gsung
86a5(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje yis// de dag thams cad snying khar bsdu// rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su// slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi// dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog
86a6(rgyud): las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu dad cing shes rab che// gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'// sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms//
86a7(rgyud): dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yon rnams rab tu phul nas ni// bla mas de ni byin brlabs te// sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor//
86b1(rgyud): gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan// zhe sdang rgyun gyis
86b2(rgyud): dbang bskur na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags la 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor// 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// 'dod chags rdo rjer
86b3(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor// rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni/
86b4(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang // lag par lags pa bzhag nas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas la// slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo// thabs gzhan gyis ni
86b5(rgyud): 'tshang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin// chos kun gnyis su med pa la// dngos po gnyis su btags pa yin// de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba// rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas
86b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o// rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na// de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub// tha ma la lus kyi chos la ni// dri ma lnga rnams sdang ba ni// ye shes lnga ris
86b7(rgyud): byin brlabs pas// bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad// sngar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar bya dang gzugs sdang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje/
87a1(rgyud): hUM las byung ba me// bar snang la gnas bsam par bya// A las byung ba'i bad+ma ni// de 'i 'og tu bsgom par bya// oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// de mi dus su gzhag par
87a2(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// 'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya// shol dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing // ye shes nyi ma gnyis par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// mtshon cha
87a3(rgyud): mchog gis drangs nas ni// bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang // bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum sa bon las
87a4(rgyud): bskyed bya// gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'grub// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal pa zhes bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin//
87a5(rgyud): thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byang chub rdo rje can gyi sa gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsngags// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste// nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin//
87a6(rgyud): sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa yin// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis// bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste// ye shes bdud rtsi mchog yin no// dang po
87a7(rgyud): stong nyid byang chub ste// gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa yin// gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste// bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o// rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis// rdzam la bsgrub la bsnyen pa bya// mchog ni ye shes
87b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi nyid/ lhor ba drug gis bya ba yin/ brtsen man lag drug gis ni/ khyas pas sgru pa mchog tu 'gyur/ gzhan du bablangs par gyur nami/ dngos zung bcwo ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ soso
87b2(rgyud): rdzang dang dasamagatan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i mnalal drug tu bshA / bang po bcu 'o rnams kyi yang // rang gi 'jug ga nas 'angs
87b3(rgyud): cad du// 'dod pa so sor sdud pas na// so sor sdud pa zhes bshad do// 'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas lngararu sbyor ba yis// brtag pa bsam gtan zhes pa shad de// bsam gtan
87b4(rgyud): de ni rnam lngar 'gyur// rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang // de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste// lnga po de ni bsam gtan bsdu// gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du/
87b5(rgyud): rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa// gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste// de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o// dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// bde bsdus pa ni bzhi pa'o// shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i// rang
87b6(rgyud): sems lnga par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni// 'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs// 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni//
87b7(rgyud): sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad// rang sngags snying khar bsams nas ni// srog ni thig ler gyur par gzhag/ rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi//
88a1(rgyud): gzung ba 'dzin pa rin par bshad// sems ni 'gog pa rdo rjer gyur// mtshan mnyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar// byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/
88a2(rgyud): sdig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste// du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang 'dra gsum pa ste// mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o// sprin mang nam mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o// brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i
88a3(rgyud): lam nas ni// nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya// rjes dran gang zhig rnam sgom pa// de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do// so sor snang ba de la skye// thabs dang shes rab snyoms
88a4(rgyud): 'jug pas// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// dbus su gzugs ni rnam par sgom// yid kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa// ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas//
88a5(rgyud): so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na// sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob// bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na// mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni// byang chub
88a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi gzigs// rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug/ rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang
88a7(rgyud): gyur tsam gyis ni// sgring pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// snying po de ni thugs ka ru// zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon ma mchog gis drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya bya// sngags kyi gdugs/
88b1(rgyud): kyihrus gyis ni// khrung chung tshig bca rjod par bya/ chog pa ngas sbyor thos pas/ rang mi dkyi 'khor la gnas te/ sems de shes gzugs kyis ni// sgom panye bar spyang ba'o// byung /
88b2(rgyud): ba phred du// rnam gnyis zlab drug tu rnom// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byas// thams cad du ni rtug tu bya// gal te tha badrug gis ni/ ngi ga du gsungs pa mthong ma 'ji swA dang sha nga'i tsho dang /
88b3(rgyud): sdom pas lan gsum brtsam par bya// de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos// mthong ba 'byung bar mgyur cing // gang che byang chub ma grub na// drug shur sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// de'i tshe de yi ye shes /
88b4(rgyud): 'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung // rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje phur bus phyir bu gdab// de nas dbang du bya ba dang // bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni
88b5(rgyud): ye shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu// lha mong gu ni spos nas su// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod// yongs su gyur las phyag rgya ba ni// dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par bya// bdag nyid dbus su nas
88b6(rgyud): byal// 'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la// de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya// bskul ba'i glu dbyangs bzhi yis ni// lha mos snying po bskul ba yis// dus gsum rdo
88b7(rgyud): rje'i rang bzhin sems// ye shes lta bur lus sgom mo// bzhi yis kha dog rnam par dbye// de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste// dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu// bzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin// sngags
89a1(rgyud): kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la// rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po drug/ gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i longs spyod pa ni
89a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags// de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces byar ba shad// bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cad la// dbang bskur ba na rab tu bsngags// cho ga'i
89a3(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa// sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// bdag drung 'dra
89a4(rgyud): bar dkyil 'khor bskyed// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che// sbyor ba nyid kyi gzugs su dmigs// nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs/
89a5(rgyud): kyi bar// sngags pa cho ga shes pa yis// sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas bya// sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku// 'di ni rdo rje can kun dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang
89a6(rgyud): ba che de lha'i rnam byas shes byas nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyis kyang // dngos grub mchog ni zhi bdag/ nges par
89a7(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsgrub bu sgrub par yang dge sbyor// gang yin do ni bsten par bshad// rdo rje pad+ma ma'am sbyor ba// zhi bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do// yo ga hUM dang ba ldan pa// bskyod pa sgrub
89b1(rgyud): sa nas / sa ga ku
89b2(rgyud): na mam sa byung / sa dang gyu sa byu sa pala' sa
89b3(rgyud): rje'is/ dang rjeb dang ba bzung ba bya/ nas gcug tog dmatshig mi chog ji gang bsungs rgyas byung / lus dang bang ba rjes 'dun pas lagu 'byor dang nga
89b4(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa la'ang // dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su// de mi lus gnas 'khor lol// de 'i nyes pa bslag par bya// dri nas de rnams de bcom nas// byung bar gyur
89b5(rgyud): par rnam par sgom// dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas// dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni// de ni rang gi 'khor lor gzhug/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// de yi gzugs brnyan byas
89b6(rgyud): nas ni// khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya// de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni// sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams// sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// sgrub bya gsong
89b7(rgyud): phyir gtang bar bya// khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas// de ni bcings shing brdeg pa dang // de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur pa// sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de 'i
90a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan la bab nas// sngags pas rdo rje dag gis ni// spyi bo mgrin pa sgyid kha ru// dur bu'i sngags kyis bur bu gdag/ sems dang nye bar 'che ba kun// sna tshogs/
90a2(rgyud): yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de la ni phab nas su// de rnams kyi ni phur bus gdab// de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la
90a3(rgyud): sogs// las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya// mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa 'am// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam// bsgoms pas gdug pa'i sems can ni// zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/
90a4(rgyud): zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya// rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te// dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya// khro ba gtum pas rab tu bsgrub// ces pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
90a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tsom thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
90a6(rgyud): la zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis// de bzhin/
90a7(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
90b1(rgyud): thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas// sems can sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam// bskyung bya su rin sgrub po gang // sgrub pa'i
90b2(rgyud): dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis// ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub
90b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// bdag nyid chen po legs so legs// gsung dbyangs chen po legs so//
90b4(rgyud): legs// mchod pa chen po legs so legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// bskyed dang sdud par mdzad pa po//
90b5(rgyud): des ni de yi sdig mi 'byung // bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin te// gang la sdig dang bsod nams med// de ni byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon pa de yi bslu ba yis// lus can thams cad 'jig
90b6(rgyud): mdzad kyang // ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'// sngon ni mi bzang las byas pas// gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni// skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi// dmyal ba rnams kyi
90b7(rgyud): 'dras du che// byang chub rjerdzas bsgrub bya 'di// po shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas/ sems can rnams kyis sbyor bdes/ mchog tu ban bangabs shes par bya// char gcod pa dang rjes gzung las /
91a1(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po de yis bya// sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje
91a2(rgyud): chen po'i tshul gyis chos thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs so zhes gsol te/ mgon po chen po legs so legs// thub pa chen po legs so legs// chos rnams chen po legs
91a3(rgyud): so legs// thugs rje chen po legs so legs// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// thugs rje chen po dri ma med// gdug pa mi bzad las kyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol// de nas de
91a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang
91a5(rgyud): bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing / skrag par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub rdo rje las byung ba// zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs// sngags kyi rgyud ni
91a6(rgyud): bsdus pa dag/ yongs su spang bar mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa
91a7(rgyud): 'dis mngon par bstod do// dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang // zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can// de la lus ngag/
91b1(rgyud): 'di kyis rnam tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor nga 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug/ sarba me dang rlung dang rnam ma dang thams cad te/ rlung
91b2(rgyud): chu sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje tshes bcas gang // rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas spros pa'i dngos
91b3(rgyud): gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// smyo dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes thogs chos// rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chag
91b4(rgyud): sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa// thabs dang shes rab las byung spos dang rnam par bral// gsang ba'i dbang bskur
91b5(rgyud): brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba rtag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar ba lnga de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sgom zhing // bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen
91b6(rgyud): pos blo mi 'gyur ba'i sgrub dbang po// byang chub rdo rje 'drar ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrung byed pa// mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman 'grub cing // bla ma'i
91b7(rgyud): dridrin gyis 'di na ma nor lam rtogs pa// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // 'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems pa dang // mchod
92a1(rgyud): par byed pa dang ni 'dri'am 'drir 'jug ga/ byang chu ba rdo rje 'dra dwa de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ gang du'i sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa 'is// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi chog
92a2(rgyud): de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i// bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni// byang chub rdo rje 'drar ba lnga de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa po mthong reg pa dang // reg par dran dang ming tsam des
92a3(rgyud): pas thos pa dang // dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis// 'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang // byang chub sems
92a4(rgyud): dpa' mchod chen la// mgon po de dag rjes yi rang // 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yis// rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin//
92a5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ spu dang / gsung dang /
92a6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / zugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dres pa las rtags
92a7(rgyud): bathams cad ston pa rdo rje'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsa ru bahA ka rab ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba dge slong
92b1(rgyud): pa na yang ba rgyu da cos te ga nal ba / A sa / s+yAd+d+ha Sh+Ta m+b+ha/ do dudu/ smyos pa
92b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dngul rdo rje sems dnga'al phyug 'tshal lo// de nyid 'di gang dadag gis thos/ shin tu gastsal ba'i dris gcig na// gsang gci rdo rje bcom ldan 'das
92b3(rgyud): dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs pan ye shes ni// yon tan dun tshogs bsam mi khyab// yod med mtha' gnyis las 'das pas// gnas med pa la gnas zhes glu/ nam
92b4(rgyud): rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir// kun mkhyen ye shes rnam bsgom pa// 'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la// phung po chen po bzhugs pa yin// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang ming dang gzug/
92b5(rgyud): skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang // nyer len srid pa skye ba dang // rga shi zhes bla rig ma yin// nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang // nga'o snyam nga rgyal mngon du rgyal// gzhan yang ngargyal las
92b6(rgyud): nga rgyal// cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas// 'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs// brjod kyis mi lang nyid du gyur//
92b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang // nam mkha'i
93a1(rgyud): khams kun gang bar snang // de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo can// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do//
93a2(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug lnga chen dang // 'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung // tshangs lha de bzhin zla bste// phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam// sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang // skya bseng sem byed thub/
93a3(rgyud): pa dang // sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid// de tshe phyung la gsol ba yi// gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid// thub tshon byang chub sems tshul du/
93a4(rgyud): mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i// phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin// dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa// srung ba'i bslab
93a5(rgyud): bzhi rnam bzhi dang // spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste// drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi// ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro// bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad// gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad/
93a6(rgyud): phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan// dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin// rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin// bcu gcig ming du byung ba ni// phyag rgya gcig
93a7(rgyud): bar bshad dkyil 'khor// bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku// nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad// de bzhin rig pa spyod grub pa// mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa// bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang /
93b1(rgyud): 'phreng sta bas bla ma ston par mdzad// phyogs dang sbya bseng nyid gyur pa// dngos sgrub dkyil 'byor du med pa'o// sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o// slong ma drung /
93b2(rgyud): bskur nyi zla dag/ chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur pa// sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda// sna tshogs ming can ming gcig pu// de ltar rnam pa sde tshogs pa'i// so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan// gcig
93b3(rgyud): dang du ma las grol ba// yang dag mthong nas yongs su bstim// yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag garten 'brel du yang bskrun par bya// de nas mu skyes sbyor ba la// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad
93b4(rgyud): cherten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i// ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad// 'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags che tshul zhes bya
93b5(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi// rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur// de nas de
93b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs kun dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de bzhin gshegs padag mnyes bya'i phyir// de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur pa// srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang // mnyam gnas
93b7(rgyud): khyab byed ces bya dang // klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin gcu rgyal zhes bya ba// 'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzod// bud med gzugs su slar sprul te// rang gi ngo bajo bzhin du// de'i sku las byung bar
94a1(rgyud): gyur/ de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor lngas// rang gi gsang sngags de dag bsgom// yan lag kun las nges grol zhing // shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur// dbu dgos ming las byung
94a2(rgyud): ba ni/ zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste// dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas// rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la// de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs// bcom ldan dgongs
94a3(rgyud): pa lung bstan pa// chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol// khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams// dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes//
94a4(rgyud): gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na// 'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 'jig rten shin tu 'das de bzhin// gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos// zhi gnas
94a5(rgyud): shin tu sngon 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpas thos na yang // de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed// de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po rnam snang chen
94a6(rgyud): po la de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// gang shes bla med byang chub ni// ma 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i// gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba// rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol// lan gnyis
94a7(rgyud): gsol yang mgon po ni// mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs// rdo rje can gyis de shes nas// de nas slar yang zhus par gyur// gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa/
94b1(rgyud): de ni 'di ltar sngags pas bsngags// 'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs// bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang // lung ni yang dag gang yin pa// de ni bstan par mdzad
94b2(rgyud): pa'i rigs// zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags tshul ni mchog 'gyur 'di// gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che//
94b3(rgyud): gsang sngags kun don sngar ster ba'o// der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing // sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag/ lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni// gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar// rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa/
94b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas// sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag/ de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur// don 'di rtogs par
94b5(rgyud): gyur nas ni// sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig pa mchog rnams byed// bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar// yi ge a ni steng du gnas// khyi ma zhes bya gnas byas la/
94b6(rgyud): sngags pas sems can don rnams bya// yi ga a gnyis sbyor ba gang // a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de// dngos po med pa'i ngaza nyid// brang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// bsamam
94b7(rgyud): khyang pa'i thangs chos pa dgang dgagis des togs de 'gyur ba// thogs med rtog pa 'dis chos so// chen pa po dang bstan dang gnas/ phrarab tsam gyi matsang // bran rdzo dus gsu ma sbyor gcig la/ sngams
95a1(rgyud): rnams kyis thos de 'gyur// shin tu grangs med bskul ba rA// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na// skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thog/
95a2(rgyud): kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa// gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te// de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes// mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin de// gsang sngags
95a3(rgyud): thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin// de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas// kun rig de ni
95a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa// de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung // mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur// nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang // bsam mi khyab
95a5(rgyud): par spro bdag nyid// de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag 'byung // sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste// de yang de ru kun gnas pas// bud med
95a6(rgyud): chos gcig pu yi gzugs// sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa// sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa// de ni bud med ces bshad de// de bas chos de bla ga yin// bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad// dam tshig
95a7(rgyud): gsum po gcig tu gyur// dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru// 'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur// dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni// ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung
95b1(rgyud): dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dung de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul me/ de ltar brjod mi lang /
95b2(rgyud): zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi// rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs/
95b3(rgyud): mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen// dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za// 'di dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i// rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs// dper nA til 'bru mtshungs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs
95b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khengs pa// de rnams der ni yang dag snang // de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur// gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro
95b5(rgyud): dang / sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // don yid thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ ka'adi rnams su li yan lag grags// zhi gnas pas ma mi khyab las byung /
95b6(rgyud): ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs// de ni
95b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun// de ni rnam par snang mdzad che// 'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// nyid su bud med nyid du mdzad// de nas mgon po bsam las las// bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur/
96a1(rgyud): de ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang // mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang // gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni// sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas// sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang /
96a2(rgyud): dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni// de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs// reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs// de nas tshul gsum don
96a3(rgyud): gcig dang // mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang // 'jig rten rgyang 'phan gdul don du// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo // gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor// rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/ dam tshig/
96a4(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbyor ba zhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid// dri ma med par byin brlabs pa// kun nus shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs// sangs
96a5(rgyud): rgyas sprin gyis kun tu byeg/ 'bar ba mang ngos rnam par 'jug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pakun gyi gnas// de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs
96a6(rgyud): kun dadag po 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su dang // rnam par gzhug ste bzugs par m+WA re// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang // don grab rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// de rnams byung
96a7(rgyud): chub sems rdo rjer/ gzugs la rnam par bdugs par gyur// de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems// dngos med ngo bor gcig par ni// mkha' 'dra
96b1(rgyud): rdo rje las byung gzigs// shes rab cing 'dzin gzhi gcig pu// de ni sring ma ltar thugs chung // rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas// 'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad// ji ltar mtshams gnas
96b2(rgyud): nyi ma yis// 'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun// byang chub sems kyis sad par byed// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig/ de rnams skye bar ba rnyed pa mis/
96b3(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis// rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur// rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni// sngags kyis byin rlabs bla na med// der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur// de bzhin gshegs
96b4(rgyud): pa kun gyis gzigs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyis// thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni rab bskor la// lan gsum ched du brjod pa mdzad// bsam mi khyab cing
96b5(rgyud): dpag med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las// spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin// de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang // de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni//
96b6(rgyud): khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams// rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni// khyed
96b7(rgyud): chos ston par mdzad pas khums// dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni// zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan// 'di dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags// byang chub sems
97a1(rgyud): dpa' sems rten de// lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig byi dus sbyo nas// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// 'od chen ldan
97a2(rgyud): pas bka' stsal pa// ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni// gang zhig khyod kyis nga dris pa// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so// smas don ji lta ji lta bar//
97a3(rgyud): de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya// ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan mchog gzhol 'gyur// log par lta ba la gnas te// ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed// la la klu dang gar la
97a4(rgyud): dga'// rgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol// dri dang 'phreng ba la dga' zhing // de bzhin 'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur// rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang // de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol// la la de bzhin
97a5(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe na// shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur// nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang // bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// skyes bu glen pa za byed cing // med par smra ba chos su sgrogs// ma
97a6(rgyud): dang sring mo la sogs pa// bgrod min la ni bgrod pa dang // pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang // de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod// brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang // khyad par du yang btub
97a7(rgyud): dang nga gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing // spang ba gzhan yang byed par 'gyur// la la dam chos spong ba dang // de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste// sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang // sngags pa
97b1(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur// gzer nad drug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad pa// 'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas// zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur// 'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa/
97b2(rgyud): de mi bzang sdig pa byas pa dang // log par lha la mchog gzhol rnams// ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin// gang
97b3(rgyud): zhig yang dag thob pa nyid// 'drir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis// tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas// don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang // de yang
97b4(rgyud): nga rgyal dag tu lhung // de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang // shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring // rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces// mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'/
97b5(rgyud): rgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan// mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba// phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin// gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas// gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams bdud
97b6(rgyud): kyi byin rlabs kyis// gal te dngos grub phra thob na// des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas// mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur// tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang // khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod yul// rang
97b7(rgyud): las 'bras las byung ba yi// phan pa la ni gnod pa byed// de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams// bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer// mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi// slob dpon smod cing bsnyen
98a1(rgyud): bkur med// skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing // de la skad cig gis rjes chags// khyi dang pag dang khwa rnams kyi// spyod pa dag ni ston par byed// de rnams pan rgyun nam
98a2(rgyud): 'tshe bar// mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur// gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par// dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur// gsang ba srung por mi byed par// thams cad du ni ston par byed//
98a3(rgyud): 'jig rten la ni smad byas nas// gzhan dag la ni rab gsal byed// bdag nyid rtsa ba med pa ni// dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur// sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskul bas// rang la rang gis
98a4(rgyud): glags rnyed med// de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi// ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir// mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman pa yi// /
98a5(rgyud): sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur// phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'// de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas// rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas// lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod
98a6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams 'tsho ba bsgrub par 'gyur// gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar// dam tshig chos ni ston par byed// de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i// gsang ba
98a7(rgyud): dgongs pas bshad pa yin// dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams// 'di yis thams cad dgug par bya// rang gi rjes rig mi shes na// de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur// de bas rjes su gzung don du//
98b1(rgyud): chub 'di dag ni gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur nas su// de bzhin gshegs pan padag po la// rang mchod de da mig ma /
98b2(rgyud): 'byung bas legs mchod de// phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa// 'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i/
98b3(rgyud): nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di// de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ gang yang
98b4(rgyud): 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so legs// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang // the tshom skye bar byed yin na// byang chub sems gzhan ci smos shes// de bzhin
98b5(rgyud): gshegs de rnams la gsungs// de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus// bcom ldan de
98b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs kun gyis// yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang // gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par// ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid bde la
98b7(rgyud): sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir// de ni yang dag bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni// de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su// ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags// ting 'dzin zhe sdang rigs
99a1(rgyud): 'byung ba// gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni// sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas// de nas yang dag phyung ba ni// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/
99a2(rgyud): zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur// mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor// zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar// bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin// rdo rje gsum 'dir de
99a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// dam tshig 'byung rdor zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod// de nas dzi na dzika
99a4(rgyud): ces pa'i// snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung // de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang // gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa// rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// dkar dang gnas/
99a5(rgyud): dang dmar bcas pa'i// zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur// de nas rin chen byung ba yi// dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas bder gshegs kun// bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir/
99a6(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// de nas rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya'i// snying po dpal ldan de tshe phyung // de ni byung ba tsam gyis ni// rigs dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ser dang
99a7(rgyud): dkar dang gnag pa yi// zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi// lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur// de yang byang du gzigs gyur te// mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas bcom
99b1(rgyud): ldan padag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 'dod chags chen po las byung ba// rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung // A ro lika
99b2(rgyud): ces bya snying ngo // rdo rje gsum las de nas byung // de nas byung ba tsam gyis ni// de 'ag bcom ldan gtso bo ni// rigs dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs// dmar dang dkar/
99b3(rgyud): dang gnag pa'i zhal// dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i/
99b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag byung // gtso bo de la snyoms zhugs nas// snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs// snying po pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces pa// rdo rje gsum zhes bya las 'byung /
99b5(rgyud): de nas byung ba tsam gyis ni// don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi// de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rigs dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal
99b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi// byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni// de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang // 'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba// 'dod dang thar pa rab
99b7(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'o// de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog gasku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// dam pa dag ni drung
100a1(rgyud): ngar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pa// mum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad// do ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po// gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog/ su dang gsung dang thugs/
100a2(rgyud): las byung // dwe Sha ra ti zhes byar grags// rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin nam// zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni// me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas rjes mnyes
100a3(rgyud): rdo rje grags// sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni// de ni mo ha ra ti ste// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang // rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste/
100a4(rgyud): zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong zhig/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis// bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas
100a5(rgyud): rjes chags rdo rje zhes/ bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// bde ba chen po byung ba ni// 'di ltar rA gA ra ti byung // zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can de// gtso bo bud med gzug
100a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur// gos med ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste// rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom
100a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can// bslu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun btsun mo mchog/ zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma/
100b1(rgyud): badz+ra ra ti zhes bya ba/ rdo rje gsum las byung bar gyur// de ni phyung ma thag tu yang // gtso bo rig ma skyes bur gyur// bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te// dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/
100b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan mgon po de// rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje gshed// khro bo chen po byung
100b3(rgyud): ba dang // phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bsnyengs par bya ba'i shar phyogs bzhugs// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mngon byung rdo rje
100b4(rgyud): zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// khro bo chen po phyung ba ni// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita rdo rje can// de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni// rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung // dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor
100b5(rgyud): pa las ka/ 'od chen phung bu'i gzugs lta bu// rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa// b+ha yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/
100b6(rgyud): gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor// rdo rje gsum las khro bo che// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita 'od po che// bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur// de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir// gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas/
100b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang // gsung gi tshul du rnam sprul zhing // gos med ye shes bla med pa// nub kyi sgor ni bzhugs par gyur// bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa// thugs kyi rdo rje
101a1(rgyud): ting 'dzin la// kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni// de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur// khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba// kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor/
101a2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang // mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// de la slar yang zhus gyur pa// mkha'/
101a3(rgyud): dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing // dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni// ji ltar de rnams zhu bar 'gyur// 'di dag thog mtha' yod min na//
101a4(rgyud): 'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur// phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la// 'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang // gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces// theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang // so so'i skye bo'i tshig
101a5(rgyud): gis kyang // spang ba dag kyang bgyed par 'gyur// gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni// de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i// zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs// de bzhin gshegs rnams
101a6(rgyud): bsten mdzad pa// rjes su spyod dang thun mong pa'i// bya ba de dag phyin ci log dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs de rnams mdzad pa// tshig gcig la ni dpag med don//
101a7(rgyud): gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni// mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni// dgongs pa gsang nga bla med
101b1(rgyud): ga dri ba rnams ni bshad par bya// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga// 'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas// pa ni/
101b2(rgyud): zhi gnas yin zhes bya// ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad// de bzhin nyid shes lus su gyur// ni ba rnal 'byor pa yi zas// ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi// sku yi gzugs bstan
101b3(rgyud): byas pa ltar// gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku// de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung // thugs kyi rnam pas thugs su ni// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // phung po la sogs chos rnams ni// stong
101b4(rgyud): zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong // ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs// zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed// de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// grib ma lta bur byung ba yin// de bzhin phung po
101b5(rgyud): khams la sogs// dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas// de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // de nas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong // gsang ba'i bdag po
101b6(rgyud): mnyan par gyis// stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar// rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni// phung po la sogs chos byung ba// lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni//
101b7(rgyud): phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur// 'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar// de las ting 'dzin skye bar gyur// 'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor// mi phyed rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// zab dang rgya chen rtog byang chub
102a1(rgyud): de rtogs pas ni sems dpar gyur// 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa// chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o// de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa// rdo rje theg par ston pa yin// ting nge
102a2(rgyud): 'dzin ni de nyid las// rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin// 'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing // de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// dgongs don de bzhin nyid gcig pu// gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshan/
102a3(rgyud): ma skyes pa las byung ba ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin// bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de// phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas// 'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas// rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad//
102a4(rgyud): lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur bshad gang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// 'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang dag gis// phung po lnga po
102a5(rgyud): brtags 'gyur ba// de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can// der ni bdag gis bdag nyid
102a6(rgyud): mthong // dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// phung po de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid las spro bya ba// chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi// mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro// 'di ni spros dang bsdus/
102a7(rgyud): pa dag/ de ni dga' bar yongs su grags// sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig/ de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad do// yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis te// mkha' dbyings dbyer med rab sbyor ba'i//
102b1(rgyud): de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor cher// bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba gang // dbang po thams cad bde skyed pa'i// yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur/
102b2(rgyud): zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang // mthong zhing de la phung po sogs// lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ba// de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin// dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog/ mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug
102b3(rgyud): 'on kyang so sor 'gyur ba ste// chos kyi sku las zhe sdang 'gyur// bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung zhing // mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can// de nyid bdag po kun byed pa'o// /
102b4(rgyud): dam tshig la sogs 'byung ba'i chos// rang gis rig par ma gyur kyang // der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad// de ni gti mug de bzhin sems// gang gis ji ltar brtags chos kyis// longs spyod rdzogs zhes
102b5(rgyud): bya byed pa// de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung // rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa// 'dod chags
102b6(rgyud): chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ ji ltar 'dab dbus pad+ma ni// de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog/ 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// 'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab// de nyid rdo/
102b7(rgyud): rje rigs mchog yin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'i// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// rdo rje dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso// ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas dud med/
103a1(rgyud): gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur// gsum po yang dang 'dug gyur pa// gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin// pad+ma bgegs 'gyur khro bo ste// mthar byed mtha' yi ming can no// 'jug pa la
103a2(rgyud): sogs gsum nyid la// phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs// skrag byed gshin rje gshed kyis kyang // thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje dam tshig skrag par byed// de bzhin shes rab mthar byed
103a3(rgyud): gtso/ pad+mo'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur// 'chi bral rnal 'byor grub pa yin// bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso// rags pa'i bdag nyid can bdag po// 'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa// gsang
103a4(rgyud): ba'i lus kyis rnam par spyod// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur ba// des ni de bzhin bya ba dang // de nas gsang ba yang dag 'byung // mu zhu mas kyis bu gso bzhin//
103a5(rgyud): srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso// sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du// chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis// sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las// bcom ldan gas pa/
103a6(rgyud): ba gongs mdzad ga// bden pa mayin brgyun pa'ang men// snang gnyi mag rin chen dang // 'dod chags sna tshogs rigs byung ba// dgangs pa'i rigs kyi brgyar gyur pas// gleng gni nyon byeng nga ba/
103a7(rgyud): da ma de bzhi nag shegs padag la// slang yang de bzhin gshegs pa bum/ lhag par badzod la byas nas me 'thung chen dal 'dzig gsol// dam ma pa'i rje ma
103b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi// zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing // byang chub sems dpa' yongs//
103b2(rgyud): rtog pa// khru nyid kyis ni rnam mkhyen pa// de nas byang chub sems kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs// lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin dag ni tshig brjod blta'i// byang chub sem
103b3(rgyud): nibla med pa// khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la// ston pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// sku dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung // de 'drin
103b4(rgyud): tshul du sbyar nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma kun tu bzang po yi// rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa// skye ba med
103b5(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis ni// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje 'i//
103b6(rgyud): ti 'dzin la skang sa zhugs nas// dngal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs// dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na// dengs dang dngos nid gnyis ka'ang min// de ltar dngas pa ngas med pas// rnamapa
103b7(rgyud): dngos po song ba'im// de nas dpal ldan rnam sda mdzad// de ba'i na gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rnga grags// ting nge 'dzin la noms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa su gyi
104a1(rgyud): mchog/ gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can// byang chub sems ni thams cad nus// de ni yang dag bka' stsal to// dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// phung po dmas sogs rnams spangs
104a2(rgyud): shing // gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa// rten cing 'brel 'byung ming can te// thog ma med nas ma skyes bdag/ rang sems
104a3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyang yin// de nas mi bskyod de bzhin sems// kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i// ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas// /
104a4(rgyud): phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med// nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i// bdag med byang chub ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal// bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms
104a5(rgyud): zhugs nas// byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//
104a6(rgyud): de nas 'o dpag med mtshan can// ye shes 'bar ba sgon rdo rje// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang med/
104a7(rgyud): rnam sa nga'i tshul du sbyor bams// dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad// de nas de bzhin gdon mi'o// pil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// chos
104b1(rgyud): 'ang bzhi 'od gas pa nyid// masong nas dgapas mkha' dang mchungs/ byang chub med cing dod rtogs med// byang chung sams na don par bshad// ded dang rdzu di/ rlung chung
104b2(rgyud): thos pa dang // dgongs pa'i don ni rang bshad par// rdu par snang mdud che la gsungs// dngos po med cing dmigs med pa// byung chung sems dang 'amakha' dang mtshung sa// gsang pa'i tsho ri 'ang rjes rnas
104b3(rgyud): dang po rin rtog pa skye// lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor ngas// sems ni de rnams skyed par byed// yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar// 'di las sa skye ngo ste// drung pa'i gsung ni de rnams la// rang gi sna ba 'in
104b4(rgyud): 'dzin par byed// bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du// 'gro ba'i don du bka' stsal cig/ de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'di// rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che// legs shes lan gsum gsungs nas ni/
104b5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs// rnam par mi rtog don de nyid// rab tu bya ste bshad par bya// tshig tu brjod pa dmigs par bshad// brda dang don dam pa yin no// rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang // mdo dang
104b6(rgyud): gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi// byang chub sems 'di bla na med// de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di// dgongs pa'i gsang ba bla na med// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje dang //
104b7(rgyud): pad+ma de las skyed par byed// tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste// sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs can yin// gsang sngags de nyid ces bya ba rnga// de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o// dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na// gang zhig
105a1(rgyud): bcu yis ma bcings pa// de ni bcings med ces bya ste// de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas// dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste// grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa// as bcings ngan tshun
105a2(rgyud): sbyor ba las// gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla// gang zhig shes pa rnam grol ba// 'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa// de ni de nyid grub 'dod pa// gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa// 'byung ba'i mthag/
105a3(rgyud): ni yang dag ldan// cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas// lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar// yi ge aM bcas ring por bcas// yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs// thung ngu ma
105a4(rgyud): lus ngag tu 'gyur// gcig min du ma ma yin no// ya yi don gyis gang yang rung // bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa// ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis// 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug/ yi ge gang/
105a5(rgyud): zhig sngar bshad dang // gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams// bud med skyes pa mi ning ste// khams la sogs par rab tu brtag/ 'og nas steng du bcas par ni// shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar/
105a6(rgyud): drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig/ dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung // de ni ya sogs don sbyar na// dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'khrul bzhin// 'gro ba rnams
105a7(rgyud): ni d+hum bar bya// brjod pa'i'i sngags 'di dag/ ngos med ngo bolas byungab// doni mongs su gyur po'i gzugs/ lha run par mtshan pa gang // 'a rnams de nyi gsum garnas pa// rang bzhin bzlam pa'i
105b1(rgyud): ba byed pa/ mas brjod papar bste/ dung chub semam mchog 'didzin mo// 'dus ma cig d+hA dag khyo na ci 'o cu gas btun / l+h+wang ra
105b2(rgyud): bya pa mya rgya pas du sa la/ ba gyu sas ma/ sa nga gi sa na sa ngas su spya smra
105b3(rgyud): bo nyid// byang chub sems gcig yang dag 'byung // rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can// gang 'di byang chu sams dag nyid// rnam 'byor ni nyi nga 'gyur// 'don ra ga sun rgyal dang // gas na/
105b4(rgyud): la ni 'jug par 'gyur// sreg dang sems dang bde can dang // kun par 'jug pa'i me bzhin no// 'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar// sems can kun lha rnam par gnas// byang chu ba sems 'dod bdag nyid de/
105b5(rgyud): babu gcig bzhin lha zhing // gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa// byams pa chen po de bskyed bya// phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas// byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung // des ni snying rje cher gyur nas// des ni 'a
105b6(rgyud): ba nges par 'joms// sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag/ byang chub sems las ma mthong na// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa// de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// 'khor ba dngos po yod min la// sems can
105b7(rgyud): rnams kyang de dang 'dra// byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni// btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing // slar yang de don mtshan nyid ni// rnam par snang //
106a1(rgyud): mdzad che la zhus// 'khor dang cig shos zhes bya ba// 'di kun byang chub sems yin na// ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni// phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag
106a2(rgyud): nyid la// gnyis su 'gog byed gang yang med// gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung // mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang // dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog/ 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bdad pas// sems
106a3(rgyud): can kha cig gzir ba dang // byang chub sems la'ang sbyar bar gyur// de lha'i rnam rtog kun rtog par// ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi// rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro//
106a4(rgyud): dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la// byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir// dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje can la gsang dgod /
106a5(rgyud): pa shin tu rnyed dka' byang chub sems// de ni yang dag bka' stsal to// phyi ma'i mtha' gang spong pa gcig/ sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te// sems de mngon du byas nas ni// ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin//
106a6(rgyud): sems ni de mas ma mthong bas// lba ba so sor gyur pa yin// de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru// 'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur// des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug che la kun tu brten// zla ba nyis bya ba'i/
106a7(rgyud): kun tu spyod pa de rnams byed// sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang // dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang // de bzhin gzhon dag dbul bar yang // skyabs skad cig dag gos 'am// le dgas su'ang 'thong dang /
106b1(rgyud): gro ba cwa tshogs dag tu 'gro// gang chem makun brten pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'du shes can dang 'dugs med// sems san du brnags 'di gnas pa// dems rnyang+ya ngas drung ba /
106b2(rgyud): rlung las skur yang 'gas pa yin// nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis snang // rang gi rnam par rtog par lhung // de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhinA du// sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'tsho// mjog pa mi se sa dza na/
106b3(rgyud): ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang // de ni phyin ci log gyur pas// khyi dang ce spyang glang po dang // sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin du ni ngag nyid dang // mi yi rigs ni sdig mkhan dang // sme sha can dang /
106b4(rgyud): rigs ngan dang // bza' dang mi bza' bya kun tu// byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur// bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes// byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// phung sogs dngos po med 'gyur las//
106b5(rgyud): rang gi myong ba shes par 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad// 'jig rten pa ni byang chub sems// nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas sku ru 'ad 'byung ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid//
106b6(rgyud): tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la// phyag 'tshal nas ni slar gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni// byang chub
106b7(rgyud): sems ni rab gsungs nas// ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa// ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs// lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir// khyed kyi chos rnams ston mdzad na// ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid// lta ba
107a1(rgyud): de ni rab bstan 'gyur// dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams// gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas// gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes// de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to// de nas
107a2(rgyud): bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// khyed gsung dgongs pa ma rtogs pa// 'dri bar byed pa legs so zhes// byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing // nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa// sems
107a3(rgyud): can kun gyi srog gyur gang // lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa// ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du 'gyur// rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems// dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin//
107a4(rgyud): ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las// rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin// 'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa// 'dir ni de la brten pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams// de nyid gsum
107a5(rgyud): gnas la brten nas// de kun byang chub sems kyi byed// ji srid 'jig rten btags pa dang // de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam rtog byang chub sems zhes pa'i// rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin//
107a6(rgyud): bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi// sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di// phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam// shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni 'gro/
107a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par// bdag por bdag nyid zlos pa de// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis// dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa// byang chub sems kyi
107b1(rgyud): rlung gcig bu// dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas// nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin// 'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang // ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyangs kyi thung du nyin mor bshad// ring po mtshan ma
107b2(rgyud): yin par bshad// dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las// de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya// e ma'o 'gro ba'i byang byung // de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal// de las 'jig rten pa yi brda// myur du mngon par shes
107b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang // gtso bo rnam snang chen po las// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa/ sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs
107b4(rgyud): gzugs can sems 'di ni// de bas dngos po med gyur kyang // srid pa dag tu rab tu grags// byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa// legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po//
107b5(rgyud): skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol// sgrub pa yin ni thabs tsam zhigashes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs// 'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes// ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag
107b6(rgyud): rin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig/ des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi shes so// de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skal med chos kun rnams spangs la// rig pa yang ni mi mthong
107b7(rgyud): bas de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur// de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi// de ni smra bar rigs pa yin// 'brel ba'i nyi ma thob pa ni// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna
108a1(rgyud): tshogs pas// grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa las// byang chub sems kyis nges pa'i don// slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa// nang na ma yin phyi rol min// gnyis ka ming du'ang 'gyur ma
108a2(rgyud): yin/ rtag pa ma yin skad cig min// de ni so so rang rig yin// mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du// byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byung //
108a3(rgyud): 'das dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang // da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang // sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba// don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin// rig byed dus dang me yi sgra// nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te// bzhi
108a4(rgyud): phyed gsum pa dag las byung // byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid// de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel// de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang // ha ni so la gnas pa yang // gnas skabs ji snyed de bzhin
108a5(rgyud): du ming ni yod pa ma yin pa// de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur// rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa// bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin// lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni// tsheg drag bcas pa'i rlung yin no//
108a6(rgyud): rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin// nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo// de dang ldan pa byang chub sems// bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung // yod med rab tu bzhi pa can//
108a7(rgyud): dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni// rang rig gcig pu'i spyod yul yin// de nyid don ni rig byed pa// dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di// chos kyi yi ge mchog thos
108b1(rgyud): nas// byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas// cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// e ma'o/
108b2(rgyud): chos ni ston mdzad pa// dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu// dag pa'i de nyid don dag ste// rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med chos las yang dag
108b3(rgyud): byung // byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa// ngo bo med cing dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung // dgongs don byang chub ster pa po// byang chub spyod/
108b4(rgyud): mchog rdo rje mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal
108b5(rgyud): lo la dgongs pa lung ston la dad par// gang gis yid ni bzod gyur pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las// des ni de bzhin bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/
108b6(rgyud): yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa// le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje// gsum dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog/ rnam thar gsum dang dkon
108b7(rgyud): mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// 'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje dang // ting nge 'dzin la sems zhugs te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs// rdo rje bkod/
109a1(rgyud): pa mchog 'di yi// le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// phra mo rnal 'byor dag pa zhugs// oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan// shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste/
109a2(rgyud): dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin// badz+ra zhes bya bzhi pa'o// swa b+hA ba at+ma kaHlnga par grags// a haM zhes pa drug par brjod// de ltar bder gshegs drug pa ni// skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin// oM shU n+ya tra
109a3(rgyud): zung dang po'o// dz+nyA na badz+ra gnyis pa yin// swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM gyur// de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o// de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par// mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no// mkha' dbus
109a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po// yi ge ma yin 'od kyis khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po'o// 'dod yon lnga yis kun tu khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor/
109a5(rgyud): na de ltar bsgoms nas su// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya mchog/ de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi// phyag rgya yang ni rnam par
109a6(rgyud): bsgom// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che// tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang // tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // de bzhin don yod gzugs can rgya// sangs rgyas
109a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gcig pa 'jigs 'jigs lha// 'dzam du chu bo'i gser 'od/
109b1(rgyud): 'dra sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs// de ni phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgoms// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan// rang 'bar lag na 'a/
109b2(rgyud): lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mar gang ta yi 'od 'dra// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// 'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab// rin chen de la rnam par bsgoms/
109b3(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po rdo rje can// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing // thor tsugs cod pan ngag gis brgyan// phyag na pad+mang sdams par bsgoms// sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za// 'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba// zhi
109b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgoms// de ltar rnal 'byor bshad pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang // de bzhin gshegs bdag la
109b5(rgyud): zhus pa// phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur// cig shos phyi rol du bsgoms pa//
109b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni// dngos po med pa'i dngos po la// sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag/ mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di// dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol ces// gang zhig ma 'ongs
109b7(rgyud): ba rnams ni// 'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal// lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa// phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes// 'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// rnam lnga mngon par
110a1(rgyud): byang chub 'di// ma 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur te// chos ni yang dag sdud 'gyur gang // ji lta ji ltar ston par byed// phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur// byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung //
110a2(rgyud): de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa// de nyid gnyis med sbyor bas so// ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni// blo yi dngos grub ston pa po// thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni// phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag
110a3(rgyud): mi gsal gsal bar rang dag sbyor// dngos med de bo las skyes pa'o// gzod ma nyid nas rang grub pa// gcig drang du ma rnam spangs pa// rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste// dngos po thams cad gcig/
110a4(rgyud): tu byung // bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin ser// dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste// bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang // gos dkar
110a5(rgyud): la sogs yang dag bri// de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas// zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min dang // steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og/ ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang //
110a6(rgyud): chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la// bco brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad// de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad// ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni// mar gsar gnas par gyur pa yin// de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la//
110a7(rgyud): zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so// gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos// mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin// mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin// rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin// 'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i
110b1(rgyud): bdag/ de bzhin nyid ni ni zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub dbyung // sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid// shes rab thabs
110b2(rgyud): la gnas nas ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// bya ba thams cad nyid du yang // rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la// ming med brjed du med pa dang // dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu babla/
110b3(rgyud): dgos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa// brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga// bzhi pa legs par bsdus pa yis// sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu// dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa// nyi shu rtsa
110b4(rgyud): bzhi'i rim gyis ni// de ni so sor 'byung ba las// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin// klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi// 'on
110b5(rgyud): kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad// de ltar rnam pa mang po yi// 'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus// gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs
110b6(rgyud): 'gro thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog/ snying po bcom ldan pa shad du gsol// de nyid gsum gnyis med sbyor ba// de ni phra mo'i rdo rje sgom// myur ba la sogs gsum
110b7(rgyud): spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor par yang bdag cag 'gyur// de ni bdag rig yid ches shing // zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur// phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te// log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu bsten// ston
111a1(rgyud): pa po yi sbyor ba bzhin// phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni// ma 'ongs dus na spong gyur pa// de nyid de ni nges par byed// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i// lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang // de bzhin
111a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun bdag po// chos nyid ngo bo nyid ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad// dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas// gsang sngags 'di ni
111a3(rgyud): bka' stsal to// su gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad// khyad par du ni byin rlob pa// gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// de ni yang dag bshad par bya// oM nr-i dang por shes par bya// d+harma zhes bya
111a4(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// d+hA tu zhes bya gsum par bshad// swa b+hA bar grags bzhi pa'o// At+ma kaHnI lnga pa yin// a haM du gyur drug par 'dod// sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu// sgom pa bdag nyid can gyis
111a5(rgyud): bsgoms// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// nyams dga'i ri rab rtse mo ru// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsgom// rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro// mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi
111a6(rgyud): bya/ sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba// mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag
111a7(rgyud): nyid can gyis spro// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// rin chen lha bu'i dkyil 'khor
111b1(rgyud): du dngos la brtson pas rin chen bsgom// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du bri bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dkyil
111b2(rgyud): 'khor las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o// dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi// lung ston dam pa 'di la ni// gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin byed pa yin// de
111b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje phra mo de nyid las// 'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog/ le'u gsum pa nyid yin no// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad// gnyis
111b4(rgyud): su med par gyur nas ni// slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la// bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa// chos kun gcig tu
111b5(rgyud): bdag med pa// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol// yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa
111b6(rgyud): bshad du gsol// ye shes spyod pa'i don las byung // zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba po// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag/
111b7(rgyud): sems ni kun tu bzang po nyid// sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po//
112a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog/ 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la// thugs de dkyil 'khor/
112a2(rgyud): 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam pa bka' stsal to// de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya//
112a3(rgyud): 'di ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ legs sgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o// sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni// mtshan ma bzang por de bshad do// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ gnyis su med pa
112a4(rgyud): mdzes pa yin// shes rab 'di ni thig yin te// thabs ni de yi rjes 'jug pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig
112a5(rgyud): gdab ste// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yin// bsdu dngos bzhi grags sgo yin te// re re'ang bzhi yi ming can no//
112a6(rgyud): chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda// 'khor lo'i nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma ste// rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgyu// rnam pa lnga yis rab bye ba'i// rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o// shar nas
112a7(rgyud): me long ngo bo ni// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin// gcig gi ming can rin po che// nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// byang du gong ma'i
112b1(rgyud): sems gang yin// 'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa// bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur// 'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te// sprin 'od dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od//
112b2(rgyud): lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba// mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje// nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba// dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin// byang shar ut+pal ltar snang ba'i// btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra// de
112b3(rgyud): bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni// tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas// de bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa// dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar// nub tu don spyod ces bya ba// rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o//
112b4(rgyud): don 'thun pa ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'khyil ba'i rdo rje can// phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'di ni legs par bshad pa yin// ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni// rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur/
112b5(rgyud): ba yin// dang por chen po yod pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang // shes nas 'gro la phan par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung /
112b6(rgyud): de tshe zla gzer 'phreng ba yi// skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas// lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming // ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni// bud med ces ni nges par bshad// zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa/
112b7(rgyud): mdangs bzang 'od ni yin par gsungs// rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te// ye shes kha phye me tog go/ dngos po med pa rigs yin te// kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do// chos dbyings nyid kyi/
113a1(rgyud): bud med ni// shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par byas// nang na ma yin phyi ma yin// gnyis kar ma yin gzhan nas min// gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur// de bas
113a2(rgyud): mA ma kIr bshad do// de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do// nam mkha' dang ni gcig tu gnas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de bas yul du rnam brtags//
113a3(rgyud): pa/ nga sdu dag ni bshang ba yin// ye shes dbang po sbyong pa gcin// rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa// de
113a4(rgyud): nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste// dngos med pa ni dbul ba yin// de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa// de rnams ji
113a5(rgyud): skad bshad pa nyid// mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa// gsar pa nyid du bkal legs dang // shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi// thig gi mkhas pas thig gdab bo// blo ldan dkyil 'khor
113a6(rgyud): brtag bya ba// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// rtsa babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste// de
113a7(rgyud): las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams rtog/ gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzugs kyis dbang bskur ba// dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag/ yid ni rtag
113b1(rgyud): tu mkha' dang mtshungs// dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das// 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spang // len pa ma yin gtong ba min// med pa ma yin gnas ma yin// blo ldan kun tu 'di shes pa/
113b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni// nges pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad// dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa/
113b3(rgyud): de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni// ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
113b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ rdo rje gsum bdag 'gro ba'i bla// slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod don gyis de nyid zhus// sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa cig/ khyad par du ni bsrung
113b5(rgyud): bslab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung // spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig/ gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu/
113b6(rgyud): gsungs pa don can bka' stsal to// mi rtog don las yang dag byung // zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin// dngos med la gnas gti mug ste// 'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba// 'dod
113b7(rgyud): chags ldan pa'i ming can yin// theg pa mchog ni bla med pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad// dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub bo// rigs ngan myur bar shes
114a1(rgyud): par bya// smig mkhan dag ni ngal ba yin// mtshams med byed pa gnyis ka ste// gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par
