114a2(rgyud): 'gyur// sems can sdig chen byas pa dang // gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po// gang yang slob dpon spyod pa yis// bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di nyid dad pas myur du ni// zhe sdang dag la
114a3(rgyud): gnas pas gnas// gang zhig phung sogs dngos med par// zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas// de ni srog gcod byed pa ste// theg pa mchog la gnas pa yin// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag/ rten
114a4(rgyud): 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni// de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste// gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang // de ni rdzas su shes bya ste// de 'phrog dang tshul gang yin pa//
114a5(rgyud): gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod// gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa// de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba// sems can de de 'dod la dga'// sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur// de yi stong nyid gti mug la//
114a6(rgyud): yul ni bshad pa zhes grags te// dbang po gci ba zhes bya la// de dag zhi ba za ba yin// theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// de tshe brdzun de 'dod pa dang // bshang gci zas su
114a7(rgyud): byed pa po// shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab// chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu// gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa// longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin// de nyid sring mo
114b1(rgyud): yin par 'dod// rang lnga'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya// bshang gci zas su byed pa yi// sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de// sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya// ma dang
114b2(rgyud): sring mo bu mo ni// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas// theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la// dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo// ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni// kun tu khyab par gnas gyur pa// 'di ni sgom pa zhes
114b3(rgyud): bshad de// ting 'dzin bsam mi khyab ces bya// de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba// rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no// sangs rgyas yul gyi ye shes la// 'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te// rnam par mi rtog/
114b4(rgyud): sbyor gcig gis// myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsungs ni// sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// thos nas ngo mtshar rmad
114b5(rgyud): du gyur// 'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa// de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung // 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang /
114b6(rgyud): gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang // zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i// rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing // gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang // 'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa// 'di ni de
114b7(rgyud): byed sems can rnams// snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam// de nas mgon po thugs rje can// sems can kun la phan dgyes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la
115a1(rgyud): gsungs pa// 'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa// sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa// chu khams rtog dang bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag po me yi gzugs/
115a2(rgyud): can te// thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor// de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu// bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs// thams cad snang zhing za ba po// de nyid
115a3(rgyud): bdag nyid bdag yin par// bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing // sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyis// byang chub spyod pa'i
115a4(rgyud): mchog 'di yin// de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de// sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//
115a5(rgyud): kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad// gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung // gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// byang chub
115a6(rgyud): sems dpa' brgyal ba ru// gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol// mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar// 'di rnams bslang
115a7(rgyud): bar mdzad du gsol// mi g.yo ba 'di gsang ba ste// zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa// 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med//
115b1(rgyud): yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu// 'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis// bye brag mang por gyur pa yin// nam mkha'i mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te// de yang de bzhin
115b2(rgyud): gshegs mchog dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid gyur// de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang // zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas// ye shes lus can ye shes can// brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni// yan lag
115b3(rgyud): dbye ba gang dang gang // 'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag po// de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa// de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu/
115b4(rgyud): 'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur// des ni bden 'di ma shes pas// dbyangs bcas brgyal la bskul ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//
115b5(rgyud): brgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba rdo rje gsum// dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa bdag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas// ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad// gnyis su med par
115b6(rgyud): mnyam rdo rje// 'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i// 'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yi// 'od gang chen por gyur pa yin//
115b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas// rang gi stan la gnas par gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang // dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas// chos kyi dbyangs/
116a1(rgyud): ni 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba// bdag med chos ni yang dag dag/ chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i
116a2(rgyud): don dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung // rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs// dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // rdo rje dpying /
116a3(rgyud): gcig rdzogs longs spyod// nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste// spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan// de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa// spyod
116a4(rgyud): pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig spyod mchog 'di rten pa// gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag/ de ni ci dga' bar yang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa
116a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi// spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin/ de nas dpal chen mi bskyod pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
116a6(rgyud): gsang ba can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i// gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin// oM zhes bya ba dang po yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// tsit+ta gsum
116a7(rgyud): par yongs su brtag/ badz+ra bzhi pa'i gong mar ldan// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa// a haM dus kyi ming can yin// sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no// de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje
116b1(rgyud): zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// spu ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung // oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad// sarba tra thA ga ta gnyis// kA ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste// badz+ra rigs
116b2(rgyud): byed yin par bsgrags// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko 'dod lha// a he skem byed ces brjod de// dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags// shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya// de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i/ kun tu
116b3(rgyud): mi gnyis rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsung // oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// bAka ces bya ba gsum pa yin// badz+ra dus
116b4(rgyud): kyi ming du 'gyur// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa// a haM zhes pa drug pa ste// gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams// re re zhing drug gsum du bshad// thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung // rim dang rim pa min
116b5(rgyud): pas gsung // bdag po las ni gcig pu las// rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung // yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung // de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bas 'di ni sgom pa mchog/ g.yel ba
116b6(rgyud): med par rdzogs par bya// 'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa// rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing // sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya// de nas dkon mcho
116b7(rgyud): dpal 'di yang // smin ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM ni zung gi dang por ldan// sarba ta thA ga ta zung // de bzhin nyid ni
117a1(rgyud): ye shes tshogs// thams cad me long ming can no// a nu rA ga skye med de// de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs// rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i// badz+ra yang ni bzhi par
117a2(rgyud): gyur dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko zhes bshad// ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming // chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// a haM so son rdzogs longs spyod// dngos po med pa'i rang
117a3(rgyud): bzhin can// bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa// mched pa drug pa'i ming can no// dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can// de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog/ de lha'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs//
117a4(rgyud): mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya// de nas dpal chen gdon mi za// don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// des ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan//
117a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// pU dza rnam par thar pa'i ming // badz+ra sems ni rnam sgom pa// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko zhes bshad// a haM pha rol phyin zhes bya// lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro//
117a6(rgyud): reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings// de dag dngos med gyur byas pa// de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin// mig sogs zhes las yang dag byung // mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes// mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams
117a7(rgyud): kyis/ myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po// thub pa chen pos yang gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs la dmigs/
117b1(rgyud): pa la// gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa// de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba// dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur// bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing // lus dang ngag kyang rnam par sgom// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
117b2(rgyud): gnas sgom zhing // sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya// rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na// shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin// sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis// sgom pa med cing byang chub med// rdo rje gsum
117b3(rgyud): gcig mtshan nyid du// mdor na rnam par brtags nas su// sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa
117b4(rgyud): kun gyis mchod// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis// bsgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs/
117b5(rgyud): ni rnam bsgoms nas// phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya// yung kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can// rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan// de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam// blo ldan ye shes kyis
117b6(rgyud): brtags pa'i// gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo// gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste// de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor sgom//
117b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas bzhag go/ dbang phyug chen po skem byed de// gzhi phyed nam mkha' mtshon pa dag/ bdud rtsi zhes ni btags pa gang // de ni hUM zhes bya bar 'gyur// nam
118a1(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong sgom// spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo gnyis sgom pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
118a2(rgyud): gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du rnam par sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid sgom/
118a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dgod pa// 'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor// ut+pal mtho na ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che// gnas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam//
118a4(rgyud): tsa na ka li 'bru tshod tsam// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse// byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya// 'khor lo la sogs sgom pa ni// de yi khyad par dag tu brtag/ yid 'ong
118a5(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi gnas// byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o// sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs// mdor na de ni spro bar bya// gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa// rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par
118a6(rgyud): bya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po// dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog/ 'gro kun don du ston pa pos// gsang ba mchog ni bka' stsal to// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // zla phyed zla ba lo
118a7(rgyud): yi dus// bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni// skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad// zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin// dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste/
118b1(rgyud): dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs// gzugs dang snga dang ror ldan pa// rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug sgom// mchod chen de ni byas nas su// gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par sgom// yul dang dbang po/
118b2(rgyud): sems pa ni// bshang gci zas su byed pa po// byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni// bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o// de nyid 'di ni bla med pa// byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o// rtog med 'dus
118b3(rgyud): ni ma byas shing // mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur// ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de// sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o// bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa// sha zhes bya bar de bshad do// nam mkha' mtha'
118b4(rgyud): yas rnal 'byor ni// sha chen de ni yin par bshad// gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub// dam tshig chen po glang chen rta// de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha// phung po la
118b5(rgyud): sogs rigs dbye bas// gang gsungs mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so// gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas// bsam gtan dga' ba'i ming gcig pu// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan 'jig rten pa/
118b6(rgyud): bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen brtag pa dang // de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'di dag zas su kun tu bshad// de nas
118b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum dgongs pa// bcom ldan 'das las thos pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol pa// nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // phra mo'i rnal 'byor
119a1(rgyud): ston mdzad cing // mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni// 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs// chu dang 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin// khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'jig
119a2(rgyud): rten 'ga' las yang dag pa// ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len// ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yi// skyes bu la la de bsres 'thung // de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams
119a3(rgyud): 'thung // dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du// gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog
119a4(rgyud): gis/ grags ldan lag na rdo rje la// bu khyed legs so cher legs te// bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya// rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang // de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams// 'di dag 'jig
119a5(rgyud): rten pa rnams te// bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas// rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas// 'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin// de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang // de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin//
119a6(rgyud): gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das// rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa// de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs// brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis// sangs
119a7(rgyud): rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing // blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis// byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang // rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur// gzi ldan
119b1(rgyud): spongs kyis phyug pa dang // mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang // mthong ngam tshig gi bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed// gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang
119b2(rgyud): chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa// gsang nga yang dag srung ba po/
119b3(rgyud): de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste// dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i// le'u drug pa yin par bshad//
119b4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang // dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig/ ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/ mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so// de nyid dam tshig bzhi po gang /
119b5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad ces te bshad// de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis// ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya// rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya/ de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'das pa/
119b6(rgyud): zhi nyid// dka' thub myur ba de yin la// sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod// mi zad pa ni gnyis ka ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang // gzungs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgom
119b7(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub// tha dad yi ge slong mo yin// de 'don pa ni za ba ste// gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de// de dge slong mo za bar 'dod// dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing /
120a1(rgyud): sdom pa mi bzang nyid kyang min// 'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod cing // sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas// rdo rje gsum dbye ba de gnas na// sngags rig byang chub thob par 'gyur//
120a2(rgyud): gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang // mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang // rdzogs
120a3(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing // byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya// de ltar
120a4(rgyud): gzugs la gsum shes nas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar/
120a5(rgyud): byangab 'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos
120a6(rgyud): nr-i 'dzin pa'i gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams ni dbul bar bya// de nyid don yod rdo rje grags// sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang
120a7(rgyud): gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod me long gzugs can no// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang // gnyis ka rjes su mi dmigs pa// gzugs la sogs gsum de
120b1(rgyud): yin te// lha rnams la ni dngul bar bya// gzugs snga ro la sogs pa la// sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa ni// snying po sangs rgyas kun skyed de// mkhas pas
120b2(rgyud): gzugs sgra la sogs pa// lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgom// de bzhin rigs su sgom pa ni// sgom pas der ni bsgom par bya// nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad//
120b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor bas kyang // chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom// rdo rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje rjes dran sgom pa'o// rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang // chos dang longs
120b4(rgyud): spyod sprul skur byung // rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa// de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba
120b5(rgyud): sngo de sgom byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzhi pa dag ni re re bzhi// ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs// de nyid lo yi grangs yin te// bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis ban
120b6(rgyud): pa yi// bud med la grangs bcu drug pa// gzugs bzang phra dang mchod pa ni// dben pa zhes byar ba rtsam par bya// byin gyis brlabs nas yang 'ong ba// khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yi// de bzhin/
120b7(rgyud): gshegs pa btsun mo che// spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas dngos grub
121a1(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang de bzhin oM// ban kyang der ni bsgom par bya// de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab/
121a2(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste// gsang dang snying kha sna rtse ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni rtag tu sgom// gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur
121a3(rgyud): pas de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o// gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bar// bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rig/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya//
121a4(rgyud): nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten// b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming // rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung // rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste// b+ha ga ling ga yin par
121a5(rgyud): bsgrags// gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste// sangs rgyas gzugs su sgom pa'o// de las blo ldan gyis spro ba// ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas// mnyam pa med pas khyad par du// sangs
121a6(rgyud): rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o// chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyar// b+ha ga'i ling gar brtag pa'o// de nas ba spu'i bu ga las// 'bad
121a7(rgyud): pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i// 'di ni chos kyi bdag po yin// rdo rje rjes su dran pa sgom// dngos med gcig pu la sbyor ba// stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur//
121b1(rgyud): bya ga ling ga zhes bshad do// de nas ba spu'i bu gnas// rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu spro// rdo rje byang chub sems sgom nyid// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/
121b2(rgyud): mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros nas// rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// khre bo rjes dran sbyor ba la'ang // stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro bo'i ba spu'i
121b3(rgyud): bu ga nas// khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la// rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni// thub pa che la slar zhus pa// thung khyod
121b4(rgyud): kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las// sangs rgyas la sogs spro gyur pa// tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la// phyi dus kun rmongs skye ba ste/
121b5(rgyud): bde gshegs rnams kyi bdug pos ni// ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra// 'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan ma can// rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing // de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas//
121b6(rgyud): ji bzhin par ni rtogs par byed// mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu// sku med srid gsum bdag nyid can// dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod
121b7(rgyud): ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum// dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum// sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung // khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste// ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid/
122a1(rgyud): khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags// khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung // dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che// dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid// shes dang shes bya rnam par
122a2(rgyud): grol// de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas// dam tshig rjes su dran sgom pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad// rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan/
122a3(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni rang sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' sgom// dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid// dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las// rang gi tshangs pa
122a4(rgyud): rtag drangs te// rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya// sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga// sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig gsung rjes
122a5(rgyud): dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga// rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs// de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur// bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// kun
122a6(rgyud): tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang // sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid// spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar
122a7(rgyud): 'gyur// sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa sgom pa ni// rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin// gsung dang sku ni rnam sgom pa// de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid// rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi//
122b1(rgyud): sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni// de bas tshangs pa shin tu dbyung // dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du
122b2(rgyud): gsung // de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni// dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste// blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na// dngos grub sngags mchogazod par 'gyur// shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa// rjes su/
122b3(rgyud): dran pa zhes bshad do// pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa/ yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang zad pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rdzogs med// khams
122b4(rgyud): med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o// ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba gang // der ni ci yang brjod min zhing // ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa// dran pa de ni yin par bshad// ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba// mtshan ma
122b5(rgyud): med cing 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing // gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing // yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang // zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming // sangs
122b6(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing // de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya// rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te// bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las// rang gi khu bas
122b7(rgyud): mchod par bya// dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang // de ni dag par bshad pa yin// de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'di yis lus la mchod pa dang //
123a1(rgyud): khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni gang dag grub// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//
123a2(rgyud): gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa// de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur// de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid// de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag/ mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang // gsung gi dbang bskur ba
123a3(rgyud): nyid gsal// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de ni ci dgar spyod par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
123a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste// sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa// le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// / de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs// dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po//
123a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la// bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba
123a6(rgyud): btab// nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che// theg pa chen po'i rnam snang ba// kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang // dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog/ rigs
123a7(rgyud): mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol// 'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che// gti mug chen po blo gros che// theg pa
123b1(rgyud): gsum po rabaston cing // rdo rje theg pa ston pa 'o// nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che// rdo rje gsum po chags med pa// rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsol/
123b2(rgyud): rdo rje gsun po lam gyi mchog/ thar lam gcig pu ston pa po// sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag/ byang chub sems
123b3(rgyud): ni rgya mtsho che// chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba// rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don// sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad// bdag med med chos shin tu
123b4(rgyud): dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po// kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin par/
123b5(rgyud): na chung mig yangs btsal nas ni// gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag/ rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi// sa phyogs su ni rgyal
123b6(rgyud): bdag nyid// zhi ba zhi pa'i gnas yid 'ong // bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rang ster ba'o// rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung
123b7(rgyud): po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes// rdo rje gsum po mi byed khams// rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste// len pa mi gsal la sbyor la// de nyid na chung yin par brtag sa 'jig
124a1(rgyud): rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa// gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa// mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin// gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te//
124a2(rgyud): rnam par dben pa dngos med pa// sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs// bshang gci yul dang dbang por
124a3(rgyud): grags// chu ni shes rab la sogs drug/ 'di dag gis gang byugs gyur pa// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do// mchod pa'i
124a4(rgyud): yan lag gnyis pa yis// bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad// 'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi bo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying kha ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang // rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa//
124a5(rgyud): rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni// rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par sgom// bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par// brtul zhugs can
124a6(rgyud): gyis snying khar sgom// chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni// mA ma kI ra ni yongs su brtag/ zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas// bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya// rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni// 'od zer sna tshogs
124a7(rgyud): nyid kyis brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa// gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba// blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las// ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i
124b1(rgyud): sprin ni des spro bya// gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod// rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma// me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni// de yi mi gsal zhi la gnas// sgron mar ut+pal nyid gyur pa// rlung sde sbyor ba lnga
124b2(rgyud): pa'o// 'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang // de bzhin sdang ba'i ming can no// de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba// lha rnams kyi yang dngos
124b3(rgyud): med nyid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las// me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni// rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ru 'ongs
124b4(rgyud): su brtag pa yin// re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya// me tog de lnga gsum du bshad// bya rgod me tog za ba dang // bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing // me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni// ma 'ongs skye bos mi shes so//
124b5(rgyud): ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi// dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar bdag ni sbrul min zhes// smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod// de ltar bdag nyid kyis spad pas// sangs rgyas thams cad
124b6(rgyud): smad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad snad gyur pas// mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min// phyi rol na min gnyis kar min// tshogs pa las ni ma yin te// rkyen gyis 'gro ba
124b7(rgyud): dag la gnas// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas// lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus// des ni bdag dang de dag spong // de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir
125a1(rgyud): dgongs pas de ni bshar du gsol// rang gi ngo bom 'tshal na// mkhas padag ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa// nyin dang /
125a2(rgyud): mtshan mo dbyed yis// me tog don ni bshad par bya// pad+ma ut+pa la nyin mor bshad// dzA ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad// lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur// de
125a3(rgyud): yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad// mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// 'jug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang // dgongs pas yongs su brtag/
125a4(rgyud): pa yin// de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur// de bas lha tshogs kyis de min// rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams// dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya// dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni// de rnam
125a5(rgyud): kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa// de ni pad+ma ut+pal ming // de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum// dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod// kar ni ka dang ma li ka/ yug ti ka ra hI
125a6(rgyud): ra ni// go rims bzhin tu spyan sogs te// sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro// dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas// gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i// mchod pa chen
125a7(rgyud): bor de 'gyur ro// lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag/ lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur byas// de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni// dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro// der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs
125b1(rgyud): rnams rab tu dgod par bya// pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang // de bzhin ut+pal rtag tu sgom// dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa// dpag tshad rgya khyon de nyid gsum// byams pa la sogs thu bzhir 'gyur// mdzes/
125b2(rgyud): baphung pos brgyan pa yin// gru ba ni de ni rigs su gyur// 'i basbyor ba gcig sing can// mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni/
125b3(rgyud): shes rab can gyis gnas sgom mo// mngon shes lnga yi ga nas 'dod rnams// de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal// rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid// gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams de dag
125b4(rgyud): gis/ byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las// lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor gcig de las yang dag byung // rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin// dga'
125b5(rgyud): mgu yang dag ldan pa yin// dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir// nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya// rin chen thams cad dbul bar bya// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung // rin chen bdun gyi nor
125b6(rgyud): de ni/ nges bkang ba yi zhing 'di ni// shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir// zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha
125b7(rgyud): rol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de// phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste// 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul// nam mkha'i dbyings
126a1(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sgom// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa// dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung //
126a2(rgyud): yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i// bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod// skal bzang bzhin ni mdzes pa yi// bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang // gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas/
126a3(rgyud): 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la// byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu// rang gi lus ni nang du gzhug/ spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bkod de// mig
126a4(rgyud): bzang dag pa'i bya ba yi// rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod// gang zhig de ltar rtog pa de// blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // spyan la sogs par rab brtag pa// /
126a5(rgyud): de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang // de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/ gsang sngags dngos grub byed pas
126a6(rgyud): mchog/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/
126a7(rgyud): rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las// bshang gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i// le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso// thams cad nam mkha'
126b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur tshe// sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin// rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gce//
126b2(rgyud): pa'o// gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje 'ang // sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis
126b3(rgyud): bsgom// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni// rdo rjes byer
126b4(rgyud): brlags med gyur pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan// bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// sems can
126b5(rgyud): thams cad bsad na ni// de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis// zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu//
126b6(rgyud): gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa// khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten pa
126b7(rgyud): dang 'gal tshig gis// mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad// gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa// ji ltar rdo rjes phye
127a1(rgyud): mar brlag/ de ni phyir brlags gyur pa las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas su// dus gsum 'byung
127a2(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus// phyir brlag byed pas dngos med pas// phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la// de 'dra
127a3(rgyud): bar ni phyir brlag par// sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so// sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin// sangs rgyas kyis ni phyed brlag pas// 'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes// ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur//
127a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa// min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing // gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin// rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur// theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba// dgongs
127a5(rgyud): pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog/ de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor bas// mi bskyod zhing du skyes 'gyur ram// sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa// de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am// snying rjes gsad par bya'o zhes//
127a6(rgyud): sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong // 'das tshe ston par gyur pa dang // da lha rjes su ston mdzad dang // mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o// mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje
127a7(rgyud): yis// de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi// de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig/ de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs// gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras rnams// dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur// ma 'ongs skye
127b1(rgyud): bo'i don du ni// de nyid bcom ldan pashad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'dzin spa yis// 'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang // khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa// legs
127b2(rgyud): so bu khyod cher legs te// kun tu bzang po khyod legs so// dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni// khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa// gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// phung
127b3(rgyud): sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang // dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu bstan// 'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te// de'i sngags rdo rje
127b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba// migs la rdo rje zhes bshad de// dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid// des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste// sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du// sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi// kha ni rang bzhin
127b5(rgyud): nyid du g.yo// rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa// 'gro ba rlung gi ming can no// mi bskyod rdo rje'i sbyor ba nyid// lag tu rdo rje gzhag nas ni// de tshe myur la sogs bya ba// klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid/
127b6(rgyud): phung sogs brtag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs las yang dag 'byung // de yi yan lag phung por bshad// de ni phyir 'gyur bsad pa yin// 'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong // mi bskyod/
127b7(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje nyid// de yi zhing skyed dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan pade chen po// ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa/ byang chub
128a1(rgyud): spyod pa rab bsgrub pas// phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po// gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la// bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs// nam
128a2(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis//
128a3(rgyud): rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya// shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur// rnam smin dngos po med pa gang // de nyid dbrog
128a4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje skye// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub po// rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba// rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang // nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di na
128a5(rgyud): gti mug rigs de nyid// dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags// rigs kun rgya mtsho zhes bya ste// de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags
128a6(rgyud): thar pa rab 'jug pa// gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpal
128a7(rgyud): med chos ni rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // bud med lta bu'i sbyor ba yang // ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin//
128b1(rgyud): dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyar// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba// gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis// sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// dbang po
128b2(rgyud): gnyis ni rab 'byor pa'i// snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yin// de dag thams cad nye bar spyod// sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi// 'di ni sgom pa mchog de yin// de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di/
128b3(rgyud): 'dod chags rigs gcig sgom pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste// sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing // rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// de nas
128b4(rgyud): gsang dbang rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa'o// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
128b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba// rgyal ba thams cad bslu ba ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i
128b6(rgyud): gsung ni dri med pa'o// gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa// brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste// dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa// de ni rgyal ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes dam pa ste// sangs rgyas
128b7(rgyud): dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i// rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o// kun tu kun nas 'bad pa yis// ji bzhin don du drang byas te// so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni
129a1(rgyud): dngos grub rgya chen 'thob// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// mi byed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag/ rdo rje'i dngos grub rabaston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i
129a2(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtag pa'i// dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun
129a3(rgyud): gyis sa 'di gang // phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du// rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i// bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes/
129a4(rgyud): bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che// bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid// dpag tu med par gyur pa yin// de nas gang
129a5(rgyud): zhig dam tshig sogs// chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni//
129a6(rgyud): tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di// de ni de rnams rjod par byed// ci ni mgon po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing // 'jig rten thams cad las
129a7(rgyud): 'das pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam// gtso bo'i yang dag rdo rje'i tshig/ dgongs
129b1(rgyud): pas ci slad gang gsungs shes// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod mi lang rnams kyis gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyi ni// ri rab
129b2(rgyud): rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen la// dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs// dman dang spang ba'i
129b3(rgyud): 'du shes ni// rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig/ ci'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin// 'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di// rnam par ngag yin rigs kyi bu// sangs
129b4(rgyud): rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di// gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// nam mkha' kun tu song ba ste// chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing // rab dbye'i sbyor bar
129b5(rgyud): gyur pa nyid// 'dod pa'i khams ni mi gnas shing // de ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas// de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min// 'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang //
129b6(rgyud): de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas// dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis// chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis// mdor na
129b7(rgyud): khong du chud par bya// yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis// nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byung // dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/
130a1(rgyud): gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang // skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yis// rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi// gtsub shing la sogs re re nas/
130a2(rgyud): 'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ me de gang na'ang mi gnas so// brag cha dang ni gzugs brnyan dang // sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste// chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra// mgon
130a3(rgyud): po pi wang sgra lta bu// rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung // de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid
130a4(rgyud): yin/ des na khyed kyis rdo rje yis// dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces// gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas// rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir// phung po de bzhin
130a5(rgyud): gshegs pas gsungs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ngo mtshar rmad du byung nas ni// rngams pa yis ni mig gdangs te// tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to// chos 'di ngo mtshar rmad byung ste//
130a6(rgyud): nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi// mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang // kun rdzob tu ni bshad par mdzad// dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas// dgongs pa lung ston mchog la ni// gang zhig yid 'ong bzod
130a7(rgyud): gyur pa// de ni de bzhin spyod pa rin// mchog tu dga' ba'i de nyid don// gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba// dam nig tshul ni yang dag bshad// le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin/ des/
130b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das// slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni// bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas// mngon par byang chub ded dpon nyid//
130b2(rgyud): sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtso la// btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol// snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pas// gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ de nyid
130b3(rgyud): bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog/ yang dag bsdus don de bzhin gsungs/
130b4(rgyud): de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum// sku dang gsung
130b5(rgyud): thugs sgom pa ni// mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa// dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs// pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul
130b6(rgyud): gyi/ rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la// dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa// gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na/
130b7(rgyud): mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang // rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang // sems can don bya la rol dang // mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad/
131a1(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang // yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni// sngags spyod pa la brtson/
131a2(rgyud): rnams la// kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rang gtsogasang sngags spyod tshul mchog/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di dag rdzogs par gyur mnyam nas// spyan ras kyis ni 'tshom
131a3(rgyud): mdzad// de ltar rnam par spyad pa'i don// gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la// yang dag par ni byin brlabs phyir// de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog
131a4(rgyud): thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams// so so skye bar gyur pa la// dngos po med cing dmigs su med// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas// 'dod pa'i yon
131a5(rgyud): tan lngar ldan nas// ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad// de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang // sems can don gyi bya ba kun// 'dod pas ston par mdzad pa
131a6(rgyud): yin// mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams// sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung // thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'byung // pha rol phyin par mnyam gzhag nyid// de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i// 'dod
131a7(rgyud): pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang // 'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad// 'di rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di// mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams// rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang /
131b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad gyur cing // 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams// de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa// dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di// de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur// phyag byar 'os
131b2(rgyud): pa'i rig pa ni// nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod// yod med la sogs byed pa ni// gnyis gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa// gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga//
131b3(rgyud): khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang // gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin// 'di ni yan lag thams cad ni// bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o// de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste// tshig de ston par
131b4(rgyud): mdzad pa 'di// gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas// de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po// chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa// mkha' dbyings/
131b5(rgyud): mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa// gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis// 'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa// zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon// 'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs// sngags las yang dag
131b6(rgyud): 'byung ba de// mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams// dngos med gnas la gnas pas na// sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur// gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis// de ni rdzogs longs spyod
131b7(rgyud): gzigs 'gyur// bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di// don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas// rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las// chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur// ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas/
132a1(rgyud): byi dus skye bo la la sba// 'jig rten pa rnams drung bya'i phyir// gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lagan rdo rje grags pa re// dgongs
132a2(rgyud): pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa// bu khyod shes rab chen po legs// gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bo rnam par mi rtog 'gyur// tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don// yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis
132a3(rgyud): bshad// de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das// bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la// spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog
132a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas// snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu// mchog las mchog tu gsungs
132a5(rgyud): gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtog/ dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs// dam
132a6(rgyud): tshig la dmigs de bzhin no// nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// tshig lam nges par brjod pa ni// de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus// sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu// yi ge hUM ni sku
132a7(rgyud): gsungs la// de nas yi ge oM gsungs te// de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AH// sta ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin// hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste// de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga// hUM oM AHswa de bzhin hA/
132b1(rgyud): 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su d+han// zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos/
132b2(rgyud): gcig pa'i// rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes// de nas bcom ldan 'das de yang // de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis// de'i byin rlabs sbyor don du// dam tshig 'di dag dka' stsal to// na
132b3(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba// re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sgom par sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'o// bkod pa mi
132b4(rgyud): gsal ba nyid do// zla ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag/ rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung
132b5(rgyud): thugs// snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas// dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso// 'di ni kun mchog chen por skye// rang gi sngags
132b6(rgyud): kyis bskyed bya ba// sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o// snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags// rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do// rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o// skyes bu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya// sbyor ba bzhi po/
132b7(rgyud): sbyor gcig pus// gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do// kha dog gsum po zhal gsum lha'o// de nyid gsum gcig rnam sgom zhes// bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni// rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos
133a1(rgyud): gsungs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che// gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa// hUM oM AHdang swA hA zhes/
133a2(rgyud): de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur pas// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// de nas rab 'dar nga rgyal gyur cing // rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa// thungab chen de 'dir ji lta bur// mgon po de ni phyi dus na/
133a3(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs la// gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams// rab tu 'dar zhing nga rgyal 'gyur zhes// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so//
133a4(rgyud): lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi// grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing // ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang // 'dar zhing brgyal bar de ma gyur// ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba// mi ni mkhas pa'i nga rgyal
133a5(rgyud): can// bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su// rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed// de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi// mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi shes par// sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yis// gzhan rnams
133a6(rgyud): la ni mi snyan rdzogs// 'khrus pa cung zad tsam mthong na// bzhad gang dag ni byed par 'gyur// reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi// mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i// 'gro la
133a7(rgyud): phan pa'i sngags pa rnams// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir// skad cig rjes gsungs grung don du// sbyor bar dgongs pa'i
133b1(rgyud): bsam pa can// bcom ldan 'di ni bshar du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ban phyag na rdo rje la// de ltar sbyor ba yang dag sbyor// sgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa// dbang po nyi ma
133b2(rgyud): thub pa nyid// gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams// sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// lus las skyes
133b3(rgyud): yod pa 'di// stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod// sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de// bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor// zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba
133b4(rgyud): las// zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam// bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing // rang bzhin dri ma med byas la// dal dang myur dang gnas pa yi// sna tshogs de gcig dag la gzhug/ yid dman rim
133b5(rgyud): la sogs pas kyang // sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas// de nas dbang po med gyur pa// gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu// rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste// de yi chos ni lta ba po// de nas rdzogs long//
133b6(rgyud): spyod pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung // gang phyir rang ni zlo gyur pa// yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags lnga// de tshe snying las rab 'dar zhing // dbang po thams cad nga rgyal bar gyur//
133b7(rgyud): gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de// de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar// nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni// phung
134a1(rgyud): po la sogs bshad pa gang // sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te// de ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur// de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad sras
134a2(rgyud): dang bcas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te// de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung // de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba// phra mo'i snying gong dbus gnas par// dkyis
134a3(rgyud): 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o// de yi dbus gnas zhi ba yi// go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya// de hUM zhes bya'i 'od po che// de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni// 'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa// rnal 'byor
134a4(rgyud): pa yis rtag tu sgom// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya// de yi snying khar bsdams nas ni// lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
134a5(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang // rol mo 'di ni dag pa ste// rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas// snying kha ru na bskul bar 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni tshul
134a6(rgyud): mchog 'di// zhag bdun bar du byas nas ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // rdo rje gsum po yang dag sgrub// phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang // de ni dngos po med lha ba// de nyid
134a7(rgyud): mchog gi gsang sngags kyis// skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la// skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste// gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung // mthong bas skrag skye mchog ster cing // 'di
134b1(rgyud): dag 'di zhid brtags pa yin// ni ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las// sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur ba'i// dngos grub rgya cher skyer bar 'gyur// phung po//
134b2(rgyud): la btags sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don sgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' nga byas nas ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// zhi nga
134b3(rgyud): nyid kyi sbyor gcig las// 'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog/ de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po// 'jig rten
134b4(rgyud): gsum mchog rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs// de ni dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i// gcig par sgom
134b5(rgyud): ba rtag tu byed// bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i// sngags kyi dbang po rnam sgom pa// dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste// dngos po thams cad rnams brtags pa'o// 'di ni sangs
134b6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig mchog sgom pa'o// rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor// rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang sgom// gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa// lta ba dam tshig
134b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba// de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni// mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa// gsang
135a1(rgyud): ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to// nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa// chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim// bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur/
135a2(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba// gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid// de ni gsang bar nye bar spyod// der ni yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnams/ bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/
135a3(rgyud): sngags rig dam pa spro 'ong zhes// der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni// ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher// 'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de// 'jig rten 'das pa bzlog
135a4(rgyud): pa'o// nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni// 'di yis shin tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog nges 'thob// dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la// gang zhig
135a5(rgyud): sems ni dang gyur pa// gsang ba 'bad de yang dag srung // de ni rtag tu legs par byed// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang // de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba// le'u bcu pa yin/
135a6(rgyud): par bshad// / de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsal ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig/ nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin
135a7(rgyud): la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yis// sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal te// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes sgom// rtogs
135b1(rgyud): dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang // tshungs pa la sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes snying po dam pa ste// rdo rje gsum sogs ba shad gyur pa// u yi rdo rje 'azong byed ba'o//
135b2(rgyud): AHdang zung ni gsung rdo rje// byang chub bdag med 'thong byed pa'o// hUM ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid// sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o// de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang // ldang ba dag tu rab tu
135b3(rgyud): bshad// nyi shu lnga sogs ming can gyi// skye bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro// de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de// rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du gyur// brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las// de ni nam
135b4(rgyud): mkha' las rgyal 'gyur// brgya byed rlung ni gcig pu la// de las nges par nyi shu lnga// skyes bu nyid du byung ba na// mgrin bcu zhes bya'o ming can dang // sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur//
135b5(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste// 'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad// 'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu// de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid// de las kyang ni yang
135b6(rgyud): dag 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o// de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur// mtshams dang skye mched nor lha'o// zla ba zung gcig rig byed de// de la
135b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnam// de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas// 'di rnams las gcig gzung nas ni// sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus
136a1(rgyud): su bsam// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa// yi ge b+h+rUM ni des bsam mo// rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku// de dbus gnas pa'i
136a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor par// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyi gtsug tor ni// sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa// gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur// sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa
136a3(rgyud): bo/ chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog/ rgyal dang rmad byung che gtsug tor// lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin// bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad// sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin/
136a4(rgyud): sbyor ba 'ba' zhig nyid la 'di// b+hU ni gtsug tor yin par bstan// ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di// dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan// sngags kyi skyes
136a5(rgyud): bu dngos grub stsol// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// oM zhes bya ba de ru sgom// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHni rnam par sgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba
136a6(rgyud): la'ang // yi ge hUM ni de ru sgom// yi ge bruM ni gnas ming can// rdo rje gsum 'byung ba sgom par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de// rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to// snying po dus gsum sangs
136a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi// rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'// oM AHhUM gi grangs dang mnyam// sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam// thugs kyi ye shes 'jigs su bya//
136b1(rgyud): rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni// re re zhing ni yang dag bshad// sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang // chu yi bdag nyid ming can yin// byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub/
136b2(rgyud): da'o// rdo rje'i shes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byeng ba'o// sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin// rdo rje gsum sa nam mi byed pa// rdzogs pa la sogs
136b3(rgyud): sgom pa yi// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni// gsum po ye shes rdo rje stsol// byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin// rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i// stan dag
136b4(rgyud): la ni sbyor ba bani// rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor// brtul zhugs can gyis kun tu brtsam// thabs dang shes raba'i zla byed// thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag/ de yi byed nyid rnga phyed kyis// rdo rje
136b5(rgyud): gsum ni nges par 'grub// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log/ rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub// grub par 'gyur ba the tshom med// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus
136b6(rgyud): gnas par// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus// bskyed pa yi ge oM bsgom bya// sbyor ba bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang // snying por yongs su brtags pa yin//
136b7(rgyud): sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid// spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas// gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur// dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba// phyed pa gsum gyi ming can ni// rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum//
137a1(rgyud): sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum sbyor brdul zhugs can// mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo// sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan// 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po// rnam
137a2(rgyud): par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas// rdo rje rnam snang de las ni// dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba// skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa// ye shes lnga po
137a3(rgyud): bsten nas ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs pa// da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum// de 'dir bskal bar brtags gyur pa// grangs med ces bya de nyid do// sku yi
137a4(rgyud): gsang ba de nyid 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs// zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba// rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de// sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis/
137a5(rgyud): gsungs// rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa li// ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to// a dang u ni lkog ma'i dngos// rgan gyi steng gi ming can no// i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid// u dang mu ni g.yas par
137a6(rgyud): brtag/ ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod// li ti rkang pa cig shos la// dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid do// dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa// ba ni lus skyes gtsug tor dang // gcod ni gsum po
137a7(rgyud): gcod pa can// yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de// lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor// de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro// rig pa chen po de nyid 'di// cha zhes bya bar de yongs bslas/
137b1(rgyud): dus can bdag nyid sbyor dbang po// de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig/ A ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni// dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor/
137b2(rgyud): mchog bsam pa// rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni// A ni ngag gi lam du bzhag/ kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni// brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms
137b3(rgyud): pas// dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya// gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad// khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa// zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya// chos
137b4(rgyud): kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas// gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs
137b5(rgyud): pa kun gyis gsungs// dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// der ni rang sngags
137b6(rgyud): skyes bu dag/ hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya// dam tshig chen po de nyid can// kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i
137b7(rgyud): thugs 'dra ba// yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu// spyi bo sa yi ming can te// rdo rjes gsum
138a1(rgyud): thugs gsang ba gcig/ de nas haM las zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba// rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung // ting
138a2(rgyud): 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni// lus kun la ni khams dmigs na// rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur// dngos
138a3(rgyud): po med don gsal byed pa// khams nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad// rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las// khaM du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang
138a4(rgyud): dang yang du mchod pa dang // rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// so so ru ni yang dag gnas// nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig
138a5(rgyud): che// chos rnams des ni mi gzigs so// sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med rang // mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin// dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so//
138a6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung // mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin// de yi bkod 'phreng zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs// ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid// sku dang ldan pa'i
138a7(rgyud): 'od po che// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// rang sngags skyes bu bsam par bya// ha~M ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa// sIng kha ru ni yaM mdzes pa// rtag tu sbyor ba gzhug pa ni// 'od zer rnam/
138b1(rgyud): par bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// 'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can// sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni// dgongs don de tshe kun tu byung // ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di// byang chub
138b2(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje can// snang ba can zhes bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// b+h+rU~M ni 'drar ba'i 'od bzang ba// mtshon cha mchog ni rdo
138b3(rgyud): yis/ rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor// dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur pa// ting 'dzin dam tshig mi sdang ba'i// b+h+rUM ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad// sangs rgyas
138b4(rgyud): mngon par shes gnas pa// dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad// mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba ni// de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa// 'di ni dam pa
138b5(rgyud): yin par bshad// de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs
138b6(rgyud): rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la// yi ge oM ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso// 'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis// bsgom pas mi bskyod 'dra/
138b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// mi bskyed mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni// gsung thugs rtse/
139a1(rgyud): gcig 'dzin pa las// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan
139a2(rgyud): par bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te// de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom// rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing // dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs
139a3(rgyud): pa yi/ bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing // sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis// ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba// rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur//
139a4(rgyud): longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba// rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung // de nyid gsum gsang dgongs pa las// rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil/
139a5(rgyud): 'khor bsam par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// der ni chos kyi oM sgom mo// chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang // rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdo rje dpag med 'dra ba ni// bcom ldan dpag
139a6(rgyud): med rdo rje can// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dpag med che dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub bo// ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan// 'gro don gcig tu 'byung
139a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog/ sems can don ni spung gyur pa// 'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i// longs spyod
139b1(rgyud): kun tu 'gyur ba yi// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad// 'od zer der ni rab tu sgom// rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM//
139b2(rgyud): 'od chen der ni rab tu sgom// de nas 'di ni rdo rje gsum// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad// rnam snang rdo rje can de yin// rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las/
139b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'o// de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub// rdo rje sku gsum sgrub papo// sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub// de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can// ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba/
139b4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs don// sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// gsang dgongs rdo rje
139b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba// thub pa che la slar yang zhus// oM AHhUM ni gsum la sogs/ b+h+rUM sogs thog mar gnas pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur ro// oM ni rnam snang
139b6(rgyud): rdo rjer 'gyur// A ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpar be shad// skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur/ b+h+yon gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// khaM nongs par mi snang ba// ha ni 'jam dpal
139b7(rgyud): yang dag bshad// k+ShiM ni rdo rje bkod ces bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol// de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad// oM la sogs pa lnga las skyes/
140a1(rgyud): oM AHhUM ni de nyid gsum// rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags// shin tu rnam par nges par bshad// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa/
140a2(rgyud): lnga po bco lngar yang dag bshad// khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba// gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba// gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang // ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin// sna tshogs sngags
140a3(rgyud): don de nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te// de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni// dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung // dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming // de dag ji ltar rtogs
140a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi// pi wang sgra ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin phyag rgya med pa ni// gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo // brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di// gang gi don du
140a5(rgyud): rab gsungs pa// lag pa'i sbyor bas rab sgrub pa'i// phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang // gsang sngags gcig pu'i mi 'grub
140a6(rgyud): ces khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'dir ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las// phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na// gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni// 'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar
140a7(rgyud): sgrub sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa// lha rnams kyis kyang sbyor las byung // 'gro ba'i don nir rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang // yang na shin/
140b1(rgyud): tu 'jig rten 'das// mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi// ji ltar 'gro la de phan 'gyur// spyan drangs pa dang gshegs su gsol// 'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod// gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub
140b2(rgyud): 'grub// lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu// 'di dag ma 'ongs skye bo yis// gang zhig shes na yang dag par// nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba// mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs// de nas mgon po
140b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste// phyag rgya'i nges pa 'jig rten pa'i// phyag na rdo rje la gsungs so// rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya// nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid
140b4(rgyud): las/ gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gser du byed pa yin// de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis// mi ni bder
140b5(rgyud): gshegs byed pa yin// nges byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni// zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin// dngos med pa
140b6(rgyud): las yang dag skye// sngags kyi skyes du 'byung ba ste// 'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis// myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol// gnas/
140b7(rgyud): ba yis ni de sgrub pa'o// ying ston dngos grub dam pa yin// do ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya che dang gcig sgrub las// myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa// de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad// 'bang
141a1(rgyud): de bla mas slob ma yi// rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya// myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// 'di dag byug
141a2(rgyud): d+hur yang dag gyur// sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs// ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar// phung po la sogs chos rnams kun// stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba// mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las// chos
141a3(rgyud): kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur// 'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor 'gyur med// phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin// de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed// 'on te rdo rje 'dzin
141a4(rgyud): gang zhig/ sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o// nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba// ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor// de bzhin
141a5(rgyud): gsang sngags de nyid kyang // gnyis ka la ni yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad// sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni// 'jig rten par ni rab tu
141a6(rgyud): brtag/ rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgyas sa gsum la gnas pa// sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang // brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug/ gzhug
141a7(rgyud): pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid// dngos ming de nyid gcig pu yis// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// gzhan yang gsang ba pa mi mchog/ sems kyi rkyen ni nyid byos
141b1(rgyud): rang / dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la// gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med// 'jig rten na ni rtog ci rnyed// dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba// de ni dngos med sems gcig las// rnam 'phyo/
141b2(rgyud): pas ni skad cig rtogs// byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la// de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur// gnyis ka las min gzhan las min// mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems can
141b3(rgyud): bsam pa'i dbang gi sngags// gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te// de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang // rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o// sems can kun gyi longs spyod du// sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas/
141b4(rgyud): nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par dben par rab tu brtag/ gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan// klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin// mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba// dur khrod la
141b5(rgyud): sogs pa yi ming // 'di ni sngags rig mchog rnams kyi// bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir// 'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o// mi bskyod ye shes la
141b6(rgyud): sogs pa// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che// dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to// rdo rje
141b7(rgyud): chen po rab mdzes pa// rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar// rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis// mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin// mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la// gnas nas bla na med pa bachag
142a1(rgyud): gtso bo me stag mang po 'khrug/ rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje la rab dgod byas pas// rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas
142a2(rgyud): par/ 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lus la rnam par
