142a3(rgyud): snang mdzad gzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams na// sngags la mngon shes sgom par 'gyur// 'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems// nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes// sangs rgyas kun
142a4(rgyud): mchog 'byung ba yi// dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi bskyod rab tu sgom// hUM ni snying kha'i zla gnas par// bsams la
142a5(rgyud): sems ni de ru gzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// AHni snying kha'i thig ler gnas// bsams la rdo rje'ang yang dag gzhag/ 'di ni
142a6(rgyud): dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/
142a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
142b1(rgyud): bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH// bsams na bskal pa dag tu gnas// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag/
142b2(rgyud): sems yi gaM hUM// bsams na de ni bsgral par gnas// bcom ldan pa dag po rdo rje gsum// dam tshig rtog pas de skad gsungs// dgu mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di// sngags kyi skyes bu/
142b3(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// brjod du med cing ming med la// shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang // kun rdzob la ni legs gnas na// tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can/
142b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin chad ni// gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung // rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur// ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// dgongs pu lung ston 'di gyur pa/
142b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan// khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob// klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni// bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs
142b6(rgyud): skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni// myur ba de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing // 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bu bzhin du// byang chub myur du des 'thob bo//
142b7(rgyud): khams gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi// sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis// de ni dngos po med par 'joms// dngos med gcig pu rdzogs longs spyod//
143a1(rgyud): phung sogs yan lag don las byung // bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni// sngags pa sngags las gyur pa yin// ji ltar nam mkha' rang mtshan nyid/ skad cig
143a2(rgyud): ni 'dor mi byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // rigs las skyes la byin gyis rlob// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas nas// gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag srung // mig gzugs
143a3(rgyud): rang gi ngo bo nyid// spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// gsang ba dgongs pa'i ming can te// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang // gsang sngags dam tshig
143a4(rgyud): de nyid byung // de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog/ bcu gcig par ni yang dag bshad// ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung // 'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur gyur// de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// bskyed
143a5(rgyud): pa ye shes bla ma gtso// de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to// mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la// rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can// dngos med shin tu dri med la/
143a6(rgyud): dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni// gar dang glu dang rol mo dang // dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyi// rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i
143a7(rgyud): sems can ne// ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin// gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni// myur du de nyid las 'thob gyug/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pa// de yi ming ni ying ldan pa// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
143b1(rgyud): su gnas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang // thos shing reg par gyur pa ni// de ni u drum par yi// me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin// sems can kun gyi/
143b2(rgyud): gtso bo 'di// gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes// gcig dang du ma las grol ba// rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog re// chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa/ thub chen rnam
143b3(rgyud): par snang mdzad la// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus// mgon po de nyid bsdus pa las// rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang // 'jig rten pa de gar byed pa// gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni// chos dbyings don
143b4(rgyud): gar min na// gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin// chos dbyings de ni glu min na// gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur/
143b5(rgyud): rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan grwa// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de ni rol mo min// gtsu bo de ltar rol mor 'gyur// 'jig rten rgyang pan rmongs rol mo// gsang mthon/
143b6(rgyud): myos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de dgod ma lags na// gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kyang phan rgod// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ chos dbyings
143b7(rgyud): rigag sa lags na// tso bo ltar sgeg par 'gyug// rmongs pas 'jig rten byung bar theg/ gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// de byar rnam pa mang po 'o// ga'an rnams kyang 'i byor
144a1(rgyud): byed cing // bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam// rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di// yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid// de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor ba dag
144a2(rgyud): yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog/ de nas de nyid yang dag bzung // rnal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa// de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston// sna tshogs tshul gyis
144a3(rgyud): rnam dgod pas// nor can ming ni nyams la sogs// gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos bshad pa'i// gar gyis skye dgu dga' bar byed// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub// sna tshogs khyed kyis
144a4(rgyud): gsungs pa rnams// sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa// de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// mgon po shes rab 'di srid du// thabs kyis mchil par nye bar sbyor// sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis//
144a5(rgyud): khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin// bshad du zin kyang mi rig pa// dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni// gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa// ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o// phyi rol skyugs don dngos grub
144a6(rgyud): ni de nyid du ni tshod mod kyi// 'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can// der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing // sred pa yis ni ston par byed// bcom ldan 'das gsung
144a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i// gsang mchog tshig gis spobs par byed// khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams/ sngags kyi rus pa rnam spangs pa// 'jig rten pa rnams rdzang 'byer zhig / de rnams 'grub par
144b1(rgyud): 'gyur ma yin// sred pa'am dad pa dag gis kyang // rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams// gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin// rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur// mgon po de ni der gnas shing /
144b2(rgyud): nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas// de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung // tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las// chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang // phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// byang chub sems
144b3(rgyud): dpa' lhung 'gyur bar// bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang // sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// gsang ba mdo sde rnams smra
144b4(rgyud): ba gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis// de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa// gsang sngags la sogs chos rnams la// dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed// log pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni// byis pa
144b5(rgyud): nas byed par 'gyur// oM yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni// sbyor ba shes rnams kyi 'di ma yin// de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa// gtam dag yang ni byed par 'gyur// sku ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na// rgyal
144b6(rgyud): po rnams ni slu bar byed// skyeng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni// brgyud gnyis pa la tshul du byed// de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni// A yi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i// yang dag dngos grung
144b7(rgyud): byed pa'i bachog/ dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na// de ni longs spyod lam skyed min// de bas skye bo med gcig pu// bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug/ de ni mche ba can mi 'gro// de la bcal ba 'da'
145a1(rgyud): zhig yin// rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras// bar chad shin tu mang po pa/ khya ba de ni rnam par 'joms// sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can// de ni tshig de thos pa dang /
145a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing // dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las// su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed// ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag/ de la chad pas gcad par bya// 'di la 'jigs pa'i
145a3(rgyud): sems bor la// skye bo med par khyed kyis ni// rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzang ngam// ngag zhig mi bsrun rigs can rnams// dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa// de dag thams cad brlag par bya/
145a4(rgyud): de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni// rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid che// rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o// 'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nas su// rgyal po 'bras bu
145a5(rgyud): longs spyod cig/ A li dog pa ras de byin// ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas// rin chen rin thung med drangs rnams// 'di ni ji ltar bzhag nas smra// de nas don mi snang ga rgyun nan/
145a6(rgyud): des ni de tsha byas// de la sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig/ rigs skyes pa la de rnams ste// rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan rnams kyang // skrag par byed cing the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshes
145a7(rgyud): bdab bo// 'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso// phyag na rdo rjeg byed pa// san pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs// rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te// rdo rje 'di ni rus
145b1(rgyud): myur ba/ de nyid basmras pa ngas pa'o// rdo rje thal mo nyid 'di// lung bstan byalas donyon cig denying gsum du gyur pa ni/ rdorjethal mor yongs su btug denyi gasmram ni lhags/
145b2(rgyud): b+h+rUM/ chungs dang khya ba'i drag dbang drug che// de rung ni lcags ma 'gyur// oM A d+he dang grangs mnyam pa'i// gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni// snga tshogs rdzas can gcig ming car//
145b3(rgyud): zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston// der ni nga yang gnas pa yin// dpral yon de la bzhin mi sdug/ de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming // de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni// mtheb sogs ji bzhin grangs su
145b4(rgyud): bshad// lag pa g.yon ni drag por 'gyur// g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste// gnyis po sbyor ba tshangs pa yin// de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang // rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig
145b5(rgyud): ste rig byed der gyur gsum du bshad// srid bsrungs zhi ba nga yin te// mthar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin// lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni// bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa// phyed
145b6(rgyud): po'i tsham gyi haM mchog ni// rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags// nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der// so sor yongs su bsgrags pa yin// yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur dang // shis pa zhi ba skyon med pa//
145b7(rgyud): yon tan oM dang yi ge byed// oM zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin// sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan// gtsug mtha' dang ni lag par gnas// nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las// ye shes mo ni nges par skye/
146a1(rgyud): m+b+ha dang kan gyi mtshan ma ni// sbyor las thar bar de bshad de// AH'og tu u dang yang dag ldan// de steng yi ge A nyid de// thang ka ru ni ma bshad de// khyod ni yig byed
146a2(rgyud): zhi ba nyid// yi ge oM ni tshangs pa ste// A ni khyab 'jug yin par bshad// hUM ni rlung du gyur pa yin// de nyid drag po zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i phyed phyed ces bya ba// der ni bdag yongs bsgrubs
146a3(rgyud): pa yin// gnas dpa' bo dang skye ba dang // gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'pho// ye shes rang nyid me yin te// khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no// ral gri la sogs dngos grub der// byang chub
146a4(rgyud): phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur// gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi// rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag/ tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der// ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur// de ni mtho ris
146a5(rgyud): sogs 'gag pas// de bzhin 'byung ba sel ba yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas// gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas// shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas// 'jug 'gyur//
146a6(rgyud): ba ni drag po yin// nam dgag pa yi sbyor ba yang // tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can// mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste// de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba// spu yi cha ni skyong
146a7(rgyud): las gcig/ zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid// thar pa gcig par de ston bya// thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin// de lta bas na 'di log pa// zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o// ston pa de rnams phye nas ni/
146b1(rgyud): zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur// thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag/ 'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun// khyed kyi thal mo dag la gnas
146b2(rgyud): rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing // sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa// 'di nyid du ni nyi ng+ga dang // sbyin sreg las can me dang ni// lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang // rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grub
146b3(rgyud): dang // de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di// de nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la// de yang gcig dang du ma spangs// khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba// de bas
146b4(rgyud): de ni 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur bas// de ni spong bar mi bya zhing // 'di dag dngos med la ltos pas// rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod// gzhan du rnam
146b5(rgyud): rtog nyid las ni// dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur// de bas thal mo sbyar ba 'di// sems can rjes bzung dam pa yin// ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams// bsdu ba'i don
146b6(rgyud): du khyod kyis bya// spang bya'on pa lkug pa dang // de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang // gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur// de rnams la ni pan+d+ha phyir bya// de la sogs pa mdor dkyus pa/
146b7(rgyud): rimi byed kyi thal mar gnas// don 'jig rten 'das gtsor byar// de nying bsdus pa'i rgyu can no// de ni nang min phyi ma yin// gnyis min gnyen gyi rgya las mim phyag rgyatshigs pa
147a1(rgyud): las skyes mim/ 'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min// rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na// ming ni rdo rje thal mo gyur// sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i// snying po
147a2(rgyud): brtag par bya ba'i mchog phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin// phyi nang gnyis kyis ming can no// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de// dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// 'di dag lag pa
147a3(rgyud): g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas// gnyis pos gcig gyur dge 'dun te// de ni skyabs ni gsum yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// gcig
147a4(rgyud): dang gsum du brtags pa yin// phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab thabs kyi gnas mchog yin// thal mo bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur//
147a5(rgyud): skyabs mchog gsum dang de nyid gsum// rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum// zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang // lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang // dus gsum dam tshig
147a6(rgyud): mchog gyur gsum// tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur// sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste// ji srid rtogs pas brjod pa rnams// de ni thal mo sbyor 'di yin// 'dod nor yon tan
147a7(rgyud): gsum gyi mchog/ rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag/ ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur// de nyid du ni der 'gyur na// gcig dang du mar rnam par spangs// chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa// 'gro//
147b1(rgyud): ngarjer gyis yang dag sdud// 'don mkha' ltar rang bzhin gcig/ gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba// bsdu ba byas par gyur pas kyang // su gsum don gyi chos nyid do// 'di ni thog mtha' med/
147b2(rgyud): pa ste / dngos po med cing gnas med pa// mtha' med zad pa med par 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rkyen las ni// rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te// de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur// hUM shes
147b3(rgyud): sems can yang dag 'byin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag/ oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste// A ni gnas pa par 'gyur ro// gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga// gsal dang mi gsal sbyor ba
147b4(rgyud): ni/ rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te// de nyid kyi ni sngags bshad pa'o// zlos na bsam gtan rnam bral bar// de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster// rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te// 'dod pa'i
147b5(rgyud): bzlas par de bshad do// rnal 'byor pa la de gsal te// byis rnams de la phyin ci log/ rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum// dngos po med par de bshad do// de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni//
147b6(rgyud): yid min pa yi bzlas par 'gyur// yid ston gcig ni mdor bsdus las// rings dang dal dang gnas pa rnams// zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim//
147b7(rgyud): dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di// rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus te gyur// sprul pa bsam mi khyab ces dben// sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa// de yang phul du gyur/
148a1(rgyud): pa'i ming // rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar// sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed// dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni// de nyid kyi ni rdo rjer sbyar// sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba
148a2(rgyud): yis/ de yi chos rnams ston par byed// rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can// sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin// gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas// sems can rnams ni der 'jog ste// gsol
148a3(rgyud): ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang // 'jig rten rnams la gsol ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de// khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin// gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur//
148a4(rgyud): de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so// sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do// mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin// de
148a5(rgyud): bas de rnams mgu gyur pa// chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so// rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di// khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung // gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i// dngos grub des ni 'thob par
148a6(rgyud): 'gyur// A nyid der ni mi gsal ba'i// rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin// dog par de ni yod bshad de// dngos po med par ras kyi ming // 'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// gzhon nu'i
148a7(rgyud): gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya// dog pa de yi ras don las// mi snang ba la sogs grub cing // yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung // A yi dog ras mtshon
148b1(rgyud): bas ni// 'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad// 'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod// sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur// byis pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur
148b2(rgyud): thal mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang // rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yang shin tu ldan sems can// sems can sogs la rnam par gnas// rtag pa lhur ni so sor snang // 'gro ba
148b3(rgyud): dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig/ skye ba med las skyes pas na// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o// shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni// 'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod// de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur
148b4(rgyud): ba rnam par mi rtog cig shos nyid// ya yi ste sogs gnas byas te// sngags ni na ri bri bar bya// rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni// yi ge A bzhin sngon 'gro ba// so so gzhan pa'i bani
148b5(rgyud): pa ni// i u dang ni ring por bcas// a aM oM u ya ste mtha'// bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri// bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i// 'gro ba mnyam gzhag bskyed pa yin// 'di dag
148b6(rgyud): rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi// chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur// de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang // rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur// cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni// bla med
148b7(rgyud): dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// ra ga yi ni grangs bzhin du// skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa// nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang // de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin// sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni// /
149a1(rgyud): khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod// 'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa'ang // mnyam nyid ye shes de nyid las// yon tan gsum ni brdar byas pa// yon tan med pa'i yon tan
149a2(rgyud): ming // gzhon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming // lta ba 'di ni bar skyes// de ni sgo glegs mtha'i yin te// e u dang ni ring por bcas// yi ge gsum bcas thig ler ldan// tsheg drag mtha' yi
149a3(rgyud): ring sde can// yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang // bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin// de nyid ring po ring po'i mthas// bcu gnyis pa yi grangs su 'gyur// de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las// yi ge oM
149a4(rgyud): zhes brjod pa yin// snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yis// ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro// ci ste a las sngags pas ni// AHnyid du ni blta bar bya// de bzhin A yi sbyor ba las// yi ge a ni ci
149a5(rgyud): 'dod par// ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta// re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo// i ri li u'i tshogs las kyang // sngags pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs// lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni/
149a6(rgyud): rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa// gang che a ka'i sde grangs las// A yi kha yi rgya ba nA gnas// i tshan phrag pa lag pa dang // tshig rnams la ni de bzhin no// dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang //
149a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag/ dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang // rkang pa g.yas g.yon de bzhin no// gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas// ta tshan shin tu dngos grub ster// u tshan de bzhin
149b1(rgyud): dbus dang ni// lag parla ni yongs su bshad// rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshun// 'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin// de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i// sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong /
149b2(rgyud): lhun gyis grub pas dngos grub pa// me tog gis mdzes 'phreng ba bzhin// rang rgyud kyi ni nang nyid du// lha mchog dag ni bya ba yin// dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun// de nyid las ni
149b3(rgyud): bdag 'grub 'gyur// tsha ba'i bzhi bzhi sde sbyor bas// mkhas pa yi ni sgro rnams bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang // dbus dang shar la sogs sngon 'gro// 'gre la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang /
149b4(rgyud): ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin// thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/ yi ge hA yis mchod par bya// sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing // 'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos// yi ge a ni lus
149b5(rgyud): su bya// lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas pa// mtshams med lnga yi sbyor ba las// sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston// sha thog mthar gnas sngags las skyes// dbang bskur gsum po spyilas
149b6(rgyud): skye gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni// skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur// de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pa// 'jig rten pa rnams chos dgar 'gyur// a ku ha gnas
149b7(rgyud): byang phyogs gnas// yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// gsang sngags bsam pas mi khyab gsungs// de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa// rang gi mtshan ma
150a1(rgyud): cig shos nyid// gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa// cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su// dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas/
150a2(rgyud): dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang // 'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las// smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o// 'gro ba don gtogs 'dod
150a3(rgyud): pa'i yon tan gyur rnams la// dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod// sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni// thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye
150a4(rgyud): bar gsol// nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog 'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag la brten par mdzad// lhag pa'i skyeng rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku// bdag
150a5(rgyud): ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod// sring mos kyang ni khyad par du// de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni// de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de// rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du mdzad//
150a6(rgyud): shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni// phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur// bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na// dga' ba las byung chos dga'
150a7(rgyud): bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni// nam yang lhod par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags// kun tu song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston//
150b1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod// dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis// sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhin khrus/
150b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags pa mdzad// 'dod pa med cing chags la zhi// de yang don dam dag gyur yin// spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni// bzlas brjod dngos po med pa yin//
150b3(rgyud): bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan// mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang // zung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa// dbyings kyi yi ge gzhag par bya// ha yi sde tshan ka sde dang / bcu
150b4(rgyud): gnyis phyed phyed dag tu sbyar// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod// de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste// dgongs pa'i don gyis
150b5(rgyud): brtag par bya// phung po khams la sogs lta ba// brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin// ma byin len pa byang chub sems// kun rdzob bstan pa brdzun smra ba// phung po srog
150b6(rgyud): chags gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin// mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste// de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni// dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru// sngags pa
150b7(rgyud): yis ni de bya'o// bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad// gci ba zhes ni dbang po ni// de dag za bar bshad pa yin// ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o// khrag ni pags par yang dag
151a1(rgyud): bshad// sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin// nang ni sems kyis kun rtog pa// zab dngos med gyur pa'o// smon lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni// bi mur shu pas 'di/
151a2(rgyud): lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la// byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theg la gnas khyod kyang // chos nyid de yang mi
151a3(rgyud): shes so// rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas// chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs// de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa// mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed// yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/
151a4(rgyud): 'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa// 'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las// de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong // gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi// sems ni dngos grub la gzhol ba// rdzogs longs spyod
151a5(rgyud): pa'i skur sbyor las// dngos po med pa nyid du byung // bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs// kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung // sprul pa'i lus las bsngags pas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du
151a6(rgyud): ston par byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa de nyid 'di// 'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o// rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom// nam mkha' brtags pa'i rnam
151a7(rgyud): 'byor la// phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsam shing // dngos grung sna tshogs me to/
151b1(rgyud): ldan / sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri// dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba// rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya// phung sogs yan lag thams cad de// sangs
151b2(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur// sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa// bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa// lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni// rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya// lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum/
151b3(rgyud): de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya// rdo rje gsum dang legs sbyor las// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog/ sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin// lnga bcu gnyis gyur
151b4(rgyud): gang yin pa// brgya po rgyu ba nas mngon phyogs la// ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar gcig stsol// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'bar ba'i rdo rje
151b5(rgyud): snang ba yis// sa la sogs pa brgyan pa ni// de ni snang ba zhes bshad do// tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha// dad pas de la phyag kyang byed// 'di ni mi snang byed pa ste// ting 'dzin 'jam
151b6(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje nyid// rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing // ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par// mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag/ bshang gci sbyang las de/
151b7(rgyud): gyur pa// gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o// dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas// dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te// bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya//
152a1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin// bdag med ces bya kha yin te// gang 'di rnam chog gcig nyid du// bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod// sangs rgyas rnams
152a2(rgyud): kyis mi phyed pa'i// sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o// de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms nas// skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis
152a3(rgyud): rnam bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad// sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams// de snyed//
152a4(rgyud): de yi rjes 'brang rnams// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya'o// gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste// sna ni ri rab ces bya'o// bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun// nam mkha' spro ba bsam mi khyab// 'jam
152a5(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste// 'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi ngo bo ru// phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya//
152a6(rgyud): 'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba// skad cig sbyor bas sgrub pa'o// rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms pa// rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste// thugs kyi /
152a7(rgyud): rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de sred bud med de yi ni// gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che// drag po yis
152b1(rgyud): ni phyag byas 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na//
152b2(rgyud): rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni// dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog/ gos med mnyam
152b3(rgyud): nyid ye shes kyi// rdo rje pad+mo gru bcas sbyin// so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// shin tu grangs med bskal par ni// grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni// gnas
152b4(rgyud): shing sgom par byed pa yin// de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// 'jig rten pan phyir gsungs pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i// yon tan
152b5(rgyud): gsum ni yongs su brten// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i// rang sngags las byung ral gri ni// blo ldan lag par de bzhag na// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyi khongs chung 'di//
152b6(rgyud): ho ho hUM de khams gsum pa// pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher// rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing // tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum mi yi
152b7(rgyud): mchog gcig pu// dbang chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur// thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// de ni de ma thag tu 'thob// rang
153a1(rgyud): gardo rje ting 'dzin 'di// dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung // byang grol la yang de mi gnas// ral gyi kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur// oM ni ril btsan ka'i// 'bru tshang tsam du/
153a2(rgyud): bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// blo ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog
153a3(rgyud): gam nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo// de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs// khar bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes
153a4(rgyud): 'od po che// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang // nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge hUM ni
153a5(rgyud): rnam bsams te// dbus su rang gi lha bsams nas// khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang //
153a6(rgyud): nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/
153a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang // 'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char
153b1(rgyud): kabe 'od 'dra ba'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog gi sgrub pa 'di/
153b2(rgyud): rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgoms pas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen la ni rin chen sgom// de nyid lag tu legs
153b3(rgyud): banag na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las// rin chen rigs kyi mchog sgom pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam
153b4(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms la// lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni// pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+ma mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// pad+ma'i skur ni
153b5(rgyud): sbyor ba las// pad+ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la// lag tu ral gri rab
153b6(rgyud): bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di sgrub pa// sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las// dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/
153b7(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i rdo rje'i dbye ba yis// mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yis//
154a1(rgyud): dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i// mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug/ sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid// 'gog dang /
154a2(rgyud): lam ste bzhi po ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dgra bshad// sgrub pa po ni gnas ming can// shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog/ chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can// sna tshogs
154a3(rgyud): mtshan gcig yang dag dgod// mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no// 'byin dang rngub pa nyid dang ni// gnas pa yis ni nyer mdzes pa// yid ston pa yi mnyam sbyar la// rab tu zhi
154a4(rgyud): ba'i zhi gnas su// dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das// rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par dang // sgrub pa po ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni// sbyor gsum
154a5(rgyud): rdo rje can bsam pa// sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o// sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi// mi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las// 'gro ba thams
154a6(rgyud): cad dgug par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas//
154a7(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang // mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed// gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni// mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams// de nyid rdo rje bkug
154b1(rgyud): nas ni// sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya// nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di// dam tshig chen po rdo rje can// sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las// lcags kyu de rnams 'grub
154b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog/ rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya// me long lta bu'i
154b3(rgyud): sngags pas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// lcags kyu la sogs rab tu sgom// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// de nyid las ni lha
154b4(rgyud): rnams dgod// de ni de ma thag tu yang // dngos grub kun sder las byed 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni// mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya// lce yi rdo rje sbyor
154b5(rgyud): ba yis// gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam sgom// brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis// gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do// dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis// ji lta ji ltar rab sgrub
154b6(rgyud): pa/ dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i// de na yang dag yin par bshad// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yis// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod// bcom ldan dam tshig chen po
154b7(rgyud): yi/ rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs// de nas phyag na rdo rje ni// go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs// gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i// mnyam gzhag mchog ni 'thob 'gyur ba'i//
155a1(rgyud): gsang dang nga bad dam pa sa// don 'is yang dag ba shad// rnal 'byor chen mo gcig bdag // rnam pa la nga rnaMm lam 'i byangs/ zlas
155a2(rgyud): tshig yang drug pa// sha chen la ni yang dag sgyur// dngos po med pa'i sha chen gyi// dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni// blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni// rdo rje dngos grub yongs spyod
155a3(rgyud): ster// rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin// de nyid ye shes dbang po gci// dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// longs spyod rtogs
155a4(rgyud): phung las byung ba// glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag/ dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las// mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste// dngos med de/
155a5(rgyud): nyid las sbyor las// dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na// mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// dgongs pas cig shos zlos pa yin// phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa//
155a6(rgyud): dngos med de ni khyi sha yin// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas can pa lang sha// khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par
155a7(rgyud): 'gyur// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las// dgongs pas cig shos bzlog pa yis// sha chen dang ni bsha
155b1(rgyud): gci dang // glang po rtakhyi ba lang dag/ mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis// dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur// brtan pas 'di ni grub pa ni// sngags kyi longs spyod nam/
155b2(rgyud): 'byor pa// rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis// sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing // rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang // snying khor ye shes dam tshig
155b3(rgyud): dang // dbu rgyun la ni rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i// 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o// dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ dam tshig chog 'dis ra
155b4(rgyud): tu bya// dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste// rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin no// de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgron// gtso bo rnam snang chen po la// gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni// rdo rje
155b5(rgyud): 'dzin pas slar yang zhus// gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni// gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug tu// mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshul mi 'gyur// rang gi
155b6(rgyud): bstan bcos brda yis ni// phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la// ting 'dzin brtags po 'di dag kyang // 'di la rang gi ngo bo med// tshangs sgro mdzod kyi rgyud la ni// ri rang gcig dang
155b7(rgyud): bcas par bshad// byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa// gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'das// rdo rje can la slar gsungs pa// legs so
156a1(rgyud): legs pa che// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa// rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang // 'dir ring yis gsal bshad bya// sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag/ theg
156a2(rgyud): pa chen po mi mthong ngo // tshad yod dang ni yongs chad pa'i// rang gi lus la gang bshad de// ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod// khron pa'i rus sbas zhes bya'o// nam mkha' dang ni
156a3(rgyud): mnyam ye shes// rdo rje theg pa bla med pa// mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du// rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste// de yis yang dag ma mthong bas// rang gi lung ni tshang
156a4(rgyud): ma yis// gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra// theg pa che la gsang ba rnams// srang la btsal te de smra ba// de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes// nga yi tshig las bltas te smra// de nyid
156a5(rgyud): rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgom pa rnams// gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub// sna tshogs
156a6(rgyud): dngos grub 'bras bu ster// dgongs don ji lnga ji lta bar// do ni nga yis yang dag bshad// dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni// rdo rje can gyis hUM bsams te// rnal 'byor byas ri bdud rtsi lnga// zos na/
156a7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum thong 'gyur// A dang mo gyi gsang bdag/ 'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor bayis// rje rjesams de pa'i 'od chen 'gyur// 'dzi rdo rje'i bdud rtsil
156b1(rgyud): baphreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshud// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung // ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur// de nyid sems
156b2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ rdo rje bdag nyid de snang
156b3(rgyud): byed// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du// grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i// rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// su yi rdo rje sgom bdag nyid// grub mchog dam tshig la
156b4(rgyud): gnas pa// mi sdang gyur pa kun gyi mchog/ stong gsum dag ni snang bar byed// lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mar legs sbyor// gang+gA'i bya snyed ces bya ba'i/
156b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun// dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa// sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa// lag tu skyu ru bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur// sangs rgyas
156b6(rgyud): ning ni gang drug tu// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa// rna ba la gnas ma nor bar// skad cig gis ni de kun thos// gang+ka'i bye snyed zhing dag dang // sru la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan// sems zhes
156b7(rgyud): bshad pa'i sgom pa mchog/ sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig/ bskal pa gad+hA'i bye steng du// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gengs// rdo rje bsam mi khyad sngon 'gro// rang gi rna ba sems bcas
157a1(rgyud): pa gang+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi/ gnas kyi dngos po bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes nas// 'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to// mngon shes drug ni don
157a2(rgyud): grub bo// de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// 'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas// sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spyod/
157a3(rgyud): yid rton bden gcig bsnyen pa ste// de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa// brten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa// ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o// yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// sgrub pa yi ni
157a4(rgyud): dam tshig 'gyur// 'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa// 'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags// sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba
157a5(rgyud): skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur// bsnyen po'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang // nye bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang // sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin// 'di la yang dag
157a6(rgyud): 'jug 'gyur ba// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs// lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya// rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po// bsten pa'i
157a7(rgyud): dam tshig yang dag sbyor// byang chub mchog ni rnam par sgom// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang rig bya chos rnams la// dngos grub mchog ni rnam dpyad pa// de ni nye bar sgrub par
157b1(rgyud): 'gyur// sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni// bskul ba sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod// bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag / sngags pas/
157b2(rgyud): kun tu brtag par bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung // sngags kyi de nyid don
157b3(rgyud): gnyer ba'i// sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsnyen// sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog/ sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod// de yi dpag bsam shing longs spyod// sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/
157b4(rgyud): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam pa'i dben pa chen por bshad// ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o// de 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru// der ni 'od chen
157b5(rgyud): rnam gnas te// gnas med pa'i sbyor ba yis// rgyug tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni// chen pos de spyad bka' stsal to// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs
157b6(rgyud): 'jig rten pa rnams spa bgasal// bsten pa sku'i bcu la zhugs mchog tho dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis/ rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor bas// bsgoms na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyum myong /
157b7(rgyud): nas bu gon pache// rin men zhes bya ban pa'o// chen po'i sa bya 'ong dpag med / gdon yod pa nir 'ong yin// tshung bas dag pa'i chos kyi ma/ gnas lnga dag tu rib tu bcag 'dzo mang ni sbyor/
158a1(rgyud): ba bzhis// yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed// de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i byed// yi ge so gcig
158a2(rgyud): sdom pa'o// gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i// oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab// de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po// gtso bo rang nyid zlog pa yin// la la glang po spangs nas ni// rjes la dbyibs
158a3(rgyud): ni tshol bar byed// de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni// oM las sdom pa bzhin du 'dod// gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dus thub de bzhin nor can dang // phan tshun sbyor gnas brjod
158a4(rgyud): pa las// bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur// bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste// tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spungs// brda tsam du ni oM zhes bya// dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin//
158a5(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// sku gsum du ni yang dag bshad// gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni// des na oM ni sdom pa yin// dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod// de nyid sdom par gyur pa/
158a6(rgyud): yin// brda ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa// bsams nas sdom pa kun tu bshad// mi phyed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis// bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral// rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung //
158a7(rgyud): rjes bcas zhes bya de bsgom bya// rtag tu 'byung ba'i yang shes gzhag/ mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la~M// g.yas dang cig shos bla byed de// shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o// 'di dag zung
158b1(rgyud): byung blang ste// rdo rje ming can byed dang gnyis// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'ag ni thub pa zla byed dang // zla gcig rlab byed gAnyis byas 'a
158b2(rgyud): rten pa yi zhag dbye bas// rgya che rangs ni bshad pa yin// gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni// zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs// de nyid nye bar 'grub bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i yul ni
158b3(rgyud): dam pa yin// gang tshe shes rab thabs ye shes// de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad
158b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang // gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams// chos sku mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlog/ 'das pa rnam
158b5(rgyud): ni chos sku yis// bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs// sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni// cung zad
158b6(rgyud): tsam yang yod ma yin// 'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i// sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// mi phyeng rdo rje gsum bsgoms la// sgyu na
158b7(rgyud): ji lta bar 'jam pa// de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad// rig dang ma rig yang dag ldan// srog la sogs te bcu gnyis bshad// dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs// de nyid rna ba lasom
159a1(rgyud): 'gyur// zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas// nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin// khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis// lam rtsom pa'i ni brdugs pa yis// de nyid du ni
159a2(rgyud): sgrub pa mchog/ sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin// sngags dang dngos med de byed pa// mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs// rtog pa las byung de 'di ni// dngos med pa ni bsgoms pas so//
159a3(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni// lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // lce dang de bzhin lus dag dang // pags pa rkang par yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa//
159a4(rgyud): lha dang nyan dang dri dang ro// reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa// rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi// 'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku// sangs rgyas byin gyis
159a5(rgyud): byin rlabs kyis// de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can// dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin// shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs// rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la// rang gi chos ni spangs nas su//
159a6(rgyud): tshig gi lam de ston par byed// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog/ cho 'phrul de la ga las byung // de nas dang sogs yang dag pas// slar yang de lagasol 'debs kyang // gsol ba 'debs pa/
159a7(rgyud): tsam gyis ne// de dang 'dra bar gal 'gyur// phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'// lha rnams thams cad spong ba yin// de ltar sku las su byung ba// dpal ldan chos 'di'ang gsum gyi lam// byin
159b1(rgyud): rlabs pa dag longs spyod na// gsung gi rdo rje can du byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs btsun ni gang bzhugs pa// byung dang 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni// mi byed gsum gyi
159b2(rgyud): lam du 'gyur// yid rton bde bzhi bdag nyid// de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba// yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di// rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar brjod do// de yis byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/
159b3(rgyud): rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can// gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang // 'gro ba'i slar ni 'di gyur te// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rnal 'byor// gsung
159b4(rgyud): gi rdo rje ma byed pa// rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob// 'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang // ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan// gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa// de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// ji ltar/
159b5(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur rgyal ni// tshig gis lam gyi las byed 'jug/ gsung byin brlabs pas sngags pa ni// de bzhin don yod nyid du byed// der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di// sgrub pa
159b6(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba'o// sangs rgyas de rnams byin rlob po// sdom pa yul ni dam pa'o// rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po// de ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad// mi byed rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/
159b7(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas// gang zhig byung dang 'byung 'gyur ba'i// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// len gsum
160a1(rgyud): las ni byung ba mdzad// sku yis ston pa'i mdzad pa mchog/ rang sangs rgyas ni sgom pa yin// mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi'ang // smra ba sgrub pa por gyur yin// sems ni/
160a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan mchog gis// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// 'gro 'ong gnas dang bral ba ni// rdo dang sa dang dbyig byed pa// lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis// 'on kyang da ni gsung du
160a3(rgyud): 'gyur// sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i// de bzhin nyid ni 'gre don can// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gcig/ gyur kyang so sor brtan pa yin// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos dag gam// de bzhin
160a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas sogs// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtags// de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// so sor rtog pa 'gags par 'gyur// sku la sogs
160a5(rgyud): pa'i grangs mnyam par// sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtogs gyur// stong pa shin tu sbyor ba yang // de ni gsal bar the tsom med// sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni// gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed//
160a6(rgyud): 'das pa dag ni de thams cad// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi// byang chub bsdus nas bshad pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa// mdor bsdus
160a7(rgyud): pa yi 'di yin no// sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' yang rung // rmongs pas 'di las 'das na ni// de ni 'gags par the tshom med// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gsang ba
160b1(rgyud): dam pa yang dag srung // ldan gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub mchog ni bstad par bya// su la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog/ rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i// dmatshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'o//
160b2(rgyud): le'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin// dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgyu gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma shrI b+ha dra dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang
160b3(rgyud): pos bsgyur cing nus te gtan la bab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra mA la a b+hi d+hA na me hA mog tan+t+ra sarba tan+da rmed la rag tu bye dka ma mi / 'od
160b4(rgyud): skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
160b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
160b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs pas bzhugs te/
160b7(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par rtogs pa la mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa/
161a1(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas dgyes pas mchog tu pad+ma dgyes pa/ chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes/
161a2(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa// rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dam tshig bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang
161a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang / byang chub
161a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / de lta bu rnams gtso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i rigs dang 'brel ba byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun
161a6(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
161a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
161b1(rgyud): mkha'i gtsug tor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams rnams kyis nges par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / byang chub
161b2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje seng po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
161b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'
161b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems
161b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i spyi gtsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i chos
161b6(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab
161b7(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje dang / gzhan yang dpag tu
162a1(rgyud): med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas lhag par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de'ang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu
162a2(rgyud): bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so// de nas
162a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzigs nas/ de nas snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes/
162a4(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye sde bzhugs so// 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
162a5(rgyud): po de rnams la reg par mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
162a6(rgyud): dag nyid dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu mgu ba skyes nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to// bsdus pa
162a7(rgyud): deyang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar byung bar gyur pa des brgyal ba de dag la reg nas/ rdo rje 'phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs
162b1(rgyud): nas gnas so// slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur to// rdo rje'i yi ge hUM brjod pa de nyid kyi bde ba chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba nyid
162b2(rgyud): kyi thugs ka'i lte ba'i rtsa sbubs nas 'od zer chen po phyung ste rang rang gi stan la 'khod par gyur te// de nas de rnams chu'i gting nus 'thon pa lta ngur sems dga' ba skye ste/ bcom ldan 'das
162b3(rgyud): kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i cho 'phrul mthong nas shin tu mig gdangs te bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag par bstod do// bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i
162b4(rgyud): dga' bas rgyas// bcom ldan mchog tu ngal bso kye// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das// bcom ldan nyid kyi dgyes nyams bltar// 'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde// e ma'o lhan cig
162b5(rgyud): skyes bdud rtsi// ro bsten thugs rje chen po ste// bcom ldan sems can thams cad kyi// sems can don kun gsal bar mdzad// de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa// phyag rgya chen po rab dbye ba/
162b6(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor che la dgyes// 'ching ba thams cad gcod mdzad kyi// bcom ldan dgyes pa cher mdzad cing // 'gro ba skal bzang nges par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde// rab tu dag
162b7(rgyud): zhing mgu ba stsol// e ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas pa// rang byung go 'phang sgrub pa po// e ma'o shin tu zab mo'i chos// dmigs pa med par ston par mdzad// e ma'i rdo rje 'chang chen gtso/
163a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang po shin tu gsang // e ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa// e ma'i spros pa rnam spangs shing // bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa// theg pa'i sgron mas snang ba
163a2(rgyud): mdzad// mgon po bdag cag khyed drin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang thob// mgon po bdag cag lam log zhugs// khyed kyis yang dag lam la bkod// mgon po bdag cag mun par
163a3(rgyud): 'thoms// ye shes snang ba thob par mdzad// dam tshig rdo rje nyi ma kye// phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad// bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid// phyag
163a4(rgyud): 'tshal gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'// dga' ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud// ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par gyur te/
163a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'dod nas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang / sems rtse gcig gis dga' bar byed pa'i gsung nyan par 'dod nas ba spu ldang
163a6(rgyud): ba dang / dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod nas sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams
163a7(rgyud): kyi de lta bu'i sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ slar yang rdo rje 'phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi rig
163b1(rgyud): ma byung ste/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang rang /
163b2(rgyud): gi rig ma la 'khyud de/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas slar yang de dag de lta bu'i gzugs nyid du mthong ste/ ngo mtshar skyes nas mig gdangs te ri mo'i bkod pa lta bur
163b3(rgyud): mthong ba nyid kyis ci'ang mi smra bar gyur pas/ de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma yang dag par bskul te phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor
163b4(rgyud): dor nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las btsun mo rdo rje rigs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga las de bzhin
163b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to// phyung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rang
163b6(rgyud): rang gi stan la gnas par gyur te/ kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis so// kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis so// kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis so//
163b7(rgyud): ji srid gnod mdzes rgyal po dang // gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yi// rgyal po'i bar gyi gzugs kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci'ang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//
164a1(rgyud): gang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod nas smras pa ni/ e ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i don sngon mdzad/
164a2(rgyud): e ma'o rdo rje theg gsal ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston mdzad// ces lan gsum brjod nas de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad
164a3(rgyud): cig thang cig yud tsam de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de dag mthong nas/ phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad
164a4(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan ye shes rdor dbang phyug/ gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pa// dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor dbang // thugs rjes bdag gi tshig gson cig/ bskal
164a5(rgyud): pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje theg pa mngon 'dod pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// 'di dag lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod// snyigs ma lnga yi dus na ni/
164a6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams// brtson 'grus chung zhing bsod nams chung // lta ba ngan pa mang po dang // tshe thung ba yi sems can rnams// go 'phang mchog ni thob phyir zhu// rgyal ba'i
164a7(rgyud): sras ni de dag dang // ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams// 'khor ba las ni pha rol tu// gang gis myur du thar par 'gyur// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la// 'di ltar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/
164b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyed drin gyis// de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi// rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// bla na med pa'i rim pa gnyis// rdo rje 'brang ba ngon/
164b2(rgyud): rtogs pa// cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyi// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni// khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gsol// dpal ldan 'dus par brda tsam gang // rnal 'byor bla na med
164b3(rgyud): rgyud du// thub pa chen pos chos phung po// brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong ngo // de skad smras nas mdun 'dug ste// lus kyis phyag ni byas nas kyang // ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems
164b4(rgyud): dpa' 'gro ba'i bla// rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don// de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang thob// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don// bdag la bstan par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i ming ni ci/
164b5(rgyud): 'dus pa ci zhig stong pa ci// thig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra// gsang ba dang ni dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni sgra tsam dang // rlung gi de nyid bde chen ci// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor dang // sngags kyi de nyid rnal
164b6(rgyud): 'byor pa// rlung rnams dang ni 'khor lo dang // grangs ni ji tsam gang du gnas// rnal 'byor lus la rtsa gang lags// rnam pa sna tshogs sogs skad cig/ dga' ba bzhi dang rdzas dang ni// sngags dang rlu
164b7(rgyud): dadang thig le zhes// yi ge gsum gang de nyid gsum// de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsum// lus kyi stong nyid ye shes dang // lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas// de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci// 'char ba dang ni nub pa ci// mgon
165a1(rgyud): po dga' rnams ji ltar ni// yang dag skye ba gsal bar gsungs// sngar bshad rtsa rnams cag tu ni// rdo rje'i lus la ji ltar n+tu// mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni// gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsus
165a2(rgyud): rlung rnams ji ltar ldang ba dang // gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim// de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa// gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob// rnam rtog rlung gi rab bcad nas// rnam rtog med par ji ltar 'char// rtsa rnams
165a3(rgyud): ji ltar nub pa dang // sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom// dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ci// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang // rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta bu// phyag rgya'i dbye ba rje
165a4(rgyud): tsam zhig/ phung po la sogs skye mched dang // phywa rgya chen po'i ming ni ci// ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang // bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnas// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa dang // stong pa nyid ni gang du skye// nyin ma
165a5(rgyud): dang ni mtshan mo gang // A li kA li badz+ra dang ni// mtshams kyi 'char baji lta bu// rgyud gsungs sngon ni bsnyen pa sogs// cho ga nyi shu'i las dang ni// rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci// mchod pa'i/
165a6(rgyud): chog ji ltar baspangs// de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang // lha po'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs// drung du thog mar gsungs pa'i// 'di skad bdag sngag sa lta bu// 'di skad ces sogs dang de ngas
165a7(rgyud): ngan rgyas par mau sar 'gyur// ga dag nyid rgya // dung rtsi ldan papa'ang dang // rna mi bying ma tshogs 'dus pa dang // de badzin pa sang ba'i brda ngon// phrug kyang drums kyi sa/
165b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams ning ltar gsungs/ sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun gyi// mi rnams bshad pa'i sra bra/ jam ston pa rlob dpon dag / rdo rje 'chang ni bshad paci// slob pa'i yon tan da /
165b2(rgyud): ldan pa// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snong du 'gyur// de mi spyod pa'i dbyed du// de'i 'bras bu ji lta bu// zhi brgyas pa dbang dang ni// de bzhin gsang dang bsnad ba dang // rengs par byed pa nyid dung ni//
165b3(rgyud): bsgrung bya la ni mngon spyod dang // sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang // mngon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ts+tsha// dngos grub brgyad ni thob pa dang // mngon shes lha ni ji ltar thob// rnal 'byor rnams kyis de 'i
165b4(rgyud): mthong // skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// lus brten pa dang ni rgas pa med// bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba dang // gser 'gyur sogs kyi sbyor ba dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che// 'a
165b5(rgyud): ba'i bla ma ji ltar thob// lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang // de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu// 'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas// thim dang longs spyod bdag po dang // rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid kyi/
165b6(rgyud): de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur// de ltar dri tshig rdzogs pa dang // lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// lus kyis phyag byas de nas ni// gtso bos rdo rje sems dpa' la//
165b7(rgyud): legs so bya ba byas nas ni// tshangs dbyangs zab mo snyan pa yis// 'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsol ba gdab pa
166a1(rgyud): dang / dri ba dang / slong ma'i las nyid la sogs brgyad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// de nyid gsung gi/
166a2(rgyud): 'gro mgon gyis// lag na rdo rje la bos te// yang dag dris pa nges bshad pa// snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa// dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun// khyod kyis dri bar byas pa rnams// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang
166a3(rgyud): chen bdag/ bya ba skyed pa'i rgyud rnams dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni gang du yang // mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa// rdo rje'i dbang phyug de nyid mchog/ dris pa'i lan rnams gsal por ni// nges par
166a4(rgyud): yis rab bshad pa// skad cig gis ni spyan phye la// mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la// thugs rjes khyab par de skad gsungs// de phyir khyed ni legs par nyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes//
166a5(rgyud): thugs brlan cing the tsom thams cad gcod pa la/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab ste mchog tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni/ dbang bskur ba ni gtso bo ste// dngos grub thams cad
166a6(rgyud): rtag tu gnas// nga yis ji bzhin don bshad kyis// de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon// thog mar slob ma gang gi tshe// blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la// de'i tshe na sdong
166a7(rgyud): du 'gyur// yang dag dbang bskur gyis dben na// sgrub pos chud kyi don shes kyang // slob dpon slob mar mtshungs par ni// mi bzad dmyal ba chen por 'gro// de phyir yang dag bla ma ni// rab tu gus
166b1(rgyud): pas bsnyen bkur bya// dbang bskur thob cing de nyid shes// blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can// zab cing rgya che dri ma med// gnod dang 'tshe ba rnam par spangs// skal bzang lus ni rdzogs pa dang /
166b2(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par brgyan// chags pa che la gcig tu dgu'// yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs// bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang // rnal 'byor ma yis mngal nas skyes// rdo rje theg pag
166b3(rgyud): tu mos// theg pa da man la rgyab kyis phyogs// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// bla ma slob mas bsnyen bkur bya// yang dag bla ma rnyed nas ni// skyob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams// ngag dang rtogs dang
166b4(rgyud): sprin byas nas// ji bzhin ye shes bzang dang ldan// ji ltar rin chen brdar ba dang // gser ni bsregs dang bcas pas brtags// de bzhin du ni slob ma yang // lo ni bcu gnyis bar du brtag
166b5(rgyud): de phyir phan tshun de lta bus// dus kun tu ni de ltar brtag/ gzhan du bgegs ni 'byung 'gyur te// dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal che// dug ni sngags kyis 'joms pa bzhin// sngags kyis
166b6(rgyud): dge byas bcud len byed// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sngags kyi slong ma rtogs byas nas// bla ma dbang bskur la sogs kyis// dngos grub phyir ni ji lha'i don// de phyir dbang bskur slob pa ni/
166b7(rgyud): mngag pa yang dag par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 'de chen la// de la lag na rdo rjes zhus// dbang bskur je ltar chud ngu ni// gtso bo chu ni gsungs pa lags// rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad ma khyen/
167a1(rgyud): the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// de kho na nyid mkhyen pas na// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// don de ji lta ba bzhin du// nga yis yang dag bshad kyis nyon// dbang bskur ba'i
167a2(rgyud): dbye ba ni// dang po'i dbang ni gtso bo ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming can no// gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste// bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o// gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste// bcu gnyis pa ni gsang
167a3(rgyud): ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor// bcu bzhi pa ni don dam ste// dbang bskur re re sa re'o// rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang // bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya// dga' ba la sogs
167a4(rgyud): rim pa yis// thams cad la ni nga yi khyab// mar ngo yi ni tshes gsum dang // de bzhin tshes bcu tshes bcu bzhi// yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la// bla mas cho ga bzhin dbang bskur// lus phra/
167a5(rgyud): lo ni bcu drug lon// gzugs dang skal ba dag gis brgyan// sngobasangs mig ni yangs pa dang // snying rje'i bsam ldan yang dag mos// ngag snyan dbang bskur thob pa dang // rnal 'byor rgyud la
167a6(rgyud): lhag par mos// yang na le ni nyi shu lon// nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste// de las lhag pa skal med 'gyur// de ni dngos grub ring du byed// lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la// chung ma 'am yang na
167a7(rgyud): phreng ro 'ag/ yang na bu mo'ang dang pa mis// bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// gser dang rin chen gos dang ni// me tog 'phreng ba sna tshogs pas// mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// slong ma yis ni
167b1(rgyud): 'di skad brjod// deng nas brtsams te bdag dran du// gtso bos bdag ni mchod pa bzhes// de lha'i rnam pas mnyes nas ni// bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod// bla ma 'o bo rdo rje 'chang // de phyir rang
167b2(rgyud): dag bla ma mchod// de nas bcom ldan yum drug rgya// yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya// bsten pa las ni gang byung ba// lhung bskal bzang kha la ni// sbom po zla stug sbyor ba yis// yang dag par ni
167b3(rgyud): longs sbyar bya// de las skyes pa'i ye shes ni// bde ba chen po rang rig pa// 'byung rngub pa ni ro gcig cing // rab tu dga' ngas mchod par bya// hUM phaT sngags ni nor bu'i sgor// bkod de rdo rje rab
167b4(rgyud): bskyod bya// dga' rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// skad cig de la skyes gyur pa// dga' ba'i sems kyis bde ba la// rdo rje btsun mo'i kha nas brjod// de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni// gtad nas gsal
167b5(rgyud): bar 'di skad brjod// ji ltar pad mchod bya ba ni// byos la e baM mchog gi gdong // gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ rang nyid 'di yi snying la zhugs// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas nyid//
167b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i dngos de yang // bde chen rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par gyis// lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni// dbang bskur
167b7(rgyud): gtso bor gyur pas na// thams cad ji lta ba bzhin thob// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste
168a1(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// / de nas de nyid gzhan yang nyon// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i don gsal ba// rlud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni// dri ba gzhan la brjod mibya/
168a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes bya'i ming // de yang sa ni bcu gsum pa// dga' ba bzhi yi don gyi gnas// thams cad stong pa dga' ba ste// ngag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das// gnyis pa thams cad rnam
168a3(rgyud): par spangs// skal bzang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'// rnal 'byor ma yi ngag gi yul// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes bshad do// stong nyid rdo rje gsang pad+ma// rtsa ni rdo rje dbyings
168a4(rgyud): dbang phyug/ ye shes mchog tu bde ba che// lhan skyes dga' rmad byung ba// rdo rje de yang rnam rtog rnams// 'bigs par byed par yongs su grags// 'phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun// byang chub
168a5(rgyud): sems kyi rdo rje rnams// mi phyed pas ni rdo rjer gsungs// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni// gang yang rung bas brjed mi bya// de ni dbus su yongs su grags// 'phreng ba rgyun ni mi 'chad par// dga'/
168a6(rgyud): b.rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis// rnam rtog rlung kun 'bigs par byed// rlung la 'bigs par mi nus so// nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni// brgya dang brgyad lhag gsal bar yang // rnam rdog rang bzhin/
168a7(rgyud): rlung rnams ni// 'char ba dang ni 'joms pa dag/ ji lta ba bzhin rab dbye yis// rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyon cig/ btang bzung dang ni dung phyur dang // myos pa dang ni blo ngan dang // bsil byed dang ni
168b1(rgyud): gala' ba dang // ngar rnams dang ne sba re dang // gzigs pa chu srin dza sha dang // rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus// 'dod myos chung ngu sbyin dang // sna tshogs skyed dang 'dud pa dang // sems dang /
168b2(rgyud): dang sgra sgrogs dang // rlung lha dang ni gnad 'bigs dang // me dang dus dang ci bgyi dang // rdo rje mchog sbyin tsu ta dang // sbrang ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od// kam po dza dang rol pa can// yungs nag rab bkram
168b3(rgyud): dus 'gugs dang // sdig pa dang ni g.yon can rten// grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang // kun sel mchog ster myos byed dang // nga rgyal mtsho dang tshogs bdag dang // rtsangs pa dang ni sa mi blo// theg
168b4(rgyud): pa bzang dang mchog tu skyes// dri med phrug gu nyi ma dang // gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon// stobs bzhin nga ro dang ni dus// sdom pa dang ni mchongs nas 'gro// spang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang // thod dang sgur po
168b5(rgyud): drang po dang // sa dang sa la 'gro ma dang // bram ze dang ni sna 'gyur gnas// ma mo'i rigs dang lce bskyod pa// mi spra dang ni rnga sgra'i sprin// dga' bar byed dang mig yangs dang // dri med 'od srungs ne tso dang //
168b6(rgyud): sna tshogs mchu dang mig mnyam dang // mdzes dang chos kyi dbyigs pa dang // 'gro kun snying stobs bstan pa dang // za phong phung bu snyom las dang // kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtse// rtswa brad dbang byed gso
168b7(rgyud): can// gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'// glog 'phreng dang ni dga' byed dang // dbugs 'byung rag lce dang ni// bde mchog su dum par rmongs// pad+ma'i dra ba pad+ma bskor// dgra swa ma bya rlung dang ni// rdo rje dbang phyug
169a1(rgyud): rlung gi meng// de ltar nga yis bstan pa yin// bcom ldan dris pa'i rlung rnams kyi// gnas rnams kyi ni dbye ba ris// de dag gang las ldang ba dang // mched pa rnams su bgyid ba lags// bcom
169a2(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'khor lo drug la khyab pa'i rlung // chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu gnas// srog ces bya ba'i 'gro la khyab// rnam rtog med pa mtshan byed na// nam mkha' mchog
169a3(rgyud): las shar nas ni// rlung gi rang bzhin 'joms par byed// rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu// chos kyi 'khor lo'i cha na gnas// mtshan byed dus nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid// nyi ma phyed/
169a4(rgyud): kyi mtha' ru ni// rlung rnams kyang ni ldang bar byed// nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug las dgu bdag nyid// mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mthar// rlung rnams gsal bar rgyu ba dang // de nyid
169a5(rgyud): gaganas kyi dbye ba yis// sna tshogs pa yi rtog par 'gro// rnam par rtog pa rnam phye nas// de dag ming rnams bshad par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon par zhen// phrag dog
169a6(rgyud): khro dang ser sna dang // g.yo dang sbrul cha lugs ngan// blo rgod parkam chags nyid dang ni// the tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang // dga' dang chags bral dregs pa dang // 'cha ba dang sred dang bag chags dang // sgyu dang rmongs
169a7(rgyud): dang 'dod chen dang // rtsod dang rtse 'jo spyi brtol dang // tshul 'chos reg dang kun nas gdungs// rnam 'gyur ma zhi shes bzhin med// bems po log pa'i nga rgyal dang // 'gyod dang khrel ni med pa dang // gus pa med dang
169b1(rgyud): ches pa med// blo dman ngo tsha med dang mching // ngo tsha shes dang ngo tsha dang // mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang // yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems med// bsgrims dang the tsom ngal ba dang // dbang dang 'khrul pa'i snying stobs dang /
169b2(rgyud): snyam sems pa dang brgyal ba dang // thim pa dang ni mi bsrun dang // gya gyu snyoms dang mos pa dang // rig byed min dang bag yod dang // gnas ngan len dang nyam chung nyid// yid mi bde dang lhag par rtog/ skrag dang rmugs
169b3(rgyud): ngang gnyid dang ni// banam chags rol pa khrung khrung dang // 'tshe ba le lo yon po nyid// bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang // kun rdzob de nyid don yod dang // star dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang // 'jigs dang 'dar dang
169b4(rgyud): pra bdag nyid// gsal dang rnam gsal lhad 'jug dang // 'brel dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang // rus sbal ngom med gnod pa dang // mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong // gnas med mang du smra ba dang // bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang /
169b5(rgyud): ni// ya mtshan dga' dang skye bo ngan// dman pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum// 'khor ba la ni chags pa dang // rtag tu brgya dang brgyad lhag pa// nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tu ni// rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yin//
169b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rlung dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i tshig gi dbye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// de nas rdo rje gsum nyim// gsang ba'i pad+ma la
169b7(rgyud): 'byed pa// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang bzhugs// 'dus pa'i mchog don rab gsungs pa// 'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad// 'dres pa nga yis khyod la bshad// 'khor lo bzhi dang tha mi dang // sngags kyi
170a1(rgyud): lhan cig chos bzhin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor pa sbyor ba// gang tshogasang ba na ba stan// mang dag sbyor ba ga gyur ba// de ni nam mkha' rnas rgyas nyid// rnamam pa' las ni
170a2(rgyud): pa'i rlung // de yis me ni rab tu 'bar// rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// rtsa rnams rab sang gzi brjid kyis// bde ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor khyab// bde ba chen po'i
170a3(rgyud): byang chub sems// rnam par zhu nas rtsar gnas pa// rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir// khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang // phung po rnams ni yongs bzang dang // ngal bso ba la rlung rnams
170a4(rgyud): ni// dga' ba rnams ni yang dag skye// de nas byang chub sems kyang ni// gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas// ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa dang // rtsa ni gcig gi 'bras bu ni// ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la// 'dres pa
170a5(rgyud): zhes ni de la gsungs// phung po khams dang dbang po dang // yul rnams su ni sbas pa rnams// rnam rtog kun nas zad pa las// bde ba chen po yang dag skye// ro gcig pa ni ngal bas ba// de ni 'dus pa
170a6(rgyud): 'dres pa ste// de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsungs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad
170a7(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// stong nyid don ni rab rgyas pa// stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun// nang du khyab pa'ang chos nyid de// de nyid yang dag
170b1(rgyud): shes pa ni// de bzhin nyid dang rnam mi rtog/ bdag dang gang zag chos rnams ni// bdag med rang bzhin gcig pa nyid// stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa// nam/
170b2(rgyud): 'byor gcig pus rtogs pa ste// rtog ge pa yi spyod yul min// chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa// 'khor lo drug tu rnam par brjod// de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo legs
170b3(rgyud): rgyas pa// de ni nam mkha' khyab cing phra// khyab med zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can// dmigs pa med cing rten pa med// gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang // rnam par mi rtog mchog tu zhi// rang bzhin med
170b4(rgyud): cing dri ma med// gnyis su med cing bya ba med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// dus dang dpe las 'das pa ste// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul bral// chos nyid chos ni thams cad kyis// ji ltar
