170b5(rgyud): bzhin mngon par brjod// dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral// dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol// de ni kun nas bsgribs pa med// nam mkha' lta bu'i mchog tu khyab// chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin
170b6(rgyud): skye// de ni de bzhin nyid ces brjod// gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing // gang du yang ni 'gro ba med// rmongs dang 'khrul pa gcig pu las// de ni rab tu spro bar snang // bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal
170b7(rgyud): spangs// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi gos// 'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel// rtog pa dang dral dri ma med// bdag dang srog dang skye ba po// skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang // shed las
171a1(rgyud): skyes dang shed bu dang // byed pa po dang tshor ba po// shes pa po dang mthong ba po// sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs// phung po skye mched khams la sogs// rnam shes dang ni gzung /
171a2(rgyud): pa yis// sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra// nam mkha' mchog la yang dag gnas// de ltar ma lus stong nyid don// brjod dang brjod bya'i don dang bral// ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang // rang byung mchog
171a3(rgyud): turmad byung ba'o// brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir// de kho na nyid mthong ba med// bdag nyid rang gi ngo bor rig/ pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul
171a4(rgyud): min// de ni rang rig par bshad do// chos kun gnas ni zhi ba'o// rnam rtog gis 'khrul rtog ge gang // mi shes pa yi rmongs pa rnams// don dam par ni mi shes shing // kun rdzob dgra 'i mdzod 'dzin
171a5(rgyud): pa// ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing // rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed// rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// de ni mchog tu phra bar spyod// stong nyid yang dag nam mkha' che// shes dang shes
171a6(rgyud): byarnam par spangs// rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral// stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// 'khor lo drug gi phraganang na// zla ba byed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gyi/
171a7(rgyud): 'khor lor gnas// byed min gang ba med pa dang // ji ltar bag chags chu zla bzhin// rlung gi 'khor lo srog tu bshad// mtshan byed ga dacig ma la 'char// de ltar yang dag sgom pa ni// 'don rdzong
171b1(rgyud): nyid sgom byed pa'o// don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// yang na rgyu 'bras sbyor ba'i phyir// de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom// don dam rang gi ngo bor ni// kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du// bsgoms pas/
171b2(rgyud): 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur// ji ltar til la til mar ni// gnas pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin lus la stong pa nyid// gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong ba med// bla ma'i zhal las 'di
171b3(rgyud): shes par// yang dag rig pas kun rdzob spangs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
171b4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le'i dbye ba bla na med// 'jig rten thig le dbye bas dben// 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor// mdzod spu'i dbus na gnas pa ni// thig le rlung du
171b5(rgyud): yang dag bshad// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed// rnal 'byor mdud pa bkrol nas ni// rlung gi de nyid rig pa de// mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba de yang mi shes par// rlung dang sngags
171b6(rgyud): kyi rnal 'byor gyis// brjod dang brjod bya'i dpe las 'das// mi gsal log par mthong rnams kyis// bsam gtan bsgom bya dang bral ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'// rnal 'byor ma
171b7(rgyud): yi drin gyis ni// zhal nas zhal du brgyud nas gnas// bcom ldan bde ba chen po la// rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa// 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bstan du gsol// thig le'i dbye ba rig bcas pa// rnal
172a1(rgyud): 'byor mchog ni gang gis shes// sbyor bas mdud pa 'byed par byed// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di// myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// de skad nus nas rdo rje can// rdo rje
172a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la gsungs pa// mchog tu gsal ba 'di nyid ni// gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni// nga yi bshad kyis de nyid nyon// snying gi pad sbubs nam mkha' la/
172a3(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs// steng dang 'og la brten nas ni// srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas// de la'ang dbye bar dka' ba yi// dbus su mdud pa gsum gyis dkri// de yis mchog dang bcom byas
172a4(rgyud): pas/ steng du 'gro ba thob mi byed// des bcom slar yang rnam lnga rgyu// srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang // khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid// rtse mo lnga las rgyun du ni// rtsa lnga la ni yang dag brten// rmugs/
172a5(rgyud): dang rnam par rgyas pa dang // myos dang btung dang mdza' bo ste// de dag rtsar ni lngar shes bya// rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab// steng gi srog gi dbus na yang // rdo rje'i lte ba'i mkha' dbyings 'gro// srog ces
172a6(rgyud): bya ba'i rlung chen po// lte ba mdud pa dang phrad pas// bcom nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu// rtse mo rnams la rtsa lngar ni// zla ba'i cha dang sA dang ni// bsnyen bkur lkog shal mchin pa ste// rtsa ni lnga yi ming yin no//
172a7(rgyud): rtsa ni lnga las rgyu ba'i rlung // klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal// de ltar rtsa de dang bcas pa// lus kyi thur du 'gro bas na// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni// yang dang yang du #
172b1(rgyud): bskul bas kyang ni rgyas pa na// gti mug chen pos dbang du byed// de steng chos kyi 'khor lon// gnas pa'i rtsa ni bskul byas na// de rnams lhan cig rtsa de dag/ de sdang gis ni dbang du byed// rang \u0f7f/
172b2(rgyud): bskul byas nas bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// chags pa chen pos dbang byas nas// bskul ba dang ni de steng gi/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i
172b3(rgyud): bde chen du// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cigatu// byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed// rnam rtog rnam par rgyu byed cing // sna tshogs dbye ba thams cad las// steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro// srog gi
172b4(rgyud): rab tu bcom nas ni// de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rtsa ra// zhugs nas thur du kha bltas pa'o// de yang thur du mi 'gro ste// ma rig mdud pa'i 'khor lo ni// rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung /
172b5(rgyud): de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas// mig dang rna ba de bzhin sna// lce ste rnam par shes pa bzhi// rtse mo bzhi nas phyung nas ni// bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas// rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu//
172b6(rgyud): don ni rab tu rgyas par byed// slar yang lam de nyid nas ni// ji lta ba yi rim pas 'jug/ de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas// rnam shes bstan pa'i skad cig la// de yi chags bcas kyis slar 'phel/
172b7(rgyud): 'khrul byas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las// de ltar bag chags kyis bslad pa'i// rnam shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro// de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas// khams gsum par ni 'khrul pa'o// byed po las/
173a1(rgyud): kyi 'bras bur myong // gzhan nyid du ni 'khor ba med// de phyir 'khor ba gzhom don du// thig le go 'phang gsal bar dbye// sgom pa la ni 'bad par bya// ma rig gzhan ni mi
173a2(rgyud): shes pa// dbus kyi mdud pa de yang ni// de phyed na ni dngos grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pa ste// ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang // mchog tu gsal ba thob nas
173a3(rgyud): ni/ blo bzang ji lta ba bzhin gnas// 'phreng ba mi dgos sgom mi dgos// bya ba mi dgos dgag mi dgos// sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob// las chos
173a4(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya ni// dbye ba 'di ni ma gsungs so// 'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing // de bzhin dga' ba sogs kyis min// phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang gsal// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni thob// stong
173a5(rgyud): nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang // gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang // rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing // 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms/
173a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang // rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad// sngags kyi de nyid nges sbyor bas// rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang // rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang // bla ma'i zhal las nges/
173a7(rgyud): rtogs 'gyur// man ngag med pa'i bzlas pa ni// sngags kyi rgyal po blo rmongs byed// de yi dka' ba gcig pa dang // chu bsrubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar// de bzhin man ngag dang bral sngags// skyes bus ji
173b1(rgyud): srid 'tshom bar// bzlas kyang de yi 'bras bu mi// cha tsam thob par mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho'i gzhi yi ba mtha' yi// sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa// las ni gang yin mi 'dzi
173b2(rgyud): gang 'di ltar bdag nyid 'gro bar byed// de bzhin dga' ba cher byed pa'i// man ngag dang bral sgrub pa po// 'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang // sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye// khong khro skyes pa'i skad
173b3(rgyud): cig la// 'bras bu med cing ngu 'bod 'gro// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dad pas bla ma brgyud pa las// man ngag dag ni bslab par bya// gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab// brgyud pa'i
173b4(rgyud): rim pas gnas par byed// de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang // bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa yis// de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya// sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung // de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang //
173b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// phyag byas nas ni zhus pa ni// khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med/
173b6(rgyud): gang bslabs skad cig dngos grub 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni// gang du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa// skal ba med pa
173b7(rgyud): bsam pa'i rgyus// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas byas la// de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyen// sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med// sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis// gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur// thog mar uSh+ma'i tha
174a1(rgyud): ma bri dbyangs yig drug pas rnam par brgyan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan// dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas// uSh+ma'i mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di// dgu pa dang ni yang dag
174a2(rgyud): ldan// mthar ni tsheg drag mchog gi sgra// sngags kyi gtso bo btu bar bya// de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming // sngags kyi brda ni rmad byung ba// 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir// sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas//
174a3(rgyud): rlung gnyis kyis ni phyi nas ni// ma rig mdud pa 'byed par byed// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu// mchog tu zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis// man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don// gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na// thog
174a4(rgyud): le'i sgra yi go 'phang gsal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// skye bos dben pa lha yi gnas// sgra yi tsher ma rnams dang bral// bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba// skyed mos tshal zhi bde ba che//
174a5(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga la yongs spyod pas// sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas// gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// sgrub po bde ba'i
174a6(rgyud): stan 'dug nas// mig gnyis sna rtser gtad byas nas// sna ni lce ba'i tshad du gzhag/ phrag gong bsnyams la lce rkan sbyar// so dang mchu ni bde bar gzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub glod nas ni// cung zad
174a7(rgyud): cung zad rtsol bral nas// ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngub ni// rdo rje skyil krung legs gnas pas// de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas// yi ge gnyis ni rtag tu bzlas// thig le'i dbye bas bde bas che// zla ba
174b1(rgyud): drug gis rnal 'byor mchogathob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni dang po 'di// a ba d+hU tI dri med gnas// rlung gi de nyid ye shes che// rdo rje sems dpa' yini nu// ri lu ral gri ro langs dang //
174b2(rgyud): rgyal po rig ldan bcud kyis len// dmag dpung rengs dang cig pa 'bigs// rig 'dzin gyon go'i pang mchog/ mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba// 'dod dgur bsgyur dang gzugs mthong dang // gser
174b3(rgyud): 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal// me yi nang du 'jug pa dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang // ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de ltar skad cig gcig la ni// byang chub mtshan nyid go 'phang ngo // dka'
174b4(rgyud): ba spyod pa spangs nas ni// shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan// bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster// sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min// 'phreng ba mi dgos bgrang mi dgos// 'di ni bskyed rim dbye mi dgos//
174b5(rgyud): gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgos// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa dang // zla ba drug gi mngon sbyor bas// go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor
174b6(rgyud): chen po'i chung dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le'i dbye ba dang rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/
174b7(rgyud): bla na med pa nA da'i don// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur// sgra yang mi shigs par ni bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med// rnam pa kun las rnam par grol// lte ba/
175a1(rgyud): sprul pa yang dag gnas// sbrul gyi lce ltar pra ba ni// gnyis med ye shes rmad byung ba// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba// de dag de ltar rin po che/
175a2(rgyud): skyed pa po yi pa dang mas// yi ge med cing gong bu med// 'byung ba chen po rnam par spangs// dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol// skye med zad med rmad du byung // 'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs// spangs shing
175a3(rgyud): lhag ma med pa dang // mchog gi mchog ste zhi ba med// dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas// rnam rtog med cing rten pa med// kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni// bems po
175a4(rgyud): rnams kyi sad par byed// mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// thob pa'i go 'phang bla na med// gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang // rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten// yi ge hoHyis bskul nas ni// me yi
175a5(rgyud): 'khor lo sad par byed// de lha'i nA da'i go 'phang don// bla ma'i zhal la yang dag gnas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ nA da'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u
175a6(rgyud): ste bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don// bla na med pa bshad kyis nyon// gsang ba b+ha ga zhes su gsungs// d+ha ka de bzhin chos 'byung ba// bde ba chen po'i
175a7(rgyud): go 'phang ste// dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas// ye shes lnga li bdag nyid gsal// ye shes chen po spros pa med// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// bral dga'i
175b1(rgyud): mtha' ste mchog tu phra// lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas// dga' dral la sogs skad cig gnas// phra ba yang dag byang chub sems// srog la phan par 'tsho ba ste// srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor
175b2(rgyud): lta bur gnas// dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste// stong nyid skye med 'chi ba med// sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang // bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye// bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste// chags bral
175b3(rgyud): 'gro kun skye ba med// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba thams cad ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis// rtsa yi dbus su 'dzin par byed// gang de skye ba nyams myong bar// gsang ba zhes ni
175b4(rgyud): bya bar grags// de nyid gsang ba yi ni mchog/ bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas// phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis// bla ma bzang po'i zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng
175b5(rgyud): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don// de kho na nyid bshad
175b6(rgyud): kyis nyon// sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang // de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod// rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa// de ni srung ba zhes ni grags// dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la// 'jug cing rtag tu gang
175b7(rgyud): gnas pa// de ni sdom pa srung ba dang // dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin// gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu can// rmongs dang sems khros g.yo can dang // dang med rtog ge ba lhan cig/ rtags kyi
176a1(rgyud): bar 'tsho ba dang // nyan thos nor la brkam chags can// de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing // don dam pa ni mi shes pa// med par lta dang tshul khrims 'chal// gtam dang tshig ni bkyil pa
176a2(rgyud): dang // 'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing // se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang // de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya// las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba// gal te byas pa'i skye bo dang // de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni//
176a3(rgyud): mi bya rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// skyeng na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang // pad snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang // brkam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang // dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya// snod dang cang te'u
176a4(rgyud): gri gug dang // glegs bam dang ni bgrang 'phreng dang // dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la// gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o// dge slong sdom la gnas pa la// rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang // man ngag rnams
176a5(rgyud): ni bstan mi bya// ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing // gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu// ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod// bla ma la yang smra min na// gzhan rnams la ni spos ci dgos// dbang po yul la spyod pa
176a6(rgyud): ni// gang nas de ni bsdams nas ni// stong nyid gnyis med sgyu ma las// sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs// nyams su myong ba'i bde ba yis// bde ba chen po'i dran
176a7(rgyud): pa yis// dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog/ bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang // ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa// blo ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi/ yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin// de lta bu sogs
176b1(rgyud): dam tshig ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya// gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can// bgrang 'phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang // rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang /
176b2(rgyud): glegs bam bsam gtan ras ris dang // thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma// thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir// bla ma la yang smra bar bya// sngags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya// mchu 'gul bar yang
176b3(rgyud): mi mngon zhing // cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis// sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas// gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med// gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad// snod min nor ni chen po dang /
176b4(rgyud): ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs// bla mas bla med dngos grub phyir// 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya// bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang // nor ni chen po la chags shing // snod min slob ma
176b5(rgyud): man ngag mchog/ rmad du byung ba smra ba gang // rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di la// de ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sdom
176b6(rgyud): pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// dam tshim don ni bla na med// bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang // de ni de yi don bshad
176b7(rgyud): bya/ bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang // de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// zhu nas ro gcig slar yang ni// rdo rje lam nas steng song ste// gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o//
177a1(rgyud): dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis// de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang // 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang // bde ba nyams su myong ba gang // de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa/
177a2(rgyud): rtag tu spyod pa bza' ba'o// byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim// zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis// bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o// spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas ni//
177a3(rgyud): de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu// de la snying rje btung ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che// snod mchog gsang ba'i pad+ma blugs// rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed// sems kyis bdud rtsi
177a4(rgyud): 'thung byed na// bdud rtsi lnga yi ro rdzas 'thung // de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang // glang po rta khyi ba glang mi// byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag/ bsres nas skad cig de la bza'// de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes
177a5(rgyud): brjod// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro// dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni// lhan skyes ldan
177a6(rgyud): cig snod du ni// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni// zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por// rlung gi de nyid shes pas bza'// rnam rtog med//
177a7(rgyud): pa'i go 'phang gnas// phyag rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du// rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'// sreg dang rtsol ba'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis//
177b1(rgyud): skom dang sgom min sogs 'khrul pa// srog chen po yi snod du ni// rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs// phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por// ye shes chen po'i me yis min// sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas/
177b2(rgyud): bza'// bdud bzhi khro bo chen po yi// skyobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa po// sgrub pos legs par mnyam gzhag nas// rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'// rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi// thig la gsum ste bran
177b3(rgyud): med// mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni// zos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs med pa// snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni// ye shes chen po mnyam bzhag nas// btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'i/
177b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bshad// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang // de ni skal ldan snod la ni// rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba// bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog/
177b5(rgyud): nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya// de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs// gzhan ni gang du ngas ma bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar
177b6(rgyud): rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//
177b7(rgyud): sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang 'thob// chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad sbubs su// sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni// chags med snang ba med pa dang // gnyis su
178a1(rgyud): med cing dri ma med// dpe bral g.yo ba med pa dang // gzhi med bla gab med pa dang // lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung dang rngub pa rnam par spangs// rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/
178a2(rgyud): de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'// mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che// gzugs cho ga 'chi ba med pa'i mchog/ rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// rgun chang ro yis myos pa ltar// mchog tu nang du song gyur nas// de bzhin
178a3(rgyud): rnam pa kun gyis gnas// sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten// rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas// de nas ston pa bla med pa// rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa ni// bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen// sngags kyi de nyid
178a4(rgyud): rab dbye ba// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid bla na med// mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang // ye shes chen po mchog chen po//
178a5(rgyud): snying po yi yang snying po mchog/ yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams// gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med// lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ sgra tsam du ni yang dag gnas//
178a6(rgyud): stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // snang ba med cing kun rdzob med// gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba//
178a7(rgyud): thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// de tshe thog mar stong nyid sgom// snang ba med pa'i go 'phang zhi// rang bzhin med
178b1(rgyud): gnas nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med la mchog tu rten// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med// byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni// yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung // rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che// de nyid gsum ni ro/
178b2(rgyud): gcig don// a bad+hU tI'i go 'phang gnas// slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni// byang chub sems ni dri ba med// sna tshogs skad cig dbyer
178b3(rgyud): med pa// brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba// rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang // byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob// skye med zhi ba'i thig le tsam// sngags kyi spyod pas spyad
178b4(rgyud): pas na// ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
178b5(rgyud): de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog/ don dam ni bshad kyis nyon// rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rlung gi thig le ye shes che// phra zhing de gnyis go 'phang gsal// dngos grub kun
178b6(rgyud): byed nyams dga' ba// gnyis med rnal 'byor mi zad pa// skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang // lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang // ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// skom dang
178b7(rgyud): bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis// thig le rang gi ngo bo shes// chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas// sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu// bag chags kun las rnam par grol// kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba// sna
179a1(rgyud): yi rtse mor de nyid mchog/ 'od zer thig le bsam par bya// srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor// rtog pa rnams kyi grangs ster ba// skal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni/
179a2(rgyud): rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam// thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos// ngag gi grangs kyi zlos mtshan nyid// yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhen// sgom pa'i go 'phang mi bzad pa// dbum
179a3(rgyud): kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang // rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang // gnas kyi dbye ba rtsa rnams kyi// dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang // rlung rnams kyi ni bzlog pa dang // rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste// de ltar mdor bsdus/
179a4(rgyud): rnam drug gis// 'byung dang rngub pa zhes su brjod// thog mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams// nyi khri dang ni tshig stong dang // de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug/ nyin dang mtshan mo nges pa ni// ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas//
179a5(rgyud): nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du// grangs kyi rjes su sbyor ba yis// grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag/ dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas// de nas rjes su zlos par 'gyur// thun tshod so sor srog rnams dang // rtsol ba ru
179a6(rgyud): ni brtag pa ste// nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni// yang dag par ni nges bzung med// yongs su gsal bar bcad nas ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin dang /
179a7(rgyud): mtshan du nges par ni// de rjes gnas ni rtsol ba yis// tha dad du ni rab tu brtag/ rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis// 'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni// nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las// rtsa yi 'khor lo spyad par bya//
179b1(rgyud): de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// de rjes gnas kyi sgrol ba'i sa// gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya// gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgya//
179b2(rgyud): rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// 'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun
179b3(rgyud): gyis// mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar gnas par rang ngo bo// rtag dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de nas rnal 'byor log nas ni// rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po// rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam
179b4(rgyud): par rgyu// de thob nas ni log pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor pas// nges pa la ni don dam pa// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis// blo dang ldan pa log pa las//
179b5(rgyud): de nas dgag pa de dag kyang // yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam rtog rnams// kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni// rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya//
179b6(rgyud): gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// rlung gi de kho na nyid rten// 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni// de la rtse gcig sems kyi ni// rtog med de kho na nyid kyis// rlung gi/
179b7(rgyud): de nyid rnal 'byor mchog / yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal// khang bzang byed pa bzhin du ni// thog mar sa ni yongs su sbyang // de sbed bgegs dang bral byas la// gnas ni legs par dag par bya// khang
180a1(rgyud): bzang skal ba nyams dga' ba// blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas mchog/ rlung gi de nyid rnam par sgom// snga ma bzhin du mnyam bzhag nas// srog dang rtsol
180a2(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes che// rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya// thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang // de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal// de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/ gsal ba chen po'i kha dog
180a3(rgyud): lngade bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin// phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo// de ni ye shes lnga dag pa// rlung lnga ru ni rgyu ba byed// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i// de nyid mtshan nyid go 'phang mchog/ sna yi rtse mo de nyid
180a4(rgyud): mchog/ rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo bo// rlung gi thig le zhes ni bshad// yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang // sna rtse yungs kar de yang ni// rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni// sna rtser yungs kar de yang ni// srog dang /
180a5(rgyud): rtsol ba'i brtag pa ste// srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa// 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su sgom// steng gi sna las nges 'byung ba// g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi dus ni//
180a6(rgyud): yin par bshad// lkog ma snying kha lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston// thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu// go rims ji bzhin gnas pas brtan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid/
180a7(rgyud): yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid// pad+ma'i mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o// gnyis ka
180b1(rgyud): las ni 'byung ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel lngar snang ba ni// chu yi dkyil
180b2(rgyud): 'khor nyid yin te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung // bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di/
180b3(rgyud): ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min zhing // rtog gi pa yis mi shes so// dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa// de nyid kun gyi go 'phang gsal//
180b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsal// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra// bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i
180b5(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i
180b6(rgyud): tshig ga/ rdor sems go 'phang mi byed pa// rang rigs pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa// bde ba chen po zhes 'di brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam
180b7(rgyud): par spangs// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs// zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bral// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod// rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas lnga 'i/
181a1(rgyud): rang bzhin can// lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun// stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal// rang bzhin med cing rten pa med// gnyis med dngos po rnam bral zhing // cha mang cha ni rnam par/
181a2(rgyud): spangs// rtag tu rtogs pa kun las grol// 'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang // zad med bde ba thams cad gsal// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa// stong pa stong pa
181a3(rgyud): chen po dang // shin tu stong pa mchog gi mchog/ stong pa dang gzhan stong pa'i gnas// nam mkha' lnga yi ngo bo nyid// mi chod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid// mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs// sangs rgyas lnga li/
181a4(rgyud): ye shes mchog/ rang bzhin rdo rje zhes ni brjod// snying rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'dres// mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di// de nyid gsum po ro gcig pa// brjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs// bde chen zhes
181a5(rgyud): bya'i 'khor lor gnas// dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul min// mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob// rnal 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang
181a6(rgyud): gsal// stong nyid lnga yis kun nas gang // cha bzhi yi ni rnam bkag pa// rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbab// nam mkha' lnga yi cha yi gang // 'di ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod//
181a7(rgyud): nyid bde chen go 'phang ste// bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes// mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs// de yi ngo bo de nyid de// rang nyid tshor ba rig pa'o// pha rol gzhan gyi spyod rul min//
181b1(rgyud): dpe bral mtshon par dga' ba dang / rang gi grol yang dag ga nas// rang rig pa zhes bshad pa'o// gnon du mayin rab dga' bzhin// mchog tu gsapa par nyams su myong // de nyid mchog dang rol 'am/
181b2(rgyud): mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs// rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni// de ni mchog dang bde ba che// de nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcig/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug
181b3(rgyud): bsngal las ni grol bar rtogs// gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid can// gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba zhes// shes dang
181b4(rgyud): shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang // mthar gyur kun khyab zhi ba mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde la stsol// dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod// bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba/
181b5(rgyud): 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtog spangs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs// mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos// mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid can// gzung ba rnams kyi yul rnams zhes// kun nas gzugs
181b6(rgyud): la sogs pa las// 'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams// mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de dang bral zhing mchog tu phra// ye shes bde ba kun gyi bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gzung dang
181b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde ba sems ni zhi ba nyid// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des// de las rnam grol 'jigs pa med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/
182a1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing // thugs rje zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde mi gnas// nyan thos ye shes zhi ba nyid// gnyis med mchog dang bse ru'o//
182a2(rgyud): de dag bde ba stobs pa yi// de dang bral ba'i bde chen po// dgang phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus// nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do// de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang /
182a3(rgyud): de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi// bde ba yis ni bye brag byas// dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed// rtsa rnams kun la bde ba ni// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas/
182a4(rgyud): de yi bdag nyid de nyid ni// bde ba chen po zhes ni brjod// rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni// rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min// bsnyen nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min// bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs
182a5(rgyud): pas min// bya ba ma yin 'phreng bas min// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min// cung zad bzhi pa'i dbang bsgyur gyis// bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob// rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni// mchog gi/
182a6(rgyud): ye shes bde ba che// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ bde ba chen po'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// /
182a7(rgyud): nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor// gang gis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pa// mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod// de ni rlung du yang dag grags// yi ges
182b1(rgyud): ni bye bayis// rnal 'byor shes pas rtag mchog stsol// de rten ming kha'i pad+mayis// 'dabam brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor log la ba ba dang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu brdugs
182b2(rgyud): deyi 'dab ma la skyes pa// rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo// mig la sogs pa yang dag sten// 'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod// de dag 'jom pa rlung rdo rje// bgegs mthar byed pa zhes ni brjod//
182b3(rgyud): rnam shes rnams dang gang de la// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su brjod// 'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams gnas// skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis// yul la sogs pa'i 'bras
182b4(rgyud): bu gnas// de la rlung gi yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo zhes ni brjod// rdo rje snying rjes shes par bya// pad+ma yang ni stong pa nyid// de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rjenyi ma zhes ni gsus/
182b5(rgyud): 'od zer tshogs kyi bdag nyid can// de rnams kyi ni 'byed pa gang // de ni pad+ma zhes su brjod// de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bde chen
182b6(rgyud): 'khor lo pad+ma'o// de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang // sbyor ba mchog de rmad du byung // bla ma'i gsung ni rdo rje ste// slob ma bzang gis thos pa'i snod// pad+ma de yi gnas de la// de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tu gsal/
182b7(rgyud): zhiganas pad+ma zhes gsungs la// de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o// de gnyis gcig gyur rnal 'byor na// sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong // rnal 'byor ma zhal pad+mar gnas// rdo rje bde chen bla na med// pad+ma spong ma bzang
183a1(rgyud): gi kha/ an ngag gi ni don gyi snod// de gnyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid// yang dag de nyid don mthong byed// blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi// rdo rje ling gzhes ni bshad// rnam rtog bral nga'i/
183a2(rgyud): blo ldan gyis// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes ni brjod// dam tshig gis brlan rnal 'byor ma// de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor// gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed// stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi//
183a3(rgyud): rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pad+ma zhes ni yongs su grags// de ni kun tu sbyor ba des// dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan// rang gi rdo rje 'chang pad+ma/
183a4(rgyud): de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal// dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste// pad+ma slob ma snod bzang po// de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor// yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu// e ni pad+ma/
183a5(rgyud): zhes su brjod// yi ge baM ni rdo rje nyid// thig le de nyid mi shigs pa// de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni// de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dang // bla ma'i
183a6(rgyud): drin gyis yongs su shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'brang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// \u0f7f
183a7(rgyud): kyi de nyid ye shes mchog/ bshad kyis rdo rje can ni nyon// sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa yis// gang gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// sngags ni gzung bzhin bzlas brjod bya// de yis
183b1(rgyud): myur du dngos grub 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid pa mthar phyin// rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang zhing // phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don// mchog gi de nyid ye shes che// sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yin// dmigs pa med pa'in/
183b2(rgyud): 'phang gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' nges pa'i rgyu// sngags ni yon tan kun gyi gsal// lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o// de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog/ de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa// snying kha'i pad+mar mchog tugs pa//
183b3(rgyud): de nyid ye shes bla na med// zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni// 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni// rnal 'byor pas ni yongs su grags// dmigs med ces ni gang gsungs pa/
183b4(rgyud): de ni don dam par ni brjod// sbrul sogs pa yi dbye ba yis// sngags ni zlos pa gnyis su med// 'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum// sngags kyi don kun bsdus pa'o// bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med// yang dag
183b5(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag bzlas na// dngos grub mtshungs pa med par 'gro// rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla// sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni// sngags kyi man ngag kha brgyud pa// sngags kyi
183b6(rgyud): man ngag mi gsal ba// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la// rdo rje sems dpas yang nas yang // phyag byas nas ni yongs su zhus// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu//
183b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi ming dang don// rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba// sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni// sngags kyi sdom don ji lta bu// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid//
184a1(rgyud): sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// snying po snying po'i don bsdus pa// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med/
184a2(rgyud): bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// nyon mongs med cing mi gsal ba// rang bzhin med pa'i mchog gi mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang // rnam pa med/
184a3(rgyud): pa'i chen po'i mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar byed// thams cad shes shing cha dang bral// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes//
184a4(rgyud): de nyid de ni don dam yang // de nyid de bzhin nyid gzhan min// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// khyab pa kun 'gro stong pa nyid// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms// dri med dri bral
184a5(rgyud): dga' ba dang // rang rig pa yi go 'phang mchog/ dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' bzang // cha yis tshogs rnams rgyas par byed// man ngag gnas kyi bye brag gis// 'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya// rtsa dang mgrin pa/
184a6(rgyud): snying kha kan// rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi// de bzhin du ni las bya ba// zhi ba la sogs go rims bzhin// ji bzhin dngos grub ye shes dang // ji bzhin nyams su myong mtshan nyid// rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu//
184a7(rgyud): rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu// rig pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas// yang dag bsam gtan phyag rgya'i rim// gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi// bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas// rab tu
184b1(rgyud): 'bad pas bslab par bya// gser dang do shal gos dang ni// rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog/ bran dang las byed grangs med dang // dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis// ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la// ded
184b2(rgyud): par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis// sngags kyi don sngon bla ma ni// dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya// phyag byas de rjes sngags pa yis// yang dag gzungs nas 'bras bu'i don// me mi nus pa'i sdug gu dang /
184b3(rgyud): sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba// yang na dur khrod thal ba ni// rab brdal dngos grub ster bar byed// thog mar dbang bskur blang byas nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya// bgegs mthar byed la gtor ma ni//
184b4(rgyud): chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri// dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' cha ldan//
184b5(rgyud): sku yi sa bon du ni brjod// thog ma'i yi ge nyis 'gyur la// uSh+mASha yi cha dang ldan// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ uSh+ma 'phe cha dang bcas// dbyangs yig drug
184b6(rgyud): par yang dag ldan// sde tshan mtha' yi mtha' char bcas// thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gsum// 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed// rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog
184b7(rgyud): sngags btu ba ni bla na med// de nyid dngos grub thams cad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// sngags kyi theg pa kun yin no// rgyu dang mi rgyus nyid la// dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog
185a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni// ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog/ mar dag rje bzhin sngags zlos pa// dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis// de yi dngos grug
185a2(rgyud): rgya chen 'gro// tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes pas// ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che// rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed//
185a3(rgyud): gang zhig sngags ni mgul pa ru// rtag 'chang de kho na nyid shes// rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang // dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // blo bzang 'jig rten
185a4(rgyud): gsum yang 'grub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang
185a5(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon// grangs kyi rim pad+ma na med// ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi// rim paji lnga ba bzhin du// gang gis thob pa skal ba bzang // srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas// gang gis yang
185a6(rgyud): dag yongs su shes// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor// goms pa thob pa de yang ni// bla ma rnal 'byor de shes brgyud// rlung gi
185a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid ji lta bu// lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sprin gyi dpal las gsal bgang // mdor bsdus nas ni dus ni drug/ lo tshogs su ni yongs su grags/
185b1(rgyud): sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te// dus de nyin 'ag drug cu'o// nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la// nyan 'ag gcig ces yongs su grags// nyin mtshan nu chod drug cu ste// de bzhin dbyug sung ba'o// 'drung dang rngub
185b2(rgyud): pa'i dus drug la// tsa shwa zhes ni yongs su grags// skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs// de nyid se gol gtogs pa'i tshad// thang cig gsum la skad cig go/ da la yungs kar bskor ba tsam// dbugs gsum
185b3(rgyud): la ni thang cig go// zang cig de ni yud tsam mo// thang cig gsum la mig btsums te// de yang mig ni 'dzums pa yi// tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te// tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o// bde ba 'char bdegasum
185b4(rgyud): tsamade ni thig le 'pho ba'o// spangs pa gsum la bde bar gnas// de ni rab 'gyed 'jigs pa brjod// dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad// dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag/ 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa
185b5(rgyud): yi mtshan nyid do// 'das pa'i skad cig gsum du gsungs// da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum// ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad// de las slar yang skad cig gsum// de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha// de las cha
185b6(rgyud): gsum de las cha// de srid grangs ni ji srid du// rtog pa stong gnyis su med// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur// srog gi gnas ni bla na med// phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa la// rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa dang /
185b7(rgyud): de yi srog ni shar nas thim// gnyis med de ni bsdus pa'o// gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon// srog ni thim dang 'char ba yis// gang tshe skad cig la sogs rtogs// kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba// de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas/
186a1(rgyud): grol ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// ming ni ma skyes cha chen po// de yang rnam shes dang bral ba// ye shes lus ni bdag med pa// der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog
186a2(rgyud): srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo ste// thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la// spro 'dogs skyed pa'i ngo bor byed// de tshe rang gi gnas su thim// rnam shes las ni skye ba rlung // de las ma ni
186a3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur// me las chu ni 'byung bar byed// de las sa ni yang dag ste// de dag rnams las phung por 'byung // de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni// de las rnam shes rang bzhin med// brgya dang brgyad kyi lhag pa'i rim//
186a4(rgyud): ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas// thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du// rgyags pa bskyed pa'i rlung chen po// nyon mongs yi ni 'das nas ni// sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te// skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed// de las rgya gra/
186a5(rgyud): pas chu yi rlung // rgyags pa bskyed pa za ba'i phyir// phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid// rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrogs byed// de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung // rgyags pa'i chu ni sdud par byed// 'byung ba rnams kyis/
186a6(rgyud): bsdus nas kyang // go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// de la rlung ni btang bzung 'byung // rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed// de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud// khyab cing pra ba sgrib par byed// de la mi btang bzung ba dang // rnam shes
186a7(rgyud): skad cig sgrib par byed// bsgrings nas de las rnam shes kyang // bems por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur// skye mched cha ni sgrib par byed// dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog/ de las thim par gyur pa'i srog/ rnam
186b1(rgyud): shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan// de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad// srog ni thim zhing 'char ba dang // ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes// bla ma brgyad pa'i rim pa 'byung // rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// rdo rje'i/
186b2(rgyud): sgrani sgrub pa'i phyir// 'chib med pa'i sgrub pa ni// gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni// thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten// gang phyir sems can mthung bas// 'tsho ma go 'phang snga ba mi nus// de phyir 'bad thams
186b3(rgyud): cad kyis// 'chi ba med par rab bsgrub bya// bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon// rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus// 'chi ba med nyid rigs par ni// ji ltar yang dag thim pa
186b4(rgyud): lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bya ba kun sgrub go 'phang ni// 'chi ba med pa'i rnal 'byor che// yang dag de nyid rnam nges pa// sems can tshe ni thung ba yis// dngos grub 'grub pa gang yang med//
186b5(rgyud): de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams// tshe ring ba ni dge ba'o// de la thog mar rnal 'byor mchog/ blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid sgrub// lce ni rkan gyi dbus sbyar ba// byas nas de kho nyi tshig bzla// sems dpa'i skyil
186b6(rgyud): krung bcas nas ni// yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing // kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya// skad kyi gnas son zla ba ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu// zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis/
186b7(rgyud): rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung // mtshan phyed kyi ni dus tshod mthar// ji srid thun gcig ma chad par// de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bzla// rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la/
187a1(rgyud): dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan// yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla// sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs// rdzas kyang rtag tu bsten par bya// de nyid lnga yi rim pas skye// bzlas pa
187a2(rgyud): rdzogs nas rtag tu ni// lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med// lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni// bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni// 'char kar de nas de la yang // yo Shi rak+ShaM bde ba ni// thugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchog/
187a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no// nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na// rdzas kyis tshe ni 'phel bar byed// sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM// de nas lan bdun bzla bar bya// lag g.yas ba dan gyis mtshan la/
187a4(rgyud): snod bzang du la bkang nas su// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni// lan gsum du ni dag par bya// de phyir bud med gzhon nu ni// rtag tu mkhur ba bkang zhing btung // de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang // mar la
187a5(rgyud): bsdigs pa'i 'bras dang ni// ma sha dang ni nyi dga' dang // ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar// til rnams cha mnyam byas nas ni// myos pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin// bla na med pa'i bza' ba po//
187a6(rgyud): de ltar rig pas chog shes nas// su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o// thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni// myur du dngos grub ster bar byed// zla ba drug tu'ang gang bsten pa// de ni rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur// bcud kyis len
187a7(rgyud): dang gser 'gyur sogs// tshe dgug pa ni bla na med// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya// phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos// rgas pa med cing srin nad med// snyoms las med cing lkugs pa med// blo skam drung ma'is
187b1(rgyud): nad sogs med// nang dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba g.yan pa 'brus phran med// mdze nang mtshan par rdol ba med// dud dang pad dkar dpal lus ldan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar/
187b2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed// de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te// rnal 'byor ma rnams sems par byed// lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni// phyag bya ba dang mchod par 'gyur// rnal
187b3(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni/
187b4(rgyud): grangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa nyon// 'khor lo'i grangs kyi dbye ba yis// ji bzhin rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ 'khor lo drug la rten bcu drug/ lus la lha li gzhal yas khang // rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas rdzi bzhin//
187b5(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// 'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod// 'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor bshad// rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char// de bzhin longs spyod
187b6(rgyud): 'khor lo yang // rtsa ni bcu drug yang dag brjod// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o// de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor lo yang // drug cu rtsa bzhir 'char bar bshad// bde ba chen
187b7(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo cher// rtsa ni sum cu gnyis su bshad// de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang // brgya dang sum cu gcig lhag par// rtsa rnams su ni yang dag bshad// gzhan dag tu ni rgyas par yang // rtsa ni
188a1(rgyud): bdun khri nyis stong du// gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba ni// nges par brjod pa 'bum ster gsungs// rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du// snying po las ni snying por gsungs// smin ma'i dbus nas
188a2(rgyud): rlung 'khor lo// bye ba 'khril ba mi bzad pa// mi bzang brtan dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa thung drug ni mtshan nyid do// 'dzin pa rtog med gang ba ni// rtsa gsum gru gsum me dkyil 'khor// mgrin pa'i 'og tu
188a3(rgyud): bshad pa yin// dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang // drag po dang ni gsum yin no// yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs// shin tu bzang por 'gro// stobs chen dang ni mi bzad che// mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che//
188a4(rgyud): rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i cha// rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyags smyo byed// rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu 'thun dang // rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa chang // rtsu ba dang mkha' dang 'byung ba rlung dang // dbugs mi
188a5(rgyud): bde dang g.ya' mkhan 'gro// 'dab chags yan lag khA yi gdong // za phod mi bzad sgra sgrogs dang // dri ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang // dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni sprin// chu ba mthong dang rgyun ltar sngo//
188a6(rgyud): yud tsam gtso bo yang mi skyes// rgyab tu kha bltas dbyug pa dang // dbyug snyems dang ni snying pa dang // tshigs kyi lho dang tshigs kyi tshig/ tshigs kyi tshad dang brtul ba dang // tshigs kyi gnas dang tshigs kyi
188a7(rgyud): gdong // tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud// dul byed dud 'gro gzi brjid dang // dri med dul ba'i snyems pa dang // chu 'phyang lho dang chu 'phyang chags// chun 'phyang chun 'phyang phyed sbrang bu// phrug gu phrug gu ster dri
188b1(rgyud): ba/ lo ma lo ma'i mgrin pa dang // rab mchog ma dang rab gsal te// de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhir bshad// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang // rin chen chen po pad+ma dang /
188b2(rgyud): rdo rje chen po stobs po che// mgon po che dang sgra che dang // nyes dga' chen po myos pa che// 'di brgyad chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus// snying kha'i pad+mar yang dag gnas// longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang /
188b3(rgyud): nyi 'gro gsal dang skal ba dang // sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong // bzang ster bzang dang bkres pa dang // bcud len ro ni sgyur ba dang // ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni// khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor
188b4(rgyud): gnas// grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod// de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can// 'dod can ma dang srog gi lus// zla 'thung zla ster mdzod dang ni// 'dod chags min sma ku sha dang // sha bi spo dang dag pa dang // mi dang
188b5(rgyud): mi ro ne tso dang // gang la gnyis re ldan pa dang // kis ring chang ster bdud rtsi dang // dung can dang ni dung rna dang // dug gi mig dang dug gi sna// rgyags dang nga rgyags pa brkam pa dang // rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo
188b6(rgyud): mtshar rgyags// snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi rten// sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed// pra dang reg bya mchog tu phra// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam
188b7(rgyud): par spangs// rang nyid bde chen rang bzhin dang // gzhan dag la yang ster bar byed// de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rtsa yi rimi med nges par ni// phung po la sogs mi 'byung /
189a1(rgyud): ngo// phung po med na ye shes che// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags// de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni// ye shes
189a2(rgyud): lngar ni rnam par gnas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya// ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing // myur du yang ni 'phel bar 'gro// de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa// ster ba 'di
189a3(rgyud): lathe tshom med// de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya// rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni// 'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed// lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis// rtswa rnams rang bzhin bsgom
189a4(rgyud): par bya// gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis// gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na// de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar// de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus// 'khor lo'i ming can pad+ma rnams// rim gyis rim gyis byed par 'gyur//
189a5(rgyud): 'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob// ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni// 'bab pa nyi ma zla ba'o// mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // gang phyir srang du'i/
189a6(rgyud): rnam par gnas// rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni// de nyid 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis// g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang // g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung // gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni// de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o//
189a7(rgyud): gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal// bde ba kun kyang de lta bu'o// de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me// yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas// sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni// brgyal ma gang tshe 'khrul 'gyur na// pha yi
189b1(rgyud): mkha' la mtshungs par gnas// de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gsang gnas bla mtshan ldan pa'irtsa// me dang nyi ma 'char ba na// de tshe lhag par chags pas non// chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur
189b2(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong // 'jug pa pa yi kha yi rlung // de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur// sa don las ni sems can 'byung // de phyir rtsa las yang dag 'char// 'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye// de nyid byang chub sems
189b3(rgyud): kyang ni// 'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o// ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog/ mchog tu bde ba rmad byung che// ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis// mchog tu bde ba bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgung dpal rdo rje
189b4(rgyud): 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin/
189b5(rgyud): rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni// brgyud pa yi ni rigs kyis skye// gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa// dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa// skye bo skal ba med don du// gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// snyigs ma lnga
189b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dus// sems can myur du dngos grub don// snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis// rang byung ye shes rmad byung ba// rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i// 'khor lo'i rtsa ni sum cu gnyis// byang chub sems ni
189b7(rgyud): gsal 'bab pa'i// rtsa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya// de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas// de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ka tsaT ta pa'i sde tshan// ya ra la wa Sha sha sa// de dag rim par shes par bya// slar
190a1(rgyud): yang de dag bsdus nas me// sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro// de yang zhi da'i ye shes mchog/ byang chub sems la khyim nas 'gro// kun tsog thams cad stangs nAs ni// dang bkun gyig ni
190a2(rgyud): yi mchog/ shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas// rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni// gsum
190a3(rgyud): bye bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal// de ni stong du rab phye ba// so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis// rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan ni// khams
190a4(rgyud): gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni// nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ lha yi
190a5(rgyud): rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar// song nas phan tshun kun nas rten// slar yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro// bde chen 'khor la
190a6(rgyud): rtsa 'i gnas// tsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis las// de yang 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur// 'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa// brgyad brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gas la// rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces// rmad drung stsam
190a7(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis ni// yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob// phung po khams dang don yul nyid// dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid// gsal ba yi ni dkyil
190b1(rgyud): 'khor mchog/ lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang // de nyid kyi ni rang bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sgras rnams// khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi// de nyid mchog na/
190b2(rgyud): yang dag bzhugs// slar yang khro bo rgyal sras la// nang du mi sdang bar ni 'gro// rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs// lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni// de rnams kyang ni sa sogs 'gro// de dag de bzhin
190b3(rgyud): gshegs lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro// de kho na nyid bde gcig pu// de la yang ni thim nas 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las 'grol// bde ba kun rten pa 'i
190b4(rgyud): mchog/ de yang nyams myong tsam las slar// de ni yi ge tsam la thim// yi ge tsam ni thig ler thim// thig le yang ni sgra la thim// sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o// 'od gsal go 'phang yang dag par// spro dang
190b5(rgyud): bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid do// rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang // don dam pa dang bde ba che// gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// byang chub sems ni dri ma med// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che// gnyis med
190b6(rgyud): ye shes rmad du byung // dbang bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang // bzhi pa'i dga' ba go 'phang mchog/ de la sogs ming bye brag gis// go 'phang mchog ni gsungs pa yin// spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis// rim
190b7(rgyud): paji lta ba bzhin du// de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi// rim don bla ma brgyud las shes// zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las
191a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs la sogs skad cig bdag/ yang dag gzung
191a2(rgyud): lugs mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral// skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs// rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya// rnam pa sna
191a3(rgyud): tshogs mngon par 'dod// de yi skad cig dbye bar bya// a lig ga dang / tsum+ban dang / tsu ma sha na dang / ku tsa gra ha dang / bu la tra tra han dang / da sha na dang / da khA da na dang / do la dang / bu tsi tsi dang / kur pA la
191a4(rgyud): sogs pa'i ka ran dang / rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go/ na li stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// lus ni bde ba rgyas pa na// mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa// rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go// lhan cig smras pa'i ye
191a5(rgyud): shes ni// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can// thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i// rnam pa med pa'i skad cig go// na li las byung shu za 'das// rnam pa dang bral skad cig go// ye shes pa ni dang stong pa
191a6(rgyud): bzhi skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//
191a7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi// dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang // dga' bral zhes pa
191b1(rgyud): gsum pa dang // ba'i pa lhan cig skyes par bshad// sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang // mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// longs spyod bral ba'i dga' bya dang // lhar cig skyes dang bdeb me/
191b2(rgyud): lugs bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs// de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste// bde chen 'khor lo spyi bo la// de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin// longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang // dga' bral
191b3(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes// dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed// balha dang dgug dang de bzhin brda// kha la tsum pa byed pa yi// dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes//
191b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog tu// de bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje pad+mar bzhag nas ni// nyams myongs ni skad cig mchog/ rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid// de nyid
191b5(rgyud): rgyur ni rnam par shes// rtsa yi dbus na rab gsal nas// gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 'joms// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed// bral dga'i gnas su myong ba na// rnam rtog skad/
191b6(rgyud): cig mtshan nyid do// de la ro gcig rang bzhin ni// rtsa ni gcig gi rgyun la brten// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong nyid kun
191b7(rgyud): gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de las steng // rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba// nyams su myong ba mchog dga' ste// rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid do// longs spyod 'khor lo des las ni// steng du
192a1(rgyud): byed pa'i skad cig la// nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rnam 'joms mtshan nyid skad cig gi/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo mo// de thob mtshan nyid skad cigs// lhan cig skyes dgas/
192a2(rgyud): nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go// rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal 'byor mtshogs yang dag gzung // de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go/
192a3(rgyud): gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs// de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs par// rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong // slar yang /
192a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid med par 'gro// rab tu sad pa nyams su myong // stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do// bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa// gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba/
192a5(rgyud): gzhan du gsal bar ma gsungs so// rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dga' ba'i mtshan nyid
192a6(rgyud): rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le gsum ni bla na med// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor pa 'i dngos grub 'gyur//
192a7(rgyud): rtsa rnams kun tu 'bab pa dang // byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa// rdo rje'am ni pad+ma'i rtse// rlung gi bzung ba'i skad cig la// rkan dgug pa yi sbyor ba dang // k+ShiM gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob
192b1(rgyud): par byed// bde kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ snying kha'i pad+ma'i lte ba la// dbus su d+ha ni bkod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dngos dang dngos med rnam par
192b2(rgyud): grol de kho na nyid lus skyob pa// phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral// steng dang 'og ni rnam par spangs// sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas// ngag gi dra ba yongs su spangs// rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral
192b3(rgyud): zhing // rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral// gnyis pa kun la rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o// rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/ kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che// snan+ter sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/
192b4(rgyud): kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya// yi ge e ni sngags kyi mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya// snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga// zhi ba la sogs de bzhin sgrub// bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sku gsung thugs/
192b5(rgyud): kyi dbye ba yis// rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa// thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung // sngags kyi thig la de
192b6(rgyud): mchog/ thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas// slar yang rlung gi thig le yang // thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro// sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes// zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa/
192b7(rgyud): gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do// la lanA dang ra sa nA~M/ a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // de nyid du ni yongs su grags// steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid// so sor lug rgyud/
193a1(rgyud): tshul du// rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni// yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas// de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra// shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi//
193a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad drung che// gso sbyor gyis min bzlas pas min// 'phreng bas ma yin 'gog pas min// grangs min dus min sbyin sreg min// 'byin byed 'gog byed kyis ni min// ye shes
193a3(rgyud): chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed// mngon par shes dang lnga dang ni// de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog/ thig le gsum ni rnam sgom pa// zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni// rnal
193a4(rgyud): 'byor mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs// gnas kyi grangs kyi dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las
193a5(rgyud): shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon/
193a6(rgyud): de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni// yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshad par bya// de ni rnam phye khyed nyon cig/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin
193a7(rgyud): bshad// oM ni sku yi rdo rje yi// snying po ru ni yang dag bshad// yi ge a dang le ga u// yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum// A ni chos 'khor bad+ma la// rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyab// sgrib med sleb pa'i rlung chen po// srog tu
193b1(rgyud): gsungs pa thams cad bsdus// cha med cha dang bral ba dang // dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas// thig le 'khor lo'i tshil khyab// nam mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas/
193b2(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed// dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi// 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed// zad med 'phel ba med
193b3(rgyud): pa'i gnas// byang chub sa bon bde ba che// gzugs med khams su yang dag bshad// 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa'o// u ni longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi// mgrin pa'i mtha' nas
193b4(rgyud): spyi gtsug mtha'// khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus// gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes// gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can// bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// yi ge ma ni thig le tsam// gdong tshad
193b5(rgyud): mtha' yi sor bzhi tsam// dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas// zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po// mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni// 'dod pa'i khams zhes
193b6(rgyud): bshad pa yin// bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o// de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi// rtsa gsum gyi ni gnas su 'dus// yi ge oM gyi brda shes na// khams gsum rnam par sad par byed// rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzug
193b7(rgyud): spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// sna yi bu ga nas ni byung // yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis// sbas pa nang nas rgyu bar byed// me ni 'bar brtse mo la// smin ma'i dbus su srog gi
194a1(rgyud): rlung // de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad// gtan pa phab ste de nyid gsum// zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa// skye ba'i sa bon rgyas pa'o// yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/ gsung gi/
194a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying po mchog/ a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM// ring por byas te dbye ba gsum// chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa// yi ge A ni sngar bshad zin// gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung // stong nyid ye shes ming can te//
194a3(rgyud): srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs// yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o// kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog
194a4(rgyud): A ni chos 'khor pad+ma las// mgrin par yi ge A nyid 'gyur// srog nyid dang ni thur sel dang // yi ge ha yis kun nas ni// mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings// A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod//
194a5(rgyud): ro 'bab pa yi khrung khrung ni// ro sgyur ba zhes bya bar gsungs// bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed// gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o// ha dang de bzhin yi ge u// de ni yi ge ma dang gsum// rkang pa nas ni
194a6(rgyud): mgo mtha'i bar// 'khor lo gzhi yi don bsdus pa// ha ni thur sel ming can rlung // bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// yi ge U ni khyab byed rlung // mgrin pa pad+ma'i dbus na gnas// yi ge ma ni
194a7(rgyud): srog rlung yin// dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la// de dag gcig gyur snying kha nas// thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod// mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag/ gzugs med khams kyi ming can no// sku gsung
194b1(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po gsum du rab tu bshad// lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang // gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na// 'di
194b2(rgyud): rnams dbus na bdag po gang // ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs// gtso rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchod pa gsungs pa yi// sbas pa'i don ni khyod
194b3(rgyud): 'dri ba// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// thugs kyis sa bon bdag po ste// kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni// sgrib dang de
194b4(rgyud): bzhin 'phrog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// lus kun la ni khyab par byed// sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lo'i lam// gang gi stobs/
194b5(rgyud): kyis khyad par byed// gsum pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rnam rtog med par rmad byung che// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o// rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang //
194b6(rgyud): yang dag rigs par nga yis bshad// sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus// rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyis su gsungs// drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis// steng dang 'og tu kha bltas nas// slar yang
194b7(rgyud): kha sbyor tshul du gnas// srog dang thur sa la rgyu bar byed// de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa// rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs// sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis// la la nA dang ra sa nA// ad d+hU tI
195a1(rgyud): mchog gi gnas// de gnyis dbus ma mchog gi mchog/ rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung // rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab// rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni// las kun byed cing mkhas
195a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni// brgya dang brgyad la gang rgyal ba// dus kun tu ni 'phel bar rigs// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub// de yis
195a3(rgyud): thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs// de ni gang tshe skad cig thob// de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs// de yang ji ltar thob par byed// de la rigs pa ru ni brjod// thob mar rnal 'byor pa chen po// blo bzang
195a4(rgyud): gis ni zhi gnas sgom// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang // dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la// thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa// hUM bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med// mchog tu rgyun mi
195a5(rgyud): 'chad par ni// zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas na// de rjes skad cig de la thob// gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na// snyig pa'i pad+ma'ang steng bltas 'gro// de nas gsang ba'i pad+ma las// kha sbyor ba ni de bas kyang /
195a6(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ste// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob/
195a7(rgyud): ab d+hU tI'i rgyun la gnas// sprin dbus rlung gi phye byas pa// de thob byas pa'i dga' ba ni// rgyun du 'chang zhing mi zad pa// chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang // rang rig bde ba chen po'o// 'dir ni rgyu
195b1(rgyud): mtshan bshad par bya// sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang // gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong // kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba
195b2(rgyud): dang / gra lpags chad pa la sogs dang // 'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas// rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni// gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon
195b3(rgyud): par rtogs pa las/ sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// de nyid gsum gyi chog bstan bya// bdag nyid/
195b4(rgyud): sngags sogs byed pa yis// ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams// bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa//
195b5(rgyud): kun mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed// rigs kyi dbye bas rab gsal byed// rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang // de ni phung po'i mtshan nyid do// phra rigs la sogs dbye ba yis// thogs bcas thogs med
195b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos// 'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs// der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang // thams cad spros par byed pa'i rgyu// bde dang sdug bsngal mchog tu zhi// grang dang
195b7(rgyud): dro ba mchog gi mchog/ gang gis shin tu rig pa ni// de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid// glang po bong bu ce spyang dang /
196a1(rgyud): rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag/ pa dang ma dang pha yi spun// mdza' bo snag gi gnyen tshan sogs// gang gis yang dag shes pa ni// 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs//
196a2(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med// de ni spros pa kun nas gsal// 'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu// gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min// de yi 'du byed du ni bshad// don yod spro
196a3(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin can// 'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs// kun rtogs 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can// rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes// mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar phung po yongs shes
196a4(rgyud): na lung dang rig pa'i shes pa skye// dzi na dzi ka dang rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ a ro li ka dang pradz+nyA d+h+r-ikaM/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags// ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang // de ni khams
196a5(rgyud): gsum yongs su brtag/ sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas// sa yi khams su yongs su brtag/ gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod// de yi spyan du yongs su grags// zhu ba ci mchi khu ba sogs// rdzas
196a6(rgyud): kyi bye brag yang dag bsten// chu yi khams su rnam par shes// mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can// dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang // gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad// me yi khams su shes par bya// gos dkar
196a7(rgyud): spro ba'i bdag nyid can// 'byung ba rngub pa rab tu 'phel// rlung rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog/ brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang // steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag/ de ni rlung gi khams su shes// sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag
196b1(rgyud): nyid can// de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang // rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes// mo ha ra ti dwe Sha ra ti// rA ga ra ti badz+ra ra ti// de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni// de dag mngon sum cho ga yis// gzugs la/
196b2(rgyud): sogs pa yul gyi tshogs// lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du// rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig pu// sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang // ring dang thung ba'i rnam pa'i/
196b3(rgyud): lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma// phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can// mkhar rnga sil snyan sngags rol mo// de bzhin rnga snyan pi wang dang // bstod dang smad sogs sgra dag ni// sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya// gzung ba dang ni
196b4(rgyud): rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par shes bsad par byed// dri nga ba dang dri bzang dang // sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams ni// dri yi rdo rje mar shes bya// gzung ba'i rnam shes cher dmar ba// ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni/
196b5(rgyud): lan tshwa sgyur la sogs dbye yis// rdo rje ro mar de shes bya// kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o// mig sogs dbang po la brten pa// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// byang
196b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs// gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par// rang gi ngo bo spro bar byed// sgra yi rnam pa thams
196b7(rgyud): cad nas// bye brag so sor ci rigs par// sgra yi rnam par shes pa ni// phyag na rdo rjer yang dag bshad// dri yi bye brag la spyod pa// so sor ji ltar rig pa ni// sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// nam mkha'i snying
197a1(rgyud): por rnam par shes// ro yi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// lce yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes// reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa/
197a2(rgyud): bye brag so so'i go rims bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes// yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs
197a3(rgyud): pa'ajam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can// byams pa ru ni rnam par shes// rtsa rnams so so'i
197a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid can// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// 'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad// de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog/ yang dag de nyid bla na med// mig sogs/
197a5(rgyud): dbang po'i rnam shes ni// gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no// rje ngar dpung pa brla thal gong // sgo gnyis dang ni thams cad kyi// shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes/
