197a6(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba// dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che// gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur// de ltar de rnams gnas
197a7(rgyud): dbye bas// ye shes gsum gyi yongs su gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// yang dag de kho na nyid rten// gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor/
197b1(rgyud): mchog/ ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa// skye med zad med mi gsal dang // 'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ sbrul dang
197b2(rgyud): btus dang mtha' med dang // mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis// oM dang hUM phaT swA hA'i mtha'// sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// rang min yon tan dang ni gzugs// btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no//
197b3(rgyud): oM la sogs pa zhabs med pa// mtha' med ces bya'i ming can no// sna'i mtha' can oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// thams cad yod la oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// de
197b4(rgyud): ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de nyid bla na med// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// 'di yi rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs//
197b5(rgyud): dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor// dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus// ngag gi rnam rtog kun tu spangs// snang ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag byin brlabs pa'i rang bzhin can
197b6(rgyud): kun la khyab pa rmad du byung // rang rig pa yi rnal 'byor mchog/ skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang // rnal 'byor byis pa mi shes shing // kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa// don
197b7(rgyud): dam rang gi ngo bo ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pas dbye ba dang // sngags de nyid ni rab tu gsal// a ni de nyid mtha' thig ler// yang dag thim par rnam par sgom// thig le yang ni a la thim// a ni mtha' yi ha tsam
198a1(rgyud): pa'o// sa yang 'i ga tshulalo// ge tshum la 'o// ga yang sol gyis/ gas bags la/ tshig sa 'an tu gyig/ ska dang smranam 'jog// ska nas marlog ma pa
198a2(rgyud): la'o// de yang 'od gsal ba la thim// 'od gsalago'abang gsal ba ni// shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ rab tu sad cing rang tu 'char// ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang
198a3(rgyud): bral// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// phung po lnga ni gcig pa'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bsten// rnam shes brgyad ni tshogs dben pa// phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni// rlung bcus shes pa bcu
198a4(rgyud): bsdus pa// de ltar mtshan nyid kun bsdus pa'o// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan// skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba/
198a5(rgyud): rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems// rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang // he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che// kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal dang // sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can// sna tshogs
198a6(rgyud): yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi// kun nas spo ba'i rnal 'byor ni// rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med// ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni// rtog pa med cing gnas pa med// chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do// bskyed dang rdzogs
198a7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid dag/ skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong 'dra// shin tu gsal zhing 'od gsal ba// lung dang rig pa'i dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes// de ltar de nyid gsum dam tshig/ zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa
198b1(rgyud): skye// gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog/ bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dbab pa'i la'u
198b2(rgyud): rtsi nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon// sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba snying kha gdong sna'i ming // gsum po rgyud las gsal ba ni// 'khor lo
198b3(rgyud): gsum gyi dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yi sgom pa'i rim// shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i// sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis// rtswa yi 'khor lo sad par byed// bde ba chen
198b4(rgyud): bopo kun nas skye// khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni// dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// lhan skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje rtse mor gzung bar bya// de nyid bde ba chen
198b5(rgyud): po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le// yang dag gzungs pa'i bdag nyid can// chags chen sems ni gcig pa yis// rnam
198b6(rgyud): 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// bad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la// rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char// de yi lte ba snar ni bshad// gsang bar bde ba thams cad ster// snying kha'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de
198b7(rgyud): yang lte ba sngar ni brjod// zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni bsgom// gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems// yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu// ngag ni rtog pa kun spangs pa// rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog
199a1(rgyud): rtag tu sngags ni nA nga 'byung // rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog/ man ngag thob pas bde ba rgyal// zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas// zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu/
199a2(rgyud): gcig ni// zla ba nyi ma me dang gsum// lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab// gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad// rlung rnams gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang // de la gnas pa'i ye shes che// thig le mu tig gis gnon//
199a3(rgyud): yin/ bsam gtan gti mug mchog las rgyal// dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal// de kho na nyid lnga brtan mchog/ de yi 'od zer thig le tsam// gdong gi sna rtser yang
199a4(rgyud): dag brten// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gti mug rgya mtsho las ni rgyal// de nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// ming can du ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan
199a5(rgyud): nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni// gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms pa// kun mkhyen rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na// sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing // rlung lnga steng du yang
199a6(rgyud): dag rgyu// kun rdzob lngar ni rgyu ba yi// sgo de las ni rnam par byung // g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//
199a7(rgyud): kha dog dmar ba bzang po 'ad// pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen
199b1(rgyud): mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// 'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag byung // rten dang brten par bzung /
199b2(rgyud): nga ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu zlos// sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan
199b3(rgyud): rtag tu zlos pa yin// de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni// kha dog lnga par rnam par sgom// gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med// de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni// rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub
199b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro mgon la// de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus// thig le gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni// khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na// 'di
199b5(rgyud): la cung zad the tsom mchis// srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad// rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung // thig le gsum ni bsgom pa na// rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni// yang na rnal 'byor so sor sgom//
199b6(rgyud): de la the tshom kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// yun ring chags chen dbang song bas// srid pa gsum du skyob pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni// rdzas kyi thig le gsungs pa
199b7(rgyud): yin zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba// mi gang mi bsrun pa yi lus// de rnams myur du grol don du// sngags kyi thig ler gsungs pa yin// gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob
200a1(rgyud): gang da de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu// thob phyir ye shes rgya mtsho ni// rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin// yang dag de nyid smos pa ni// de ltar yang dag thig le gsum// bsam/
200a2(rgyud): pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// tshe 'di nyid la grub don du// sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni// ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bras bu chu yi brgyan//
200a3(rgyud): skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rna ra// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sna'i rtse mo gsum
200a4(rgyud): gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad
200a5(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// chos rnams thams cad snang bar byed// mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod// de las ye shes bde ba che// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa// gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr zhugs//
200a6(rgyud): yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod// chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched// rtog pa thams cad gcod par byed// rnam rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba// de ni stong pa nyid du bshad// gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i//
200a7(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni de nyid do// der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa// srog gi ye shes ming can te// gzugs mer drag po chen po yi// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la ye shes bde ba che// byang chub
200b1(rgyud): sems kyi gang ba nyid// de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas// ye shes yang dag byang chub sems// de la sogs pa ming gi sgras// brjod bya gcig pu bde ba che// dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid// stong nyid ye
200b2(rgyud): shes nas ni brjod// bde ba can zhes de la bshad// bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid// gang de bde bar gnas pa ni// de ni bde ba can zhes brjod// tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams ma / dadeng kun gyi
200b3(rgyud): gzhi yi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med// de las byung ba'i skyed pa'i 'od// de phyir 'od dpag med du shes// bde ba kun gyi gzhi mi mchog/ stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ de nyid mnyam
200b4(rgyud): bar sbyor ba ni// stong nyid ye shes nas ni brjod// shes rab pad+ma la la nA// zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na// de yang stong par rnam par shes// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// thabs kyi rdo rje ra sa nA//
200b5(rgyud): zla ba shu kra rab tu 'bab// de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu shes// stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa// zla ba nya dang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor mami nal/
200b6(rgyud): las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
200b7(rgyud): kyis nyon// lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas// lus ni gang gis shes pa ni// lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog/ longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po yi ni rten// 'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa//
201a1(rgyud): rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa// de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs// thim dang longs spyod bdag po ni// lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su med// yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten// ye shes
201a2(rgyud): chen po'i go 'phang phyir// bde ba chen po'i yang dgra rten// zhe sdang tshe dang gti mug che// phrag dog che dang chags dngos kyis// khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog/ 'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa// sa dang
201a3(rgyud): chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha'i dbye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang ni// lus kyi rnam shes
201a4(rgyud): chos dang ni// kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid// dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin// shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis// dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin
201a5(rgyud): stobs// shes rab stobs ni bla na med// ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes// lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin// sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis// sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang // sngags dgod pa yi rnal
201a6(rgyud): 'byor gyis// rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis// gang gis rnam par nges byas pa'i// yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang // lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// bdag la byin rlabs go 'phang gnas// 'dod pa
201a7(rgyud): lnga la longs spyod cing // rab tu 'bad de mchod pa byas// rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi// phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya// bdag la byin rlabs rim de nyid// gzhan du srid pa gsum na med// de kho na nyid rnal 'byor
201b1(rgyud): mchog/ bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs// phyi yi dngos po mi bsdang ste// de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni// 'bad pas byin gyis
201b2(rgyud): brlab par 'dod// bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ lus kyi lha ye shrIs kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug
201b3(rgyud): pa'o// de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs kyis ni// las dang rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo
201b4(rgyud): la sogs rigs dbye bas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs// 'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang // de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog/ tshor ba nyams su myong ba yis// thams
201b5(rgyud): cad la ni khyab par gnas// sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes// lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs// mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma// las sgrol ba dang yid gcugs ma// 'khrul 'khor ma dang 'bud ma
201b6(rgyud): dang / snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma// rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma// grub ma sprul 'tshe sgra ma dang // gter 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma// gser pad+ma dang dri med ma// rlung gi lu gu rgyud byed ma/
201b7(rgyud): bzang mo dang ni khwa yi gdong // gnyid log ma dang mi 'phel ma// 'phar ma sngo bsangs dus mtshan ma// rtse 'joms ma dang skal bzang 'phel// na ga dza na byi gdong ma// chags ma dga' ma rnam skrag ma// brtson
202a1(rgyud): 'grus 'phel dang dkar mo dang // bdud rtsi ldan 'phel ba ma// dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang // pad+ma lnga dang 'dod mdung // sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang // myur dang chang gi dang /
202a2(rgyud): byuphyug ma// ming zang che dang las skal bzang // me tog bzang mo bdug rmongs ma// steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan// mdzes ma dang ni ljang bskyod ma// rtag bam ma dang gar ma dang // ri dgas mig
202a3(rgyud): dang chags dga' ma// sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa mo// dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo// ro blan dri med 'gro bsnyun ma// ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs// rtag tu brgyad dang spel ba'i grangs/
202a4(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med// rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis// mtshon cha rnams kyi yang dag brgyan// de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas// g.yon pa 'gying bas ut+pa la// g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang //
202a5(rgyud): de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// zhal ni ljang khu spyan gsum pa// don yod grub pa'i cod pan can// zhal rnams bzhad par
202a6(rgyud): sgom pa dang // bdeng bla ba cad 'angal bar byed// nga go sang gang bya ba'is// yi ge gsum dang u par spel// sngags kyis byung ni lad+ya dag marjod// 'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol badzad// chos kyi 'khor lo/ ra/
202a7(rgyud): dbus// lha 'di dag ni yang dag bzhugs// rdor dbyings dbang phyug lAm dang // rdo rje phyag rgya stobs chen mo// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong // rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzang // rdo rje rol mor shes par bya// chos kyi 'khor
202b1(rgyud): gang na 'a du ny-i pa garngu pa dang / sa dang rgya rdzu rgyas segs pagrus rdo ga na du byas pa'o bya na sa spyo dag /
202b2(rgyud): badzin pa phran med// sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa// rnal gyi mche bcung ba gtsigs// rang mong yi ga gsum dang spel// sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod// longs spyod 'dab su bcu drugs// badz+ra
202b3(rgyud): dbus na lha rnams bzhugs// pad+ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo// pad+ma ku mu d+ha 'phel ma// pad+ma'i spyan dang bang gtsug phrang // pad+ma'i 'phreng ba pad skyes ma// bad gdan ma yi dra bam// de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang /
202b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i spyan dang pad bzang ma// pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma// pad+ma'i gsar pad+ma ma// de ltar 'di ni yang dag bshad// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs
202b5(rgyud): bzhugs// g.yas na pad+ma 'khor lo dang // rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad// g.yon na ral gri dril bu dang // rin po che yi rnam par sgeg/ spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang // pad+ma dmar po'i mdog lhar
202b6(rgyud): dmar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas// 'di rnams sngags ni bla na med// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// pang
202b7(rgyud): 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la// rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs// rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can// 'khor lo'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan// rin chen sgrol ma par zhugs ma// sna tshogs las ma gti mug dga'// zhe sdang
203a1(rgyud): rdo rje dga' chags ma// rdo rje las chags gzugs rdoH// A la~M rdo rje rdorje// rab bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma// spyan 'od ma dang rdod dbyangs sa// snga 'i sdang ba ro dga' ma// sku'i rgyal
203a2(rgyud): mtshan yid dga' ma// khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab ma// gshin rje 'joms pa'i blo yi ni// bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dang // pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes// bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo// sras
203a3(rgyud): pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma// shin tu bstan ma stobs chen ma// rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug/ de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar// slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang // phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can//
203a4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhugs// dri med pad+ma dkar mo'i mdog/ zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim// de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag
203a5(rgyud): gsum la// pad+ma zhags pa rin po che// 'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad// pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od// spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang // rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming // 'di dag sngags ni
203a6(rgyud): go rims bzhin// de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni// de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas// 'dod pa lnga yi longs
203a7(rgyud): spyod brtson// mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes// rdo rje pad+ma'i bdebs myos// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed// demi ni sogs pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur
203b1(rgyud): 'di la the tshom med// bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang // sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni// dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni// bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni/
203b2(rgyud): 'bad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//
203b3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor mchog/ dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas// mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las//
203b4(rgyud): yid la byed pas der mi 'gro// sngon gyi bag chags nang gnas pa// de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal// de yis de ni rab tu sad// de rnams rtsal rim bzhin gnas// rab sad de yis sang byas nas// lha mo rang
203b5(rgyud): yang 'khor lo las// de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs// nub pa yang ni bshad par bya// yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang ni sang mI sad/
203b6(rgyud): rgyurnams 'dar bar ni 'gyur zhing // lha rnams yang dgasad par ni// de sa byer ni mi 'gyur te// ti ge bus nas bde ba'i dngos// sangs rgyas nyim smras la ma'i 'od// gzung+gA dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs
203b7(rgyud): kyis kyang // dini 'od zer bcu gnyis te// bong 'phel 'od zer bzi brjid pa// gsal ba 'bar ma'ong 'bar ma// meg sa sogs pa la brten nas// byoraro la gzugs sogs 'dzir pa'o// sun ma mthong/
204a1(rgyud): ma snang ba mo// gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma gsal// phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o// drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod// lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang // ye shes nyi ma 'char ba
204a2(rgyud): yin/ de yang yang dag nub pa ni// de yang mchog tu nub pa'o// 'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad// sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o//
204a3(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brang nas// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
204a4(rgyud): pa las/ 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis//
204a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang mchog/ de ni rtswa yi 'khor lo la// slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor// rtswa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa// mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang //
204a6(rgyud): rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten// bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab// de rnams dga' ba'i rim pa'o// chu khams khong du chud pa can// pad+ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis// de ni de yis byang byas shing // bde rgyan no/
204a7(rgyud): phan par byed// 'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis// mngani pa yi yi ge sa// shin tu phra ba'i cha rtag tu// khyab pa brten gyi tshul du gnas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las// rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thog
204b1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bdag zhir mang drung ba'o// rog ces pa'i go 'phang 'jog/ rim gyis so sor nyams myong las/ sna tshogs du'i sbyor ba las/ ris kyis rgyamatsho chu bsnyen du/ sbyor ba ba ni mi 'thor pa 'dus
204b2(rgyud): dga' ba bzhini de la brjod// rnal 'byor mchud spyod pa las// go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dngul rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs bgyis/ dga' ba bskyed pa
204b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi le'u sa nyi shurtsa dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang yang dag nyon// rdo rje bstan pa'i lus kyis ni// cag tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyun// de kho na nyi dngas bshad bya// myong
204b4(rgyud): drag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba// byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// khrag 'bab par ni
204b5(rgyud): shes par bya// nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni// lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis//
204b6(rgyud): de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo // thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor ba// gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa
204b7(rgyud): las/ gnas rnams kyi ni grangs su 'gyur// slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba ni// gsum po brgyad brgyad dbye ba'ang ni// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang // thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis// rtsa rnams gong nas
205a1(rgyud): gong du ni// nang du 'gro bar shes par bya// g.yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab// g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab// dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni// mye sad byed par shes par bya/
205a2(rgyud): la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming // de rnams spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad// gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gro// thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir// rim
205a3(rgyud): gyis grangs ni bdun cu gnyis// slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis// re re 'ang stong stong dbye ba yis// rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni/
205a4(rgyud): sbyor bar gcig pa nyid du 'gro// dang po las ni rnal 'byor pas// pra ba de ni shes par dka'// bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni// thig le nA da rnam par spangs// bde ba kun gyi gzhi gsang ba//
205a5(rgyud): kaurten gyi mtshan nyid dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phrag dang // dus kyi na ni rnam par bshad// ro gcig go 'byung bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yi rgyud las shes// rnam 'byor chen po'i drud dang
205a6(rgyud): bya na da na bya sa smra sa/ ma sa
205a7(rgyud): da ca sa rnams par 'a n-i// gangags shes na cag tu'i/ mchog tu ga'ang mas myong ba/ lha ma la shes gas la bar byed/ lha'i sngags su rang dag sbyor/ lha'i rnal 'byo na/
205b1(rgyud): ya p+'u / dacing gsum sbyor drim dang // de gsus cig car bdag nyid rdzom// 'jig tan pas su khyab cing na// lhas thun la ni yang dag ma// ye shes ses dpa' don sangs/ u d+he/
205b2(rgyud): dam tshig sems dpa' bad// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// khyab pa'i de nyid nang byung gA/ mchog rab mchog dang zang dang // rang byung sme shes te bdag// khung sems su su nan gcis
205b3(rgyud): 'bag rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni// de yi dbus su rtsa gsum ste// gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad// zla ba nyi ma mo d+hu ba/
205b4(rgyud): 'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab// ji ltar shing rtswa cung zad cig/ sa la brtan par gnas pa na// sdong bu yal gA 'drab phre'u// sogs pa yis ni kun la khyab// de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas/
205b5(rgyud): phung po khams la sogs tshogs la// mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos// de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rang bzhin mtshan
205b6(rgyud): nyid dbye ba gsum// mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang // dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni// gsum phye dam tshig mtshan nyid dang // stong nyid ye shes rdo rjerje//
205b7(rgyud): rnam gsum de nyid mtshan nyid do// rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni// rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang pad kan mkhris pa ni// gsum phye khams gsum bsdus pa'o// 'dod khams gzugs khams
206a1(rgyud): gzugs med khams// 'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// rtswa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig/ rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro// de ni sprul pa gsum dugasal// sku
206a2(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// gang tshe de la rab sbyor ba// de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do// gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na// de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do// gang phyir srog ni rlung bcom na// de tshe 'chi ba'i
206a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid yin// rtsa yi gtso bo'ang nyid rnams ni// gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya// rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng
206a4(rgyud): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni// dus
206a5(rgyud): kyi glags ni btsal ba na// ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid// rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong // don ni shes par mi shes shing // rlung tsam gcig pus rmongs pa'o//
206a6(rgyud): kun gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni// bag chags nang du rnam par spyod// bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung // bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las// nang gi bag chags bgos pa yis// de rnams zla mtshan/
206a7(rgyud): dus su ni// mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa na// rdo rje khu khrag zhu thig lo// 'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang // kun gzhi las ni rnam shes skye// ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin// kun ga'i rnam shes bag chags las/
206b1(rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni ste// nyon mongs can ni srog rlung nyid// skad cig gcig la yang dag 'gro// thog mar 'pho ba'i dus su ni// nya yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// 'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su ni// slar/
206b2(rgyud): yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni// steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis// srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro// thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la// rus sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas 'pho ba gsum pa la// khrag dang /
206b3(rgyud): khu ba zos pa na// thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs// bskams nas gyen du rlung ni 'byung // steng du kha bltas nas ni gnas// phag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur// skur yang 'pho ba bzhi pa la// khran
206b4(rgyud): dang khu ba bsgos pa ni// gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas// 'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro// seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni// khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed// de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la// khrag dang khu ba
206b5(rgyud): 'phel nas ni// mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas ni// me yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro// mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab byed spro// gang gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur// phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na/
206b6(rgyud): de ltar gsungs pa de las slar// 'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la// sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang // khyab byed rlung gis klu rlung spro// rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed// de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la/
206b7(rgyud): chu 'i khams dang snga bug dong // klu yi rlung gis rus sbal rlung // spros nas gnyis su med par spod// de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la// me dang sA yi dug 'byed// rus sbal rlung gis rtsangs rlung spro// rang
207a1(rgyud): gi rang bzhin shes par byed// de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la// rlung gi khams dang ro ni tshor// rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos// lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed// de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la/
207a2(rgyud): lha sbyin rlung gis gzhu rgyal spro// rlung kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can// dgu pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams// phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can// rtsa dang rgyu ma rgyas pa'i sbubs// sgo ni dgu po rgyas
207a3(rgyud): par byed// lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang // gcig tu reg pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// rab sang mchog ni nam mkha' la// 'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa bcu// de lta bu nyid
207a4(rgyud): bshad par bya// 'pho ba bcu ni sa bcu ste// rim pa yis ni rnam par shes// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjod// byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams
207a5(rgyud): cad gzigs// mgo bo'i sgra ni bregs pa dang // phru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos// dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar// spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag/ mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dang // dpe byad bzang po
207a6(rgyud): brgyad nus brgyan// ye shes chen po legs par sad// 'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas// dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med// skyed byed sha ni 'jigs par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes che// rtag tu bdud rtsi
207a7(rgyud): lnga byung byed// dngos po thams cad rnam spangs la// rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spong // 'di gnyis mchog ni gas brtse// gang du yang nim gsungs so// rlung skye ba yi ngas pa ni// blam brgyad pa las shes bya/
207b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gis bskyed pa skyes bu skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas gnan yang
207b2(rgyud): bshad drab// rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// 'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni// phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud// skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur// rlung rnams yang dag cu
207b3(rgyud): bani/ yan tshun nub pa'i nyim bzhin// klog mar lo bcu lon nas ni// rgyags pa'i myos pa'i rlung skyes nas// gzu las rtul ba'i drung bos te// rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin// de rjes lo bcu phyin pa ni/
207b4(rgyud): lcags na rung gis yang dag kyi// lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni ba// drung gi rim pa snyam bzhin// gzhan snang mo bcu phyin pa ni// rgyams pa'i chu rung skye bar 'gyur// rdungs pa zhes bya'i na nub// de nas pas
207b5(rgyud): rang po na phyi// soms skyes pa'i ma pa'is// btung badz+rang rdung na chen pa yis// rnas dU ni rna bar byeng // klu dru dang bdang rlung rdzo// rdzongs dang ba'i brjing ma rgyus pa'i // dus pa
207b6(rgyud): nga sa rdzud bya byeng par mnas te/ slobs skyes pa ma rnangs pa'i gyur// keng sa gang lam rje pani khyed pa rnama'o// brlam pa sbyi gyu /
207b7(rgyud): pa sa 'tsha la ma ma# 'i ma ma ma 'i ma
208a1(rgyud): pan// myos chu rlung ni bkug nas ni// tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel// de yis btang bzung klu za byed// de nas bcu gzhan byin pa// yol btang bzung rlung stongs kyis/
208a2(rgyud): myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed// me dang rlung ni 'phel bar byed// btang bzung chung nyid rnam gyur nas// longs spyod chen po 'phel gyur nas// de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas// rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar
208a3(rgyud): 'gyur// chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa na// khyab cing sgrib byas rim pa las// de las lo bcu gzhan du phyin// chu shing 'bras bu bzhin du med// rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur// las kyi rnam smin mtha'
208a4(rgyud): yis ni// de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis// zla ba 'am ni nyon zhag gzhan// tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni// srog zad par ni shes par bya// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// shin tu rgyas par shes par bya//
208a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rlung gi rim pas srog zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan
208a6(rgyud): yang bshad kyis nyon// chen po'i chen po ye shes mchog/ bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mchog/ snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa// gang phyir mkha' 'groms bsdus pa// de phyir bsdus pa'i
208a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro brjod// lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa// nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed// char pas phung po'i rnam rtog ni/ bsregs byas par chad med pa'i lus
208b1(rgyud): rdo rje khams kyi rnam rtog ni// bsdus nas slar yang rang bzhin gyis// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// de rjes der ni skur yang sdud// de ltar gang la phye leb bzhin// 'ching ba thams cad sgeg par byed//
208b2(rgyud): rlung gis de nyid mngon sbyor bas// sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis// rnam par rtog pa tsam yang ni// sreg pa nyid du the tsom med// mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi rim shes na/
208b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ye shes rgyas par ni// rnal 'byor bsnyen par rig par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
208b4(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rnam rtog rlung ni rnam par gcod// nyin dang mtshan du shes par ni// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// rlung rnams de ni
208b5(rgyud): rnam rtog ni// gang phyir rnam par gcod pa byed// rnal 'byor de ni mchog tu zhi// thams cad stong pa'i ngo bor byed// the tsom thog mar sbyor ba drug/ rnal 'byor rig pas mchog tu sgrub// de nas
208b6(rgyud): dbyangs med yi ge ha// shin tu rgya che bzlas par bya// gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing // bde ba skye ba ster bar byed// de yis rnam rtog thams cad ni// skad cig gis ni gcod par byed// rnal
208b7(rgyud): 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// de yi dbye ba bco brgyad kyis// dang po sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs// de las dkyil 'khor
209a1(rgyud): rgyal mchog ni// rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga// de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog/ rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis so// de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu// bsgred pa'i rim pa/
209a2(rgyud): bsdus pa yis// mngon sum byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro// de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog/ rdzogs rim rnal 'byor yan lag ni// rnam par rtog pa 'joms byed pa// phra ba'i de nyid bla na med// cho ga ji
209a3(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor pa// blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin bsgom// srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed// rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che// nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni// rnam rtog rlung ni 'joms
209a4(rgyud): par byed// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis// dngos med ngo bo gcig pa dang // stong nyid brten pa mngon par zhe na// sgom pa nges par brtan par byed// sgrub pos yang dag bsgoms byas na//
209a5(rgyud): rdo rje bzlas rim bla na med// de yi rim bzhin ye shes mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnam par rtog pa'i
209a6(rgyud): rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung shar na// gang shes rdo rje sems dpa' yi/
209a7(rgyud): rang dngos go 'bang bzang po thob// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral// rnal 'gyur
209b1(rgyud): / da mdzu da// dngaman sa// sa da rna mangs spyan pa rgya pa dang / 'dug gas ng+tha
209b2(rgyud): mi namatshan nyid rnams las zil// bag chags rnam rtog rnam par snangs// tshigs dang mdud pa'i cha yi lam// skem dang bsgom tu rnam par spangs// song nyid le shes mtshan nyid do// ldas
209b3(rgyud): drang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i na// rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par snangs// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyis// rgyung rnams la rang bklag mebya// rgyal 'byor chen po'i rgyung rten pa// ba shangad bar bya da ba
209b4(rgyud): tshig mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// thog ma nyid du bshad por rigs// de yi rim pa rjes 'gro shes// bla ma brgyud pa'i glo 'phang mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje bzang
209b5(rgyud): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni/
209b6(rgyud): de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor// rtswa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur// shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni// bskud pa'i rim pa bla na med// rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir//
209b7(rgyud): brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// de las skye dang ga dang na// 'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur// yul rnams dngos po med pa yi// sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir// de nyid de la spyod pa'i phyir//
210a1(rgyud): dngos su yul rnams dngos med dbyer// dbang po rnams ni skye ba min// de las gnyis gnyis yang dag sbyor// dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid// de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te/
210a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rten// de rnams bsdus pa las ni zhi// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// kun kyang rtsa yi 'khor lor 'gyur// de nyid kun chas nang du khyab// stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las/
210a3(rgyud): yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// ngas pa ru ni shes pa zhes// rigs pa'i rdo rjes rnam par 'joms// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u
210a4(rgyud): rtse sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sbyor drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni// ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten// rnam pa
210a5(rgyud): drug po de las byed// de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag/ brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni// de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal// zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed pa ma/
210a6(rgyud): yin rdzogs pa min// chu yi zla ba lnga bur snang // sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma// thams cad rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad// mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min// me yi 'khor lo stong nyid
210a7(rgyud): khyab dbus na thig le lha bu ni// mi 'gyur kun tu 'gro ba dang // rang byung kun la khyab pa dang // bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs// 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa/
210b1(rgyud): gcig tu byas na skyed par byed// mi shigs nA da'i go 'bang can// rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs pa mes dang // 'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ma yin
210b2(rgyud): yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin// 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs// grangs bral zad med skye ba med// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa// sna tsam dri ma dang bral ba// chags
210b3(rgyud): bral chags pa med pa dang // bya ba byed dang gnas med pa// dpe med gnas pa med pa dang // srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs// lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ de lta bu yang rnyed par dka'// longs spyod 'khor
210b4(rgyud): lo mchog tu gnas// 'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog/ mchog tu khong du chud gyur pa// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs// rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// chang gi ro yis myos pa bzhin// mchog ni dang
210b5(rgyud): po ma lus pa// dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas// thog ma tha ma lhag par gnas// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs// zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod du med// rang bzhin nyams myong rang
210b6(rgyud): ngo bo/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// bla ma brgyud pa las ni thob// de ltar ye shes bye brag che// rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug/ steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor// rnal 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor
210b7(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// dus kyi mtshan nyid
211a1(rgyud): sdom pa ni// rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes// grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla na med// dus ni dus chod ces ni bshad// bsam dang bsam bral rang dngos ni// dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang /
211a2(rgyud): rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas// sna yi bu ga las byung nas// phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char// nang du sdud par dus bzang gsungs// 'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod// dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog
211a3(rgyud): dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni// rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang // gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po// rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste// de ltar gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba
211a4(rgyud): dang ngang lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste// dga' dang bral ba ngan dus so// dus kyi mtshan nyid de ltar bshad// 'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus// dus bzang por ni yongs su grags// ldang ba yang ni dus ngan/
211a5(rgyud): te/ de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid do// dus ni khams rnams thams cad de// mnyam pa ro gcig go 'phang mchog/ ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te// dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin// dngos dang dngos med spros
211a6(rgyud): bral ba// bzhi pa'i skad cig mtshan nyid do// brjod bya rjod byed las grol ba// dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// chags dang chags bral nges grol ba// bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs// phyag rgya chen po'i don
211a7(rgyud): gyi gzhi// dus gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spangs// de nyid dus su ngas bshad de// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
211b1(rgyud): dngal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dus dang dus tshang rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i 'bras bu
211b2(rgyud): mchog nyon cig/ gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// phyag rgya chen po yang dag brten// gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing // bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming // zhal
211b3(rgyud): nas brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams// mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che// rnam rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa// rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslab
211b4(rgyud): pa/ mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid// ye shes chen po'i ro 'bebs pa// de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan// nam mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed// /
211b5(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das// shes dang shes bya rnam par bral// sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs// sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas sbyong // kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// dngos po kun gyi go 'phang
211b6(rgyud): gsal// 'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi// chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// dam tshig chen po la gnas pa// grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos// dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud// de ltar
211b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal// gzhan ni gang du'ang ma gsungs pa// rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par/
212a1(rgyud): rtogs pa las/ gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang mcho/
212a2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams// chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod// kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang // kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang // phung po lnga nyid 'byung ba lnga// yul dang skye mched rnam
212a3(rgyud): shes dang // de dag yang dag ldan chos kun// bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug skye// de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams// khyab cing spyod yul ma yin pa// ji ltar til gyi til mar dang // ji ltar
212a4(rgyud): shing la me bzhin du// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no// nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog/ gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis// khyab
212a5(rgyud): kyang mthong ba ma yin no// stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal bar mthong // chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod// b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog/ gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan//
212a6(rgyud): ldan pa de phyir d+ha ga brjod// d+ha ga chos rnams su yang bshad// dbyings ni byang chub sems su gsungs// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yi// rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar bshad// dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis/
212a7(rgyud): chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas// don dam gcig pu'i de nyid shes// lag mthil skyu ru bzhag pa bzhin// mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang // rang rig shin tu dri ma med// dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni// rtag tu/
212b1(rgyud): de nyid mthong zhing snang // chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal// de ltar shin tu rgyas par bshad// gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas// sbyor bral shes pa rmad du byung // rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
212b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rdo rje yi ni mtshan
212b3(rgyud): nyid mchog/ de yi don du bshad kyis nyon// ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyed ces ni gsungs// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog/ rtsa lnga yi ni nam mkhar rten// rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo// sa dang /
212b4(rgyud): chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni// rtsa yi nam mkha'i cha yi gzugs// bla ma brgyud las shes par bya// aM raM laM baM yaM sa bon// brjod pa rtsa ni lnga rnams te// 'bad pa yis ni
212b5(rgyud): shes par bya// rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni// pad+ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa// thig ler bshad pa 'gro ba med// dam tshig gnas ni shes pa dang // bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang // rnam pa kun/
212b6(rgyud): ldan rnam pa med// don rdo rjer yongs su grags// me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin no// de yi ngo bo yongs su
212b7(rgyud): shes/ rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog/ nam mkhar cher gnas zhi ba dang // rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen
213a1(rgyud): po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//
213a2(rgyud): rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdus pa// de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga// rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs// rnal 'byor spyo ba dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/ rgyud du grags par dbye ba yi//
213a3(rgyud): mthar thug de ni yang dag gsungs// de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang // rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs// sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod// gang gis
213a4(rgyud): de yi rnam pa mthong // sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no// sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni// 'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i phyir/
213a5(rgyud): gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni// sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo bo nyid// grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis// dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis// don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid// rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa
213a6(rgyud): yis/ sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis// de ni bsdus na dbye bar 'gyur// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i rim pa yis// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de la stong phrag sum cu drug/ lus kyi rdzas
213a7(rgyud): dang gnas sogs kyis// rim pa'i dbye ba de las kyang // stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang // bdun cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa las/
213b1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang // sum cu dang ni dgu yang ngo // de las lnga dang de phyir gsum// gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid do// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzhan yang gzhan du
213b2(rgyud): 'dres nas 'gro// de yang 'od gsal go 'phang la'o// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// gnyis med ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
213b3(rgyud): dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rigs kyi dbye ba'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
213b4(rgyud): kyis gsungs// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// chos dang las dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po mngon par brjod// las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis// kun nas rgyas btab lta bur gnas//
213b5(rgyud): gang yang 'di ni las gang gi/ de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas// dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos// rgyal sras rnams
213b6(rgyud): kyis rgyas btab pa// sbyong dang snying rje mi phyed pa// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyong ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ni// yongs su dag pa'i mdzad pa yis// de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med//
213b7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po zhes ni brjod// las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na// sngags pa las ni thob par skye// bla mas shes rab dbang bskur na// ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos
214a1(rgyud): don snying rje'i bsam pas gsal ba ni// de las nges par thob nas ni// chos nyid sgo nas nges par byed// de ltar de nyid de ye shes// de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid// dam
214a2(rgyud): tshig la zhen mkhas pa dang // rlung gi de nyid pha rol son// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i don bslabs pa// ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang // mig yangs ma yi bu mo rnyed// gzugs dang yang chos rnam par
214a3(rgyud): brgyan// ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la// phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed// de nas de nyid thob pa na// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do// de nyid bde chen go 'phang ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad
214a4(rgyud): spangs// stong nyid ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye bas// phyag rgya drug tu yang dag
214a5(rgyud): bshad// yaM raM laM baM aM haM dang // lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las// mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig pa// rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya// gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan mo// sme sha can dang gar mkhan ma/
214a6(rgyud): bsreg ma dang bram ze mo// grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya// khrus mkhan rin chen rigs las skyes// gdol pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes// de bzhin gar mkhan
214a7(rgyud): las kyi rigs// ro bsreg ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs// sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs// ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su brjod// 'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur// bram ze mo ni ma yin/
214b1(rgyud): ti 'khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod// gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes// sre sha can ni chung mar grags// ro bsreg mo ni mna' ma ste// stug mo gdol pa ma zhes bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/
214b2(rgyud): rnam rtog med pas brjod par bya// gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na// dngos grub kun la dus kun tu// sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni// sring mo dag tu yang dag bshad// lus ni bu mor shes par bya//
214b3(rgyud): srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal// mna' mthur du sel ba'i rlung // dbu ma'i rlung ni sgyug mor brjod// ma ni rgyags pa'i rtsa yi cha// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa/
214b4(rgyud): spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas// bu mo khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa// de ni phyed phyed lhag par gnas// chung ma gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas// mna' ma mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa//
214b5(rgyud): mgrin pa'i gnas su lhag par gnas// ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad// chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod// me ni bu mor shes par bya// rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags// mna' ma nam mkha' ru ni
214b6(rgyud): bshad// sgyug mo nam mkha' chen po'o// mngar bar gyur pas nam mkha' ni// skur pa sring mo ru ni brjod// kha ba rang gi bu mo dang // lan tshwa chung mar yongs su grags// bska ba sgyug mor shes par
214b7(rgyud): bya 'tsha ba mna' mar yongs su grags// de dag 'bad pas 'dod bya zhing // dngos grub 'dod pas bstan par bya// las kyi phyag rgya dbye ba 'di// de yi yon tan bstan pa'i mchog/ dam tshig de dang
215a1(rgyud): rtog par 'jug/ phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi// ye shes mchog ni bla na med// de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'phang gsal// rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yul lo//
215a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang yang dag
215a3(rgyud): bshad// phung sogs skye mched mtshan nyid ni// rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad// rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang // rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs// 'khor ba las rgal 'du shes gsungs//
215a4(rgyud): shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang // de ltar phung por rab tu gsungs// sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad// de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'// me ni chags gsal dga' ba dang // de bzhin rlung ni
215a5(rgyud): rdo rje dga'// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste// dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang // ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad// reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur// chos kyi
215a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang // rnab phyag na rdo rje dang // sna ni nam mkha'i snying po dang // lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang // lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel brjod// yid ni kun tu
215a7(rgyud): bzang po dang // rtsa ni byams pa ru ni brjod// ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid// khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad// de bzhin lus kyi chos rnams ni// khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad// de ltar
215b1(rgyud): lus kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs// phung po la sogs skye mched sogs// rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyung dpal rdo rje 'greng ba'i mngon
215b2(rgyud): par rtogs pa las/ phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid/
215b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi// ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa// bde ba chen po'i skal ba che// ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can// sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra// chen po'i chen po nam mtha
215b4(rgyud): che/ phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang sten// mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// rnam rtog med pa'i bde che// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// rang bzhin
215b5(rgyud): med cing gzhi dang bral// gnyis med bdag med brjod du med// rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa// phung po khams dang skye mched che'i// kun rtog chos ni yongs su spangs// sgom dang bsgom
215b6(rgyud): bya snyoms 'jug dang // rim pa gnyis ni rnam par spangs// rnam shes ye shes dang bral ba// sngags dang bzlas brjod bsnyen pa spangs// dngos po kun gyi gnas las brgal// ye shes chen po
215b7(rgyud): rab gsol ba// dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya// phyag rgya chen po bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges
216a1(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ni// gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa/
216a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par// gyur nas kyang ni ye shes tshe// de nyid rnal 'byor kun las bsgyings// 'drar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// dbyangs 'gyur ba dang ldibs pa dang // mdog 'gyur mchi
216a3(rgyud): 'dzag thim pa dang // snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams// dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi cha// rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' na// khong stong 'dar bar skyed par byed// rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sad na//
216a4(rgyud): rab tu rdul byed skyed par byed// de bzhin rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa// khong stong pa spu ldang bar byed// de bzhin na sa ra yi rtsa// khong stong tshig ni ldib par byed// rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyas na//
216a5(rgyud): kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed// mgo bo chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par byed// 'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa byed na// ba spu langs pa skyed par byed// dga' ba chen po'i rtsa rgyas na//
216a6(rgyud): khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed// myos pa chen po'i rtsa byed na// srog gi chung ni thim par byed// brgyal dang sems med bde ba che// de nas dran pa nyams par byed// sgeg pa la sogs nyams su shes//
216a7(rgyud): sngags bshad rim pa sad par byed// dzaHhUM baM hoHde bzhin du// a la la la la ho sngags// rab tu bskul bas rgyas nas su// nyams ni so so'i dbye ba shos// de ltar de ni dbye rgyud la'o// rnal 'byor/
216b1(rgyud): rin dod chud dpa rdo 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ byams kyi dbye ba ba shad pa'i le'u sde ba ni brnyacu bdun pa'o// de nas bcom lda rjes gsungs
216b2(rgyud): bdag ces bya ba sA yi rten// gang gis yang dag shes pa yi// srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid ni// u he 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag/ de ni songs pang grol ba'o// a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog
216b3(rgyud): khrus rnams kun la lhag par gnas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med// thogs med snyed stobs zhes bya ba// thabs cig tu ni skye bar byed// sred dang sring
216b4(rgyud): brtse ba med// sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang ni// don kun byed pa la mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o// haM ni dngos po dang bral ba// lus la gnas kyang lus bskyed min//
216b5(rgyud): dbang po las 'das mi gsal ba// rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing // gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa// dngos po thams cad nub pa dang // chos kyi
216b6(rgyud): sku yi ngo bo nyid// sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung // don kun byed pa dang bral ba// stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid// rjod dang brjod bya rnam par grol// de
216b7(rgyud): yang yi ge haM du grags// thams cad a haM kun la khyab// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// a haM dngos po thams cad la// khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas// a haM dang bral skyes bu ni//
217a1(rgyud): rtsa ba bcad pa'i shing bzhin no// haM ni dpral ba'i sgra mtshams na// a ni lte bar yang dag gnas// 'dir ni a las zla bar bshad// 'od zer stong 'gyed pa yi haM// 'dir
217a2(rgyud): yang a yi ming la brten// brten pa'i haM du rab tu grags// a ni srog gi rlung du bshad// de bzhin thur sel haM du brjod// de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste// des nas haM zhes par grags// rnam
217a3(rgyud): rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni// a haM gang du gnas pa med// gzhan ni 'ga' zhig 'di la yang // don dam par ni dmigs su med// de ltar a haM nga yis bshad// rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed par dka'//
217a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ a haM gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes
217a5(rgyud): gsungs// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni// rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes// stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir// stong nyid sgom par yongs su gsungs// nang //
217a6(rgyud): gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni// kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang // phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa// phyin nas stong pa nyid du 'dod// phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba// nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang //
217a7(rgyud): phyi rol tu yang mi rtog pa// 'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad// snod kyi 'jig rten dang bral ba// chen po stong pa nyid du brjod// ye shes gang gis de stong par// mthong ba
217b1(rgyud): de yang stong par brjod// me long ye shes rdzogs pa la// rjes su dmigs par byed phyir ro// de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa// dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid// don dam par ni brdzun pa'i dngos
217b2(rgyud): shes pa don dam stong pa nyid// 'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyang // dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir// rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad// yang dag byang
217b3(rgyud): chub 'dus ma byas// rgyu mtshan yang ni dmigs su med// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dus ma byas pa'i sbyong nyid gsungs// sems can don du smon lam sogs// rang dga' so
217b4(rgyud): pa dmigs pa med// shin tu stong pa nyid du bshad// kun rtogs thams cad rnam par spangs// mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs// thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyi// 'gro ba'i phyir ni
217b5(rgyud): smon lam nyid// rlom sems med par de brjod de// thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid// mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med// dge ba'i bdag nyid mi spong ba// rlom sems med pa zhes bshad do// dor
217b6(rgyud): ba med pa stong pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni// bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i// de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs
217b7(rgyud): pa// sku gzugs de yi yon tan ni// gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid// spyod pa la yang rlom sems med// chos rnams
218a1(rgyud): thams cad spong bar bshad// bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni// slob tugs dngos po med pa'i mchog pa 'arnying ba thams cad rnam par gcod// dngos med stong pa nyid du
218a2(rgyud): gsungs// ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid// de ltar dngos po med shes pa// slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni// dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dod// de ltar stong nyid dbye ba yang // bag chags
218a3(rgyud): rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir// rgyu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'brang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi/
218a4(rgyud): dbye ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu// rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos// lus rnams la ni khyab
218a5(rgyud): pa dang // phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus// 'khor lo drug la khyab pa dang // chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir// ring ba ma yin nye ba min// de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med// stong pa nyid ni don dam mo//
218a6(rgyud): rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad// smig gi rten gyi mtshan nyid ni// sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa// spyan gsum po la phyag drug mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas// g.yon pa dril du pad+ma dang / @
218a7(rgyud): shin tu rnon po dang // phyar ba go rims bzhin du bsnams// A la~M kI li las byung ba// zla bzhi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs par rgyas gdan la ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// hUM gi
218b1(rgyud): sa rdzogs pa dang // rdorjenan pa'i ses pas byung // dran cig rnams ni 'byed pa'i drung // rnam par gcod cing bris par byed // gnod drud de dag sa ma dur byung / gnyis pa masas yung
218b2(rgyud): gcod// sgyum chen mchong pa che// sangs rgyasas ni nang du byung // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras skyer ba'o// bde yi sngags ni brjod par gyu/ oM dang badz+ra mA le dang // de bzhin m+b+ha dang d+hA dang gnyis
218b3(rgyud): paH dang sa hUM yang dag ldan// sngags mchog btus pa bla na med// rlung 'phrog de kho na nyid kyis// yid kyi rnam rtogasil bar byed// zhi ba'i gnas dung chu 'bras dang // shing gcig la mgyi bani mdo dang /
218b4(rgyud): yang na sum mdo 'bum phrag bcu// gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya// de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// de yi yon tan gsal bar 'byung // zhi ba la sogs
218b5(rgyud): 'bad mi dgos// skad cig gcig la mngon par rtogs// de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes// dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga 'di// dpa' bo gcig pu nyid sgrub pa// de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang // rnam rtog
218b6(rgyud): spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// shin tu rnam dag nam mkha'i dngos// rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i
218b7(rgyud): 'brang ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya// 'byung po thams cad zim nas 'gro// mtshan/
219a1(rgyud): mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur// zla ba mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid// kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi// shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya// kun rdzob shes byar shes par bya// don dam reg bya rnam par/
219a2(rgyud): spangs// reg bya dang bral bde ba gang // bde ba mchog de thob par dka'// nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad// thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang // gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma// rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por
219a3(rgyud): 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur// nyi ma las ni zla ba skyes// de las gnyis med ngo bor bshad// 'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur// rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam dang // chags bral mchog tu/
219a4(rgyud): phra ba dang // mi snang ba dang stong pa'i lus// 'od gsal ba yi go 'bang zhi// gang du yang dag mi gnas so// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ mtshan mo nyin
219a5(rgyud): mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// A li kA li'i dam tshig ni// rgyud rnams gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i/
219a6(rgyud): rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa yi// 'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa'i// sdang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan// kA lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// snang ba mtshad
219a7(rgyud): pa'og 'bang ni// sdang ba las byung zad pa med// dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa// A l-i'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor b.lam// dbus su skyes pa'i bde bache// A la~M
219b1(rgyud): 'ab pa gces// dgom pa'i tshi gzhes bya blas byas/ sa zla ma'i ye shes mchos khrul brgyad pasags par bya rnas 'gyun na pa'i spyad dpa 'dzi rmed pa'i don pa rlon pa/
219b2(rgyud): las u la cas par bshad pa'i le lda cu na gnyis pa'o// den su gzhan yang bshad kyis zhin// ma mams kyi nan nyid dun med// nga dang po
219b3(rgyud): rdul ba'i mtshams// shes rab rdo rje las byung ba// gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas// 'phags shing gos pa rnam par spangs// rdo rje pad+ma 'di med skyes/ A pa N+Da pa yang dag 'dres// med
219b4(rgyud): ni yang dag mi 'gro gang // mtshams med 'khor ba dag par byed// rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/ phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam me khyad// sems can kun gyi mtshams kyi ni// rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang /
219b5(rgyud): 'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad// dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs// mdud pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu zhi// tsa na kA ya~M tshig gu tsam// mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba// gang phyir steng gi go
219b6(rgyud): 'phang gnas// la la thig le'i rang ngo bor// rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas// la lar thog ma la sogs spangs// la lar de yang dmigs su med// gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can// de phyir brjod
219b7(rgyud): dumed pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ mtshams kyi 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas
220a1(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rjes gsangs// rnam pa'i bu'i ming tsam ni// slob dpon las su yongs su bshad // sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa// sngon du bsnyen pas sbyang dang // babyung /
220a2(rgyud): po bskrad pa nyid dang ni// sa gzung nyid dang thig srung ni// spyan drang lhag par gnas pa dang // bgegs bslad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi// thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang // phur bus yang dag gdab
220a3(rgyud): pa dang // bum pa byin gyis brlab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang // khrus dang rab tu sbyang ba dang // mchod par rab gnas gtor ma dang // slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang // me la
220a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin// dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol// de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las// gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i bla// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya// bdud las sdigs mdzub de ni
220a5(rgyud): mchog/ yi ge gsum zlos pa la zhen// rdo rje theg pa lhag par 'gro// zhi ba la sogs las gang gis// rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas// de yi yang dag cho ga yis// cho ga mchog ni bya ba yin//
220a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor sogs// cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya// bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog/ stong phrag bcu ni yongs su bzla// thog mar mkhas
220a7(rgyud): ba ji bzhin du// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad// de 'og yi ge gsum khrir ni// bsam pa kun gyis bzlas byas na// yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/
220b1(rgyud): slob ma rnams kyi dngos rgyub sbyar/ skye bos dben pa'i phyir bcas/ sa bzud nu ni nye bar bcas/ zod dang bcang mi skye zhing / ring por yang ni rnam mi bya shin tu 'jam zhing srog rags
220b2(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu ring // gang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring // yang na bde gshegs rten la ni// thog mar sor mo rnams la ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod bya// khru gang sor ni bani
220b3(rgyud): pa yi// seng ljang phur ba byas nas ni// yi ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru// yig brgya pa lan bdun dang // yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko// sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa// yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum//
220b4(rgyud): yang na sems kyis sbyang bar bya// de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni// yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya// oM ma hA kro d+ha dz+wa lArka/ hU~M phaT mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de ltar lag mthil sngags bkod la/
220b5(rgyud): 'byung po rnams ni bskrad par bya// sa la thal mo lan gsum du// brdab par byas nas sngags bzlas te// ud gats+tshad lan gnyis brjod// sarba b+hU ta gra ha ud gats+tsha// yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru
220b6(rgyud): brjod// badz+ra satwa be shad de// las ni thams cad par gsungs pa'i// gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug/ sa ni yongs su bzung rjes la// rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya// tshwa sgo med cing mags la/
220b7(rgyud): mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang // me long lta bur 'jam pa dang // mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya// ba yi lci ba la sogs pa// rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya// byugs nas de rjes khrus byas la// slob
221a1(rgyud): dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni// dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis// mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni// 'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis// ras sam yang na gsom yis// yi ge
221a2(rgyud): gsum gyis rnam par sbyang // thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam// gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang // rdo rje can gyis khru gsum gsum// gru bzhi par ni gzung bar bya// de yi dbus su lte ba'i ma// sgrib
221a3(rgyud): pa'i skyon ni spang bar bya// sku gdung dang ni rin chen bzhugs// legs par bsangs nas byin gyis brlab// yi ge gsum yang swA hA'i mtha'// phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar// sngags 'di yang ni
221a4(rgyud): bzla bar bya// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal// tshangs pa'i thig ni btab nas ni// yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya// de rjes de la me tog char// sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya// oM dang a mo g+ha
221a5(rgyud): pad+mo// de bzhin du ni phyi nas su// ba su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis// d+ha ra Ni maN+Da li hUM// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang ni// lan gsum bar du thig srud la// zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya// yi ge gsum gyis/
221a6(rgyud): thig gdab bya// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje can gyis mtshams bzhi pa// thog mar shar dang byang dang ni// ji srid lho dang nub dag dang // mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang // slar yang yang dag/
221a7(rgyud): gdab par bya// shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams su ni// thig skud kyis ni tshad gzhal bya// zung bzhi dang ni thig srung bya// bskor thig gsum ni sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje 'phreng ba
221b1(rgyud): gsub skyes mdzes// tshangs pa'i thes gnyis bcang nas ni/ de las dadang po'i ba brang ne// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag jig rgyal bdun gyi bzugs gnas smras pa// de la rin pa 'dir brtse ldam
221b2(rgyud): yang rin chen phye ma 'am// tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang // rdzas sam las kyis sbyor ba las// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs bri// me bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs/
221b3(rgyud): rigs ni dbus su dgod par bya// rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang // 'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang // rim bzhin sku mdog dbye ba yis// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod// gAti
221b4(rgyud): mug zhe sdang chags pa dang // rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su// ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi// gdan bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis//
221b5(rgyud): 'khor dga' zhe sdang dga' bar bcas// kA yi 'phreng gis rnam par brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na shes rab ral gri bsnams// gzugs dang dbyibs rnams ji bzhin du/
221b6(rgyud): dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dgod// shar la sogs pa'i sngam du la// byams pas yi snying po shar// 'jam dpal phyag nAM
221b7(rgyud): rdo rje sdo / mkha' zhing 'jig rten dang thug ni// kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya// sleb pa rnam par sel ba dang // kun du babang po byang du dgod// zhal gsum phrag drug rnam pa cam// khon na ma che
222a1(rgyud): dgod pa dang // phyag na rdo rje dri med pa'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan// lha mo rnams la zla ba'i gdan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gsal// rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mtshan/
222a2(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin// mi g.yo la sogs mtshams
222a3(rgyud): rnams su// gshin rje gshed kyi rang ngo bo// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na ral gri rnam par bsam// gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon// de bzhin g.yon na ral gri brjod// gnod mdzes
222a4(rgyud): de bzhin gtsug tor ni// 'og dang steng du rnam par dgod// khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs// nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya//
222a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i// ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod// de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng // rab gnyis ni yongs su bskor// rin chen dra brnga ma dang // lha mo rnams kyi snam du yis// ka brta babs 'khor/
222a6(rgyud): lor mtshan// ri dgas rnams kyis mtshan pas brgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan sogs// rnga yab me long la sogs kyis// brgyan pa ru ni rnam par bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag brten//
222a7(rgyud): slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni// rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// bgegs bskrad pas ni sngon song bas// sum b+ha'i sgra dang ni sum b+ha// thog mar oM dang ngo mtshar cha/
222b1(rgyud): hUM gnyis pan kyi mtha' dang ldan// shar gyi so ru dgod par bya// oM dang gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na nes// hUM gnyis paT dang yang dag ldan// blo dang ldan pas lho ru dgod// oM dang gr-ih+NA pa ya gnyis// hUM gnyis pan gyi
222b2(rgyud): mtha' dang ldan// nub tu yang dag spro bar bya// oM A nA la ho b+ha ga bAn dang be d+yA rA dza dang // hUM gnyis dang nI paT mtha' dgod// de rjes yang ni byang du dgod// 'di yis gdug pa bkug nas ni// de nas
222b3(rgyud): sngags pas ngur pa gdab// seng ldeng las+ya ni byas pa yi// pur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad// zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan// yi ge brgya pa so sor bzlas// sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas ni/
222b4(rgyud): phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya// oM dang yi ge g+ha lan gnyis// de bzhin g+hA ta ya ni gnyis// sar+b+ba duSh+Ta phaT cis dang // de bzhin kI la ya gnyis dang // sarba pA paM paT dang ni// hUM gsum badz+ra
222b5(rgyud): kI la ya// badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti// kA ya bAka tsat+ta badz+ra dang // kI la ya hUM phaT yi ge'i// mtha' can gyi ni pur bus gdab// oM dang badz+ra mud ga ra// badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta// ya dang hUM gnyis phaT mtha' dang //
222b6(rgyud): sngags dang phur bus brdung ba brjod// rdo rjes bgegs ni 'jug la sogs// bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang // steng du mda' yi dra ba dang // 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje dang // gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis
222b7(rgyud): ni/ byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis// dum pa bcu 'am yang na drug/ rin chen las byas rnam dag pa// sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// 'bru lnga la sogs kyis gang ba// rin chen lnga dang snam sogs/
223a1(rgyud): lom lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gur kum gla rtsig pur dang // tsan dan chu yis gang bar bya// me tog la sogs kyis mchod bya// rang rang sngags kyis byin gyis brtag khadz+ra
223a2(rgyud): d+h+r-ika dang dzi na dza~M ka/ rat+na d+h+r-i ka dang A ro li ka/ de bzhin pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags dang // lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni// bum pa rang gis bskur byas pa// de nas
223a3(rgyud): spyan drangs nas ni gzhug/ de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas// de rjes gzhan la dgod par bya// oM dang ru ru s+phu ru dang // de las dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gsal// de bzhin sid+d+ha lo tsa ne// sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ne// swA hA/
223a4(rgyud): zhes ni de la bzlas// spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang shaM ka re dang yang // de las shAn ti ku ru dang // de bzhin b+hu ta b+hU ti dang // b+hU ti ne dang b+hU ti ne// b+hU ta ya
223a5(rgyud): ni lan gnyis brjod// swA hA'i mtha' can sngags brjod bya// mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang ka Te bi ka Te// ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te// ka ro Ta dI r+ye swA hA// gos dkar rnam par
223a6(rgyud): rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang tA re tut+tA re// tu re swA hA dgod par bya// sgrol ma'i rnam par rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams
223a7(rgyud): lang gcig la las ni thams cad pa// oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ki tsit+ta badz+ratrA~M/ na maHbadz+ra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA dits+tshi ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si pus la/ bar shu pA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha ba khA tsi lA/
223b1(rgyud): gai )9b+h+ya/ ban d+ha ban d+hA/ rgan pa na/ dAh+ma nga/ bar+dz+dza bar+N+Na/ ba snronas \u0f7fsa/ sadz+ra na pa na/ d+hag 9/ da ldan padas rdul da / sngags 'di sa bdu /
223b2(rgyud): du ne// las ni thams cad pa yin te// snying po'i sngags ni baM pras byas la// rigs kyi dbang phyug mtshod par bya// yaM ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni// lan 'dun par du bskom par bya// daN+Da dang
223b3(rgyud): brgyad rim pa yis// yi ge gsum yang bzlas pa ni// de nas rang lce'i rnal 'byor gyis// mchod yon snod du mchod par bya// de nas du gu la ras ni// gzums kA rus bdugs pa// bka' nas rang
223b4(rgyud): rang sngags dang ni// de la rim bzhin lhag gnas bya// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sbyin bral nam mkha' lta bu'o// de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag/ rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud// A li kA li las
223b5(rgyud): byung ba// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// gzhal yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i// 'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod
223b6(rgyud): pan can// bsgoms nas de las 'od zer spro// kha dog lnga dang lcags kyu yi// de yis spyan drang slob dpon gyis// sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya// e h+ye hi dang b+ha ga ban// sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/
223b7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya// de la a nu sma ra gnyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // swA hA yi mtha' lan gsum brjod// 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor pa dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor
224a1(rgyud): dbus su spyan drang ba// rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba la// bzhugs shing yang dag mchod par bya// rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin// lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod// 'khor lo
224a2(rgyud): mchog ni mchod par bya// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong // yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni// dkyil 'khor mchod pa dgyi bar 'tshal// thugs ni brtse bar
224a3(rgyud): nyer dgongs te// mgon pos mchod pa 'di bzhes shig/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA n+tu/ pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ bla mas yi ge gsum ni brjod// lha yi rnam par byas nas ni// de rjes
224a4(rgyud): bdag la mchod par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba// At+ma ko ha~M zhes ni brjod// rang lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni// ji ltar bskyed pa'i yum rnams dang // gnod byed kha na ma tho med//
224a5(rgyud): zhe sdang chen po'i rigs las byung // dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod bya zhing // de las lha rnams lhag gnas bya// yid 'phrog sna tshogs lha yi gos// ga pur a ka ru yis bdug/ sngags
224a6(rgyud): kyis ngag byas dgab par bya// oM dang tiSh+Tha badz+ra hoH// brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o// oM dang sA ra badz+ra hoH// blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod// me tog spar bas gtor nas
224a7(rgyud): nilhag gnas der ni gshegs par bya// rnam pa kun dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong bar bya// rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis// bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas
224b1(rgyud): ni me long sogs la khrus bya zhing // de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma sogs// ji ltar bskams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa// de bzhin dadag gis su khrus gsol// cod/
224b2(rgyud): pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems// dbus su yi ge gsum dang spel// swA hA'i mtha' can brjod par bya// las kyi de nyid cho ga shes// rdo rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya// oM sar+b+ba A ba ra NA// prad+d+ha sarba pA \u0f7f
224b3(rgyud): dang / bi shud+d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ swA hA mtha' can sngags brjod bya// pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang // yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas// nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed// 'khyud cing bskor bas dor
224b4(rgyud): bar bya// de nas cho ga bzhin lags mchod// sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya// rang rang sngags dang go rims bzhin// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha dang //
224b5(rgyud): sasu dra dang s+pha ra Na// sa ma ya dung shri ye AH/ hUM gi sngags ni rjes su brjod// rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni// gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod// rdo rje sems legs
