224b6(rgyud): bsgyings pa// rdo rje slob dpon cho ga shes// sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya// oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+re sA hA'i mtha' can bzlas// yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni// sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni//
224b7(rgyud): me tog char ni dbab par bya// slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas// glu yis yang dag bskul nas ni// sad pa na ni phyag kyang byas// las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag/ gtor mngon kun grub
225a1(rgyud): par byed// las la byang zhing mkhas pa dang // cho ga bzhin du bsgyings bcas dang // chang dang sna tshogs sha dang ni// de bzhin la du'o ma dang // 'bras chan bye yi 'khur ba dang /
225a2(rgyud): sran 'khur bye ba mang po dang // mchod yon me tog sogs kyis mchod// snod bcu chu yis gang ba la'o// gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// de dbus 'byung po kun la
225a3(rgyud): ni/ ngo mtshar chen po'i gtor ma sbyin// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// til bsregs bza' bas khyad par du// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas bya// 'di ni don kun sgrub byed pa// oM brah+ma da ba tA sar+b+ba/
225a4(rgyud): in+d+ra da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka/ nA ga gan d+har+m+ma kuM b+hUr+N+Na/ yak+Sha b+hU ta ga nAH/ ta thA pre ta ut+ka ta/ pi shA tsi a pa s+phA re/ DA ki nI gra ha/ bidz+dza mA tra ga NaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ag+ni ma ra gra hA/ oM dza~M b+hak+Sha ma hA te dza/ ma nu ShA nAm/
225a5(rgyud): daM hi sa ka/ mu drA man+t+ra a d+hi d+ho b+h+yaHtsa/ grah+Na na k+Sha tra ma mu Sha/ i maM ba laM/ b+h+ra brit+tan+tu/ sid+d+hi m+me pra ya tsA nu me san+ta / sa t+ya ma ne Sha ka re mi Sha/ sa ta sa ha/ ya b+hA ban+d+ha tse/ d+hA na d+hA na/ su pa ra NAny+tsa / d+ha DAnA ma ma/
225a6(rgyud): t+yo shIta/ oM ti up+pa tra Na tr-iSha NI/ satwa na mA n+ta sha ya rbA ne/ thog mar mo dang A/ hUM phaT/ swA d+hA'i mtha' can las sun byed// de ltar sngags 'di skad lnga bzlas// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par ro/
225a7(rgyud): slob ma lhag par gnas par byed// mtshan nyid yon tan gyis brgyan pa// tsan dan ga pur gla rtsi yi// chu yis kyang ni khrus byas te// dad pa'i chu ni 'chang ba yis// sems kyi dri ma rnam par 'khrud/
225b1(rgyud): bdog pa thams cad gtong bar byed/ gos gtsang ni mchog tung go// khang pa brtsegs pa byas nas ni// ras kyi rol bkun nas bre// yi ge gsum dang yang dag ldam rdo rje can gyis sngags dra ni// ngan
225b2(rgyud): bdun gdong la gtor ba yis// las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed// de nas sa yi snying po sogs// mig la sogs la rnam par dgod// sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni// dbang po so so la reg pas//
225b3(rgyud): brjod bya zhing byin gyis brlab// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor gyis// oM dang naT+Ta tsak+Shu/ dang // sa man+ta dang tsak+Shu/ bzlas// maM tri sA tA lo tsa ne// sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni// swA hA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod//
225b4(rgyud): mthe bong gung mo yang dag sbyar// zhabs bsil chu dang mnyes nas ni// sngags de lan gsum bzla bar bya// slob ma'i mig la so sor ni// mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par bya// khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i// srung
225b5(rgyud): pa zhags pa 'dra ba la// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum// bzlas nas zhabs bsil chus bsang bya// skud pa lan gsum dkris pa ni// rdo rje gsum ni mdud par ldan// dpung pa g.yon par bcings pa
225b6(rgyud): ni sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya// oM dang lo tsa ne yi s+tha// ya ta tAta taM saM pra taM// maM b+ha bi TuR+tsi yi sgra// raM dang rat+na tra yA ya// sid+d+hi ra ni daR+sha dang // ya swA hA yi sngags 'di ni// theg pa bla med lan bdun
225b7(rgyud): bzlas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni// sor ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yi// zur ni gsum du yongs su bya// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlab sgom// slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya/
226a1(rgyud): oM dang pra ti badz+ra dang // sa man+ta dang I shwa ri/ AHhUM swA hA'i mtha' can sngags// bzlas nas slob mas dor bar bya// sar bad pa yi phur du ste// phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid// slob dpon
226a2(rgyud): dang ni slob ma yis// de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya// nam nangs yang dag bla ma la// ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu// de la dmigs nas sbyin sreg ni// zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas// las ni thams cad pa nyid
226a3(rgyud): dma' dgegs zhi ba yi don du bya// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas// rnal 'byor ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni// bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya// de nas gsol 'deb
226a4(rgyud): slob ma ni// rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen
226a5(rgyud): po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal//
226a6(rgyud): de nas bla mas de la yang // bya dang mi bya gsungs pa ni// sems can las kyi srad bus gdab// rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim par kye// 'gro ba 'di dag dkyil 'khor te// rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o// thog mar
226a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bdag/ rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid sgom// slob ma bdag nyid 'drar dmigs nas// de 'og thams cad rab bsgrub bya// bla ma bzang la dbang bskur phyir// slob mas de rjes gsol ba
226b1(rgyud): gdag// 'di nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la// nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab// las kyi rlung gis dpa' klong 'khrug/ bdag bying thugs rje'i rgya mtshor skye// mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig/ nyon mongs
226b2(rgyud): dbang du bya ba ni// bde ba sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyob// thugs rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod// de 'dra tshig gsan rdo rje can// thugs rje'i thugs ni yongs su gang // slong ma la ni yongs su
226b3(rgyud): gsungs// bu khyod dus 'di nas bzung ste// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan// rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis bzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas// bu khyod 'di ni bdud rtsi ste/
226b4(rgyud): srungs shig ma bsrungs na ni bsreg/ bsrungs na dngos grub kun grub 'gyur// nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i rlung // oM dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta// u da ka dang AHhUM Tha// slob mas bdud rtsi lnga btung bya//
226b5(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes rmad byung ba'o// gsang ba dran na skyon 'gyur phyir// rdo rje slob ma la ni dbab// dri chen dri chu la sogs pa// mtshal 'bab pa yi bu mo'i gos// khrag dang khu bas yang dag bsgos// gu gul dang
226b6(rgyud): ni rnam par bsres// yi dgas me ni blangs nas su// pad+ma'i snod du gzhag nas ni// der ni thams cad gzhug par bya// khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// rdo rje
226b7(rgyud): dbang slob ma la// rmad byung chen po'i dadug pas bdug/ 'bab par 'gyur ba the tsom med// oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha// de bzhin A be sha ya hUM// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod// slob ma la ni gsol
227a1(rgyud): bar dbab// badz+ra sa twa hi ma he// bid+yA rA dza ya bi d+ha ma he// de ltar sngags ni 'di yis kyang // slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas// rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus// dkyil
227a2(rgyud): 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba na// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // rgyalaM ba'i sras kyis yang ngag gzhi// khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni// phyi dang nang gi dkyil
227a3(rgyud): 'khor ni// gnyis po de la bstan par bya// slar yang slob mas gsol ba gdab// bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol// rnam rgyal bum pa blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la// de yi dbus su
227a4(rgyud): blo bzang po// hUM rdor las byung mi bskyod sgom// rang nyid ye shes sa bon gyi// 'od zer yang dag bskul bas byung // slar yang ye shes sems dpa' sgom// mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog/ mi bskyod de bo/
227a5(rgyud): de nyid kyis// rnam par shes pa'i phung po sgom// slob ma'i mgo bor lag pa gzhag/ rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab// oM dang ma hA sa ma ya// de bzhin I shwa ra t+na dang // a d+hi Shi ny+tsa mi swA hA// oM sar+b+ba
227a6(rgyud): thA ga ta// a b+hi She ka sa ma ya// shrI ye AHhUM de nas bzla// chu yi rting nas slob ma la// dbu rgyan dbang bskur don du ni// cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// sems can kun gyis don sgrub pa// snying
227a7(rgyud): rjes khyab pa ngas byin gyis// rdo rje sems dpe'i yon tan gnas// sa bon traM las byung ba yi// rin chen 'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni// ri mo dar sogs cod pan dang // slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya//
227b1(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// rat+na mu ku Ta sgra dang // de bzhin sgra dang pU dza ya// a tiSh+Tha dang AHhUM dang // sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni// me tog mgo la sbyin par bya// slob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir// slar
227b2(rgyud): yang bla ma la gsol bdang // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos// rdo rje brtul zhugs ngas byin gyis// gang gis ma rig sgong 'byed// ye shes thob 'gyur nga yis byas// hriHlas pad+ma rdzogs par ni//
227b3(rgyud): 'od dpag med du rnam par sgom// rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin// slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod// ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// kun tu bzang po'i brtul
227b4(rgyud): zhugs brtan// dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje long // khaM las byung ba'i ral gri 'am// don yod grub pa'i rang ngo bo// rdzogs par lag pa g.yon pa ni// slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin// 'di ni sangs
227b5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes la// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// rang bzhin
227b6(rgyud): yon tan rnams kyis gang // bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rang ngo bo// slob ma'i mgo la lag bzhag ste// rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par sgom//
227b7(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// che ge mo zhes badz+ra satwa// a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi swA hA// phung po lnga yi rnam dag pa// thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar// dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes// rmad byung chen po bshad par bya//
228a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas lda ni dag pa 'di// dbang bskur lnga ni thob par 'gyur// ma rig pa ni bsal nas ni// ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// slob ma 'dod don/
228a2(rgyud): sngags dbang sbyin// sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog/ ngas byin dngos grub ster bar byed// de nas yi ge drug sngags paT// swA hA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum// kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas/
228a3(rgyud): sngags kyi sku yis dag pa dang // bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod// bla mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po yi ni ye shes mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa
228a4(rgyud): nis khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de nas slob ma spyod brtul zhugs// sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// gang gis spyod pa rnam dag pa// 'dod la thugs rje'i gtso bo yis// sems can don ni byed/
228a5(rgyud): pa'i thabs// nga yis spyod pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin// de nas glegs bam dung la sogs// mda' gzhu ral gri 'khor lo dang // sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed// slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin//
228a6(rgyud): 'di ni kun bzang spyod brtul zhugs// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // sems can kun gyi dor gyis byos// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// de bzhin d+hi Ta ra tra~M dang // de ltar sngags
228a7(rgyud): 'di dgod par bya// de nas lung bstan thob don du// bsam pa dang bas bla ma la// da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug/ khyed kyis bdag la lung bstan gsol// don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod// rigs kyi dang
228b1(rgyud): brug lung bstan bya// de nas slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod// bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni kye// mgon po yang dag bdag dbugs byung // byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan// de nas rdo rje chos gos mtha'
228b2(rgyud): g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la// dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba// nga yis rdo rje gsungs dag khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'
228b3(rgyud): mngon par brjod// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// dpal ldan yon tan 'byung gnas bdag/ bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal// grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs so// de nas slob ma don 'dod la// phyir
228b4(rgyud): mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la stsol// de nas ye shes rdor dbang phyung // ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis// spyan drangs sangs rgyas
228b5(rgyud): lnga la sogs// lha mo'i 'khor lo rim bzhin 'byung // de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i// bum pa phyag bsnams de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal// rin chen 'dzin dang 'khor ba sgrol//
228b6(rgyud): shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la// de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab byed// pad+ma mthar byed dgegs mthar byed// 'di yis kun nas
228b7(rgyud): dbang bskur bas// rdo rje slob ma rnam par bsam// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // sangs rgyas kun ni nga yis spyir// de nas de
229a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs lnga mo// khro bo rang gi gnas su dgod// 'jam dpal rngam par bsgoms nas ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+ra sA hA'i zhes ni dgod/
229a2(rgyud): blo bzang gis ni sngags brjod nas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod// slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra// thugs rjes khyad pa'i bla ma yis// de nas slob ma rjes gnang bya// de
229a3(rgyud): nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// dpal chen khyod kyi bka' drin gyis// da ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod// sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas// rten 'brel las byung chos rnams ni// gzugs/
229a4(rgyud): brnyan+da lta bur shes nas ni// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni// ci bde bar ni sgrub par gyis// de nas bla ma la yon dngul// bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang bya// skye bo bzang dang
229a5(rgyud): lhan cig tu// de nas dra ma gsang don gnyer// zur du kha bltas kha sbyar to// ji ltar bdag nyid chen po khyod// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mdzod// de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i// las dang chos sogs
229a6(rgyud): bayis// sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol// skal ldan bud med phyag rgyar bshad// skye bos dben pa'i mtshan byed na// ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas// thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon yon
229a7(rgyud): tan 'byung // de ltar ji ltar rnyed phyag rgya// snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i// bla na med pa'i rang bzhin gyi// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yis yang dag lhung // kun rdzob byang chub sems
229b1(rgyud): gang yin// gsung ba de yis dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig chen po rnam drung ba// khams lnga las byang bcud kyis len// bde chen pos myang bar gyis// slong martog pa dang
229b2(rgyud): drul bas// pad+ma la gnas de myang gis// 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba yis// rgyal sras ji lngar dbang bskur bya// byang chub sems kyi chu yis ni// bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya// de nas shes rang dbang bskur
229b3(rgyud): phyir 'ablams don 'dod slob ma la// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// bdag la khyod kyis dbang bskur stsol// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che// phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob// mchog ni thob par bya ba'i
229b4(rgyud): phyir 'de 'og slob ma la ni sbyin// lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di// dpag med bde ba rang ster ba// bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pagyis// de nas shes rab ye shes de'i// sgrub pa'i mchog
229b5(rgyud): tu 'dod pa'i dor// lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog/ dngos grung don du nga yis sbyin// lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba// dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med// dpa' bo khyod ni spro'am ci// byang chub sems ni za nus
229b6(rgyud): sam yang dag de ni nges par ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smos// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus// de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// skra bkrol gos ni bor nas kyang // pad+ma
229b7(rgyud): dag ni 'byed byed cing // badz+ra mok+Sha ho zhes gsungs// b+ha ga'i pad+mo'i dbus gnas pa// bde ba kun tu rgyu ba'i rtsa// sor mos bskul nas dga' bar bya// dzi hA sa kyang ni rol bar bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i
230a1(rgyud): bde byed pa/ 'di nyid rig pa bzang bstan nA/ mchog tu dga' ngas nyams myong nas// rlung ba'i 'du byas de byung bya// de nas bcog ldan pa gyes nas// d+hAHpod+hA sngags/
230a2(rgyud): gsung zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la gzhag/ bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// rmi lam bzhin du sems n+dan gyi// blan
230a3(rgyud): med pa'i don byos shig/ bskyed pa'i rim pasgom pa yi// 'di la man ngag la mi shes// rig pa 'di ni dor byas nas// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi N+ya// brtul thugs rnams kyi mchog gi/
230a4(rgyud): mchog/ rig ma'i brtul zhugs bu yis spyod// de ltar 'di ni byang chub mchog/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma// rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'bang brten// bdag
230a5(rgyud): la go 'phang mchog stsal lags// ting 'dzin kun gyi 'bras bu gsal// sems can kun la ci 'dod par// dngos grub bla na med par gsol// slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i phyir/
230a6(rgyud): rang gi gnas gshegs badz+ra ruH// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin// 'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim// un+niSh+ma k+She tra pA la// a ti tsakrA suts+tshiSh+Ta// su b+ho dza nAM bi ba gnyis// b+ham+b+ha gnyis dang
230a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba dang // sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha me dang // oM sngon AHhUM phaT swA hA// de yi rjes la brjod par bya// rdo rje dril bu 'chang 'gyur ba// g.yon brkyang nga yi gnas pas gnas// khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin/
230b1(rgyud): dang rdo slob dpon rang ba'an ne// khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang // de skar cho gnyi shu las// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bsam 'i mang du shes pa'is// rlu dag gi
230b2(rgyud): las bzang po// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ cho ga nyi shu pa'i las rgyus pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas gnan
230b3(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang // las ni cho ga nyi shur bshad// dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci// de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur// chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs// de nas
230b4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang // sngon du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni// rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad// ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas
230b5(rgyud): mchod pa rnam sgom zhing // sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan rab tu rdzogs// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// gsang
230b6(rgyud): ba la sogs la gnas pa// skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan no// kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams kyis// mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni// bla ma dad pas mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'bang
230b7(rgyud): don// chu sogs ming ni mthar thug pa// ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir// spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'// sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir// shes rab brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'/
231a1(rgyud): dpe les bde ba bstan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor sa tshon thar pa dang // mtshungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun// mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // dmyur 'bras du 'khor/
231a2(rgyud): lo 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni// las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur// shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dbang bskur ba ni thob pa dang // dngos po'i ngo bo ji bzhin du// shes
231a3(rgyud): rang ye shes kyis ni thob// bla ma yis ni sgrub pa yang // mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog/ de ltar yun mi ring bar 'thob// dag pa'i spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
231a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//
231a5(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim// rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni// sku gzugs la ni phyag mi bya// rang gnas dkyil 'khor
231a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg dang // rab gnas nam yang mi bya'o// dri chen rdor chu dkon mchog sogs// bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod// de phyir de la mngon zhugs pa'o// thugs kyi rdo rje rang nyid gtso// sems de
231a7(rgyud): yang ni de dngos med// gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni// stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa med// de phyir thams cad nam mkha' 'dra// de ltar rnam dag rnam shes bya// rtsa ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya//
231b1(rgyud): gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun// sems las gzhan pa yod ma yin// rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas// lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa// sems ma gtogs pa gzhan/
231b2(rgyud): ni med// de phyir de ltar rnam spyod pa// rang lus gcig pu rtag tu mchod// rigs lnga dag tu rtag spyod pas// rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag/ 'dod dang mi 'dod dbye ba dang // btung dang mi btung rnam
231b3(rgyud): par spangs// rnal 'byor skal yod skal med ces// nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// phyag rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs// de bzhin gzugs la'ang dbye ba gsum// gzugs rdo rje ma bkug nas su// sa snying la ni dngul
231b4(rgyud): bar bya// yang dag klu dang brjod bral dbyangs// de bzhin sgra la'ang dbye ba gsum// sna rdo rje ma yang dag dgug/ phyag na rdo rje la ni dbul// ga pur a ga dzA ti sogs// de bzhin rje rang dbye ba gsum// ji rdo rjem
231b5(rgyud): rang dag dgug/ nang pa pa'i seng po la yang dbul// 'obyed pa dang 'jib pa dang // ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum// rdo rjer ma yang dag dgug// 'jig rten dbang phyug la ni dngul// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// gros dang /
231b6(rgyud): brlang pa'i dbri ba gsum// reg bya rdo rje yang dag dgug/ sgribasel la ni dpral bar bya// phyil chos rnams 'di dag kun// dachags pa dang nim brtags pa'ang // chos dbyings rdo rje yang dag dgug/ 'dzed pa'i rdoH/
231b7(rgyud): 'aning bug// de bzhin byed pa nang deng ni// gnyis ga mngan mi darigs pa// gzugs la gsum du byas nas ni// lha rnams pa ni dngul par bya/ du ni lnga ni ngang gnas kyi// chud ldar ngas par 'byung ba 'i khris
232a1(rgyud): shA ma/ pa byed/ dung gang bdu nas nga byu ga dag thA smA b+hA/
232a2(rgyud): yang dag dga' pa'i rmi thog gis// rdo rje N+Di ng+ga badz+ra bzung // me tog bdag nyid la mchod pa// rdo rje gsu gyi ma tshig mchog rnam tog tshul su lta yin shing // de ltarang gtsu pa'i na 'i
232a3(rgyud): nges par bsregs pa de ni spos// thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par// zhugs pa la sogs rim las byung // rnal 'byor pa yi mi shigs sgra/ zugs rdo rje la dpu phra// li gr-i d+hU las
232a4(rgyud): yang dag byung // sngags kyi 'od zer shin tu gsal// mar me 'bar ba'i yang dag 'od// thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya// bde ba chen po nam mkhar gnas// byang chub sems ni sad pa dang // de nyid kyis kyang
232a5(rgyud): byugs pa ni// thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya// 'dir ni gang dang gang longs spyod// dbang po thams cad yang dag brten// de dag thams cad thugs rdo rje// bza' ba'i snod du mchod par bya// dgod dang sgeg dang rtse
232a6(rgyud): 'joni// sna tshogs kyis ni sems dga' byed// rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag dang // thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dngul// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ nang gi bdag nyid
232a7(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// lha mo yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ rnal 'byor ba de la rtog pa rnams// rtsa
232b1(rgyud): dbye ba'i rang bzhin ces// chab tu lus kyi 'jog// de sde rna rnams su ni bshad// rtag tu de bdun ces dga'/ kun nas rnam par theg pa'i lus// bdeng chen pos kun tu chub/ rta' du 'angs
232b2(rgyud): brjod// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // bral bstan cig skyes skad cig/ 'char ba dang ni rtse 'dzo dang // kun nas lhag par theg pa dang // brtu dang sang par gyur pa dang // de rabs nA mo bshad
232b3(rgyud): phyi rol tu ni byung ba na// gang phyir yang dag sbyor bar 'gyur// lus kyi rtsa rnams yang dag sad// de phyir rnal 'byor mar ni bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'greng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/
232b4(rgyud): lha mo'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// e baM zhes bya yi ge gnyis// a ni stong pa nyid du bshad// de bzhin pa ni thugs rje
232b5(rgyud): dang 'thig le de gnyis sbyor las byung // de ni rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung // e haM gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang // mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis// rgyud rnams sun thog
232b6(rgyud): rar gsungs// e ni d+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do// pad+ma'i rten du shes par bya// rten pa rdo rje zhes ni gsungs// brtan pa rdo rje 'chang ba yi// de la gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs// sna tshogs sprul pa ston par byed//
232b7(rgyud): bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// e ni gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings sam// b+ha ga chos 'byung pad+ma la// rnal 'byor seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// mchog tu rmad byung ston par
233a1(rgyud): mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' de rdo rje// rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang // he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po sangs rgyas la sogs mtshan// e baM de bzhin gshegs pa'i rma
233a2(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i bde mchog dang // stong nyid snying rje dbyer med dang // gang la de nyid mngon par brjod// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya// gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni// rgyud kun gyi ni gling gzhir
233a3(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa// stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa// gang la de nyid mngon par brjod// e baM zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// gang la 'di nyid med pa ni// de la de kho na nyid med// gang
233a4(rgyud): la de nyid yongs shes pa// bcos ma'i gser ltar gsal por ni// rgyud ni legs bshad de nyid shes// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par// de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog/ e baM don ni rnam par
233a5(rgyud): nges chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis// dang po'i ngag tu yang dag bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ e baM zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa dang rgyu
233a6(rgyud): mtshan bstan pa'i le'u rtse lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyen// oM baM la sogs don rgyas pa// gang gis yang dag yongs su shes// chos kyi da ni /
233a7(rgyud): dag rtogs// e/ e ne shes rab dam pa sde// 'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag/ srid pa gsum na 'ongs shes pa// 'di ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan// baM/ 'od ma bsngang ba ltar mdzes shing /
233b1(rgyud): chags la sogs pa rab bskyed ldan// snang bgasal pa rnam par shes// ming ni thabs shes bya ba yin// ma rig chen rang nyid rtsu ba rtse// ma rig pa ni 'azlog pa yin// ma rig pa las 'di 'byung ngas//
233b2(rgyud): de bas snang ba 'byung ba'o// ya/ 'gro ba rnam shes gsum dang po'i// de ni skyong pa cher 'gyur la// de yang 'od gsal bar 'gro'o// shru/ sdang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can// gang 'di rnam shes gsum
233b3(rgyud): thob pa// sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i// rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin no// taM/ da ni re re'i don snang ba// rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed pa// la/ rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni// kun tu 'gro la
233b4(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur// e/ 'di ni rlung khams chen po ste// rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin// de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni// ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// ka sra ba'i sa khams chu nyid dang // de
233b5(rgyud): bzhin me dang rlung dag ni// rnam par shes par blangs nas su// srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur// smi/ 'di na phung po lnga rnams su// 'byung ba 'dus byas mtshan nyid ni// gzugs tshor 'du shes
233b6(rgyud): 'du byed dang // rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o// sa/ mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // bya ba sgrub pa nyid dang ni// me long dang ni chos kyi dbyings// 'di ni ye shes lnga po yin// ma/ yid kyi skye mched nyid
233b7(rgyud): dang ni// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // sna dang lce dang lus rnams te// 'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o// ye/ gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams// srog dang rtsol ba la brten pa// gsang
234a1(rgyud): sngags rgyal po zlos bzhin du// mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs// b+ha/ 'di las rang bzhin chags pa dang // chags med la sogs par yang 'gyur// de las
234a2(rgyud): dge dang mi dge'i las// de las skye ba 'byung ba yin// ga/ 'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes// ming gis rab tu bskul/
234a3(rgyud): ba yin// bAn/ rlung dang chu dang me dang sa// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po ste// ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du// shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster// sa/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs
234a4(rgyud): pa'i skur// phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing // mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der// sa snying la sogs rgyal sras so// rnga rol pas dga' ba gang yin pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po
234a5(rgyud): skyongs chen rnams// de yi phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru// dpung pa yan lag rnams su brtag/ ta/ de dang de yi rigs las byung // lha dang lha mo tha dad pa// de ni yod min de dag kyang // 'gro ba'i
234a6(rgyud): don phyir ston pa yin// thA/ 'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi// rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes gsum// mthong phyir dman dang bar ma dang // dam pa'i yul la gzhag par bya// ga/ dbang po rang nyid rang
234a7(rgyud): yul la// 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dang de// dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang // de dang de snang tsam nyid do// ta/ dbang po de yis lam nas ni// sgrub pa pos ni yul thob pa// de bzhin de las ma gsungs
234b1(rgyud): par// tshim par bya phyir dbul bar bya// kA sku gsum dag ni tha dad par// skyob pa yis ni yang dag bstan// rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis// gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ya/ gang zhig
234b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas su mtshan nyid// kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa ni// de nyid rdzogs rim sbyor ba yis// 'od gsal bar ni rnam dag 'gyur// bAka/ tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid// gtso bo ye shes su
234b3(rgyud): rang bzhin// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin// tsita/ sems dang sems byung ma rig pa// shes rab thabs dang nyer thob dang // stong dang shin tu stong pa dang /
234b4(rgyud): stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod// ta/ rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes na// de nas spyod pa rab tu bya// las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas// rdo rje sku nyid thob par 'gyur// hriM/ thugs la 'jig
234b5(rgyud): rten pa rnams kyi// don spyod bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs// kun rdzob tu ni sprul skur gnas// ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa spyod// da/ yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du// 'dod pa thams cad ster
234b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang // stobs kyis blangs nas spyod par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dbang po gang yang 'dod// de ni sdeb pa med par bya// mnyam par ma gnag rnal
234b7(rgyud): 'byor gyis// rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur// ga rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa// blo ma gos dang ma gos pa// der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas// dz+ra/ sgyu ma lta
235a1(rgyud): bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos dag kun las rnam par rol// sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du// gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas// lo rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
235a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur// rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro ma// gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid// Sh+Ti/ dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na// bya dang bya min rnam spangs te// pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis bzhin//
235a3(rgyud): ngo bo nyid ces gos mi 'gyur// b+ha/ yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas// sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spyod//
235a4(rgyud): gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi// de yi khyim ni nam mkha' nyid// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// de nyid du ni rtag tu rol// Sha/ 'di la snang ba dbye ba la// thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi// 'jig
235a5(rgyud): rten tha snyad byas pa yis// ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro// gi/ sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad drag/ 'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa// lan gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// ye shes gsum la 'byung ba'o//
235a6(rgyud): dzaHskye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa bar mar gnas pa ste// ji srid 'jig rten gyis brtags pa// sems kyi rlung ni rnam 'phrul lo// ha/ rgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang // gar gyi nyams dgur
235a7(rgyud): ldan pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// 8 bdag byin rlabs chen ma gtogs pa// rin chen gzhan dag 'di na med// me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin// rang
235b1(rgyud): bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa'o// 'di skad la sogs dang po'i ngag/ mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo// de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
235b2(rgyud): shes// sgrub po'i de nyid shes pa ni// ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis// gang du gsal bar ma gsungs so// rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas// dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa// de ltar/
235b3(rgyud): rim pa 'di yis shes// sems can kun la phan bskyed pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ e baM ma yA zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u
235b4(rgyud): ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog/ nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams// gang gis thim par gyur pa dang // rnam
235b5(rgyud): rtog bag chags sa bon ni// phung po lnga yi bud shing dang // rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mes// rtag tu sbyin sreg rmad byung bya// lte dbus gnas pa'i sgra tsam ni// sgra tsam phyi rol gsang padra// de la rang
235b6(rgyud): rgyud rlung gis ni// yongs su bskul ba'i me yis ni// dbang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor// gzi brjid gsal bar rab tu 'bar// gang tshe mar gang gsang pad+ma// de la 'di ni snod du brjod// ha ni thugs gzar
235b7(rgyud): zhes byar gsungs// rdo rje dgang gzar du ni brjod// b+ha ga thab khung zhes ni bshad// dbang po lnga yi bsreg rdzas dang // phung po lam shing du ni gyur// mar ni byang chub sems su bshad// gnam stong nas
236a1(rgyud): brtsams nya yi bar// ji srid byed pa gshegs su gsol// me thab thig le tsam du gsungs// thugs gzar nam yang mi 'pho ba// sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs// gzugs/
236a2(rgyud): rdorje sogs rgyal sras rnams// khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis tshim bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa gang // de yang dgang blugs su ni brjod// hUM phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis//
236a3(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du sreg blugs dbul// de yis lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na// lha yi dam tshig bla na med// yid la ji ltar 'dod pa rnams// de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni// sbyin sreg 'di ni mchog tu gsung/
236a4(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o//
236a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni// dngos grub kun byed de nyid mchog/ ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // don yod grub dang 'od
236a6(rgyud): dpag med// rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do// khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang // byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med// de bzhin don yod thug pa sha/ ma bskyod de bzhin rdorje
236a7(rgyud): chung 'dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad// de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog pas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben// sgra yi tsher ma rnam par spangs// de la khang pa bya bo na// khang pa gnyis brtsegs ni/
236b1(rgyud): dang bcas// sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing // gzhan dag de yi steng du bya// gzhan ni gsang nas bya ba ste// 'jig rten pa ni gcig tu shes// sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing // sngags shes
236b2(rgyud): bsam pa rgya che ba// brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang // yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs// sgrub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang // de lta bu nyid sgrub grogs mchog/ chags dang chags bral rnam
236b3(rgyud): par spangs// brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang // khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang // mang du thos shing yod par blta// thog ma gnyis ka yi ni lus// 'bras bu sogs kyis dag bya ba// gnod
236b4(rgyud): mdzes skul byed 'bum phrag gcig/ de rjes sngags pas bzla bar bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga dAn bid+yA rA dza hUM
236b5(rgyud): hUM phaT/ de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum// sgrub pos mi smra bzlas par bya// kun tu bzang po 'gro ba'i gtso// de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong // des ni bka' yis bsgo nga ni// ka n+ya mchog ni rten gyis
236b6(rgyud): la sems can don ni mtshungs med byos// ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang // bu mo skal ldan mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyan// brkam chags med cing chags bcas sems/
236b7(rgyud): sgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas// nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med cing mang du thos// sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya// ji srid khu ba dang bcas gyur// de nas gdong ni pad+ma
237a1(rgyud): gnyis// gnyis ka 'byung ba blangs nas ni// pad+mo'i snod der gzhag par bya// mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du// glang po rta khyi ba lang mi// dpyid zla tha chung gnyis ka shar/
237a2(rgyud): skye gnas nas ni blangs nas ni// de bzhin de ru rim pa bzhin// par snod de nyid la ni der// zhag bdun bar du gzhag par bya// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya//
237a3(rgyud): 'du 'dzi med cing dben pa'i gnas// tsan dan bzang po byugs nas ni// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sngags bkod pa'i// pad+mo'i snod la gzhag par bya// ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar// mar dang li kha dkar po dang /
237a4(rgyud): cha bsdams bskol ba byas nas ni// de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre// rgya shugs tshig gu tshad tsam gyis// blo dang ldan pas ril bu bya// grib ma la ni bskam byas nas// rim gyis bskyed cing bzag
237a5(rgyud): pabapar bya// rdo rje ming sring spun dang ni// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag/ mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo// mar ngo'i tshes brgyad tshes bcu 'am// yang na bcu bzhi
237a6(rgyud): nas brtsams te// de la gtor ma bya ba ni// las kun la ni bla na med// de las kyang ni dngos grub skye// phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang // dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs// de yis 'bad mi dgos
237a7(rgyud): par thog/ rlung gi de nyid yang dag slob// mkha' spyod nyid ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i drung dpal rdo rje 'brang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u rtse
237b1(rgyud): drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga mchog/ gang gis mchod pa las byung ba// rgyal sras rnams kyi dngos grub
237b2(rgyud): mchog/ rnal 'byor tshe dang lhan cig tu// sgrub pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing // de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug/ de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang // tshogs kyi 'khor
237b3(rgyud): lo zhes ni brjod// kun kyang dam tshig la gnas pa// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bla ma la dang dam tshig gnas// gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// thabs shes bya ba bgegs
237b4(rgyud): med na// tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug/ gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur// shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs// mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas/
237b5(rgyud): lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon// lhag pa yongs su spangs nas ni// thabs dang so sor shes rab dang // kun la gcig ni phan yon med// thog ma yid 'ong nyams dga' bar// me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor
237b6(rgyud): bya de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag nas mchod// gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod// tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes la// dkyil
237b7(rgyud): 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas// dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni// mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni// bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig rten dang // 'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya//
238a1(rgyud): gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa// mtshan byed na ni dgug par bya// slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod// ji ltar gdan stengs bzhugs gsol nas// gdan ni
238a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan// rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang // mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs// dkyil 'khor ba ni gzhan rnams dang // de bzhin 'khor lo gnas/
238a3(rgyud): pa gzhag/ dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang // rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang // mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang // rkang pa la sogs rkyong ba dang //
238a4(rgyud): yang dang yang du ldang ba ni// de la dus kun tu mi bya// phyag rgya brda yi tshogs rnams kyis// bya zhing bya bar shes par bya// shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya// gtso
238a5(rgyud): bo la ni snod kyi mchog/ dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang // de med dum bu gsum pa la// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// lha yi chang la sogs pa gang // legs par mnyam par
238a6(rgyud): gzhag ste dbul// tshogs rnams la yang so sor snod// me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba// thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin// sngon bzhin bza' ba la sogs ldan// gang gis dga' ba rnams
238a7(rgyud): nyams pa// de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o// yang dang yang du phyag byas nas// phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya// de nas bza' ba thams cad ni// sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyang // oM dang AHdang hUM
238b1(rgyud): gis ni// sbyang dang sad dang rtogs par bya// gur kum tsan ldan dpa' bo dang // gangs dang ri dgas lte ba dang // 'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga// bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod// sbom po ming med
238b2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin// gang gis lce rtses myang bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su dus kun tu// kha la sems ni rnam par bkod// bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dngus
238b3(rgyud): la ni dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod// dpa' bo'i don gyis mtshan nyid rnams// gal te dpa' bo mi shes na// dngos grub thams cad gsol ba yi// 'khor lo de yi 'bras bu med// de lha'i rim
238b4(rgyud): pa cung zad gang // phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod// de cis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ster// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig 'dres// rab tu bshad kyis de nyon cig/
238b5(rgyud): gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ga' zhig/ sems rtogs pa yi phyir 'ongs nas// de la de tshe smra ba yang // sgrub pa pos ni mi bya zhing // tshig tsam gyis kyang lan mi gdab// bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgya bya//
238b6(rgyud): del cung zad bya sgra gang // slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya// yang na bya ba thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje yang dag spyad// gang phyir gang nyid rdo rje sems// las kyi rdo rje gzhan 'ga' med// sna tshogs kyi ni rnal
238b7(rgyud): 'byor ma// yang dang yang du dgug par bya// de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa med// slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod// gang yang skyon gyi spyod pa ni// de yi lus ni ltung bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes//
239a1(rgyud): bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya// rdo rje bcing bas de yang bya// lha rnams ji ltar mnyes pa nyid// ma'ang sring mo bu mo 'am// gal te mchod par 'dod pa na// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/
239a2(rgyud): rtog pa med par bstan par bya// rang mchog de yis dngos grub ni// thod par 'di la the tsom med// lhag ma gtor ma blangs nas ni// dgon pa chen por song nas dor/ b+h+rU~M uts+tshiSh+Nak+Sha tra/ pA lA ya swA hA sngags brjod bya/
239a3(rgyud): gal te de la rab byed pa'i// rnal 'byor ma ni slar yang mthong // de ltar de ni yongs shes nas// rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog/ gang gis gdong ni 'bar ba'i 'od// zlum zhing mjam la mdzes pa dang // smin ma ring
239a4(rgyud): ba de shes bya// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // de la pad+ma'i phyag rgya bstan// rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no// mchu slo mig dkyus ring ba dang // kha dog ser po yid 'phrog pa// 'di yi dpral bar yi ge gsum//
239a5(rgyud): ji srid sgra mtshams bar du gnas// g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyis ni// 'dzum dag la ni rtag tu nyan// 'di 'dra'i mkha' 'gro mthong na ni// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa dang // de yi bar
239a6(rgyud): byed rab tu ston// g.yon pas yongs su bskor nas ni// phyag rgya lan gyis bstan par bya// sna tshogs pa yi gos la'ang dga'// rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung // kha dog gnag cing gos kyang gnag/ snga ni
239a7(rgyud): 'khyil cing dar gyis bcings// dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yis// de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// rtag tu de ni sems g.yo ba// ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// de yi g.yon pas phyag
239b1(rgyud): rgya ston// mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes// mtshan mo'i sa nas 'gro ba'i mchog/ thung ngu lho sbom kha dog dkar// byin pa sbom zhing shin tu mdzes// sa spyod mar ni shes par bya// dung gi phyag rgya lan yin no//
239b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mig yangs rdzi ma sdug pa dang // yan lag kun la bsdus brgyan// sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang // yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring // de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags// don/
239b3(rgyud): yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // de 'dra ba yis rab mthong nas// ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya dang // g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'i lan yin no// de ltar 'bad pas shes nas ni// mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni// de la cung
239b4(rgyud): zhig 'jigs mi bya// gang phyir de nyid gang mchod bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang rnal 'byor ma dang 'dre ba'i le'u ste drug
239b5(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// gsang ba'i tshig gi bshad pa dang // rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams su// rigs kun las byung rnal 'byor ma/
239b6(rgyud): mtshan mo 'du ba'i dam tshig ni// 'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang // de lta bu yi gsang ba ni// bshad kyis dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// saM po ta kaM chang 'thung ba// bi ra sha ru mngon par brjod// na li ni pa taM thod dang //
239b7(rgyud): ku la la mi'i rus pa'i rgyan// kun da raM 'dod yang dag sbyor// tsa ri ro drug bza' ba'o// saM pu taM dbang po gnyis sbyor ba// a li gang yod pa yi ming // shang rim ga kaM skal yod shes// tsi tra kaM ni skal med shes//
240a1(rgyud): ru sha ra ni zhu bar shes// sreg ma dam gla rtsir brjod// tsan dra ma ni khrag tu bshad// ga ni bshad par yongs su grags// g+ha na sha chen du ni bshad// ni dzid du ra ru brjod/
240a2(rgyud): b+ha ha naM nI chu ru bshad// ban+de yan lag rab tu bshad// shu paM bzang po zhes ni brjod// he ni tshim pa zhes ni grags// marga ltogs pa ru ni brjod// b+hi ti laM du bshad pa dang // khyo ma gau ni pha rol dpung //
240a3(rgyud): ka ma ya ni gyis shig brjod// na ga raM ni bdag lus brjod// pa ta ka ni nyos shes brjod// a dza ya ni me zhes brjod// sha khaM za ba zhes ni brjod// ra gam 'dor ni cho ga brjod// sha ta kaM ni bza' bar
240a4(rgyud): brjod// ci 'dra ba ni sngags zhes brjod// sha raM khyi 'tshed sha zhes brjod// raM pa ka ni bla mar bshad// ka ya 'dir ni rgyal rigs brjod// ra gaM rje rigs zhes ni bshad// be raM rgya ni dmangs rigs brjod//
240a5(rgyud): tsa baM rigs ngan zhes ni brjod// sha ra sme sha can du brjod// b+ha ga tsa graM ko lpags mkhan// khang kom ro sreg ma ru bshad// sa man tra ni rgyal por brjod// mi raM ma yi ring du brjod// b+ha ra ha gang zhes ni/
240a6(rgyud): bshad// bip+lu phag ces brjod par bya// pa la sha ni nya zhes brjod// de na mar skyes bu ni bshad// nam hUM sbyin sreg tu ni bshad// maN+Da a hA 'dab chags brjod// hi ra pyA ni me tog brjod// sha drul lam ni/
240a7(rgyud): spos su bshad// mA la tri ni dri ru bshad// sha ku ni ka mar mer bshad// ka shi ko ni ges su bshad// kaM sa ra ni gdong du brjod// ba traM dpral ba zhes su bshad// ma la smin mar yang dag grags// ko ba la
240b1(rgyud): yaM ni mig tu shes// a da ra ni so ru brjod// pal la po ni mchu ru shes// pa sha mgrin pa ru ni grags// hUM so phrag pa ru ni bshad// a gu ro ni dpung par brjod// so so ru nI lag par bshad// shri bang le ni nu/
240b2(rgyud): mar bshad// dza ta pa laM rkang par brjod// da la na ni lte bar brjod// pad+ma dza lam gsang ba'i gnas// ka ti bka brla gnyis so// bi si dz+ra dar du ni bshad// tshwa gan ni rkang par brjod// bar a ka kaM
240b3(rgyud): sar/ sen mo zhes ni yang dag bshad// pad+ma gar ni ga ni snang // sha kra ku su laM mal stan// shag tu bu zhes bya bar brjod// na la ni nA lam ston med// go bag Sh+ma lam thams cad brjod// sa ga raM ni rgas
240b4(rgyud): par bshad// a laM ro ni zhim por brjod// a k+Sha raM rim mi zhim bshad// mI gaM mi smra bar ni bshad// pa gau la mu daM glu len// mi tra gar zhes bya bar brjod// shapya tshul 'chos su ni bshad// spar sha
240b5(rgyud): zhags par rab tu grags// rangs sgeg mo yi ro 'bebs ma// ru paM ri yi rtse mo'o// tra ne ha ni bsad par bshad// pA rA pa ta 'chi bar brjod// ta ma lA ko se ma yul// pa laM grong khyer du ni brjod// dran grong
240b6(rgyud): du bshad pa yin// thu n+ya srog ces bya bar bshad// ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad// na ya na ni rnam shes brjod// a b+hi na paM dgod par bshad// ru d+hi ran 'chang bar brjod// ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad//
240b7(rgyud): kan nya mtshan mor rab tu grags// ngas nyi ma phyed du bshad// ra pi mtshan gyi cha ru grags// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u
241a1(rgyud): ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// sku ni mgo bor gnas pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis/
241a2(rgyud): byang sems 'bab// de ni so sor rab phye bas// sku yi 'khor lo ru shes bya// yi ge phyi mo'i dbye ba yis// gsung la gnas par rab tu shes// chags sogs bag chags dbye ba yis// thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni/
241a3(rgyud): shes u gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni// sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la// rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas// dang po sku yi rdo rje ni// gzugs phung la ni yang dag
241a4(rgyud): bzhugs// de rjes num mkha' rdo rje ni// tshor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs// bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni// 'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs// las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni// 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs//
241a5(rgyud): bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo rje ni// rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs// yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhugs so// khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni// bcom ldan
241a6(rgyud): 'das yum mA ma bzhugs// dro ba la sogs me khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs// mi bskyed la sogs rlung khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs// de mig dang
241a7(rgyud): po gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pas snying po// de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la// bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o// de yi sna bug gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i mdzod// de yi lce yi dbang
241b1(rgyud): po la// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang // de yi yid kyi dbang po la// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni// lus shes bya bar brtags pa/
241b2(rgyud): la sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so// lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs
241b3(rgyud): pa gshin rje gshed// lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub// kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no// gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni//
241b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba// dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal
241b5(rgyud): pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngo// pus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che// rang gi mgo stengs bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs
241b6(rgyud): pa 'khor los sgyur// rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te// lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs// sku yi dkyil 'khor
241b7(rgyud): zhes brjod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di// lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku// skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa
242a1(rgyud): myur du 'thob// khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa// de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs// mthong na don ni yod pa kye// phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che//
242a2(rgyud): de bas sems can thams cad kyis// lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis// rab tu 'bad de bla ma bstan// de nas mthong ba don yod bcas// byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che// dga' zhing mgu
242a3(rgyud): bas phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags// gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs// legs so bya ba byin nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// a A
242a4(rgyud): i I u U dang // r-i r-I l-i l-I ai aM// o au aM aHdbyangs zhes bya// ka tsa Ta tA pa sde tshan// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa// ha dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes// ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan// 'dod/
242a5(rgyud): chags la sogs bag chags kyang // grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis so// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa// dpal mchog las ni shes par bya// de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//
242a6(rgyud): rdo rje gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni// sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sku gsung
242a7(rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang // bla ma ston pa slongab dpon
242b1(rgyud): dang / rdo rje 'chang dang slob ma yi// mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni// dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs// sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste// byang chub sems
242b2(rgyud): ra pa'i tshogs kyi gnas// sangs rgyas yi ge hUM du bshad// gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod// dge 'dun zhes bya yi ga oM// kun nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do// sangs rgyas a ba d+hU tIr 'gyur// chos kyang ma
242b3(rgyud): lan+da ru brjod// dge 'dun ra sa nA ru brjod// 'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni// 'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te/
242b4(rgyud): de ltar khams gsum mtshan nyid mchog/ snying por gyur pa rang srog las// khams gsum na ni gzhan med do// sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa// rmi lam rmi lam bzhin du mthong // khams gsum bdag
242b5(rgyud): nyid de bzhin du// gcig pur myur ba mthong bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// dam pa'i chos dang chos kyi
242b6(rgyud): srung dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur// de ni sku gsum bdag nyid can// snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs// chos ni snang ba thob pa'o// dge 'dun snang ba mched par 'gyur// de ni snang ba gsum mtshan
242b7(rgyud): nyid// zhi ba la sogs las la byang // sngags dang rnal 'byor cha rnams shes// cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs// de ni bla mar mngon par brjod// tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong // bzod dang brtson 'grus
243a1(rgyud): mchog tu ldan// nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen// shes rab ldan zhing bzod la mkhas// bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs// dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod// nang gi gsang 'dus la/
243a2(rgyud): rab dga'// phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa// de lha'i man ngag rim pa yis// slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab// de ni ston par yongs su gsungs// de skad smras pa de bzhin byed// rtog pa rnams dang dkyil
243a3(rgyud): 'khor tshogs// dam pa'i don gyis bya ba dang // slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la// slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug/ de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o// de nyid bcu ni
243a4(rgyud): yongs shes nas// dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes// slob ma rjes sdud nus pa dang // gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang // shes rab ji snyed yang dag ldan// rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs/
243a5(rgyud): zab cing rgya chen yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog/ tshar gcod pan 'dogs pa la mkhas// de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad// dad cing bla ma la yang gus// rtag tu dge ba'i las la
243a6(rgyud): gnas// gnyis med rgyu yang med pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// lung ni mang du thos pa dang // gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs// sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos// kun tu brtson dang yang dag
243a7(rgyud): ldan 'de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan// dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang // stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// gang la de nyid nges shes bya// gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog/ sngags dang rnal 'byor rim
243b1(rgyud): pa sogs// ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang // sangs rgyas lnga ni rang bzhin nyid// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi sa// snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang // chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // sku gsum rnam
243b2(rgyud): par sgom pa dang // bde chen yon tan mtshan nyid ni// dga' ba la sogs dbye ba dang // de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// dang
243b3(rgyud): sbyor ba mdor bsdus pas// de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog/ 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bde gnyis dbugs
243b4(rgyud): 'byung gnyis la sogs// gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod// yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud// thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni// rten dang snod ces bya bar gsungs//
243b5(rgyud): mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang // ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni// sa mi snod du gzhag mi bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud// snod min dag la sbyin mi bya// slob ma skad cig de la 'chi// 'di dang pha rol
243b6(rgyud): tu ni phung // snod min man ngag rab ba shwad na// slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ sangs rgyas dang / dam pa'i chos dang /
243b7(rgyud): dge 'dun la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni// zhi ba la sogs bya ba
244a1(rgyud): yang sngags dang rdul 'byor rim pa yi// lham dang gdugs dang gtsug tor dang // so ci la sogs byung ba dang // sbubs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs// 'dor zhing gang brkyong ba dang /
244a2(rgyud): gzhan du blta dang spyi brtol snga// nor gyis sems dang ngar 'dzin dang // rgyan la sogs pa blta ba dang // ngag med par ni spa ba dang // bla ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang // de la sogs pa skyon gyi tshogs/
244a3(rgyud): bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs// 'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod// rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas// ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong spad pas// slob masar+b+ba/
244a4(rgyud): ma'i mdun gnas bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams// de lta bu sogs spyod ces bya// dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa// de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o// de yi zhi//
244a5(rgyud): sogs bya ba ni// bla mas bstan par bya ba'i rigs// de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya// thun mong cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis// zla ba yar gyi ngol bya// dbang dang mngon spyod kyi ni
244a6(rgyud): las zla ba mar gyi ngo la brtsams// byang du kha bltas zhi ba la// de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta// drag po'i las la lho phyogs su// dbang gi las la nub tu blta// gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs// sngab
244a7(rgyud): bar bya la bden bral du// gnas nas bskrad la rlung gi phyogs// rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs// zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste// rgyas pa la ni ser po bya// dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmar// kha dog nag po/
244b1(rgyud): gsod pa la'o// byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la/ chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la// khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o// zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya// de
244b2(rgyud): bzhin rgyas par snga dro bya// dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las// nyi mgung dang mtshan byed la'o// de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad// sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis// zhi ba la sogs dngos
244b3(rgyud): grub brgyad// blo ldan cho ga bzhin du sgrub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras
244b4(rgyud): bu bstan pa'i le'u sta drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub bshad// thob
244b5(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// khro ba'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni// khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes ni brjod// yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams// sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya// dngos
244b6(rgyud): grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu stsol// 'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod du// 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas// skyes bu thod pa khrag gis gos// rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blangs// skyes bu'i khru
244b7(rgyud): bzla mtshan dang // bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni// de na bsgrub bya'i rnam pa dang // gsal dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang // g.yon brkyang ba yis mnan nas ni// zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du// gshin
245a1(rgyud): rdzag shed kyi sngags 'dis ni// dngos grub rgyar ni bzlas par bya// nam sa man kA ga pAka tsit+ta badz+rAH/ oM kha kha khA hi lU hrI/ sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka/ a saM mu sa la par shu sha /
245a2(rgyud): kha Da ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni haSh+Tha/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+Ta prA Na a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA bir+N+Na b+hU ta ka/ bi kr-i ta A naM/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT Ta aT Ta hA sa nA di ni/
245a3(rgyud): byAb+hap+pa tsad+d+hA ni dA san/ ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba karmA Ne/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da / sar+b+ba man trA~M/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ par mu drA nA/ A kan+d+ha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sar+b+baM b+hUt+tha/ ma tha ma tha/ nem tha ni maH/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAn/ pra be sha ya pra ba sha/
245a4(rgyud): maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ be ba shwa ta/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ha na ha na/ da ha da he/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam+b+ha mA bi laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu s+phu ra/ hUM hUM/ tardza ya/ be ka na/ phaT phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ kA ra kA ra/
245a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba A na na bI ra pU rA ya/ hi hi b+ha ga bAM/ kin+ti rA ya si na/ na ma/ sar+b+ba at+mA na sa twA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ thog mar khro bo'i bzlas pa 'di// dbang du bya dang dgug pa mchod// bskrad par rab tu bshad par
245a6(rgyud): bya khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang // ske tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang // dug dang da du rA khu ga/ sdigs mdzub khrag dang bsres nas su// dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni// zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog/
245a7(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya// de dbus sgrub pa'i ming bris la// g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni// sngags ni yongs su bzla bar bya// sngar bzhin bsgrub
245b1(rgyud): bya'i ming bkug nas// mtshan byed kyi ni dus su ni// kun nas zhag bdun par du bya// bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa ma n+ya kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra d+haM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ mahA daSh+Tota kaT+Ta
245b2(rgyud): d+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu bA sha hastA le/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+d+ha gAr+N+Na/ s+phoT s+phoT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba d+d+ha/
245b3(rgyud): bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni// bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yin// zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya ba// gzhan gyis mi thub
245b4(rgyud): ming dang ni// khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas ni// ma dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed// lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis// de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis// brabs
245b5(rgyud): la de la zhugs nas ni// bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyis// 'byung po sregs par bsam par bya// me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i// 'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya
245b6(rgyud): bAka tsit+ta badz+rA NaM/ oM a pa rA dzI rI ti ri ti rI dzi hUM phaT/ che ge mo 'byung ba gdon las grol bar mdzod cig/ d+hIHdug sel ba yi sngags kyis ni// bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyen cig/ khro bo rta mgrin
245b7(rgyud): bzlas pas ni// yang dag mi mtshungs pa yi mchog/ bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum brtsegs sgom// snying khar zla gnas ye shes sems// de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang // bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu
246a1(rgyud): bsam// rab tu 'bar ba de yis dug/ de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni// zla ba haM gis rnam par brgyan// kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod// de ltar sgrub pa po la bya// dr-i b+hI dzi NI sa
246a2(rgyud): d+ha dgod// las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed// bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te// rkang pa'i mtha' yi bar du skem// chu rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa ni// dug ni 'og btang rim pa yis// 'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas
246a3(rgyud): bya ste// rta mgrin du ni mngon par brjod// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa li ti bi sU li ka/ aT Ta hA sa nA da sa hi tA/ ka sa ri sa ho pa taM ad de badz+ra lu/
246a4(rgyud): rag+ha ta na/ tsa ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shA sa ma ru ta uta k+Ship+ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ bi Sha na ar+tha hA sa a pa ra mi ta wa la pa rA kra ma Ar+ya ga b+ha ti/ bud d+ha bud d+ha / ha ya grI ba kha kha tsIn dats+tshin da/ A be sha ya/ sar+b+ba pra he Shu/ a
246a5(rgyud): pra ti ha te b+ha wa/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si i daM duSh+Ta gra haM daMSh+Ta/ sar+b+baM bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mtha ma tha/ mad da ma da/ bud+d+ha b+hA raH/ bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA na kar+yaM ku ru swAh+ma/ che ge mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod cig hUM zhes bya
246a6(rgyud): ba dang sngags spel lo// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te// lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs dngos
246a7(rgyud): grung brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ dngos grub la sogs mtshan
246b1(rgyud): nyid ni// sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang // byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang // yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// mig dang rna ba yid dang lus// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo byin gyis brlab// mtshan/
246b2(rgyud): gsum nyin mo de dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga nyid theb par byed// bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur bas// blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur// snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur// nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o// mtshams
246b3(rgyud): ni snang ba thob pa'o// de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid// mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min// kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed// de ni skad cig mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod//
246b4(rgyud): mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am// dbus min 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba 'am// mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba 'am// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// gang
246b5(rgyud): du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing // zad med 'phel med dngos med min// ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad
246b6(rgyud): rnams dang bral// bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad cig gcig la
246b7(rgyud): mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni// 'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid byang sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas// rigs pas steng du
247a1(rgyud): byed pa ni// rgas pa med par the tsom med// hUM ho rim bzhin shes pa ni// 'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel// sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga// 'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod/
247a2(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni grub par byed// lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni// rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che// zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim
247a3(rgyud): pa yang // gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni// gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur ba// zung du 'jug
247a4(rgyud): ces de la bshad// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral// gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi
247a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod// sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdag la byin rlabs rim pas kyang // dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur// snang ba la
247a6(rgyud): sogs dbye ba shes// mngon par byang chub rim pa thob// zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis the tsom
247a7(rgyud): med// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher/ gzung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par zhugs nas ni// thob pa 'di la the tsom med// lus ni gzhal las khang du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun
247b1(rgyud): gyis yang dag brten// zur bzhi pa ni mdun rgyab dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so// steng 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtse bzhi yi dbyigs kyis ni//
247b2(rgyud): dbas bzhi ni brjod par bya// dra ba rgyu mar yang dag bshad// rgyus par gyur pa dra ba byed// cha ni zla ba phyed pa dang // bum pa lto bar yang dag shes// rje ngar brla dpung lag dar ni// ka ba brgyad du yang /
247b3(rgyud): dag bshad// mig gi rnam shes me long sogs// sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang // sna yi rnam shes me tog 'phreng // rin chen pa gu lce rnams shes// lus kyi rnam shes ras 'phan dang // yid kyi rnam
247b4(rgyud): shes ri dgas so// mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang // rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams// sna ni ba dan du ni bshad// lce ni dril bu ru ni gsungs// rnga yab la sogs rnam dag pa// lus kyi tsho ga
247b5(rgyud): zhes bya bar bshad// yid ni dbus kyi pad+mar gsungs// rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brtan// ye shes lnga ni rnam dag pa// re khA lngar ni yang dag brjod// phung po lnga ni rnam dag lnga// rnam
247b6(rgyud): ngag kha dog lnga ni dbye// de dag gzhal yas khang du sgom// dang por sbyor bar shes par bya// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo bo// de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod//
247b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// gzugs kyi phung po mdor bsdus na// gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni// mig gi rnam shes sa snying po// phyi rol
248a1(rgyud): gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad// byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus nu bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni// me long ye shes su ni bshad/
248a2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skyo// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni// phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad//
248a3(rgyud): rigs ni gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// dri yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur// sna yi rnam shes mkha' snying po// khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes// mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang // dngos dang dngos med//
248a4(rgyud): sogs 'du shes// snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po me khams dang // phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang // lce yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// /
248a5(rgyud): de ni so sor rtog ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du byed mtshan nyid ni// 'du shes phung po rlung gi khams// phyi rol ro yi
248a6(rgyud): rdo rje dang // lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnam sel// kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// bya ba nan tan grub ye shes// don yod grub pa'i rigs las
248a7(rgyud): byung // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod// rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i khams// yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis//
248b1(rgyud): shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// mi bskyod pa yi rigs las byung // mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs// de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis// rim pa ji
248b2(rgyud): bzhin bshad par bya// skra rus phyi sa mchil ma snying // so ni rnam snang bdag nyid do// spu dang gnas dang nye ba'i snying // sen mo chu yi khams su shes// rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi
248b3(rgyud): rigs kyi rten du shes par bya// so dang pags pa sha dang snying // me yi khams shes bya bar brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang // rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya// rgyus pa sha dang rtsibs
248b4(rgyud): logs snying // rlung ni don yod grub pa'o// dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pa snying // de ni nam mkha'i khams su grags// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang // snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya// re re la
248b5(rgyud): yang so sor ni// rnam pa lnga ni spro ba shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po lnga// nang gi bdag nyis rdzas phye ba// sha rtsa rgyus pa sha kham tshad// klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang // rus pa rkang
248b6(rgyud): dang gnye ma dang // mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang // glo ba mcher ba gcin dang ni// bshang ba po ba long ka dang // zhag dang chu ser rnag dang ni// khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // ngar
248b7(rgyud): snabs skra dang kha spu dang // sen mo spu dang pags pa dang // lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs// 'tshogs ma dpung pa zhes ni brjod// de dag rim par shes par bya// gzhal yas khang ni rnam
249a1(rgyud): dag pas// de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// pu lI ra ni mgo bor shes// spyi gtsug dza lan d+ha ra dang // rna ba g.yas pa oM r+yan dang // spyi bo'i
249a2(rgyud): rgya ba ni arbu da// go dA ba ri rna ba g.yon// rA me shwa ni smin ma'i dbus// mig gnyis de bi ko Ta dang // mA la wa ni dpung pa'i rtsa// kA ma ru pa mchan khung gnyis// o tre nu ma gnyis su grags/
249a3(rgyud): ko sa la ni lte bar shes// tri sa ku ne rna ba'i rtsa// kha ye pad+ma ka ling ka/ mgrin pa laM pa kar ni brjod// snying ni kAn cir shes par bya// hi ma la ya mdoms su shes// mtshan ma gr-i ha de ba dang /
249a4(rgyud): pre ta pu ri bshang ba'i lam// brla gnyis su waN+Da dI ba// sau raSh+Ta ni byin pa gnyis// rkang pa'i bol ni sin du'i yul// sor mo rnams la na ga ra// mthe bong gnyis ni ma rur shes// ku lu tA ni rkang
249a5(rgyud): pa'i mthil// de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang // sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid// de nyid dang ldan shes par bya// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// 'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis// rim gyis/
249a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas// mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes// mdoms na gnas pa'i
249a7(rgyud): thur sel ni// rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes// stong du rgyus pa lkog mthar gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no// me dang mnyam gnas lte bar gnas// don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin
249b1(rgyud): nos khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas// rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni// srog dang rtsol brdzun 'di dang // dus kun tu ni rgyu ba ni// srog ces bya ba min
249b2(rgyud): par bshad// srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang // de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs// 'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung // rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rgod dang za dang bldag pa dang // kun tu 'thung dang
249b3(rgyud): 'jib pa dang // gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas dang // mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod// gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang // bza' dang mang ba la sogs pa// shes dang lhan cig 'byor pa dag
249b4(rgyud): gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya// khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs// tshigs kun tu ni khyab pa'i phyir// khyab byed ces ni bya bar bshad// rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad
249b5(rgyud): pa ni// de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod// snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod par byed// gzhan ni gzhan la 'tshe ba yin// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gcig ni gcig la
249b6(rgyud): thim par 'gro// ji ltar zla ba gzas bzung la// rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong // rang gi bdag nyid la thim par// btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed// ji ltar
249b7(rgyud): mes bsregs dngos med dang // rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro// slar yang srog gi rlung shar ba// las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang // slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas//
250a1(rgyud): de las las dang de las skyes// de las chags sogs bag chags dang // de las slar yang 'chi dang skye// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// sngon bzhin rdo rje bzlas la
250a2(rgyud): sogs// rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur// de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig sman thur ma yis// thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal// yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong // de nas/
250a3(rgyud): yang yang phyag byas te// mchi bcas mig gis bcom ldan la// lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod// e ma ho kun 'gro kun dbang phyug/ nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs/
250a4(rgyud): pa brnyes// e ma'o dam tshig de nyid gsum// mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs
250a5(rgyud): med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams la mi rten cing // srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar nam
250a6(rgyud): mkha' gnas med cing // spros pa med cing gos pa med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spu// 'jig rten gsum
250a7(rgyud): 'di rnam par g.yos// bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gnas lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gtso bo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo
250b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sa yi cha ni gang na 'di// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud// dus kun tu ni spyod 'gyur zhing // rgyun du de nyid rang nyid kyis// khro bo bcu yis de las
250b2(rgyud): ni/ rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la// srung ba'i don du yul 'khor der// rang rang 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni// de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// snga
250b3(rgyud): tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun tu// nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ dngos grub
250b4(rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u sde drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje 'phreng mngon par rtogs pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam
250b5(rgyud): par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang / sgra basbyar
250b6(rgyud): gyur lo tsa ba chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa/ rgya gar skad du/
250b7(rgyud): tur de bi ti pa ri pr-its+tsha/ bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing // sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa/
251a1(rgyud): shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la// rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhugs so// 'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi// gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la// byang chub sems ni 'phros
251a2(rgyud): nas su// chos kyi dbyings gnas zhu mdzad do// zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas// lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la// tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste// chos kyi
251a3(rgyud): dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni// gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags// dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin// de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags// yan lag med pa gang de ni// yan lag dang bcas 'gyur
251a4(rgyud): nas su// lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid// dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang // khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang //
251a5(rgyud): ma rig bag chags sred pa yis// bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs// rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa// ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags// dngos po med pa sgom pa
251a6(rgyud): gzugs// gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams// rang bzhin med cing dmigs med la// dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags// de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni// bdag gi the tshom
251a7(rgyud): lhas bka' stsol// de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// shes rab zab pa zad med ni// nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya// dpyad du med cing shes bya
251b1(rgyud): min// de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// nam mkha'i spyod yul lo// mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na// nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min//
251b2(rgyud): spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni// rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste// de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes// shes med so so'i skye gnas dang // ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang // da ltar byung
251b3(rgyud): ba'i dus gsum la// byol song bag chags las byung ba'i// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba rnams// de kun gyis kyang mi shes te// sangs rgyas sgrol yul gsang chen no// snying po shin tu snying
251b4(rgyud): po'i mchog/ gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// lha mo khyod la bshad par bya// byang chub sems dag 'od gsal ba// zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i
251b5(rgyud): 'od / de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos// yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo// de yi dbus su bzhugs pa'i lha// mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te// phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog/ yid
251b6(rgyud): kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs// rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa// 'od zer chen po 'bar ba can// ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni// dpral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar// thig le de kho nar
251b7(rgyud): bsdu ste// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// cha shas lnga pa can yin te// bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la// cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyid// nga ro thig las brgyan byed pa// rdo rje khong nas
252a1(rgyud): phyung nas su// sa bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste// chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed// de ni rim par skyed byed na// sgo dgu la ni kun tu 'gro// khyab cing khyab gnas
252a2(rgyud): 'gro kun la// mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi// gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o// gang las gtso bor skyed byed la// sa dang nam mkha'i de zhes gsungs//
