252a3(rgyud): ji snyed lus la gnas pa'i bar// de yis las dang lus min byed// dag dang mi dge bsam pa yang // bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin// sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te// mchod pa sgom par
252a4(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// gang tshe las kyi lus zhig nA// de tshe de yi rang mthu yin// de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te// gang gis g.yo dang mi g.yo khyab// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba// de ni
252a5(rgyud): gnas par shes par bya// bcu yi gnyis mtha'i tshig gi don// gang gis rtag tu bsgom byas na// des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// so dang mchu dang dkun
252a6(rgyud): dang rtse// mgul gnas gang la yod pa ni// gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid// de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro// brjod pa med cing the tshom med// sku yig rnam par spangs pa ni// rang gi phyi nang de bzhin
252a7(rgyud): nyid / byang chub sems ni 'dir gsungs so// lha mo bzhis yongs su nus pa las/ lha mo spyan mas yongs su nus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas lha mom ma
252b1(rgyud): kIs rdo rje can la 'di zhus te// byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis// kha snying lte ba gsang bra la// 'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni// rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal// cha shas rnam pa du/
252b2(rgyud): zhig gsungs// gnas kyi rnam par sgyur ba du// kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs// de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan
252b3(rgyud): zhing / pad+ma bzhi la yang dag gnas// snying kha'i pad+ma la gnas gnag/ kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar// nga ro lte ba'i pad+mar gnas// gsang ba'i pad+ma nga ro mtha'// skyabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro/
252b4(rgyud): byed pas// thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas// bsnam byed pa dang thos byed pa// de tshe mthong byed za byed pa// reg par byed kyang de go nas// bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o// gang
252b5(rgyud): las bzhad byed bzla byed pa// de bzhin cho de dang ngu ba// 'byed pa gcod pa de kho nas// cho ga rnam pa mang po shes// rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur//
252b6(rgyud): bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs smad pa'i rigs rnams dang // bud med du ma sprul par byed// dud 'gro yi dwags skye ba dang // gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang //
252b7(rgyud): de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las// 'byung ba thams cad skyed byed pa// de nyid kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas// mo gzugs dang ni po yi gzugs// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de ltar de
253a1(rgyud): bzhin nyid shes pa// dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa gang // des ni gsang chen shes pa ste// gang de bdag nyid kun gnas pa// kha dog med cing kha dog dmar// kha dog/
253a2(rgyud): dkar dang ser ba yi// thig le'i gzugs su bsgyur ba 'dis// 'gro dang phyir 'ong rnam par bstan// gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che// mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs// skye dang bsdus
253a3(rgyud): nga 'jigs pa la// thig le'i gzugs su rab gnas so// gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos// stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang // de yis de nyid mi shes te// de dag kun kyang 'bras med do//
253a4(rgyud): bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang // brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dus// sgra yig dang po yi ge a// lnga pa yis ni yang dag brgyan// snying rje chen po las byung ba// kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas/
253a5(rgyud): btags// gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha// de ni spyi bor bstan pa yin// de dag gsang chen dam pa yin// lha mo bdag gis rab bstan no// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mo mA ma
253a6(rgyud): kIs zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha mo gos dkar mos// yan lag kun gyis btud nas su// thal mo snying khar sbyar byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa/
253a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags// lha yi dbang phyug khyod la zhu// gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lag/
253b1(rgyud): gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags// chu khams dang ni me yi khams// ji ltar ro na mnyam por 'gyur// ma las skye ba gsung ca dang // de bzhin pa las skya ba gsum// de dag drug
253b2(rgyud): sogs gong bu las// ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal// thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod// rdo rje can gyis dka' stsal pa// gsang ba shin tu
253b3(rgyud): gsang gyur pa// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste// g.yon du byang chub sems shes bya// g.yas su de bzhin rak+Sha'o//
253b4(rgyud): de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba// chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin// mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te// rdul ni rok+ta byang chub sems// mun pa de
253b5(rgyud): bzhin bskyed pa yin// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro// dri chen chu dang shel me tog/ de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems// bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus/
253b6(rgyud): de las rdo rjer 'dir gsungs so// cha shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin dgu pa dag yin no// de skad gsungs pa bcu dang ni// de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te// cha shas gnyis pa lnga yi ni// drug gis
253b7(rgyud): btags pa des byung ba// de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bruM// skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa// de nyid sa bon swA hA mtha'// 'dus pa la ni shes par bya// chu khams pa
254a1(rgyud): las skyes shes bya// me yi khams ni ma las skyes// sha dang khrag dang pags pa yang // ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do// tshil dang rkang dang khu ba ni// pa las skyes zhes
254a2(rgyud): bshad pa yin// gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni// de dag tsam du bshad pa yin// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams// sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi
254a3(rgyud): gzugs// phung por zhes byar bshad pa'o// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las/ lha mon bza' dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// de nas bzhad pa'i
254a4(rgyud): zhal gyur te// lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas// rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni// gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po// rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal/
254a5(rgyud): de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang // dkyil 'khor rnams ni btags pa dang // sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang // de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang // khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal// de/
254a6(rgyud): ltar lha mos zhus ma thag/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub thabs ni// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// de bzhin ro dang reg la
254a7(rgyud): sogs// khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang // chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba'o// de dag nyid las byung ba ni// byang chub sems zhes shes par bya// byang chub sems las gong bu ste// gong bu
254b1(rgyud): las kyang yid skyed do// yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams// de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste// bsdu ba de ni
254b2(rgyud): bstan byas pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya// 'di ltar gal po zhes dngos kyis// bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtag
254b3(rgyud): chos dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su// rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad// ril bu mog spyan dngos grub dang // sa 'og ral gri'i dngos grub dang // nam mkhar 'phur dang mig sman dang /
254b4(rgyud): 'chi ba med dang nang 'joms dang // mi dang glang po che dang rta// glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang // rnga mo ma he spyang kI rnams// cha ni mnyam por bya ba'o// mthe bong tshigs tshad tsam du ni// shin tu mnyam
254b5(rgyud): par bzhag nas sbyar// dri chen chu dang rak+Sha dang // byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni// sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te// byin gyis brlabs kyang bya ba'o// phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge AH/
254b6(rgyud): dbus su de bzhin hUM byas te// 'bar ba'i hri yig 'bar byed pa// dgu po de ni rab tu sgrub// lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags bzlas nas ni phye mar btags// yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam
254b7(rgyud): du la lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// ril bu rnams ni byas nas su// pad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te// stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya// mtshams bzhi la ni bsgom
255a1(rgyud): byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar yang // de ni bskul pa'i mtha' bar yang // dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste// gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson 'grus/ lnga/
255a2(rgyud): pa la ni smon lam yang // mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa// ril bu chen po zos phyir ro// rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas// rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol// yi ge e dang baM yig dang /
255a3(rgyud): laM yig dbus su yang dag gnas// dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste// gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkar ba// gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ltar ni bskor/
255a4(rgyud): ba ni/ gnyin byed dang ni mtshan phyed la// rig pa de ni rab 'byor na// de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub// lha mo lha min bu mo dang // mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi// sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// sngags kyis
255a5(rgyud): bkug nas spyad par bya// sgom pa de bzhin rig pa'i sngags// bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad par bya// dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// dkyil 'khor
255a6(rgyud): lus shes gsungs pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni// dkyil 'khor gsum du brtags pa yin// brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste// gang
255a7(rgyud): du gtso bo skyed par byed// phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs// 'byung ba rig mar brtags pa'o// chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste// zhags pa pad+mar chung byed pa// kha phrad pa ni sgrog yin par//
255b1(rgyud): sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bur bshad// spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te// me tog rak+ta zhes 'dod do// mar me sha rnams kho na yin// dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod// sgeg mo ling gar bstan pa/
255b2(rgyud): 'phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin// dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang // gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs// de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin/
255b3(rgyud): rtogs pa de rnams byams pa sogs// de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin// sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya// nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi
255b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te// phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin// nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni// pad+ma bzhi rnams 'byor pa ni// lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas// me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni//
255b5(rgyud): da dang chen dang ni chu de bzhin// rlung gis me ni 'bar byas te// chu yis yongs su smin par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// gang du me ni bskyod pa'o// ra yig mngon spyod yi
255b6(rgyud): ge ste/ ya yi dbang gi las kho na// la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste// ba yig zhi ba zhes gsungs so// gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni// de dag thams cad tshu la ste// pad+mar k+Sha yig kha mar lnga/
255b7(rgyud): snying gi pad+mar btsud par bya// lte ba'i pad+mar 'gro phyi rol// kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro ma thag/ thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan// de ltar sbyin sreg bdag
256a1(rgyud): ba shad pa// nyin dang nyin du bya ba ste// rtag par rgyun du zas zos na// tshe 'di kho nar 'grub par 'gyur// rgas pa med cing nad kyang med// 'chi ba med cing 'bras
256a2(rgyud): rnams med// de ni glo bur 'chi ba med// 'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur// bzang po skal bar gson pa ste// sems can thams cad dga' bar sgra/
256a3(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis skul byed do// sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas// lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya// dri dang 'phreng sogs gos rnams dang // spos med zas dang lha bshos
256a4(rgyud): kyis/ dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas// bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya// bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te// de bas nan tan thams cad
256a5(rgyud): kyis/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod// gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par sgom// zas dang btung ba de bzhin gos// de bzhin dri dang 'phreng kho nas//
256a6(rgyud): rig ma bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i// bdag nyid lha nyid bsam par bya// de ltar bshad nas rdo rje de// cang mi gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// phyag gis
256a7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar gyur te// dgyes pas rab tu zhal bzhad nas// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste// cang mi gsung bar bzhugs gyur to// lha mo bzhis yongs su
256b1(rgyud): nus pa las/ lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhis yongs su nus/
256b2(rgyud): pa dpal oM r+yan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po smi ti dz+nyA na kirti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas
256b3(rgyud): gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/
256b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lnga pa bzhin du gsungs pa'o//
256b5(rgyud): byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags
256b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir
256b7(rgyud): ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zab
257a1(rgyud): pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba nye bar thob pa dang / stong pa chen po'o// de yang rtogs par dka' ba'o//
257a2(rgyud): 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ de ni snang ba ma ched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so// sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems
257a3(rgyud): te/ de ni snang ba dang stong pa ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o// gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// de nas byams pa
257a4(rgyud): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes/
257a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug/ de nas byang chu sems dpa' chen po de
257a6(rgyud): rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma'o ston pa rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa
257a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang / yid
257b1(rgyud): dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang gzhan dag tu'o//
257b2(rgyud): rnam par shes pa de'i bzhen pa rlung ngo // rlung las me'o// me las chu'o// chu las sa'o// de rnams las phung po lnga dang / skye mched drug dang / yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni rnam par
257b3(rgyud): shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o// de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes su myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par
257b4(rgyud): 'byung ngo // de la 'od gsal ba/ gnas pa med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ don dam pa'i bden po/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o//
257b5(rgyud): de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang / 'khrul pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o// ma rig pa las sems las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i snang ba
257b6(rgyud): lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes
257b7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs dang / lha'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma dang / rdo rje'i brda'o// sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang / shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o// rang bzhin ni
258a1(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o// kun rdzob tu ni mngon sum gyi bud med dang / b+ha ga dang / pad+ma dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par/
258a2(rgyud): sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o// me las chu ste/ nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mer po dang / nar nar po dang / bor gor po dag go// de nas
258a3(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnams so// de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o// de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so// 'dod chags
258a4(rgyud): las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste de'i phyir lus te/ lus las byung ba'i skyil krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang / gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa/
258a5(rgyud): A li kA li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lngar dmigs pa'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis snyoms
258a6(rgyud): par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o// sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni bde
258a7(rgyud): pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o// de sgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /
258b1(rgyud): chu zla dang / mig yor dang / sdig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang po'i gzhu dang / grog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs/
258b2(rgyud): brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o// ji ltar 'o ma bsrub pa las mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te/ de bzhin du
258b3(rgyud): rdo rjes ni thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'o ma dang til dag yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med
258b4(rgyud): par mar dang til mar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ sngags dang phyag rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus
258b5(rgyud): so// gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do// bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni las
258b6(rgyud): dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa la'ang slob par 'gyur ro// gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa
258b7(rgyud): de ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyi'i
259a1(rgyud): don ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma
259a2(rgyud): grol ba rnams/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed paM/ ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas spong
259a3(rgyud): par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
259a4(rgyud): 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so legs so//
259a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig/ mtha' ni mu ste/ 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya bar mthar thug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
259a6(rgyud): dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la
259a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum mo// stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa gsum 'od gsal
259b1(rgyud): ba'i mtha' ji ltar 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mes shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring /
259b2(rgyud): bos rnam par sbyong bar byed do// ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do// ji ltar ras bal gyi 'dab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba
259b3(rgyud): thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do// de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang / ras bal gyi 'dab ma thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang / shin tu stong
259b4(rgyud): pa dang / stong pa chen po rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de
259b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad
259b6(rgyud): pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzhag ste tshig
259b7(rgyud): re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags ma yin pa dang /
260a1(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba ma yin pa dang / bar mnye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o// lus dang / ngag dang / yid med/
260a2(rgyud): pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang / 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// ga pur dang / khrag chen po
260a3(rgyud): dang tsan dan dmar po dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don te/ ga pur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po'i zla mtshan gyi khrag
260a4(rgyud): dang tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsan dmar po'o// rdo rje ni mtshan ma ste thabs so// pad+ma ni b+ha ga ste shes rab dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
260a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to// gnyis ka dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor
260a6(rgyud): ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni snga ji bzhin pa ste/ de ni yi ge'i don gyi
260a7(rgyud): bshad pa'o// ko nA khya/ ko nA ba/ ko TA/ ko Ta ba sh+tsa/ ko Ta rA ka ko la khya/ ko la wa/ ko la ko la bash+tsa/ ko lasta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang yul gsungs te/ de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje
260b1(rgyud): tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i/
260b2(rgyud): rgyud dang / bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/
260b3(rgyud): rgyas par bya na grangs med do// gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/ spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do// bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// de dag ni stong phrag
260b4(rgyud): sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+hanya/ Ta Sha DA D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pa ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ 'di dag
260b5(rgyud): ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang / cho ga dang / bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa de gang lag/
260b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/
260b7(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'gal ba rmad
261a1(rgyud): du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gis rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so// rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi
261a2(rgyud): 'khor lo la dgod pa dang / de las byung ba'i byed pa dang / las dang sgrub pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed pa gnyis ka'i rgyud la bzhugs so// las kyi bya ba
261a3(rgyud): sna tshogs phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// 'jigs par dmigs shing
261a4(rgyud): shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang / skyon gyi rgyu'i rtog pas rab
261a5(rgyud): tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugs so// sngags dang / sman dang / sbyin sreg dang / phye ma dang / mig sman dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad rab tu
261a6(rgyud): dpyad pa sgrub par byed pa ni rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
261a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / mtha' drug gis bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i
261b1(rgyud): slob ma brtag pa dang / bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so// gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang / gang gi don du byas pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa
261b2(rgyud): rnams so// mtha' drug tu bshad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang /
261b3(rgyud): sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// rigs pa rnam pa bzhi ni rgyud dang / gleng gzhi dang / nges tshig dang / rgyu rnams so// bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / sbas pa dang /
261b4(rgyud): mthar thug pa rnams so// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad pa'o// gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang /
261b5(rgyud): tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal rnams so// bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu
261b6(rgyud): kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o// de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o// don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bcwa brgyad do// de'i mtha' ni gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
261b7(rgyud): gsol pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chen po pas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom
262a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
262a2(rgyud): gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas yang dag pa'i mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par
262a3(rgyud): byed do// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// ye shes rdo rje kun las
262a4(rgyud): btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas
262a5(rgyud): dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o// ye shes rdo rje kun las btus// rnal
262a6(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin// ye shes rang bzhin 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo'o// de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste// kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus// de ston pa la
262a7(rgyud): der brtags nas// gzhung la'ang ming don 'tshams pa yin/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra hri da ya a laM kA ra tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpa
262b1(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
262b2(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po dud med bcu'i dkyil na cha shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'khor rdo rje dang pad+mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di lnga ste/
262b3(rgyud): dam tshig yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ye shes kyi lus yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i rdo rje'i gsung 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo
262b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtse gcig tu 'dris pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'
262b5(rgyud): 'gro dang / rten par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rlan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / spyod par byed pa zhes
262b6(rgyud): bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / go 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / hA ra nu pU ra la sogs pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gi ta mgrin la sogs pa'i glu
262b7(rgyud): mkhan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pa'i dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / tshod ma sna tshogs za ba'i ro ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /
263a1(rgyud): rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / gsum rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ri rab/
263a2(rgyud): kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'
263a3(rgyud): 'gro chen po dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid nub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan
263a4(rgyud): nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa
263a5(rgyud): rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu lta bur gang bar snang ngo // de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ mkha' 'gro chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
263a6(rgyud): po la mchod pa'i sprin spros pa du ma yid las byung ba lha dang mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs rnams
263a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi// gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud// 'dren pa mchog gis bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab po'i tshigs
263b1(rgyud): bsan nasamakha' 'gro thams cad la rnam par bltas te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces
263b2(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor du 'chang du mi
263b3(rgyud): ba zhes pa de bdag cag la mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i badrag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa
263b4(rgyud): gsung pa/ sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs// sa 'og ma yi sangs rgyas kyang // 'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na// sems dpa' gzhan ni smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas chos nyid
263b5(rgyud): dag pa 'di// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir// byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad pa ni// ston pa rnams kyi chos nyid do// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas yang
263b6(rgyud): mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis
263b7(rgyud): brlab par mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa bstan cing rnam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/
264a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang phyug gi rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ sems dpa' thams cad byin gyis rlob rdo rje zhes bya/
264a2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka las phyung
264a3(rgyud): ngo oM AHhUM sa ma ya badz+ra/ de nas phyung ma thug tu de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'khor de dag thams cad bsdus nas rang gi snying khar btsud nas/ bud med kyi dkyil na thams
264a4(rgyud): cad brgyal ba ltar gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de bslang ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
264a5(rgyud): so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de dag dran pa slar thob cing ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis 'khor lo rnam par dgod pa zhes bya
264a6(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
264a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
264b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te/ dbus/
264b2(rgyud): rngub par mi mdzad// 'byung bar mi mdzad// lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad// lus gnas par yang mi mjed// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ mi dgongs//
264b3(rgyud): nye bar mi 'jig go// thabs dang shes rab sdong bar yang mi mdzad// shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par mdzad par mi mdzad/ mtho ris la'ang mi 'jog/ ma dad pa rnams dang par yang mi mdzad
264b4(rgyud): ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gag pa rnams 'gag par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams
264b5(rgyud): rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ mi dga' ba rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad//
264b6(rgyud): ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi sdug pa rnams sdug par yang mi mdzad/ drug po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang /
264b7(rgyud): gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang / tsha ba'i gdon dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad
265a1(rgyud): la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad do// rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ brjid pa dang /
265a2(rgyud): bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / spyan mdzes pas smin rings bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+ma'i phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon/
265a3(rgyud): gar gyi 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad
265a4(rgyud): kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de la khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ de nas chu'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par
265a5(rgyud): mdzad/ de nas sa'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad do// de'ang kun tu khyab nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad do// ri dang sems can thams cad
265a6(rgyud): dang / sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang // bud med gzhon nu rgan pa dang // skyes pa dang ni ma ning dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang // chu bdag brgya byin la sog
265a7(rgyud): dang / 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur thams cad la// bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen po// kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin// kun tu khyab par byas te gnas// dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud las/
265b1(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'tsho byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// las kyi mchog rnams 'grang byed pa'i// gsung sngags rnams ni bshad/
265b2(rgyud): par bya// rtse gtsug sems kyis mnyan par bya'o// oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA dz+nyA A d+ya nut+pan na tAH/ gtor ma'i sngags so// a swa/ oM s+t+rai/ su s+'u/ ye s+t+waM/ oM s+t+wa~M/ a s+yaH
265b3(rgyud): bud med do// r-I r-I/ le l-I/ ma ning ngo // kA kha ga d+hA / tsa tsha dza d+hA Da/ D+ha trA DaD+hiN/ ta tha dAd+hanA/ pa pA ba b+hU mA/ skyes pa'i 'o// ya ra la wA/ 'byung ba'i'o// sha Sha sa ha/ 'jigs
265b4(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'o// k+ShaHchos kyi dbyings kyi sa bon no// badz+ra d+h+r-ika hUM/ dzi na dzi ka b+h+yAM/ rat+na d+h+r-ika aM/ A ro li ka d+hI/ pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka khaM/ mkha' 'gro chen po lnga'i'o// dwe Sha ra ti nAM/ mo ha ra ti
265b5(rgyud): lA rA ga ra ti pAM/ badz+ra ra tIt+taM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rten par byed pa la sogs pa'i 'o// k+Shi ti gar+b+ha k+Sha~M/ badz+ra pA Ni dA+e/ ga go na gar+b+ha khaM/ lo ke shwa rA ya ga~M/ nai ba ra NA bzhim+b+ha ni kaM kas man
265b6(rgyud): dra saM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dam tshig spyod pa la sogs pa'i 'o// rU pa badz+ra dzaHshap+ta badz+ra hUM/ gan d+ha badz+ra baM/ ra sa badz+ra hoH/ s+phar sha badz+rA khaM/ d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra raM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro mdzes
265b7(rgyud): par byed pa la sogs pa'i 'o// ya mAn+ta kr-i ta/ badz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ dig+h+nAM takr-ita/ Ta k+ki rA dza/ nI la dar+N+Na/ ma hA ba la/ a tsa le ka na hUM/ suM b+ha ni hUM/ tsakra brti ne hUM d+h+waM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro/
266a1(rgyud): gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i 'o// wa ri dziHb+hUM/ dzosan+ta d+h+waM/ man+teHkra b+hUM/ ba ra d+ha na b+h+yAM/ bi sa ra Na b+h+yAM/ bi ra dzi na d+h+waM/ ka ro b+ha ba g+h+nAM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro gtsug tor rgyal
266a2(rgyud): bya la sogs pa'i 'o// hUM hrIHkha/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'o// oM maM de ni badz+rI b+ha baM badz+ra ban d+ha hUM/ se'i'o// oM badz+ra pra ka ra NA rU bi dz+ra/ ra ba'i'o// oM badz+ra bany+dza ra hUM saM hUM/ dra ba'i'o//
266a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra bI tA na d+b+ha khaM trUM/ gur gyi'o// oM badz+rA sha ra ta satwAM sa~M dz+dza/ mda' 'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na lAn hUM hU~M hUM/ 'od kyi'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ stong pa nyid kyi
266a4(rgyud): sngags so// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA be At+ma kai&haM/ sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i 'o//
266a5(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ thig gdab pa'i 'o// badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ tshon dgye ba'i 'o// hUM haHA dzAMH/ dbab pa'i 'o// badz+ra kI la ya mud ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ phur bus
266a6(rgyud): brdung ba'i 'o// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags kyi tshogs rnams ji snyed pa// de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru// gsang ba dang ni 'jigs
266a7(rgyud): byed dang / bde mchog sogs la nga yis ni// las dang bcas par rab bshad pa// rnal 'byor rtogs pas shes bya'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u
266b1(rgyud): ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas mkha' 'gro grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// las kyi cho ga shes pa yis// ci rigs par ni las rnams bya/
266b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga'i srad bu ni// sems med las byung byas nas su// byin rlabs mi bskyod rtag pa ru// byas te thig ni gdab pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// tA ra Na bzhis brgyan pa ste/
266b3(rgyud): dar dang me tog 'phreng bas klubs// srad bu bzhi dang rab ldan pa// zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod// las kyi bye brag shes pa yis// blo dang ldan pas phyag rgya
266b4(rgyud): dgod// in+d+ra nI la lta bu yi// 'jigs byed rdo rje dbus su bri// shar du lte brgyad 'khor lo dkar// lho ru rin chen zur dgu ldang // nub du 'dab brgyad pad+ma dmar// byang du ral gri
266b5(rgyud): sngon po dri// ma yi mtshams su 'khor lo sngon// bden bral ut+pal dmar po dang // rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma dmar// dbang ldan ut+pal ser po ste// rdo rje thob shar gyi sgo// lho yi sgor
266b6(rgyud): rdo rje dbyug/ pad+ma'i sdong bu nub kyi sgo// byang sgo rdo rje kha bye ba// sbyor ba ldan pas dgod par bya// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon rtsi dag kyang bsgom bya ste// rdul tshon lnga la sogs pa rnams//
266b7(rgyud): rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// de nas bum pa gzung bya ba// rtsa ba nag nog med pa yi// zhabs brtan mgrin ring mchu 'phyang ba// lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas// mgul par ras kyis yang
267a1(rgyud): dag dkris// ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa// rin chen sman 'bru sna lnga dang // spos chu yis ni rab bkang nas// bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil
267a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kyi ni bum pa bzhi// sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni// las kun byed pas bzlas byas te// ku sha'i chun pos sems can che// 'jug pa kun la
267a3(rgyud): gtor bar bya// yon dang gtor ma mchod phul nas// de dag phyi grar rab bkod de// g.yas su rgyal ba spyan drang ngo // de nas lha rnams rab gnas pa'i// bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste// phyag rgya
267a4(rgyud): dral ba'i sbyor ba ni// lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas// bu mo gzugs bzang lang tshos brgyan// dbang thob lus rgyas thob pa mo// g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te// de yis 'khor lo sprul par bya//
267a5(rgyud): de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i// mchod pa phul nas bstod bya ste// bshang gci khu nga khrag rnams ni// dung chen po ru bzhag bya ste// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas mkha' 'gro grong mchog tu//
267a6(rgyud): slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya ste// rdo rje ye shes rab thob pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas slob ma de yis kyang //
267a7(rgyud): me tog sngags 'dis gtor ba'o// pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes bya// de nas tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol// de ring dang pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor de 'dir blta bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs su/
267b1(rgyud): khyod skyes so// sngags dang phyag rgyas khyod byin brlab// dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu 'grub par byed// rdo rje pad+mo rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid
267b2(rgyud): shes par bya// pa sh+ya badz+ra/ gang dgra me tog gsang ba ste// de de de yi lha yang dag/ de yi sbyor ba rab sbyin te// de yi nan tan du sgrub bo// dung chen bdud rtsi lnga blud de// dmyal ba'i chu 'dis khyod
267b3(rgyud): la ni/ dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i// 'thung zhig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// badz+ra u da ka/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig dang ni sdom
267b4(rgyud): pa rnams// bla mas slob ma sdig bral la// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrag par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//
267b5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur ba yi cho ga'i mchog/ gang gis legs par byed 'gyur na// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// yang dag
267b6(rgyud): shes shing rgyud shes pa// de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi// gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos// bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung // bla ma la gus dad pa'o// dge skom lha rnams mchod byed pa//
267b7(rgyud): gtor phod yon tan ldan pa'o// de nas slob ma de yis kyang // langs te zhabs la mgos gtugs nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// gos dang rgyan gyis legs par bgos// steng du
268a1(rgyud): bla re bre bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // lham dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang // bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis//
268a2(rgyud): slob pa sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro// dang po rnam rgyal bum pa dang // de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po bzhis// bkra shis tshigs bcad
268a3(rgyud): glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du// til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bar// dkyil
268a4(rgyud): 'khor de nyid rig par bsam// de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang // chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya// de nas yid 'ong bu mo ni// legs par goms pa dbang thob pa// rgyan gyis rab brgyan rab
268a5(rgyud): mdzes pa// btsal te bla ma la phul nas// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang ni sbas pa btus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yi// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+ma
268a6(rgyud): las drang ba// sbom po mtha' lhag rtse sbyar nas// rkan du rdo rje gzhag par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya'o// 'di ni gsang
268a7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i// de dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog go/ yang na shin tu dang ba dang // gzugs bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang // sbyor goms bla ma la ni dbul// bla mas byin brlabs lha
268b1(rgyud): mo dang // sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya// de yis blangs nas brtson pa'i tshogs// ji skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas// rang gi lha dang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams
268b2(rgyud): kun// mnyes byed cho gas sems brtags te// mngon sum bde ba rang byung ba// gzhan gyis gang du bsgrag mi nus// go ba'i yul de bde ba che// bla ma de la dbul bar bya// bla ma gzhan la de
268b3(rgyud): bzhin du// ci dga' ba yi yon yang dbul// slob dpon cung zad ci 'dod pa// yid la bsams pa dbul bar bya// dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa'i phyir// bsgrims te de bzhin dbul
268b4(rgyud): bar bya// slob dpon gyi ni yul gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga// bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis// yang na gsum du 'gyur ba yin// rang gi ma dang seng ge'i gdan// yon gyi
268b5(rgyud): mchog ste sangs rgyas rigs// gser dang glang po rin chen dang // sring mo bla ma la dbul ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te// yon te yon gyi mchog yin no// shing rtarta ni shin tu brgyan/
268b6(rgyud): rang gi chung ma dbul bya ste// rin chen sna tshogs rnams dag pa// yon de rin po che yi rigs// mu tig 'phreng ba shin tu mdzes// bu mo rin chen dra ba yis// brgyan te bla ma la dbul ba// yon
268b7(rgyud): de pad+ma'i rigs yin no// rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma 'phrul gyi bzhon pa sogs// glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tan bla ma dbul bya ba/
269a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no// de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang // mi 'gyur ba yi bye brag gis// gsum du shes bya bla ma la// blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis// ci ste bde ba
269a2(rgyud): kun 'dod na// dad mos sems kyis dbul bar bya// yid la gang bsams ma phul lam// khas blangs de ni ma phul na// yi dgas dmyal ba rnam gnyis su// nges par skyes te rlag par 'gyur//
269a3(rgyud): de bas de rnams rab phul nas// gsol ba dag ni rab tu gdab// rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor
269a4(rgyud): bdag gis de ring mthong // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas bla ma de yis kyang // de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas
269a5(rgyud): brgyan// bsgrims te yang dag brtag par bya// dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang // gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de yi ye shes te// bla ma las ni
269a6(rgyud): thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ phan yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / gang gis thabs kyis rigs lnga'i don// rang gi don gyur
269a7(rgyud): kun tu bzang // 'di dag gzhan la rab bde'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad// yid 'ong dben pa'i sa phyogs su// ci bder gnas la nam mkha' kun// sems kyis khyab par byas
269b1(rgyud): nas su// rnam brtags e ma'o 'jig rten kun// sdug bsngal chos kyis kun nas gtses// byang chub sems nyams sems can rnams// kun las 'byung zhes dam bcas pa'i// sngags
269b2(rgyud): pas spyi bor gzhag pa ni// AHsems kyi rdul phran cha drug rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu phye nas su// chos kyi don rnams nges bsal nas// shin tu dri med sems dag pa// 'das dang ma
269b3(rgyud): 'ongs pa yi sems// da ltar yang ni dmigs su med// gnyis med de la gnyis med med// nam mkha' zhes pa'ang gnas pa med// de ltar kun tu brtags nas su// 'gro ba thams cad
269b4(rgyud): shin tu stong // dri med rnal 'byor nyid kyi yin// dngos po med par rang sems bsam// 'gro ba 'di ni de lta bu'i// dngos po gang dag yod min na// sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang dag lags// /
269b5(rgyud): sems nyams sems can 'byung bar sgom// 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs// dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan bya// rin chen sems ni rmugs pa la// bde gshegs rnams kyis bskul//
269b6(rgyud): bar snang // shU n+ya tA ti yo ga pA daM sUh+ma/ pra b+ha bI A kA shA ta mA pa ga ta sa ma ya/ u pa ta pa yan+ti su ga ta su ga te shrI badz+ra swA hA/ pU pu staM haM/ rnam rtog kun spangs dri med pa'i// rnam par mi
269b7(rgyud): rtog sgom pa'i sems// sngags kyi de nyid bskyed byas la// hUM zhes pa yi gzugs su brtag/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur na// gang phyir de ni bsgoms pas thob// dam pa nam mkha'i
270a1(rgyud): dbyings la gnas// byang chub sems tshogs der bcas la// rnal 'byor yid kyis kun bsams nas// rgyas par rnam par brtag par bya// yi ge bruM gyis lha yi gnas/
270a2(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen gyis ni brgyan// sgo khyud rtsu babs ka ba dag/ dar gyi 'phreng bas rnam par klubs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dril bu'i dra ba dag gis brgyan// rtag par do shal me long dang //
270a3(rgyud): me tog 'phreng bas rgyan rnams bres// de yi dbus su seng ge'i gdan// seng ge brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// smon lam dbang gis de dag kun// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// shar phyog/
270a4(rgyud): pab glang shin tu rgyas// lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzang ste// nub phyogs su ni rma bya ba shad// de bzhin byang phyogs nam mkha' lding // mi bskyod khro bo bsam pa ni// mthing kha dka so dmar po'i zhal//
270a5(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya thugs ka na// mthing kha kha dog gsal la bzang // g.yas ni rin chen 'khor lo ste// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// 'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o// brtul zhugs can gyis
270a6(rgyud): zhal gsum bsam// dang po yi ni stong pa nyid// gnyis pa de bzhin mtshan ma med// gsum pa smon pa med pa yi// zhal du mkhas pas rig par bya// phyag drug rtag tu 'bar bar sgom// mtshon cha
270a7(rgyud): sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// pad+ma la ni mnyam bzhag nas// ye shes phyag rgya snying kha nas// dbus kyi gnas su bsam pa ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung du gnas// shar gyi gnas su bsam pa ni// sngags pa/
270b1(rgyud): rnam snang thub pa ste// dkar dang mthing kha dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od gsal ba// rin chen rdo rje g.yas pa na// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// rnal 'byor/
270b2(rgyud): can gyis rtag par bsam// thor tsugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rin chen mgon po lho phyogs na// ser dang mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// rin chen phyag rgya snying kha na// mar gang lta bur snang ba'o//
270b3(rgyud): g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste// rdo rje pad+ma g.yon na'o// rtag par rnal 'byor pas bsam pa// rin chen char du 'bebs pa'o// nub phyogs gnas su dgod bya ba// snang ba mtha' yas bsam pa ni/
270b4(rgyud): dmar dang mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu// pad+ma'i phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje rin chen g.yas pa na// 'khor lo ral gri g.yon pa na// pad+ma la ni mnyam gzhag bsam// byang phyogs
270b5(rgyud): gnas su don grub ni// ljang khu mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// ral gri phyag rgya snying kha na// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas mnyam pa'o// pad+ma rdo rje g.yas pa na// 'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na// zla ba'i dkyil
270b6(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas pa// byang gi gnas su bsam par bya// sngags pas phyag drug bsam pa ni// spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya bzhin// de yi don du rnam par sgom//
270b7(rgyud): mA ma kI yang bsam pa ni// ut+pal dang ni mthing 'dra ba// zhal gsum phyag drug chags pa ste// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o// chags pas chags pa rigs kyi sngags// zhal gsum phyag
271a1(rgyud): drug dge ba ste// sbyor ba'i sa ni dkar mo bsam// pad+ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma kha dog ser mo ste// 'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rab/
271a2(rgyud): tu bsdam// thogs med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sgo bzhi sgo srungs dgod bya ba// sgo rnams su ni khro bo bsam// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// gzhan gyis mi thub de bzhin te// thub par dga' ba
271a3(rgyud): rta mgrin dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsam// de dag kun kyang zhal gsum pa// drag cing drag por gnon pa'o// mthing kha ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dag ni kha dog tu'o// mtshon
271a4(rgyud): cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng thogs de bzhin no// gdon rnams thams cad skrag byed pa// gnod sbyin srin po 'phra men ma// ma he seng ge stag rnams dang // ba lang zhon pa rnam bzhi'o//
271a5(rgyud): rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer can// khro bo spyan ni kun nas bsdus// sngags 'di rnams kyis bsam pa ni// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o// sngags kyi de nyid rjes mthun par// sngags pas/
271a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su// sa yi snying po la sogs pa// sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas bsam// lus dang ngag dang sems de nyid// hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ sems ni de ru zhugs par
271a7(rgyud): bsam// mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid che// dbang po'i lam du byung nas su// dang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyan// bdag nyid gcig cing gcig 'gyur bar// skad cig gis ni brtag par bya//
271b1(rgyud): khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya// de la sogs pas bstod par byed// de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs// rang gi snying khar rab tu gzung // gzugs rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du// rnam par snang
271b2(rgyud): mdzad thub pa bzhugs// tsher ba rin chen mgon po yin// mtha' yas 'od ni 'du shes su'o// 'du byed kun tu gdon mi za// mi bskyod pa ni phung po lngar// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni//
271b3(rgyud): sngags 'di rnams kyis bzhugs par bsam// sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// de nas spyan ni bzhugs bya ste// rnal 'byor yid kyis bsam pa ni// de yang spro bar gnas par bsam// mA
271b4(rgyud): ma kI yang chu yi khams// brlan zhing khrag ni rgyu ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni yid kyis bsam// de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur// me yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// gos dkar mo yang bzhugs
271b5(rgyud): par bya// kun tu khyab par zhugs pa yi// 'od rnams su ni der 'gyur ro// sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin du// bzhugs par de ni bsam par bya// rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// de bzhin yid mgyogs
271b6(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul 'grub// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dag tu 'jug/ de lus khong stong nyid la ni// rang sems don tan sgom pa'i sems// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rnal
271b7(rgyud): 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i sbyor bas su// dag pa'i bdag nyid ci 'dod par// de nas ri rab phul nas 'gro// sa yi snying po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag nyid de// mig gi
272a1(rgyud): phyogs su zhugs nas ni// 'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor bas na// sgra rnams thams cad shes pa de/ rna ba'i
272a2(rgyud): rnam shes de bzhin 'gyur// nam mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che// sna yi rnam shes sbyor bas na// sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shes// de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por
272a3(rgyud): rab chags pa// rdo rje rtse yi sbyor bas su// ro yi dngos po myong ba des// skad cig gcig la dri ru 'gyur// blo ldan sgrib pa thams cad ni// rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan// nyon mongs
272a4(rgyud): thams cad rnam par sel// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jig/ me long gi ni rnam pa ltar// rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni// gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyor bas su// skad cig gis ni de ru
272a5(rgyud): 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rnam pa bcu dang drug tu dang // sbyor ba de ni byin brlabs nas// sngags pas de ni sems la gzhug/ khro bo lcags kyu dpung pa yis//
272a6(rgyud): zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa'o// lu gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum// rgyal mtshan gzhug par khyab par gzhag/ de ltar don rnams rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor bdag/ rdo rje phyag rgya
272a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa// g.yon pa dril bsnams sta zur brten// rdo rje sems dpa' de gnas 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po dkar ba'i gzugs// dkar dang mthing kha dmar po'i dbu// stong nyid la sogs
272b1(rgyud): bdag sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su smra// rdo rje drug tu rjes su chags pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga N+Da badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&hUM/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta p+'u tra
272b2(rgyud): badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rang gi dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// mdun du bsams nas nam mkha' la// khyab pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams bzlas/
272b3(rgyud): bcom ldan mi mo nyam gzhug bcing bzhugs// rdo rje phyag rgya thugs kar bsnams// g.yas par 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri g.yon pa'o// de nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis ni// ci tsam nus pa
272b4(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// skyon yid kyis drangs nas ni// de dag thams cad snying khar gzhug/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na// lus kyis ci tsam bskyod pa dang // tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams/
272b5(rgyud): de dag sngags dang phyag rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu sgom pa'i sbyor bas ni// de la sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor ngo bo gzugs can la// lha mo rnams kyang de la 'dzin// dbang po lam du
272b6(rgyud): gang gyur pa// de dang de yi ngo bo dag/ shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor bas su// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bya'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
272b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'
273a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub sems//
273a2(rgyud): ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
273a3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la/ lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing / sems kyang tshig gis rab tu brjod pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
273a4(rgyud): de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs sbyor ba thob nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma kun tu bzang po 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
273a5(rgyud): can/ chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med cing gnas med pa// rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa yin// bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin//
273a6(rgyud): gshegs pa gsung spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems 'di gsung ngo // dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid med//
273a7(rgyud): nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
273b1(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo // dngos/
273b2(rgyud): po 'di dag dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis
273b3(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs
273b4(rgyud): so/ dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod min pas// nam mkha'i go 'phang thob po zhes// dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis
273b5(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
273b6(rgyud): nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang
273b7(rgyud): chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub kyis gsungs so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274a1(rgyud): chen po byams pa la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa/
274a2(rgyud): thob nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kyi ma'o ngag/ kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams// bdag med chos las legs byung ba// byang
274a3(rgyud): chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems kyi skom pa yi// mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing // rmi lam la sogs ma skyes pa// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang /
274a4(rgyud): stan ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sems mas byin gyis
274a5(rgyud): brlab// rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya// lag pa stong de bskor ba ni// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang // byin nas drang por phyogs bcing ste// dam tshig mchog kyang dbul bar bya// gdan rnams
274a6(rgyud): so sor phul nas su// mchod yon 'bul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtsho mamago cha sogs// sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya ba// rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyi
274a7(rgyud): bdag/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang // gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags kyis
274b1(rgyud): byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che// phyag rgya tshogs su brtag pa yi// rim gyis gzugs/
274b2(rgyud): kyi rdzogs bya ba// de ni brtags pas brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar bya ba las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang // skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/
274b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par// rnal 'byor rig pa dag gis brtag/ rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri
274b4(rgyud): mar bcas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// dag gyur de nas blo yis ni// sems la so sor brtag par bya//
274b5(rgyud): sems la so sor brtags nas kyang // phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/ zla ba'i gzugs su rnam
274b6(rgyud): par brtag/ dag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa// oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya// AHzhes bya ba'i spros med gsung // sems ni hUM zhes bya ba smrab/
274b7(rgyud): yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus// snying la gnas pa zla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag nyid brjod//
275a1(rgyud): rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha
275a2(rgyud): mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bskur te// cod pan 'phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma 'phro// yan lag bzhi pa dpung ldan pa'i/
275a3(rgyud): phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsgrims ma dang ni tog ldan ma// mtshon cham dang rtsed mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlag/ kun la khyab par byed pa yi/
275a4(rgyud): sna tshogs dbus su gzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khor la khyab bya ste// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro// ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// 'os par byed pa'i
275a5(rgyud): sngags pa yis// 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun la pad+ma yi// ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang // e zhes bya ba 'phro ba las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs
275a6(rgyud): su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun ldan pa'i// nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs par lta// sgeg dang glu dang gar rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang // sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna
275a7(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyis mchod pa bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas// myur ches bya ba bul ba dang // mi gsal gug khyed nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs/
275b1(rgyud): de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims nas rdo rje gsor nas su// g.yon pas dril bu la gsil zhing // rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang // ba dan tshul du byas/
275b2(rgyud): pas mchod// bzlas pa yis ni mjug brtul nas// gshegs su gsol dang rang nyid 'grub// lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur nas
275b3(rgyud): kyang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar bsgoms pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub de ni myur thob nas// zla nyi dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi
275b4(rgyud): thob 'dren cing // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rgyal byed pad+ma'i gdung brgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' chen 'dod
275b5(rgyud): dgur lcags kyur 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du kun shes shing // dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i le'u ste
275b6(rgyud): drug pa'o// sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i// me ni lha yi zhal yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin sreg las ni
275b7(rgyud): lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur na dngos grub ste// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis bskongs// de phyir sku gsung chos mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags
276a1(rgyud): par mdzad// nub shing las ni byung ba'i me// dge ba yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa'am dur khrod byung ba yi// me ni las rnams rab tu sgrub// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla
276a2(rgyud): gam dang ni zur gsum dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni kha khyer la// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rigs pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+ma'i steng gnas gtsug tor dang /
276a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen pad+ma gzhag/ ji ltar dmigs pas 'dug nas su// lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni// blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/ sbyin sreg la dgos/
276a4(rgyud): g.yas su gzhag/ g.yon du chu yi snod dgang ngo // las kun byed pas bzlas nas su// bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// ku sha rtse mo rnon po yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// ma ni
276a5(rgyud): 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas pa mi 'jigs thob spyod cing // gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo // tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po yi// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog
276a6(rgyud): sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol// oM ag+na ye A di byA A bi she A bi shaM ma hA shri ye ha bya ka bya bA hA nA ya swA hA/ phyag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te/
276a7(rgyud): mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// me yi phyogs nas bos pa yin// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi pa la lag bzhir ldan// mdog dmar ral pa'i thor tsugs can// me yi dkyil
276b1(rgyud): 'khor la gnas shing // las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan// lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor 'phreng // g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te// gnyis pa na ni be con
276b2(rgyud): nyid// mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la// drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa/
276b3(rgyud): kun la lan gsum sreg blugs dbul// de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs
276b4(rgyud): par tshim byas bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs// pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang // me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil
276b5(rgyud): ba'i mtshan mas mkha' las brtag/ des ni myur du 'byung 'gyur ba// bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyud ni
276b6(rgyud): sring ba ni// bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi ba la// 'byor pas rgyas pa mngon par spel// dregs bde stabs tshul bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang du
276b7(rgyud): bya'o// drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pa// hU~M zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang
277a1(rgyud): sngags yi ge nges par sbyor// sngags grub chog shes pa yis// sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa yi// yang dag yin par mchod par bya// sbyin
277a2(rgyud): sreg de nyid la bskul zhing // dang po dgang blugs sreg cing dbul// phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge pa'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya// bshang gci
277a3(rgyud): khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal// mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ ji ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang /
277a4(rgyud): sems can mi shes pas rmongs pa// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs shing // phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blugs byas gang // de dag gis ni dge sdig gi ga phung po gnyis su//
277a5(rgyud): rnam par brtags// chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas med kyang // sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thabs su bstan// dam pa'i don du
277a6(rgyud): dge spangs nas// bsod nams min pa ci zhig smos// dper na mi gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus nas// chu la rgal ba'i gzings byas te/
277a7(rgyud): de la 'jug ste legs brgal nas// bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyi lam ni bskyed byas kyang // chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba
277b1(rgyud): thob pa ni// de phyir rnam rtog rnam spangs la// zab mo yi ni chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs rnams la// sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste//
277b2(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas// nam mkha' lta bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gnas// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas//
277b3(rgyud): nga'o snyam pas gzi skyed lus// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na// rnal 'byor ldan pas tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// las las byung bar bstan pa yi// skyes pa bud med/
277b4(rgyud): gzugs mang la// mnyes pa nyid du mi bya 'di// rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yi// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi 'byung //
277b5(rgyud): rdo rje dang ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed rtsu ba phra ma yi// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde ba byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen 'khrug
277b6(rgyud): mchog ga sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la mi 'khrugs pa rgyas pa ste// khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi
277b7(rgyud): tshogs rnams rnam 'brel la// thub pa skyes mchog don yod la// dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen pa yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje rnams kyis ni// rtag tu bsten cing bsgom par bya/
278a1(rgyud): 'dod chags de bzhin gti mug rmongs// sred dang 'du byed rnam sel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshang gci khu chu
278a2(rgyud): mchil ma khrag/ 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa// sgom pa'i blo gros rtogs pa yis// dam tshig brtan par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing sbyin par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las//
278a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'gro ba mi shes mun bsal phyir// ye shes nyi ma shar ba las// dgeg pu mun pa bsal tshul gsungs
278a4(rgyud): gshin rje gshed la sogs pa yi// mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa// de kun mngon du rgyas pa ru// bye brag gis ni rgyas par bstan// de ni las kyi khyad par gyi// dbang du byas pa khro bo tshogs//
278a5(rgyud): gzhan du ma gsungs gang yin pa// de dag 'di ru bshad par bya// bruM gyi ye shes las byung ba// gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po ste// zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug nyi ma la sogs pa/
278a6(rgyud): 'dzin cing skyil mo krung bcas pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan cing // 'jig rten khams kun 'khrug byed pa'i// gzugs kyi spros pas nam mkha'i gar// rig mas sku la rab 'khyud pas// chags
278a7(rgyud): phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bgegs kyis gnod pa yod dgos// skyon med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gyi ye shes las// byung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo can/
278b1(rgyud): zhal gsum gser 'dra mdangs po che// phyag drug 'khor lo la sogs pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// 'dzin cing stag gis smad g.yogs te// gzod pa'i 'phreng bas srul brgyan// rig ma dang ldan
278b2(rgyud): chags pa po// 'jo sgeg nyams kyi sbyor ba mdzad// 'di sgom spro bar byed pa la// nyin dang mtshan du rdo rje sems// 'khor bcas gnas su byon nas su// rtag tu srung ba nyid du byed// bka' bzhin byed
278b3(rgyud): pas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de bzhin bruM gyi ye shes las// byung ba'i khro bo gtsug tor rgyal// zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug lcags kyu la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sprul
278b4(rgyud): gyis yang dag brgyan// 'og tu bgegs kyi gtso mnan nas// gad mo'i sgras ni 'debs par byed// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// khro bo 'di 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor gang la
278b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa'i bgegs kyang rlag byed na// gzhan ma rnams ni smos ci dgos// snying 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bruM las yang ni byung ba yi// gtsug tor dam tshig
278b6(rgyud): spyod pa can// zhal gsum gser zhun mdangs ldan pa// phyag drug ka pA la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sna tshogs rab tu 'bar// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// zhabs rnams bsgyur zhing rnam
278b7(rgyud): par 'phen// spro dang bsdu ba'i blo gros can// 'di 'dra gang zhig sgom pa la// bi na ya ka la sogs pa'i// bgegs kyis skabs ni mi rnyed phyir// ji bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi
279a1(rgyud): thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bruM g+hi yi ge las kyang byung // ming gi gtsug tor rnam par mthong // zhal gsum gser ni gtsom 'dra// phyag drug tri shU la sogs
279a2(rgyud): pa 'dzin cing srog song steng na gnas// rol pa'i stabs kyis bgegs mchu bcings// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni spro ba'o// gang zhig de 'dra sgom byed pa'i//
279a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor de yis go cha bgos// sra ba'i ngang tshul can yin pas// bgegs lus gang gis mi g.yo'o// bgegs las rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bruM gyi ye shes mthu
279a4(rgyud): las byung // gtsug tor rnam par 'joms pa'i mchog/ zhal gsum gser 'dra'i nyi 'od mtshungs// phyag drug rdo rje la sogs pa// 'dzin cing tshems kyis smos mnan te// chags ldan
279a5(rgyud): rig mas 'khyud pa'o// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa// khrag can ljags kyang 'dril ba ste// bla med byang chub thob 'dod pa// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bskal pa brgyad cu'i/
279a6(rgyud): bar du yang // bgegs kyis gnod pa yong mi 'ong // bgegs kyi stong pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gyi ye shes las// yang dag byung ba'i skabs dkar po// zhal
279a7(rgyud): gsum gser zhun lta bur gnas// phyag drug gdugs la sogs 'dzin cing // skyabs med 'phongs pa'i skyabs mdzad cing // ma ning rnams dang za ma la// bu ni sbyin par byed pa po// ral pa'i
279b1(rgyud): gtsug tor gyis brgyanA pa// rimam dang ldan su chen 'di// rnal 'byor gang gis skom byed cing // bzlas pa rtse gcig tu byed na// bgegs kyi gnod pas de mi brdzi// rin chen gyi skabs rdo rje
279b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnal 'byor khyad par can gyis ni// 'di rnams byang chub thob pa'i phyir// 'khor lo gtso bor rab bsgoms na// rang gi bgegs kyis yong mi tshugs// byang chub
279b3(rgyud): snying po don gnyer bas// 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgoms na// bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/
279b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gtsug tor byung ba'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
279b5(rgyud): dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di yi dpal ni gang zhig lags// rdo rje dang ni snying po dang // de bzhin rgyan gyi don ni ci// kye he mchog de bstan du gsol/
279b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pas/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i// gsang ba'i rgyud du rab sbas pa// ji bzhin
279b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i de kho na// yang dag bstan gyis rtse gcig nyon// lus ngag yid gsum bde dam pas// lha mo las ni bskyed bya ste// byang chub chen po bde ba yis// tshul bzhin du ni sngags pas bya/
280a1(rgyud): bskul ba'i snying pos 'di smra ste// dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid lha nyid bskyed par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba
280a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul bas bskyed par bya// de bzhin bskyod pas bsgrub par bya// de bzhin du yang bskul bya ba// rgyud kyi 'phreng ni 'od gsal
280a3(rgyud): bzhin// steng dang mdun du rtsa gnyis las// bcu drug gnas su yang dag gnas// de las snying dbus rab zhugs te// rlung gi sbyor bas phul byas pas// steng dang mdog rab mdzes rdzogs sku//
280a4(rgyud): bdag gi dpal du shes par bya// de las byung ba'i dngos grub che// nor bu la gnas rtog bral ba// thig le yig med bsdus pa'i sku// lhan cig skyes par shes par bya// de la de yi gzugs
280a5(rgyud): kyi sku// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yi// bral ba'i shes pas don byed pa// gzhan gyi dpal du shes par bya// de rnams rgyu las byung ba yi// ye shes shes rab shin tu gsang // gsang ba
280a6(rgyud): rnam par 'grub pa yi// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya// lha mo las byung bde dang ldan// 'ja' tshon lhar gsal rgyud dag pa// snang ba'i sku de mi shigs pa// rdo rje nga yis yang dag bsgrags// snang
280a7(rgyud): zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// bsdus phyir bsags pa'i sku dam pa// rtog bral rgyud du sim gnas pa// 'byung phyir snying po zhes su bsgrags// ngag dang ma dag thams cad la// 'khor ba ji srid
280b1(rgyud): par snang ba// gnyis ka mdzes par byed pas na// rgyun du yang dag bsgrags pa yin// dpal dang rdo rje snying po dang // rgyan ces bya ba bzhi po ni// 'brel cing grub par byed pa'i phyir// rgyud ces bya bar
280b2(rgyud): bshad pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi// mtshan gyi don ni 'di don du// yang dag 'dus par ngas bshad do// gzhan du don ni ma bsgrags pa// bla ma la ni gus pa
280b3(rgyud): yi slob ma la ni ma rtogs pa'i// rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas pa'o// don 'di yang dag ma shes na// ji snyed don ni bsam yas pa// shes kyang de yi 'bras bu med// de 'dod mnyes byas yang dag
