336b7(rgyud): to/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ gang du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bdag po de dag gi ming yang shes par bya ba ma yin na gzhan lha ci smos zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
337a1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs kar gnas nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de
337a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin nor bu'i le'u bstan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
337a3(rgyud): cad ni g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas lngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sngags kyi ting
337a4(rgyud): nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// byin rlabs la sogs sngags sogs kyis// de nyid sna tshogs rnam sgom pa// cho ga shes pas de steng du// yi ge bzhi ni rnam sgom pa// bdag nyid dbus/
337a5(rgyud): su son byas nas// rang gi gzugs su gzugs mtshon pa// rang sems byang chub yang dag 'byung // cho ga shes pas kun dged bya// de yis sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// sgom pa
337a6(rgyud): 'di nyid rab sgrub byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shel dang zla ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lnga yi yi ge rnam bsgom nas// yi ge lnga ni
337a7(rgyud): rnam bsgom bya// sngags pas lus kyi dbus son par// oM yig ser po dang mtshungs pa// 'od zer lnga po kun tu 'khrugs// der son bdag nyid sngags pas bsgoms// dbus su hUM yig
337b1(rgyud): yang dag sbyor// rang gzugs dge ba bsgom par bya// 'dzam bu nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzugs brnyan tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid du 'ong bsgom
337b2(rgyud): par gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan de rnams su// 'od zer lnga ni rnam bsgom bya// rnam snang mdzad gzugs 'od zer gyis// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar// bsams nas cho ga shes pas
337b3(rgyud): der/ bsdus nas de la lhung bar bya// zla ba 'char bas mtshan pa yi// mnyam med gzugs ni bskyed nas ni// gsal ba'i ral pa 'chang zhi ba// cod pan lnga ni 'dzin pa po// sna tshogs 'od
337b4(rgyud): zer mnyam pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// dkyil 'khor du gzhug bsams nas ni// de yis sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni de rnams su// rdo rje sems
337b5(rgyud): dpa' rnam bsgoms pas// gtsug tor de yi bzlas pa bya// khro bo gang gzhan 'byung bas kyang // rigs rnams thams cad nyid kyi yang // bskyed pa'i cho gar 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje gsum kun tu 'byung ba
337b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so// cho ga shes pas de
337b7(rgyud): thams cad// oM yig dbus su rnam bsgom bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i// hUM yig mthar ni rnam bsgoms nas// dbus su rdo rje 'chang bsams nas// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/
338a1(rgyud): zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// rnam par snang mdzad rnam bsgoms nas// 'od zer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od// bsams nas de yi thugs ka ru/
338a2(rgyud): zla bar sngags kyi yi ge sgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gziH/
338a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid du kun byas nas// dbus su haM yig sgom pa ni// ngos su rang gi gzugs ltar bya// rdo rje dmar po rnam bsgom bya// dbus su chos 'chang bsams
338a4(rgyud): nas ni// pad+ma rA ga'i dbang mtshungs pa// phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyan pa// de yi dbus su rnam bsgom pa// thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas sngags ni rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan
338a5(rgyud): 'das chos kyi dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / cho ga shes pas gzugs byas nas// ngos su haM yig yang dag sbyar// dbus su rang gi rnam pa sgom// 'dzam
338a6(rgyud): du nA da mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'dod mchog gzugs ni bskyed par bya// lag tu mdung rtse gsum bsgoms nas// de yi snying khar dkyil 'khor dgod// chos kyi dbang phyug gzugs bsgoms nas/
338a7(rgyud): byis nas bya ba yang dag brtsam// sgron ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// / yang na brtul zhugs can gyis ni/
338b1(rgyud): bsdu bas sangs rgyas gzugs bsgom bya// gtsug tor sngags dang khro bo dang // rig pa'i rgyal po rig bcas pa// las rnams thams cad pa yi sngags// go rims bzhin du de bzlas bya// dbus
338b2(rgyud): su bdag po bsgoms nas ni// ngos su lha rnams dgod par bya// snying po sbyor ba de rnams su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge mchod bsgoms nas// de yis lha rnams
338b3(rgyud): rnam bsgoms pa// thams cad kyi ni lag par ni// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma sgom// mdung dang yid bzhin nor bu yang // bsgoms nas myur du sgrub par byed// sngags pas rang sngags bzlas bya ste/
338b4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis// ngos su zla ba yang dag sbyor// dbus su ser po rnam bsgom bya// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis ni// rang gi lus la dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thams
338b5(rgyud): cad rab bskul bas// 'di ni rengs par byed pa'i mchog/ dus rnams kun tu rnam bsgoms nas// nges par bskal par de gnas 'gyur// cho ga shes pas mi bskyod sogs// nyi ma'i dkyil
338b6(rgyud): 'khor la dgod bya// rigs kyi dbang phyug rnam bsgoms ra// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// thog ma tha mar bsam gtan 'di// bzhi yi dbus su bsam par bya// de yis sangs rgyas
338b7(rgyud): nyid sgrub na// yun mi ring bar sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi rang gi sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya shes nas sgrub pa po// cho ga shes pas bskyed par bya// myur du 'grub byed gzhan du min// phyag rgya
339a1(rgyud): zhi la me yi dbus son par// bdud rtsi lta bu bsgom par bya// de nyid la ni lha yi gzugs// rang gi tshul gyis bsgom par bya// bdag nyid bdag po'i tshul gyis ni// 'di
339a2(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i tshul las byung // kha ni rab tu gdangs byas nas// me stag 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// sngags pas lce yi dbus son par// hUM yig de yis bsam par bya// bcom ldan 'das
339a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// cho ga shes pas 'o ma spang // mar ni zhi ba'i rigs la spyad// mar khu chen po'i bye brag las// ye shes rdo rje'i rigs su brjod// zhi ba rdo rje slob
339a4(rgyud): dpon gyi// snying kha'i dbus son rnam bsgom bya// yid bzhin nor bu lag bsams nas// 'di ni dag pa'i tshul mchog go// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan che// pad+ma'i yon tan 'byung ba
339a5(rgyud): la gzugs ni 'dod chags rigs mchog go// gzugs ni 'dod mchod rdo rje can// las bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba las// sngags kyi yi ge dgod byas nas// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i
339a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags yid bzhin
339a7(rgyud): gyi nor bu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi sngags kun las btus pa zhes
339b1(rgyud): bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po// 'dod pa'i dam tshig dgyes pa po// sngags rnams thams cad yang dag dmigs// de yi bsam gtan rab bskul bya// dam tshig ye
339b2(rgyud): shes sangs rgyas kun// rigs dmigs dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gzugs ni sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i 'od// oM yig ye shes dbye ba yis// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul bstan pa'o// ral ba'i
339b3(rgyud): cod pan longs spyod pa// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// phyag bzhi pa la spyan yang pa// me stag 'thibs pas kun tu 'khrug/ rnal 'byor mchod phyir thogs la sogs// brgyan cing dkyil
339b4(rgyud): 'khor la sogs pa// cod pan du ni rdo rje sems// mdzes pa'i gzugs ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go// sku yi rdo rje sbyor sogs/
339b5(rgyud): kyis mngon shes lnga yi rab sbyor las// rkang gnyis mchog de nyid shes pas// thod pa can gyis gtso bo brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di ye shes// rigs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin no//
339b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
339b7(rgyud): snying po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// dbus su gzugs ni rab brtag bya// nag po shin tu rnam 'gyur ba// ma rungs zhal ni rnam par gdangs/
340a1(rgyud): chen por rab bsgoms nas// nam mkha'i lam gyi dbus las ni// dbus su nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i// dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya// sngags pas dkyil 'khor las
340a2(rgyud): ngos su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bdag po'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed// de yis mi g.yo bsgom par bya// rin chen bzhi byung sgo nga ru// sbrang rtsi mar gyis rab tu dgang // sngags kyi/
340a3(rgyud): yi ge rnam bsgoms nas// bsam pa de yis sbyin sreg bya// dkyil 'khor lnga yi tshul gyis ni// dbus su hUM gi yi ge 'gengs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i 'thibs pa ni// kun nas rnam par 'phro bar/
340a4(rgyud): byed// de la gnas pas lha yi gzugs// tshim pa'i dam tshig gsum 'byung bas// cho ga shes pas gtsug tor gyis// gtsug tor rnams ni bsgom par bya// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed//
340a5(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// kun nas sor mo bcu gnyis pa'i// ut+pal chen po 'dab brgyad pa// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nyid kyis ni bsgom par bshad//
340a6(rgyud): rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che// ut+pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// 'phreng ba bcu drug yang dag ldan// rtag tu bsgom bya 'grub par 'gyur// sngags pas sor mo nyi shu pa'i// rtse gsum ser po dang
340a7(rgyud): mtshungs pa// cho ga nyid kyis bsgoms byas nas// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// pad+ma las kyi rdo rje dang // yid bzhin nor bu gsum pa can// bdag po'i sngags ni yang dag bskyed// myur du/
340b1(rgyud): sgrub byed gzhan du min// 'khor lo de bzhin pad rdo rje// bsams nas rdo rje'i cho ga las// sgom pa'i go 'phang gis bsgrub bya// gzhan du 'di ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rdo rje chen po dung sogs bcas/
340b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// kun gyi las can gsang sngags kyi// brjod pa rnams kyis brjod byas nas// ral gri 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i sems// 'phro zhing 'thibs pa'i kun tu 'khrug/
340b3(rgyud): khru gang tsam du yang dag bskyed// khro bar byed pas khyad par bya// pho nya mngag gzhug sogs sngags rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// sgom pas
340b4(rgyud): mchog tu mthe bar 'gyur// dbyug pa tho ba dgra sta dang // zhags pa paTI sa sgom pas// cho gas bsgom par byas nas ni// rdo rje 'chang rnams mnyes par byed// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad
340b5(rgyud): kyisku gsung thugs kyi sgom pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gyis gsang // ye shes dngos grub can du brjod// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// gang zhig dngos grub
340b6(rgyud): mchog 'dod na// cho ga shes pas sbyin sreg bya// de nyid gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin sreg brtsam// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi sbyor ba las// rigs kyi las ni sgrub par byed//
340b7(rgyud): oM yig sngags kyi dbye ba yis// sgom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhi ba can la dkyil 'khor zlum// rgyas pa can la zur bzhi pa// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mchog/ dbang bya gzhu yi rnam pa'o//
341a1(rgyud): me stag 'thibs po 'bar ba ste// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi pa ste rab 'bad pas// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor las// 'di ni rdo rje tshul brdzun/
341a2(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje thugs sogs yang dag grub// rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'dod chags rdo rje rab bskul bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i
341a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes chos thams cad 'chang ba'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos 'chang ba'i/
341a4(rgyud): dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las// dbus su gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// dmar po 'dod chags 'dzin pa 'bar// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// phyag
341a5(rgyud): bzhi pa la yid 'ong ba// dbang po gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di yi cho ga bsgoms pa ni// 'di ni 'dod chags tshul bstan pa'o// gsung gi rdo rje gtso dngos grub// rdo rje chos rab sbyor sogs
341a6(rgyud): kyis snying rje'i bdag nyid rgyan gyis sgrub// sgrub pa yang ni myur 'thung byed// chos 'chang ba'i dam tshig gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo
341a7(rgyud): dam tshig gi rigs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor
341b1(rgyud): bsam gtan gyis// gzugs ni dbus su dgod par bya// khyab bdag zhi ba ser po'i mdog/ spyan gsum brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// kun tu dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs// me skrag chog
341b2(rgyud): ni kun tu 'khrugs// phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis// bsgom bya myur du 'grub par byed// rdo rje'i mthar thug nor dngos grub// rab tu gnas pas de bsgrub bya// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// thar
341b3(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin snying po can// sku gsung thugs kyi bsgoms pa ni// rdo rje sems dpas sprul pa yin// rdo rje mdung gi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ji srid gzugs ni kun sbyor ba// de la lha
341b4(rgyud): nyid rab tu grags// slar yang 'di yi tshul gyis ni// skyed par byed pa'i cho gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// rang gi sngags yig dbye bas sam// yang na
341b5(rgyud): rigs kyi rig pa yis// rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis sam// brtul zhugs can gyi rig rgyal po// thams cad las can sngags kyis dang // gtsug tor sngags kyis rnam bsgom bya// 'di de
341b6(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba'i las kyi rab dbye bas// rigs kyi sngags su rab tu grags/
341b7(rgyud): rgyas pa can la rigs kyi sngags// sgom pas nges par 'grub par byed// dbang du bya ba'i cho ga las// rig pa'i rgyal pos bsgom par bya// thams cad las can sngags nas ni// mngon spyod rnam
342a1(rgyud): par sgom par byed// skrod par byed pa'i cho ga la// gtsug tor du ni rnam pasgom bya// sngags shes pas ni phur gang ba sogs// pho nya bo'i mo bas ma bya// bcom ldan 'das
342a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so// 'od zer lnga yi tshul gyis ni// rtog pas de la bsgom par bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa nyid// sgom pa rnams su shes par bya// rigs kyi las kyi rang
342a3(rgyud): dbye bas// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam bsgoms pa'o// sngags kyi yi ge'i rab dbye bas// bsgom bya dngos grub thob par 'gyur// snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rnam
342a4(rgyud): bsgom pa// stong du bkod pa'i dbye ba yis// 'di ni bsam gtan tshul mchog go/ dkar gnag dmar po'i sbyor ba las// bsam gtan thams cad du brtag bya// gzhan du dngos grub med pa
342a5(rgyud): nyid sngags rnams kun tu bzlas par bya// hUM yig oM yig dbye ba yis// swA hA hUM yig gzhan gyi gzugs// bskyed pa'i cho ga byas nas ni// bsnyen pa gang zhig nges bsgrub bya// rigs
342a6(rgyud): gsum la yang hUM yig dang // oM yig ye shes rigs mchog yin// sngags kyi yi ge laM sogs rnams// dpral bar bkod nas rnam bsgom bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces
342a7(rgyud): gsungs so// thun bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs kyis// rdo rje can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// spro ba dang ni gnas par bya// 'di ni dngos grub tshul bstan pa'o// sgrub pa rang gi lha yi gzugs// rdo rje
342b1(rgyud): can la bdud rtsi'i gzugs// nye bar sgrub pa 'dus pa la// 'di ni dngos grub tshul mchog go// bdag gi sgrub pa'i las can la// bdag po'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// bsten pa'i dus su rab
342b2(rgyud): sgrub pa// gtsug tor gzugs dang yang dag ldan// me sdug 'thibs pas 'khrugs pa yi// rang lha'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje phra rab dbye ba yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'o//
342b3(rgyud): grags par ldan pa'i dngos grub kun// 'di nyid kyis ni byang chub thob// de yi mchog tu bsgrub par bya// dngos grub chen po'i yon tan 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen
342b4(rgyud): pos de skad ces gsungs so// gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por/ sngags thams cad kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
342b5(rgyud): gcig pa rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
342b6(rgyud): pa thams cad dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i bkod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ gsung gi rdo rje chos kyis gsung gi lam nges par bskyed pa'i rdo rje tshul 'di ston par mdzad do// gsang ba dag pa dmigs/
342b7(rgyud): pamed// ye shes yon tan kun gyi gzhi// kun nas ye shes bdag med pa// gsang ba'i ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i de nyid don dang ldan// mchog gi spyod pa rgya mtsho che// kun nas
343a1(rgyud): 'dod pa yang dag 'byung // rdo rje ye shes phyag 'tshal bstod// gtso bo'i ye shes ji ltar gnas// rdo rje mi byed gsum gnas pa// rigs kyi pha rol phyin pa thob// byang chub
343a2(rgyud): spyod la phyag 'tshal bskyod// sems can kun skyes can gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab bzhugs mdzad// rang bzhin dag pa dag pa'i mchog/ sems can skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/
343a3(rgyud): chos sku thar pa chen po ste// yid bzhin nor bu mthong ba che// sems can kun dgyes byed pa po// dag pa'i spyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang yid bzhin nor bu'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
343a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas// phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems de'i mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan gyi khyad par so sor 'dod par bya/
343a5(rgyud): ba gang ji ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// the tshom med par mnyam par shes/
343a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos su 'dod par bya// the tshom meng bar 'du shes pa// chos rnams thams cad 'dod par bya// the tshom med par 'du shes pa// 'du byas thams cad 'dod par bya// 'di lta ste/

343b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i du dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams su rnam par rtog pa med cing the tshob med pa de bdag go zhes chos thams cad kyang rnam mkhar mthong bar gyur to//
343b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ye shes zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
343b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi spyad pa spyod par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di don
343b4(rgyud): dam pa'i gsang ba la dad par ji ltar 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom
343b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams su yang dag par byang chub nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
343b6(rgyud): pa gcig pu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang bas gsol pa/ ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
343b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi cha shas su gyur pa'i gzhi'i sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ngar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
344a1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i tshul 'dir blta bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la mtshan rjob cing dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba thob nas de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// /
344a2(rgyud): ma'o ye shes ye shes che// rdo rje chen po rab tu mthong // rmad du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi// ye shes mig ni rnam sbyangs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
344a3(rgyud): bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis

344a6(rgyud): bzhin yang dag thob// byang chub sems dpa' snying po byin// nam mkha'i khams la longs spyod pa'i// rdo rje byang chub rab tu gnas// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la// spros pa dag ni yod ma yin//
344a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i rang bzhin ye shes kyi// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ rdo rje chos la bos par gyur to// sems dpa' chen po
344b1(rgyud): dam tshig gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skyes bu chen po de'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dbye ba rin po che sgrom du nges/
344b2(rgyud): par rig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi thugs su zhugs par mdzad do// de ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
344b3(rgyud): cad kyi bdag pos rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyor bas yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
344b4(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pa gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rtog
344b5(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// mkhan chen thar pa lo tsa ba'i phyag dpe'i gseb nas shog yar lnga byung ba sngar bsgyur ba las/ phyis nyang stod smon 'gro'i gtsug
344b6(rgyud): lag khang nas rgya dpe lhag ma rnams rnyed nas bsgyur bar rtsom pa na/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gzhan gsum gyi tshul la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa thob pa'i bla ma yang dag pa'i dag
344b7(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen chen po/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo gros shin tu byang ba'i 'jig rten gyi mig chos grags dpal bzang po'i bkas bskul zhing sbyin bdag
345a1(rgyud): mdzad nas/ bu ston gyis bsgyur ba'i yi ge pa ni dge slong rin chen rgyal mtshan no// rgyud min rgyud ltar bcos pa yis// chos min sun dbyung bya byir dang // dam tshig snang /
345a2(rgyud): ngaspel ba'i phyir// ji ltar nus bzhin bsgyur ba lags// 'di don 'byed pa'i 'grel pa dang // rgya pe'i dpe dbang ma rnyed cing // don zab sgra ni rtogs dka' la// saM s+thi ti lam byang bas// sgra don rdzi

345b1(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me mngag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'brar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ pad+ma dang chu lngas lag pa
345b2(rgyud): pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa/ nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan pa/ sbrul rin po che 'bar ba'i cod pan thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas snyan cha byas pa/ rkang pas sprul
345b3(rgyud): gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing za ba/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ sbrul nag po se ral khar thogs pa/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu

346b1(rgyud): pa can rnams 'dul ba'i don du brjod par bya'o// tad+ya dz+nyA/ d+he d+ho paM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i da nI lAm+ba ru d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da ya~M/ yaHsa mA ti kra pU ta \u0f7f/ mA ku la uta sA da na d+ha di Sh+Tha ti/
346b2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha dud+d+ha/ bi dud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mAd+hi yaH/ ta ha dus/ dra ha pA har nAg+na nI/ nIn+da nIn+da nA ga hr-i da pA ni b+hi da b+haM da nA ga marbA Ni/ bi shIr+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rANI/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA naM hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/
346b3(rgyud): hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA raNA ya hUM phaT/ nA gota sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hU~M phaT/ kr-i tI tA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha NA ya hUM phaT/

346b6(rgyud): gtang bar 'gyur ro// klu zlog par byed na spyug shad kyi lcug ma 'am/ ngal po se'u'i lcug mas bya'o// yi dgas dang brjed byed rnams la ni skud pas bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhog
346b7(rgyud): byedan pa dang / yig 'chus pa la ni skud ba sngon pos bya'o// nor 'dod pa la ni zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug ste spos bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston no// mchod
347a1(rgyud): rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon po la sogs pas mchod la sngags stong bzlas nas gsol ba btab na gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do// rgyas
347a2(rgyud): btab pa 'grol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na nyungs kar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba la ni rtsi mar rnying pa dang / thal ba dang / nyungs kar gyis

347a5(rgyud): gzhan srung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni gcig gam/ gsum mam/ lan bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub

347b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba'i don 'di yang dag zhus// sgrub dang gnas dang mtshan nyid gang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/

347b5(rgyud): dung skyong ser pos dbu// dga' bo nye dga' snyan cha dmar// dpung pa pad+ma chu lha dkar// ser la 'dab bzang rigs ldan gnag/ tsham rngam rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang // thal mos bdud
347b6(rgyud): 'joms sbrul nag 'dzin// zhal gsum pa ste 'jigs pa che// sku gsum dag gis rab tu mtshan// pho nya gsum gyis gdug pa 'dul// klu yi gnyen po'i gnod sbyin ba dag/ bdud 'dul
347b7(rgyud): tshangs pa'i pho nya ni// zla dang nyi ma dag gi steng // glang chen kar ka gser gyi gdan// brgya byin ser po rdo rje 'dzin// tshangs pa ral gri pad+ma 'dzin// klu 'dul sbrul nag 'dzin pa'o// bdud 'dul
348a1(rgyud): dbang po nyi ma'i steng // gnod sbyin zla dang stobs kyi sde// klu 'dul ri steng rgya mtsho'i nang // sbrul nag 'khyil ba stobs ldan te// mkha' dang ri bos mnan pa'i steng /
348a2(rgyud): gser mdog stobs ldan gnyis kyi gdan// brgyad khrir zhabs bzhag ri rab mnan// me dpung sku la 'khrugs pa'i 'od// khams gsum khyab mdzad khro bo 'phro// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i
348a3(rgyud): sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje me dpung 'od dang ldan// de nyid mkha' dang 'byung ba las// dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gnas// bdag po'i sa byin las
348a4(rgyud): byung ba// zla nyi thod pa rdo rje las// drug po'i rtags ldan gtso bo che// mdzes ldan sku la yang dag 'khril// drag chan 'dul mdzad dri za'i gtso// mdog dkar rtse gsum 'bar ba 'dzin//
348a5(rgyud): 'od 'phro dkar mo sku la 'khril// 'joms mdzad spu gri 'bar ba 'dzin// mgon po gzi brjid gshin rje'i bdag/ mdog ser dbyug tos gshin rje 'dul// mdangs ldan ser mo sku la
348a6(rgyud): 'khril// 'ja' 'dra ba yi zangs gri bsnams// 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i klu yi gtso// mdog dmar klu 'dul sbrul gyi zhags// sgra yi lha mo sku la 'khril// mdog dmar gcod pa'i ste'u bsnams//
348a7(rgyud): 'phrin las khro bo gnod sbyin bdag/ ljang nag be con gnod sbyin 'dul// rlung 'byin ljang khu sku la 'khril// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams// 'gugs pa lcags kyu lcags kyu ste/
348b1(rgyud): sdud pa zhags pa zhags pa'i bdag/ sdom pa lcags sgrog lcags sgrog ste// zhi mdzad dril bu dril bu zhi// kha sbyor ba de dang longs spyod dang // chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// sa bon
348b2(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba yis// thabs dang shes rab bsreg gso mdzad// nyi ma zla ba'i 'phro 'du las// thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la// gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul
348b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba las le'u dang po'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i sngags ni khyod kyis zung // las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang // sdig pa bdag ni
348b4(rgyud): zhi ba'i phyir// klu dang gnod sbyin bsdigs pa dang // bdud rnams ma lus zhi byed pa'i// dus gsum sangs rgyas byin brlabs pa'i// rdo rje can gyi sngags bshad bya// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ba na nA
348b5(rgyud): ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lam+bA ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la Ata sA da naM/ b+ha bi ShAn+ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi dud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha / mA ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM//
348b6(rgyud): prA ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+na ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmA Ni bi shIr+yaM tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ nA ga bi da raN+Da ya hUM phaT/ nA go ta sA da nA ya phaT/
348b7(rgyud): nI la ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pr-i ti ha taM ba la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/ kr-i tAM tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAM ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kuspr-i DoMta sA da nA ya phaT/ pre ta bi shA tsa bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ yak+Sha
349a1(rgyud): a pa s+phA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra/
349a2(rgyud): d+ha ra badz+ra bA Ni r+yA dz+nyA pa la ti swAhA/ zhes pa 'phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad 'dag pa dang / ma rungs pa
349a3(rgyud): thams cad 'joms pa dang / las thams cad 'grub pa yin te/ de'ang rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub ske mtshig dang ldan pas so// de yang bla ma la gus shing // yi ngas dkon mchog la dad cing /
349a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dang sdom pa dang // lha dang sngags la gus pa dang // rgyun du rnal 'byor dang ldan te// rgyud don don la brtson ldan na// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'o// byang chub sems
349a5(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ dam tshig dag las 'das na las rnams mi 'grub/ dag pa med don med dag ste las rnams
349a6(rgyud): mi 'grub/ 'bras bu gang du skyes zhes nus pas/ rdo rje dmyal ba'i nang du mi bzad pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhes
349a7(rgyud): zhus pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khyod legs so// skrag par ma byed cig/ 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bshig ste/ thugs dang
349b1(rgyud): 'gal bas rdo rje gdan zhig tsam na thar par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan nam 'jig par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
349b2(rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu thob ste rdo rje gdan 'jig ste thar par 'gyur ro// bar ma do dang skye gnas 'jig pa dag yod do// de'i gsang ba'i sngags ni zla ba'i steng du yi ge a bkod de/ chos nyid dag pa'i
349b3(rgyud): sngags brjod do// na maHsa ma~M ta badz+ra NAM/ sar+b+ba d+harmA mi ta badz+ra satwa hUM/ zhes phyogs bcur kha bltas te rdo rje thal mo sbyar la ye shes kyi 'od kyis gsol ba btab la rdo rje sems dpa'i skur/
349b4(rgyud): bya'o// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ zhes pa 'bum brjod do// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje rdo rje 'jigs byed che// me long me long gsal ba'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs
349b5(rgyud): pa che/ mtshon cha 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs// chos dbyings chos dbyings rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// de bzhin
349b6(rgyud): gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// so sor kun rtog kun rtog bral// pad+ma dri med pad+ma'i bdag/ zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// rgya mtsho skyes sku phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen po
349b7(rgyud): nur gzi brjid 'bar// mnyam pa mnyam nyid ye shes sku// zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// rin chen rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// las kyi sku ste 'phrin las mdzad// bya ba bya ba
350a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i bdag/ zhal gsum phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin// 'phrin las rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod// oM unan pa ra swAhA/ oM sram+b+ha ni sud+g+ha d+hu/ A kaR+Sha ya bi d+ha ya swAH/
350a2(rgyud): hA la grI ba ban+d+ha sho ka ya swAhA/ oM a pa re a pA rA dzi ta swA hA/ ro Sha Na ye b+h+yaHbaT/ de nas lha'i gsang sngags brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kyA bi dz+rA ya hUM phaT/ nA ra ya tsit+ta rbung zad/
350a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta la kro d+hi runy+dza/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nA ga hUM phaT/ mA ra ya rakya rngubs rngubs/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mri te hUM phaT/ mA ra ya sod sod rbad/ de nas lha ma srin sde brgyad
350a4(rgyud): kyis rig pa pu la ba ma hA de ba mA ra ya sod sod/ ma hA dak+Sha a su ra mA ra ya ha na ha na/ nA ga rA dza mA ra yo dzaHdzaHma hA ma ni mA ra ya ni mA ra ya rngubs rngubs/ ma hA b+h+yAM mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha
350a5(rgyud): mAr ya b+hin+da b+hin+da/ kharma mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA ta brah+ma de yai phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying byed/ mA ra Na bugs mugs/ mA rA Na hA la ha la/ mA ra Na d+hu na d+hu na/ mA ra Na b+h+yos skyes
350a6(rgyud): mA ra Na bying bying / thA ma ri li li/ zum ri li li/ dzaH/ dum pa legs par ldan pa yis// sman gsum rtsi sman sna tshogs dang // kha di ra yi lob dang bcas// lcags kyi rdo rje'i khong sang du/
350a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i sngags ni brjod par bya// gnas lcags mchu ni stong pa ru// sprin bral ser ba bcad pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ oM Tak+ki tsa te gu h+ya li mi Sha sha
350b1(rgyud): gu Ta/ sha ti ba ti/ hu la hu ya pU ra ta swAhA/ oM badz+ra b+hA Ni bad+d+hA DA ki nI ga hwe he/ hu la hu la/ hu lu hu lu/ pu ru te pu ru te swA hA/ oM many+dzu shI ya mAn+ta kA/ me ka a pa rA dz+nyA baT/ oM ma Na baR+Sha
350b2(rgyud): sha za be sha/ mam du l+ya bi sha'i dza d+he/ oM prad+d+has/ A ko shA// rba dra s+t+rai gar/ br-idz+dza/ shes no// m+b+ha shi ra/ 'i dz+nyAsaH/ oM \u0f7f/ 9 shwe ng+tha/ @d+ha@
350b3(rgyud): a nan+ta/ tak+Sha ka/ bA su ki/ shaM la pA la/ nA ga rA dza swAhA/ oM A di t+ya/ so ma AM ga ra pu ta br-i ha s+pho tiH/ shu kraH/ sha ni sh+tsa ra/ ke tu swAhA/ oM nik+Shi tra/ karti ka/ ro hU~M NI/ mr-i ga shai raH/ sar+b+ba
350b4(rgyud): pu narba suH/ pu Sh+yaHa shre la/ ma g+hA/ pUrba pal gur+t+ti/ uHta ra pa la gur+t+ti/ has+t+rA tsit+sA swa tAM/ bi shwa khA/ a nu rA d+h+wa dz+reSh+Ta/ mu la pUrbAShAD+hA/ ud+ga rASh+Ta D+hA/ shra ba Na a b+hi dzid/ sha ta d+hi ShA d+ha niSh+Ta/
350b5(rgyud): pUrba b+ha dra pA da/ ud+ha ra b+ha drA pA da/ re ba hI a shI nAM b+ha rar+t+ti swAhA/ oM in+d+ra ya/ oM ya ma ye/ ba ru NA/ ku be ra/ ag+ni/ rAk+Sha sa/ bA ya be/ I sha na sUr+yA/ tsan+da lo ka pA lA ya swA hA/ be shra ba
350b6(rgyud): Na/ d+h+r-i ta rASh+Ta/ bi rUD+hA ka/ bi rU dAk+Sha swA hA/ oM de ba nA ga rA dzA su ra ge d+harba sh+tsa/ gA ru Ta/ kin+da ra/ ma ho ra ga/ kuM b+hUr+Na sA hA/ ha ra ha ra nA ga puHts+tshin+dats+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni puH/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmA Ni \u0f7f
350b7(rgyud): bi shIr+yan+na nA gi sha rI rA Ni phuH/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni puHnA ga bi dA ra NA ya puHnA go ta sA da nA ya phuHswAhA/ yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha nI la ba sa nA ye phaT swA hA/
351a1(rgyud): yak+Sha a pra ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ba rA kra mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kri tA~M tA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha N+Da ya phaT/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang /
351a2(rgyud): du 'dus par 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ gsang ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas cho ga
351a3(rgyud): yang dag bshad// maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng // mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa dang // bum pa sngon po mgul chings bcas// mchod pa rnam lnga dang ldan pas// sgrub po dag ni bsnun
351a4(rgyud): ldan pas// rmi lhas rim pa gsal ba yis// nad pa dag la nyung sngags so// bcom ldan mgon po zhal gsum dmar// phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yon// drag po'i thal mos 'jigs
351a5(rgyud): par byed// tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan// 'khor du gnod sbyin chen po ste// sha za rab 'jigs ral pa can// gdong ser seng gdong gnod sbyin mo// bong bu'i rna brna ba 'phyang // ral pa gyen
351a6(rgyud): 'greng ral gri so// gnod sbyin 'khor de lnga brgyar bcas// yak+Sha bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha sA d+ha nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha nI laM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha pra ti ha ta pa lA ya hU~M phaT/ yak+ShA pa rAkra/
351a7(rgyud): mA ya phaT/ yak+Sha kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ ces brjod do// chu la bsngags shing gtor na gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar ro// mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung // tshon snga
351b1(rgyud): lnga dang ldan pa yi// mchod pa lnga dang ldan pas mchod// sgrub po dag ni bsnyun ldan pas// rmi lhas rim pa gsal ba yis// nang pa dag la tshon snas bcing // bcom ldan 'das mgon zhal
351b2(rgyud): gsum ldan// phyag drug rdo rje bsdigs pa g.yon// drag po thal mos 'jigs par byed// tha ma sbrul gdug ri rab mnan// mkha' la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan bdud// dga' rab dbang
351b3(rgyud): phyug thod 'phreng can// bum sna sen dgu sha za bdud// btsun mo me tog mdzes pa dang // 'od zer 'phrog dang mdangs 'phrog ma// gdon rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i 'khor//
351b4(rgyud): ma lus bcas pa'i sngags 'di ni// gnang la bor ba'i srog sngags so// pre ta pi shA tsa ka bi dA ra NA ya hUM paT/ pre ta pi shA tsa kro d+ha sA da nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ha pi shA tsa nI laM ba sa nA ya hUM/
351b5(rgyud): paT/ pre tA pi shA tsa a pra ti ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ pre tA pi shA tsa pa ra kra mA la paT+Ta/ pre ta pi shA tsa kr-i tAn ta ya phaT+ra/ pre ta pi shA tsa kr-itwAn ta rU pA la phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa ro Sha NA ya phaT/ nyi ma
351b6(rgyud): zla ba dag gi bar du rlung la bskyon te tshon sna lngas bcings te bskrad par bya'o// mchod rten sku gdung ldan pa'i drung // maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng // sbyang bas khyi li shal sgrug/
351b7(rgyud): rmi lhas rim pa ldan pas brtag/ brgyad khri zhabs nub 'jigs pa'i me// gad rgyangs bzhad mdzad zhal gsum pa// nag po zhabs gdub gdug pa 'dzin// stobs chen rab tu gnon pa'o//
352a1(rgyud): klu chen ma rungs gdug pa can// nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang // dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang // pad+ma pad+ma chen po'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan rnams// rgya mtsho dag/
352a2(rgyud): la gnas pa yi// klu dang gnyen dang sa bdag gsum// sprul pa las la grub po yi// glen pa nga rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// sprul pa 'bum sde 'khor bcas pa'i// ma lus pa yi sngags 'di ni// gnad
352a3(rgyud): la bor ba'i rtsa sngags so// ha ra ha ra nA ga phu/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA ga pu/ ts+tshin+dan+dan+da nA ga pu/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga pU/ bi shIr+yan+d+ra nA ga sha rI rA Ni pu/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni pu/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya phu/
352a4(rgyud): nA ga kro d+ha sA da nA ya phu/ bal po se'u dag dang ni// smyug shad dag gi lcug mas bya ba// de ni klu bzlog pa'i cho ga'o// nA ga du na dus nA ga shon dus/ hi li hi li nA ga dus dus/ klu chen nu ga'i srog snying ste/
352a5(rgyud): gnad pa bor ba'i srog snying ngo // lho 'phye dag gi kha nas khar// bcom ldan sku ni gsal bas bzlas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ las rnams bzhi yis las rnams 'grub// sa gzhi dag ni so sor
352a6(rgyud): brtag/ zhi ba dkar zlum pad+ma can// rgyas ser gru bzhi'i 'khor lo yi// dbang dmar zla gam lcags kyu ste// drag po mthing nag rtse gsum pa'o// zhi ba rgyas pa sor bzhi dang // khru dang khru do mnyam pa'o//
352a7(rgyud): dbang dang drag po sor gsum rtse// khru do khru gang khru gsum khru// 'o ma can dang dri zhim zhing // 'bras bu dang bcas zhi rgyas shing // tsher ma dur khrod shing dag ni// kha dog dmar nag dbang drag la//
352b1(rgyud): ku sha dag kyang dgram byas te// las kyi bum pas bsang bar bya'o// zhi bzho dang mar dang ni// 'o ma dri zhim me tog dkar// 'bras dang nas dang gro dang ni// zho yi cha dang bsres pa dbul// rgyas pa zho sngags
352b2(rgyud): dkar gsum ste// mngar gsum 'bras bu gsum dag ste// lam shing 'o ma lo 'dab bcas// til ni dkar po shis pa'o// khwa dang 'ug pa bya rog drun// se tshe nim pa nyungs kar dang // khrag gis sngags
352b3(rgyud): pa'i rdzas kun te// yam shing tshir ma mar dag dang // sha dang tshil dang gzugs bcas pa// til ni nag po shis pa'o// shar du bltas na zhi ba ste// byang du bltas na rgyas pa'o// nub tu bltas na dngang
352b4(rgyud): du sdud// lho ru bltas te gsad par bya'o// sbyin sreg byas pas las kun 'grub// g.yas brkyang gar gyis gdug pa ste// g.yon brkyang bas ni gsad pa'o// bum pa kha dog sngon po ste// gnas
352b5(rgyud): lcags sor ni bcu drug tshad// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin po che// 'bras gsum 'bru gsum bcas pa ste// dri zhim lo 'dab bcas pa'i shing // ba yi rnam lnga khru do tshad// gru bzhi khru gang zlum po ste/
352b6(rgyud): seng ldeng bzhi la byas pa yi// phur pa tshon sna dang bcas pa'i// dkar gsum mngar gsum bcas pa yi// gdengs ka can la dbul bar bya'o// grub pa khrus bya bsrung bar bya'o// 'bras chan bu ram
352b7(rgyud): hwags dang ni// 'bru mi chan dang dri zhim dang // dkar gsum mngar gsum chu dag dang // mdun du byas te phyogs rnams su// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang // nas dang 'bras dang gro la sogs// la phug
353a1(rgyud): sgog pa 'bru la sogs// chang dang bcas pa mdun du dbul// oM brah+ma/ oM biSh+Ta/ oM ru drA ya/ oM karti ka/ oM ga na pa ti/ oM in+d+ra ya// oM ma hA kA la/ oM ma hA drah+ma ye/
353a2(rgyud): ba li ta ta le/ ba la~M ta ta le swA hA/ stag dang khab len ti tsha dang // maN+Dal gru gsum steng du gzhag/ nag po'i thod pa gri gug can// srung dang ldan pas gsang sngags sgrug// ma hA kA la ni rU
353a3(rgyud): pa NA/ oM shri gri bo bed dza dza dza ha ha/ sa ma ya gags sol/ lcags kyi snying phyung / zhes pas lcags bya'o// nad kyi srung ba dag la ni// byang chub sems dpa' sku gsal la// snying kha'i sa bon/
353a4(rgyud): me 'bar bas// nad kun ma lus bsreg par bya'o// oM bi dug lu ma pra ti bai ro swA hA/ 'bru dang sman dang khu ba dang // rin po che dang chang dang sha/ rkang dang la du dkar gsum dang // mngar
353a5(rgyud): gsum bcas pa'i gtor ma dang // chu yi 'gram mam rgya mtshor dbul// me tog gdug pa bcas pa dbul// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hUM/ gsang ba'i rgyud rnam par
353a6(rgyud): 'byed pa drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba las/ las bstan pa'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba pu N+ya ma ti dang / lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi
353a7(rgyud): bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud/ sangs rgyas
353b1(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba/ shin tu dben pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa
353b2(rgyud): na/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/
353b3(rgyud): yid khros pa lta bu/ mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce lhar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral khar thogs
353b4(rgyud): ba klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bos snyan brgyan pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ sprin ma dpral bar bsdus pa/ ya sos
353b5(rgyud): ma mchu mnan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ sbrul za ba/ gsus pa che ba/ lag pa brda bra pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcing
353b6(rgyud): ba a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor byin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la rab tu khur ba/ klu thams cad
353b7(rgyud): rlag par byed pa'i geng rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ klu thams cad 'ching bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs shing 'ching bar mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad
354a1(rgyud): gcod par mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad zlog par mdzad pa/ sbyor ba thams cad gnon par mdzad pa/ yon tan thams cad ma lus pa'i bdag nyid de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde
354a2(rgyud): dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad dang / gnod sbyin drag po thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / dri za thams cad dang / lha mo yin
354a3(rgyud): thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding thams cad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed la sogs pa dang thabs gcig
354a4(rgyud): tu bzhugs te/ 'di ltar nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs lta bur bzhugs so// de'i tshe sa'ang cher g.yos so// 'brug gi sgra'ang byung / nyi ma dang skar ma'ang mi snang bar gyur to//
354a5(rgyud): de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la 'khor thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gos sngon po can khyod ci/ bde gshegs kun gyi sprul pa 'am// gal te bsdus pa'i sku yin nam//
354a6(rgyud): las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ram// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// ji lta bu yi dus gsum bka' nyan te// las dang bya ba thams cad bka' stsal mdzod// drag po'i ting 'dzin/
354a7(rgyud): bstaran du gsol// zhes gsol to// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas lag mardo rje drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so//
354b1(rgyud): phyag rgya gsang sngags mthu sbyor las// khro bo'i rgyal po bsam par bya// khro bo rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// byin rlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin de la dbang thob nas// las rnams/
354b2(rgyud): sgrub la thogs pa med// zho rgyas dbang dang drag po dang // gsad rmongs sna tshogs nges par 'grub// de nyid grub par gdon mi za// rang gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang // shin tu bla ma dam pa
354b3(rgyud): yang / mchod gnas dngos grub myur du 'byung // gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na// sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang // snang ba'i sgyu ma'i sku yin yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir rags par snang //
354b4(rgyud): sna tshogs de nyid bsam bral ba'i// dngos gzhi yang dag thar pa gcig/ le'u gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// nga ha sreg sogs gsang
354b5(rgyud): sngags kyis// thogs med las rnams grub pa yin// gnyis kyi 'og mas gsum pa brgyan// ri yi mtha' ni gsum pa'i mtha'// de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pa// zung dang bar zung
354b6(rgyud): ming dang ldan// yang ming skal ldan bsam gtan ni// lcags kyu'i sbyor ba rab tu bya// oM badz+ra pA Ni mahA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra hUM phaT/ 'jug rdzogs gong dang gsum pa'i mtha'// lan gnyis gong
354b7(rgyud): bzhin brdegs sngags shes// gsum pa'i dang po gnyis pa dang // drug pa'i dang po yi ge ni// lan gnyis gong bzhin gtogs byed sngags// gnyis kyi dang po lnga dang pos// drag po dga'
355a1(rgyud): ba'i sa bon ldan// lan gnyis ldan gyur las grub pa// gong ma bzhin du mchod byed do// le'u gsum pa'o// de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
355a2(rgyud): gos sngon po can sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra da ha nI badz+ra hUM phaT/ gang zhig ting 'dzin
355a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor de// nyes pa kun las rab tu thar// legs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'thob// 'bras bu yang dag mngon par 'grub// sngags ni gang yin ming yin te// gdul bya'i mtha' dang ldan pa
355a4(rgyud): la/ mtha' ma las sngags mtha' dang ldan// le'u bzhi pa'o// de nas gos sngon po can 'khor lo mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
355a5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'byung bzhi'i sangs rgyas rab bsgoms nas// so sor las kyis sgom pa ni// me brgyad rlung gnyis ldan par bsam// chu brgyad dngos po nyid yin te// de bzhin
355a6(rgyud): sa brgyad hUM 'bras ldan// rlung brgyad me gnyis ldan pa ste// 'bras bu rim gyis gnod sbyin gtso// sgrub pa sngags bzhin mngon par 'grub// e dang so so'i mtha' dang ldan// me la gong mas
355a7(rgyud): mngon par 'grub// rgyun du rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas 'phags pa gos sngon gyis// las bcu mngon par 'grub pa ni// ting nge 'dzin la
355b1(rgyud): stoms zhugs nas// las bcu'i sbyin sreg 'di gsungs so// zhi la shAn+ti~M ku ru ste// rgyas pa puSh+TiM ku ru'o// dbang la ba shaM ku ru'o// drab po mA ra gsum par ldan// thab khung dbyings ni las ngani
355b2(rgyud): ste/ shing ni rigs dang sbyar bar bya// zhi la dkar po'i shing rnams te// rgyas la gser shing la sogs pa'o// dbang la seng ldeng shing bsregs te// drag po tsher ma can gyi shing // gzhan ni tsan
355b3(rgyud): ngan shing las byas// thab khung 'dab brgyad dbyibs yin te// bi d+h+waM sa la/ uts+tsha ta ni/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ud ma na/ ud ma naM/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ kha shaM ka ra kha shaM ka ra/
355b4(rgyud): rak+Sha la rak+Sha ya/ mo ha b+hA ya/ sarba karma ku ru hUM phaT/ le'u drug pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gdul dka' ba ni gdul ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po
355b5(rgyud): gos sngon can// drag po chen po rab 'bar ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// 'khor gyi klu tshogs dbang bsdus te// nyen rnams zlog pa'i cho gar gsungs// gnas khang rim pa gsum
355b6(rgyud): dag la// phyi rol smre bsregs dpral bar bya// bar du phyi nang khrus byas te// mnyes pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// nang du bum pa'i dbang bskur bas// nyen rnams zlog la the tshom med// kye ho nyen
355b7(rgyud): rnams gdul ba'i mchog/ e ma gsang tshon drag po che// e ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can// e ma gsang sngags rnal 'byor che// phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// phyogs bral khro bo khyod phyag
356a1(rgyud): 'tshal// le'u bdun pa'o// / de skad ces gsungs nas 'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thams cad
356a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i gtor ma la// raM gyis sbyangs nas yaM ges dbus// khaM gis bkrus te dag pa la// baM las bdud rtsi chu rgyun bskyed// yaM raM dbab pa'i sbyor ba bya// dza yis bkug ste gtor mar
356a3(rgyud): bstim// bsam gtan lha mos mchod pa 'bul// de nas 'khor la 'di skad bsgos// dra ni khro bo gos sngon can// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis
356a4(rgyud): brlabs// dbang bskur mchog thob nga yi sku// ci ste nga yi dam 'das na// gtor ma dug gi rang bzhin gyis// khyed rnams thal ba rdul du rlog/ gal te dam tshig ma 'das na// gtor ma
356a5(rgyud): ye shes bdud rtsi yis// khyed kyi sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// nges par legs pa'i yon tan thob// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NA~M/ Ad+ya nung pan na trata AHhUM swA hA/ le'u brgyad pa'o//
356a6(rgyud): de nas dpal ldan gos snron can// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i bdag po des// bsam gtan 'khor lo med pa la// sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya// tad+ya thA/
356a7(rgyud): b+ho b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ uta sA da naM/ b+ha biSh+ya ti/ las thams cad pa'i sngags so// las so so ba la klu 'dul
356b1(rgyud): ba'i sngags/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ ma hI prA p+ta rA ha ra ha ra nA gA nAn/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA gA nAn/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nAg hr-i daya ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA gA marma Ni/ biShIr+yan tu nA ga sha rI rA
356b2(rgyud): Ni Da bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya naM/ tid+yA thA/ hUM paT/ nI ga bi dA ra NAM ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uta sA da nA ya hUM paT/ yaM dgas thams cad bzlog pa mi/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa
356b3(rgyud): rA kra ma ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ya phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya paT/ ku b+hi Dota sA da nA ya phaT/ gshin rje bzlog pa'o// pre ta pi sha tsi bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yi dgas
356b4(rgyud): thams cad bzlog pa'o// yak+Sha a pa s+pha ra bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa bzlog pa'o// ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA sha ka rA/
356b5(rgyud): ya phaT/ bgegs thams cad bzlog pa'o// sarba sha tAM saM g+ha bi nA sha ko rA ya paT/ dge 'dun gyi dgra 'dul ba'o// nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje be tse ni drag po che
356b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs pa sngags kyi bdag/ rdo rje khro bo bgegs kyi gshed// rdo rje mi thub 'jigs pa che// rdo rje las kun grub pa che// rdo rje las rnams kun mdzad pa// sngags kyi bdag po khyod phyag
356b7(rgyud): 'tshal// sngags kyi ngo bo khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u dgu pa'o// de nas klu dgug pa'i sngags bstan te// rdo rje lcags kyu rlung gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// de
357a1(rgyud): bzhin me yis kyang ni 'dul bar nus pa yin// de ltar nus phyir dgug pa'i sngags ni bshad par bya// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra nA ga hriMHgr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ A
357a2(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ bsam gtan drag pos bzlas pa bya// bzlas pa 'di la rab 'bad bya// klu rigs du ma thams cad kun// 'gugs 'gyur 'di las gzhan du min// ji srid 'gug
357a3(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// khugs par gyur pa'i klu rnams kun// zangs gzhong nang du spyan drangs te// khro bo'i che ba brjod nas ni// dam tshig bsre zhing dug rnams gzhom// sman gyi mchog gis gses
357a4(rgyud): nas ni// gang gnod phyogs su gshegs su gsol// le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul ba'i// klu gzir drag sngags
357a5(rgyud): bstan par bya// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra nA ga ha na ha na hUM phaT/ nA ga da ha da ha hUM baT/ nA ga s+phoT s+phoT hUM phaT/ nA ga po s+phorba swa bi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ nA ga gardza badz+ra dz+nyA phaT/ AT d+hin+da b+hin+da hUM paT/
357a6(rgyud): bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis// gdul ba'i steng na gdab par bya// 'og tu me yi 'khor lo bsam// me phung chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// me 'bar glog chen dkyil du gzir// yungs kar yungs/
357a7(rgyud): nag se tshe yis// brdeg cing khro bo'i sprul pa sngo// khwa spyang la sogs rtsa lnga'i gsob// gcan gzan sna tshogs mche sder dang // mchu sder dbab cing sprul pa sngo// myur du bar pa gdon meg/ Ta
357b1(rgyud): bcu gcig pa'o// de nas 'phags pa gos sngon can gyis nyid la nyid kyis mchod pa bul ba/ hUM rdo rje bdug pa ma// bdag nyid dri yis rgyas mdzad ma// badz+ra d+hU pe pU/
357b2(rgyud): dza me hUM/ hUM rdo rje me tog ma// bdag nyid yongs su bkra mdzad ma// badz+ra puSh+pe pU dza me hUM/ hUM rdo rje dri chab ma// bdag nyid dngos po dag mdzad ma// badz+ra gan+d+he pU dza me hUM/ hUM rdo rje mar me mo//
357b3(rgyud): bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad ma// badz+ra A lo ke pU dza me hUM/ ji srid thams cad mchod pa che// ji srid mchod pa bde ba che// ji srid mchod pa bla na med// ji srid mchod pa yang dag che//
357b4(rgyud): e ma ho/ le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bcom ldan gsang ba gos sngon can// bsdu ba thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// 'khor gyi klu rnams
357b5(rgyud): sdud mdzad nas// me yi 'khor lo snyoms zhugs tshe// gsang ba me yi sngags bzlas pas// klu rnams ma lus tshig par mdzad// bral nas dpag tshad gnas su bres// slar bsdus bdu
357b6(rgyud): sman gyis gsos// las bcos so so'i gnas su 'khod// de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// me brgyad 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu ma
357b7(rgyud): yi ting 'dzin la// snyoms zhugs khyod ni rgyal gyur cig/ bde ba'i rol mo me glong du// sreg mdzad me brgyad khyod phyag 'tshal// rang bzhin rnam dag khyod phyag 'tshal// chu yi ngang la gnas 'dod/
358a1(rgyud): nang chu brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas te// de tshe 'khor gyis 'di skad bstod// chu brgyad 'khor lo'i bdag nyid che// rtag pa chu yi dkyil 'khor can// 'byung ba'i gtso
358a2(rgyud): bo'i chu yi bdag/ chu brgyad mnga' bdag khyod phyag 'tshal// rlung brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas na// 'thor zhing 'bud pa'i bdag nyid che// rlung chen drag po rtsal shugs ldan// rlung lha gos
358a3(rgyud): sngon khyod phyag 'tshal// sa yi ting 'dzin la gnas nas// mi g.yo brtan pa'i las mdzad pa// gser ldan rol mo sna tshogs ldan// sa brgyad 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u
358a4(rgyud): bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can// phra mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas// 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun// shin tu yid dga' dad pa zhus//
358a5(rgyud): phra mo'i thig le chen po yis// cir snang dngos po gcig tu 'das// de nyid mtha' 'das rang bzhin med// de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can// 'dod chags ting 'dzin la gnas pas//
358a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun// sngangs dang dus dang brgyal ba las// bslang ste bla med don bstan pas// thams cad 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas// 'khor gyis sku la mngon par
358a7(rgyud): bstod// kye ho gsang bdag gos sngon can// bla med rdzogs pa'i glong dkyil na// 'dod chags dag pa'i blo ldan pas// mngon par sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//
358b1(rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// 'khor gyi gtso la mngon par bstod// lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// yon tan thams
358b2(rgyud): cad sku la rdzogs// dngos med dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// 'khor gyi klu tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir// klu brgyad sku la rab brgyan nas// klu tshogs zhal du gsol mdzad pa// klu 'dul byams pa
358b3(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs dag pa'i sku mnga' zhing // rigs drug sde brgyad 'dul bar mdzad// skyon gyis ma gos rang sangs rgyas// thogs med kun 'dul phyag 'tshal bstod// ji ltar
358b4(rgyud): bsam pa'i dngos po kun// khyod las 'byung bas mi zad gter// sna tshogs yid bzhin 'phrul po che// yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag 'tshal// nad dang rims kyi gshed po mdzad// nor dang /
358b5(rgyud): zas kyi bdag po mdzad// 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad// bla med skyo ba mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas rjes su yi rang ngo // lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
358b6(rgyud): la sogs pa'ang yid dga' ba'i mchod pas khyab par gyur to// mi la sogs pa 'jigs pa'i nyen dang ldan pa thams cad bde ba la bkod do// le'u bco lnga pa'o//
358b7(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga rdo rje betson gyi rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'khor de dag la rnam par gzigs nas rang nyid
359a1(rgyud): mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu srid pa gsum yang rnam par/
359a2(rgyud): g.yos so// de nas rang nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje las sngags 'di phyung ngo // oM na mo/ gsang sngags rgyal po smras tsam gyis// sa steng lha rnams
359a3(rgyud): brgyal bar gyur// klu rnams kun tu skrag nas ni// gsang bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje ldan zhing mos pa brtan// gus shing byang chub sems ldan pa'i// phyogs su 'gro bas
359a4(rgyud): yid gnas pa'i// lha dang bla ma mnyam mchod cing // brtson 'grus shes rab che ba des// rang nyid dang ni gzhan dag tu// bde zhing nyams dga'i ri phug gam// tshal lam mtsho 'am ljongs rnams
359a5(rgyud): sus yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag par// byas nas dri chus legs byugs nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te// gsang ba'i bdag po bsgrub par bya// gzhan ni ri khrod rtsub pa 'am/
359a6(rgyud): dur khrod ya ma'i khang pa yang // 'khrug cing g.yeng dang bcas pa dang // rgyal pos bzang zhing gtum mo rgyu// 'jigs pa'i phyogs nas gang dag rnams// rgyal ba sgrub pa'i gnas yin no//
359a7(rgyud): dus 'dir byung ba'i blo zhan rnams// 'jig rten 'di yi g.yeng ba dang // tsho gas thams cad skyed par byed// chags pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag mi rtog do ni skyon// sprul pa'i glang /
359b1(rgyud): bopo dang mtshungs so// stong nyid spros med rang bzhin las// sgyu ma'i sku ni yongs 'byung zhing // dang po stong nyid rdo rje ste// gnyis pa la ni yi ge hUM// gsum pa rdo rje rtse dgu pa// bzhi pa
359b2(rgyud): bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ lnga pa lha ni yongs su rdzogs// me long dang ni mnyam nyid dang // chos dbyings ye shes las grub pa'i// sku ni ye shes padag nyid do// de rdzogs ye shes
359b3(rgyud): chen po'o// ye shes sku las ye shes kyis// sprul pa'ang ye shes nyid du gnas// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs las 'das nas// mi rtog ye shes phung po la// gsang ba'i bdag nyid legs pa
359b4(rgyud): bzhugs// rnam grol rnam dag grol ba'i rgyu// sngags dbyibs chos bdag don rnal 'byor// skad cig skad cig ye shes las// sgyu ma lta bu'i sgyu ma'i sku// sgyu ma nyid la rnam grol tshe// kye kye ha ha/
359b5(rgyud): dpa' bo che// glu yi sgrar gyur 'jigs byed pos// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can// nyon mongs las rgyal 'jigs su rung // dbang phyug khams gsum las rgyal ba'i// de bas brtson ldan gang
359b6(rgyud): yin des// shin tu sgrub pas bsgrub par bya// bstan pa'i yid sos par byed pas// rgyal ba gsang ba'i bdag po'o// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid dngos grub nges par 'byung ba rdo rje zhes
359b7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje las byung ba/ oM badz+ra pA Ni sarba ar+tha sid+ha ku ru ku ru swA hA/ lha klu mi min dri za 'am// yang na mi yi
360a1(rgyud): bu mo yi// dpral bar thig le bris nas ni// lag tu lcags kyu thogs la gzhag/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// brten nas bum pas bsgrub par bya// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
360a2(rgyud): pa ni// sman la sogs pas legs bkang nas// ras kyis dkris la gzhag par bya// rgyun du de las bsgrubs gyur na// zhi dang rgyas sogs dngos grub dang // gzhan yang dngos grub 'grub par
360a3(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po mi 'gyur bar byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
360a4(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje yang dag pa las nges par phyung ngo // oM na gu nA ge pro ti ga ma Ni/ tsa ra pa ra ya ra bA rA d+he ha re ni br-i/ rin chen snod du chu blugs nas// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di la ni// brgya nas
360a5(rgyud): srid stong gi bar// brjod na 'gro ba'i dug nad sel// gzhan yang gsang sngags rgyal po ni// gsang ba'i bdag po sbyor ba dang // bcas pas mang du brjod byas nas// bsgrubs pas ci yang
360a6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba spyang kis bzung dus su dpral bar go ro tsa nas thig le byas te/ kha shar phyogs su gyur nas gsang sngags 'di brjod na ci 'dod pa dbang du byed do// yang zla ba'am
360a7(rgyud): nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i tshe klo'i gan nas mi khrag gis lus byugs te sngags 'di brjod na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di la the tsom med do// gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad bya ba// kur chu/
360b1(rgyud): dang ni gi'u wang gis// rtsibs brgyad pa yi 'khor lo la// dang po'i sngags bzhi dgra dang ni// tha ma'i sngags rnams bri bar bya// mu khyud gnyis la rtsa ba yi// gsang sngags rgyal po rim gyis
360b2(rgyud): zithi rin chen snod bzhag mchod byas nas// gsang sngags stong sogs brjod nas ni// rgyal mtshan rtse la gdags par bya// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// gal te char pa dbab par
360b3(rgyud): 'dod na sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas te/ dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la/ de'i steng du klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi gzugs byas te bzhag la/ rang nyid khro bo'i rgyal po gos
360b4(rgyud): sngon po can du byas te/ spyan sna tshogs dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras chan dang / zho la sogs pa rnams dang / ka ra dang bu ram la sogs pas mchod nas gos dkar po bgos te/ hUM 'brug
360b5(rgyud): gi sgra lta bu brjod pas mgo 'dren pa'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brjod pas char 'bebs par byed do// gal te mi 'bebs na klu rnams bsdigs pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor de'i steng du
360b6(rgyud): khrag sna tshogs dang / dug shing la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// des myur du char 'bebs par byed do// gal te char ches pa'am/ ser ba gcad par 'dod pas nyar shing dang dug ka da
360b7(rgyud): pa'i rtsa ba la yi ge bris te/ dkyil 'khor dkar po'i dbus su btsugs la yungs kar dang thal ba mang du bzlas par bya'o// gal te mi 'dod na bsngags pa tsam gyis kyang nges par
361a1(rgyud): 'byung ngo // rta'i khrag dang dug sna sna tshogs kyis brgyal bsos par byed do// rlung zhi bar 'dod na dbang phyug gi gos la tsa ta pa la ri rtsa bas sngags bris te/ dkyil/
361a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ sngags kyi rgyal po snying la sogs pa ci nus pa brjod nas khang pa'i steng du bzhag na rlung zhi bar byed do// gal te yams zhi bar 'dod pas gur kum dang / gi'u
361a3(rgyud): wang gis rtse mo bcu gnyis par bris nas dang po'i sngags rnams dang / tha ma'i sngags rnams rtsibs la bris te/ mu khyud sngags lhag ma bris te me tog dang 'bras bu ser po thams cad kyis
361a4(rgyud): mchod cing gsol ba btab nas gtsug lag gi rtse mo 'am/ dge 'dun gyi 'du ba'i sgo gong la btags na ci 'dod pa 'grub cing nad yams thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// gal te bu 'dod
361a5(rgyud): pas se'u skya dmar po'i gdong bu steng du sbyin sreg byas na bu ster bar nges so// gal te gter 'dod pas sa 'am rin po che la rnam thos sras kyi gzugs khru gang ba byas nas/ rin po che 'am
361a6(rgyud): spang leb kyi steng du bzhag nas/ mchod po rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas gsol ba btab na zhag bdun na rin po che ster bar byed do// gal te shi bar dogs pas dkyil 'khor khru gang zlum po
361a7(rgyud): ser por byas nas/ dbus su bum pa legs par gzhag pa'i nang du sman sna tshogs blugs nas ras dkar pos kha bkab par byas te/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po mang du brjod nas byis
361b1(rgyud): bum pa la dngos grub blangs na ci 'dod pa 'grub po// de ltar yang yang byas pas tshe'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// gal te mchog grub par 'dod pas sa 'am rin po che la phyag na rdo rje
361b2(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gdan pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas par byas nas/ de rin po che'i snod du bzhag la/ maN+Dal dkar po khru grang ba byas pa'i steng du khri'u'i steng du bzhag la me tog dang
361b3(rgyud): gos dkar pos mchod cing tsan dan dkar po'i chus ci nus par mchod pa byed cing / yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang / gnam stong la de'i dus su sbyang ba byas nas
361b4(rgyud): phyis ni brgyad stong gi grangs su gsang sngags 'don par byed cing rang nyid kyi spyi bor yi ge a dkar po 'od dang ldan pas bdud rtsi'i chu 'bebs par bsams pas/ khams gsum pa'i
361b5(rgyud): nad thams cad zad par bsam zhing slar rang nyid kyi rim gyis zhu bar byed pa ni rgyud las grub pa'i bsam gtan te/ 'di goms pas gang dang gang 'dod pa thams cad 'grub cing khams
361b6(rgyud): gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i bdag po nga la nyon// 'jig rten kun las rnam rgyal ba'i// sku ni sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// gang gis bgos par 'gyur ba las/ ci 'dod
361b7(rgyud): rnyed par byed pa mchog/ gal te rtog med de bral na// ye shes nyid ni bla na med// rgyal ba'i stobs kyis rtogs par byed// nyon mongs kun las rgyal byed cing // nang rnams thams cad zad byed
362a1(rgyud): cing 'gal te nad med nad bcas byed// dbang dang rengs dang dgug pa dang // brgyal dang gsang dang dbang phyug dang // zhi dang srung dang dpal byed dang // phyir rgol ba
362a2(rgyud): rnams brlag pa yi// phra mo 'grub pa smos ci dgos// 'jig rten las grol bde ba'i lus// rgyal ba'i gsung gis legs thob bo// sku ni 'dir brjod med pas te// spyod tshul rnams las
362a3(rgyud): 'das pa'o// ming dang tshogs las rnams 'das na// nyer zhi spos las shin tu 'das// tshig gi yul ni rnam pa bral// rdo rje sgo la de dag ni// ji bzhin don ni shes 'gyur gyi// gzhan du
362a4(rgyud): bskal pa stong du yang // cis kyang shes par ga la nus// gal te dmigs pa zad 'dod pas// mi dmigs spros med gang zhig la// rang gi sems nyid gzhag par bya// de la thar pas grol
362a5(rgyud): ba'o// gal te dga' 'gyur yid yod na// dngos 'di shes pas ci ste stong // de stong spros dang bral ba la// shes pa nyid ni ci la brten// gsang sngags drag po'i sbyor ba 'di// dbang
362a6(rgyud): bskur snang ba med pa dang // tshul ngan lang tshe phra ba dang // nga rgyal dregs shing khengs pa dang // theg pa che la ma mos la// yi ge tsam yang bstan pa min// gal te brgya lam rmongs pa 'gas//
362a7(rgyud): bsnyen na rang nyid phung bar byed// de skad du khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer de slar rang gi thugs kar bsdus nas zhal thams cad zhal la thib zhing / phyag thams
362b1(rgyud): cang bug la byis nas/ zhal gcig phya ga gnyis par gyur te/ hA hUM d+hu zhes pa'i gru blangs so// 'di la ji ltar dmigs byas bzhin// lha rnams kun la dmigs par 'gyur// gsang sngags
362b2(rgyud): 'bum du brjod byas nas// bsnyen pa'i dam pa 'di 'grub bo// 'das dang ma 'das 'od 'gyur ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngags 'di bshad// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi gas //
362b3(rgyud): ye shes chen po zhes brjod do// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad ni gtso bo'i thugs kar thim par gyur to// kA ye rdo rje chen po ni// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams
362b4(rgyud): cad kyi// gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rdo rje gdengs pa'i rgyud las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs
362b5(rgyud): so// tra paN+Di ta a Da ya shrI ma ti zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ban de chos kyi dbang phyug grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
362b6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra tsaN+Da tsit+ta gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud/ dpal gtum po phyag na rdo rje la phyag
362b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas ltung lo can gyi pho brang na sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las la gzigs
363a1(rgyud): pa'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i skus 'gro ba'i
363a2(rgyud): don mdzad do// brjod med don gyi gsung dang / dgongs pa brda'i gsung dang / tshangs pa dbyangs kyi gsung dang / dbyer mi phyed pa'i gsung dang / rig pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi gsung gis
363a3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings kyi thugs dang / me long lta bu'i thugs dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi thugs dang / so sor kun rtog gi thugs dang / bya ba grub pa'i thugs kyis 'gro
363a4(rgyud): ba'i don mdzad do// gnas dang / gdan khri dang / 'khor dang / 'dul ba'i zhing dang / sku 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang //
363a5(rgyud): drag po dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga dang rigs gsum la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems
363a6(rgyud): can 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/ ma chags pa'i thugs rjes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o// de'i tshe na lha ma srin shin tu dregs pa dang
363a7(rgyud): dregs pa'i ru dra zhin chags kyi 'dam na gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi ri rab la gnas pa/ phrag dog gyi rlung sems la 'tshu ba pa/ gti mug mun pa'i g.yung drung na gnas pa ka de lta bu dag
363b1(rgyud): 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs gcig tu gyur te/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po las rdo rje'i rigs dang / dud+hA'i rigs dang /
363b2(rgyud): rin po che'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs su gyur te so so'i yum dang chas nas zhugs te/ thugs 'dus pa'i byin gyi rlabs las thams cad kyi rigs kyi sangs
363b3(rgyud): rgyas sku bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin lhar sngo ba/ sngon por snang ba/ sngo bar gyur pa/ rin po che in+d+ra nI la ljang khu lta bu'i kha dog tu snang ba/ lcang lo can gyi cha byad phyag na rdo rje bsnams nas
363b4(rgyud): thugs kar brtan pa byung ngo // byung bar gyur to// de'i mthu dang stobs kyis 'jig rten na gnas pa'i dregs pa can btul te dam la btags nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
363b5(rgyud): do dpal rdo rje gtum pa thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe na nyon mongs pa la gnas pa'i sems can zhi bas
363b6(rgyud): mi 'dul bar gyur pa dag gnas pa las/ rigs lnga'i bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsang ba'i bdag po la bka' bsgo ba ste/ kye gsang sngags dang / rigs sngags dang /
363b7(rgyud): gzungs sngags kun gyi bdag po zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad khros pa'i tshul gyis gdul du gsol zhes bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra pA Ni kro d+ha kro d+ha hUM hUM/ zhes
364a1(rgyud): ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngoran po can mche ba gtsigs shing 'tshams pa/ mig me bdag gi/
364a2(rgyud): phung po ltar 'bar ba/ dbu gus dur khrod kyi me ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro bskal pa'i dus mtha' ltar sgrog pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu'i rgyal po nor bu dang nor rgyas kyi dus
364a3(rgyud): brgyan pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang nye gnag pos se ral khar brgyan pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba rta bzhin
364a4(rgyud): rgyas pa/ smin ma ser nag dpral ba la bsdus pa/ ga shin rje'i cha byad can/ lce glog lhar 'gyu ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa'i thal mo brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par
364a5(rgyud): byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes 'jigs par byed pa/ skrag par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i
364a6(rgyud): pus mo tsam du phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ ha la'i gang rgyangs chen pos dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/ khams gsu
364a7(rgyud): 'jigs shing sgeg par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa zhig byung ste/ rang gi gzungs sngags 'di ched du brjod do// tad+ya thA/ b+he b+ho pan nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i da nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra
364b1(rgyud): shA rI raM/ badz+ra pA Ni hri da yaM/ laHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ uta sA da naM b+ha diSh+Tha ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mah+ni prA pa ta/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra hA ra nA gA nAM/ ts+tshin+da
364b2(rgyud): ts+tshin+da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da bin+da nA ga dA mA ni/ b+hi She maN+Da nA ga sha rI raM/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya ne/ tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra Na ya phaT/ nA gautA sA ra nA ya phaT/ nI lA ba sa nA ya phaT/
364b3(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya pheT/ kr-i tan+tA ya phaT/ kr-i tan ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya paT/ ku b+hAN+Da ud sA nA ya phaT/ pre ta bi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a/
364b4(rgyud): pa smA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya paT/ ha sa ha sad+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni/
364b5(rgyud): rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsa la ma thag tu dregs pa can phal pa dag ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par gyur te brgya la/ rab tu brgyal ba las phyir dran pa sangs nas 'di skad ces
364b6(rgyud): gsol to// kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyod ni thugs rje'i mnga' bdag kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur pa lags na/ bdag cag gi sdug bsngal 'di las thar par mdzad du gsol zhes
364b7(rgyud): gsol to// de nas dregs pa can de dag ngam la btags te dbang bskur/ dam tshig pog nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dpal rdo rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las/
365a1(rgyud): dregs pa can phal pa gtul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag shin tu'ang dregs par gyur pa dag klu rgyal rigs/
365a2(rgyud): kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / rje'u rigs kyi rgyal po kun nas gdugs zhes bya ba dang / bram ze'i rigs kyi rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba dang / gdol pa'i rgyal po shI la bu ka ra zhes bya ba dang /
365a3(rgyud): bdud kyi rgyal po skos rje drung dkar dang / gza' rgod chen po dang / dkar po dung gi thor tsugs can dang / btsan gyi rgyal po dmar po srog len dang / gshin rje'i rgyal po dmigs pa dang /
365a4(rgyud): mamo'i rgyal mo mkha' dbyings kyi yum gshin rje'i sring mo phung byed ri ba ti la sogs pa dang / gshin tu dregs pa can gyis 'jig rten phung bar byed pa dag mthul ba las longs spyod rdzos
365a5(rgyud): pa'i sku lngas/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po dregs pa po mo dag thul bar ma gyur te/ rnams nad kyi thabs kyi dregs pa nyon mongs pa gdul bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// dus gsum gyi sangs
365a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyang gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'jig rten gyi drag pa 'di dag 'dod chags la gnas pas sems can la rnam par 'tshe'i/ kun gyi lus dang srog
365a7(rgyud): ma rungs par byed pas khyod kyis thams cad khros pa'i tshul gyis thul cig ces bsgo'o// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
365b1(rgyud): dpa' dang / rigs so sor kun nas 'dus pa rnams kyang gsung gcig gi nga ros 'di skad ces gsung ngo // gsang ba'i bdag po khyod shin tu khros pa'i tshul gyis ston lam 'phyis pa'i stobs
365b2(rgyud): kyis dregs pa can thul cig ces bsgo'o// gzhan yang rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags kyi bdag po thams cad 'dus te/ rigs kyi bdag po dang / rigs kyi yum
365b3(rgyud): dang rigs kyi khro bo dang / rigs kyi sprul pa dang / rigs kyi pho nya mo la sogs pa thams cad 'dus nas mgrin gcig tu bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po gdul bya'i zhing 'di
365b4(rgyud): dag zhi ba'i cha byad kyis mi 'dul bas/ zhe sdang dang gdug sems su bcas pa/ nyon mongs pa rang dga' ma spyod pa/ 'dod pa'i skom gyis gdungs pa 'di dag khyod kyi mthu'i stobs
365b5(rgyud): kyis shin tu khros pa'i cha byad ston lam 'phyi bar myur bar rab tu thul cig ces bka' bsgo'o// de nas sku mi snang ba ye shes chen po'i ngangal bzhugs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs
365b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud las/ khro bor bka' bsgo ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las thugs rje khros pa'i sa bon
365b7(rgyud): hUM mthing nag ha la nag po'i mdog lta bu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba dag byung ste/ de'i byin gyi rlabs las thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs las e mthing
366a1(rgyud): nag dang / yaM sngo s+ya dang / raM khaM dmar nag dang / su ser nag dang / r+ya dmar nag dang / dkar skya dang / sna tshogs pa'i khru 'phros par gyur to// de dag gi 'bre'adu
366a2(rgyud): las gru gsum mthing nag nam mkha' dang / sngo skya rlung zla gam dang / dmar na ga rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang / ser nag zhing chen sa gzhi dang / dkar skya keng rus ri rab dang / sna tshogs rin po che'i
366a3(rgyud): gzhal yas khang mthing nag rdo rje rgya gram las lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to// chos nyid mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i lte ba'i mthing nag zlum po 'phrin las rnam pa bzhis lhun gyis
366a4(rgyud): grub pa'i rgya gram gyi rtse mo phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ bar mtshams rin po che sna bzhi las lhun gyis grub pa/ gru chang rin po che ljang khur sdang ba/ sgo bzhi rin po che sna bzhi tshad med pa ban
366a5(rgyud): 'phrin las su snang ba/ sna tshogs kyi rgyan rang bzhin du snang ba/ rang byung bar gyur to// de nas hUM mthing nag khro bo'i sa bon de las sna tshogs rdo rje phra mo'i 'od tshacha lngar 'phros/ rdo rje phra mo'i 'od
366a6(rgyud): zer la rdo rje lcags kyu phra me bsam gyi mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can kun dang / srog la rngam pa'i srin po po mo sna tshogs pa bkug ste/ gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol tu shing rtsa ba nas
366a7(rgyud): bsgyel ba bzhin du gyur te ri mo bzhin g.yo ba med par gyur to// mthu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor lo'i lce dbus su rdo ba bsgyur ba bzhin du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang
366b1(rgyud): zer ba zhes brjod pas srin po ma dran pa rnyed de mdun du gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gzhal las khang spyan gyis grub pa'i le'u sde ba'i pa'o//
366b2(rgyud): de nas thugs rje khros pa'i thumathing nag 'od 'bar ba las de bzhin gshegs pa kun gsung gcig gis a b+ha ro la Na hUM zhes gsungs pa las khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal bzad pas
366b3(rgyud): dudrug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa/ de ltar 'bar ba'i cha byang du snang ba zhig byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chen po gsum g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/
366b4(rgyud): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ dpal rdo rje gtum po thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'bar ba'i khro bo khros pa'i tshul du bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na dus
366b5(rgyud): gsum gyi theg pa'i bdag po thams cad 'dus te/ ye shes kyi mkha' gsang ba'i bum pas 'bar ba'i khro bo de'i lus kun bkrus te ye shes kyi bum pa'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// dag par
366b6(rgyud): 'khru bar byed pa'i nye shing pa dang / sgrib pa sbyong zhing kun tu skyob par byed pa'i phur mong gi thal ba dang / chos nyid kyi ci dang / ye shes kyi bcud mar la sogs pas 'gro ba rnams kyi tshul dang ldan
366b7(rgyud): pa'i phyir dbang bskur ro// ye shes kyi khro bo de lus la sim zhing rgyas te bde ba skyes par gyur te/ de nas rigs thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas lnga yum dang bcas pas bde ba la snyoms par zhugs
367a1(rgyud): te gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las ye shes kyi yig 'dru khri mthing kha dang / khri dkar po dang / khri ser po dang / khri dmar po dang / khri ljang khu dang / khri sna tshogs kyi
367a2(rgyud): mdog tu snang ba dag 'thon te/ gsung gcig gis bskyed bskul gyi sngags bka' stsal pa/ hUM e yaM raM khaM su raM ko bruM/ a b+hi ro Sha Na hUM/ oM nyi ma sa sA la nAM ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ ces
367a3(rgyud): gsungs pa las ye shes las sprul pa khyud mthing kha dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang khu dang / so so nas sna tshogs pa 'dus pa'i khyung lus dkar ba/ gshog bsngog
367a4(rgyud): rA ye shes spu gri 'drar ba/ gdug pa can 'dren cing za ba/ 'bar ba'i khro bo'i thugs rjel gnas par gyur to// lus kha dog lnga la/ mchu gnam lcags kyi rdo rje las grub pa/ gshog pa nam/
367a5(rgyud): mkha'i mtha' ma khebs pa/ mig gser zhun ma bzhin du snang ba/ gdug pa'i sbrul rigs bzhi so sor za ba dag spyi gtsugs dang / dpral ba dang / rna lhag g.yas g.yon dang / dbu'i lhag/
367a6(rgyud): khung la sogs par gnas so// rigs so sor phyag mtshan so sos dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag pos 'khor lo spyi gtsug tu byin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA ya
367a7(rgyud): badz+ra swa d+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes gsung zhing 'khor lo byin no// gsung gi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang / aHsarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ke&ha~M/ zhes gsung zhing chos kyi 'khor lo/
