367b1(rgyud): mgrin par gzhag go// thugs kyi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang / hUM sarba tA thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes thugs kar rdo rje gzhag go// yon tan gyi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang /
367b2(rgyud): swA sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhes rgya gram dang lte bar rin po 'bar ba gzhag go/ las kyi rigs kyi bdag pos kyang / hA sarba ta thA ga ta karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa r-InAM/ ye shes
367b3(rgyud): kyi khro rlung sku chung la spyan che ba/ rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang khu dang / mthing kha la sogs te sna tshogs pa'i khro chung mthon to// 'thon
367b4(rgyud): par gyur to// de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i sgra tsam yang drag par gyur to// de
367b5(rgyud): ngag tshur 'dus shing nam mkha' la babs nas 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lce dbus su gnas pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gcig gis/ ro sha Na yak+Sha gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ ces
367b6(rgyud): gsungs pa las ye shes kyi khro bo/ sku dug ha la nag po'i mdog ltar 'tshar ba/ ye shes rngam pa'i spyan gsum bskal pa'i glog lhar 'khyug cing gdug pa nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin gang la bltas pa
367b7(rgyud): brlag nus shing tsha ba/ smin ma jam pa'i glog drag po bzhin ser nag tu 'bar bas gti mug dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pa/ smar ser nag la ye shes kyi me 'bar ba/ nyon mongs pa'i
368a1(rgyud): bags chags sreg pa/ nyon mongs pa gti mug 'joms par byed pa'i glang po che'i ke rlon gsol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i zhe sdang 'dul ba'i rtags su/ gcan gzan gyi rgyal
368a2(rgyud): bo stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ nyon mongs pa phrag dog 'dul bar byed pa'i rtags su gzig gi mgo bos brgyan pa/ nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba ma spangs pas zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi gsol
368a3(rgyud): badz+ra sbrul dkar khras dbu brgyan pa/ ser khras mgur chu byas pa/ dmar khras phyag gdub byas pa/ ljang khras rked bcings byas pa/ nag khras zhabs gdub byas pa/ dug gsum ngang gis
368a4(rgyud): mi spang bar nyon mongs pa'i sha khrag gsol ba/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang ldan pa'i thod pa skam po dang / rlon pa dang / ni 'phreng gis sku la brgyan pa/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don dang
368a5(rgyud): ldan zhing / 'khor ba khrag zhag dang 'dra ba la thugs rjes gzigs pa'i phyir zhag gi zo ris kyis sku la brgyan pa/ theg pa chen po'i dbang gis thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir thal chen gyi tshom dus
368a6(rgyud): skul brgyan pa/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don dang ldan zhing dbu 'bar ba'i cha byang du snang ste/ dbu skra sngo nag la ral pa'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ zhabs g.yas pa brjid pa'i tshul gyis
368a7(rgyud): bskum nas gnas pa/ zhangs g.yon pa drag po'i tshul gyis bgrad nas gnas pa/ srog la rngam pa'i srin po pho mo brdzis pa/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje rtse lnga pa rdeg pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa
368b1(rgyud): g.yon pa na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo phyar bdag tu snang ba zhes rgya gram dang / ral gri 'bar bas yang lag bzhi la las kyi byed pa por dbang bskur ro// dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lngas dbang bskur
368b2(rgyud): nas 'drin las thams cad kyi byed pa por dbang bskur te/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i rol pas so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
368b3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i khre bo la dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas dpal rdo rje gtum po lag na rdo rjes sdigs mdzud ni bsgreng / rdo rje ni spar nas 'bar ba'i khro bo'i lha
368b4(rgyud): bas kun tu ltas te/ spyan ni bzlog/ zhal ni bzang nas rngam pa'i sgra skad ni ha ha/ hUM hUM/ a la la/ oM maM/ d+hi d+hi/ ho/ zhes pa'i byin rlabs las drag pa gnyis rab tu 'bar te/ rdorje
368b5(rgyud): khre bo dkar ba/ rnam par dkar ba dag mtha' yas pa 'thon to// dpral ba rnam par 'bar nga las khro bo mthing kha sna tshogs pa 'thon to// mgrin pa rab tu 'bar nga las khro bo dmar po rnam par
368b6(rgyud): dmar ba dag 'thon to// thugs ka rab tu 'bar ba las rdo rje khro bo nag po rab tu 'bar ba sna tshogs pa 'thon to// sku lte ba rab tu 'bar ba las khro bo ljang khu rab tu 'bar ba dag 'thon to// 'bar
368b7(rgyud): ba'i khro bo de dag kyang 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ maM lce lha bu s+t+waM/ shin tu rngam pa/ shin tu 'jigs pa/ dgod pa'i mdog tu snang ba/ log sred can dag la gshe ba'i/
369a1(rgyud): mdog tu snang ba/ thams cad thugs rje chen pos kun la khyad pa/ thugs zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po dang / 'dzin las bzhi mes sku'i dngos pa/
369a2(rgyud): shin tu bsgyur te 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// zhal nas rngam pa'i sgra sgrog pa de dag kun kyang khro bo'i stang stabs dang / mchongs pa dang / 'gying ba dang / rtse ba dang / spyan bgrad pa dang /
369a3(rgyud): mche ba gtsigs pa dang / khro gnyer mi bzad pa gtsigs pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i khro bor sprul te/ rtsi mchog gi rgyal po ma ga d+ha'i drir ldan pas gdug pa can kun gyi snying rab tu rul/
369a4(rgyud): bar byed pa/ de lta bu'i 'bar ba'i khro bo de dag sprul rab tu sprul par gyur to// de nas rngam pa'i gsung gis drag po'i sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+rI tsaN+Ta/ oM bi pu le/ oM badz+raH/
369a5(rgyud): pra ba ra nA ga/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA nA ga hr-i da ya/ A bar+Ne/ dz+wa la dz+wA la/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ A brte dz+wa la/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ ki mi ki mi/ nA ga ku lan bi d+hi sa ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba nA ga
369a6(rgyud): duSh+TaM/ hr-i da yA ni/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+TA na nA ga ba na ni/ pa tsa pa tsa/ pA tsa ya pA tsa ya/ sarba duSh+TA nA gA nAM/ a kra ma/ a kra ma/ sU tra ma sa ka ra bi ma li/ bi kra ma/ ma hA nA ga te dza ba re swA hA/
369a7(rgyud): zhese pas de dag thams cad yur phur por gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// dpal
369b1(rgyud): rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang du bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas dregs pa can de dag zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir rdo rje nam
369b2(rgyud): mkha' la gaskor bas/ dregs pa can de dag shing lo rlung rgyal gyis bskyod pa bzhin no// de nas rngam pa'i gsung dang brjid pa'i sku las 'di skad gsungs so// khro bo'i rgyal po
369b3(rgyud): nyid kyis// srid pa gsum na gnas pa yang // thams cad ma lus zil gyis mnan// rigs bzhi klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas// gzi byin drag pos mnan par bya// nga ni mthu stobs
369b4(rgyud): bdag po ste/ rngam pa'i gsung dang brjid pa'i sku// phyag rgya drag pos zil gyis mnan// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas brjid gnon gyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba bcas te/ phyag
369b5(rgyud): sor mo bsnol te mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor rtse sprad nas brkyang ngo // phyag gi mthil 'khor lo can yang thur du bstan te shin tu mi bzad pa'i sngags bka' stsal pa/
369b6(rgyud): oM badz+ra tsaN+De badz+ra pA Ni/ hUM hUM/ ga ru Da b+hak+She/ hUM hUM/ dze mA la ba ri tsi/ sri tsa hUM phaT/ ces ched du brjod pas dregs pa can dang klu thams cad myos rab tu myos nas bka' bzhin bgyi'o//
369b7(rgyud): zhes gsol to// de dag thams cad kyang myos pa'i chu drag po 'thungs pa lta bu 'am/ skyes bu gnyid kyis gdungs pa lta bu ste/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ kye ma masang pa'i/
370a1(rgyud): bdag po bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags bdag po khro bo'i rgyal// khyod kyi rig sngags dmod pa yis// shin tu mi bzang rab tu myos// 'bangs su mchi zhing bka' bzhin/
370a2(rgyud): 'tshal// thugs rje can gyis bdag cag la// rab tu dgongs shing 'bangs su mchi// slad ma rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid// ces dam bcas so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/
370a3(rgyud): dregs pa can zil gyis mnan pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i sde dpon chen po brgya byin zhes bya ba gal ba der 'ongs te/ mchod pa'i yo byad
370a4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas rdo rje khro bo de la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye khro bo'i bdag po chen po dregs pa gdug pa can 'di dag ni shin tu ma rungs par gyur na/ 'di dag brid nas brtan/
370a5(rgyud): pa gnas pa'i thabs kyi spro ba mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa las/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ klu rnams kyi rdzas sna tshogs pa bsags la/ bdag nyid kyi lus dag cing gtsang bar byas la/
370a6(rgyud): longs ma spyad pa'i ras dkar po bgos te/ mngar ba dang gsur ba'i dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i thig les lus byugs la bu ram dang / sha ka ra dang / sbrang rtsi mur bar byas/ zhag bdun nam dgu'i
370a7(rgyud): gong nas kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya'o// lus kyi rnam pa la rma bya'i sgo lnga btsugs te shes rab can gyis bya'o// klu'i sman sna tshogs pa dang 'jam pa'i 'bru bsres pa'i bye ma mngar ba'i rus sbrus
370b1(rgyud): te ri lu sha tug gi 'bru tsam brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// klu sngan rnam pa tha dad pa'ang blugs te dkar gsum la sogs pa dang ldan par bya'o// de nas thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/ klu yi rgyal po'/
370b2(rgyud): dang bcas// dga' dang gus pas spyan 'dren gyis// brtse zhing gdungs pas tshur shog cig/ dga' zhing gus pas mngan mi sems// kun kyang brtse bas tshur shog cig/ ces bka' stsal
370b3(rgyud): pas de dag kun gyi dbang po kun kyang shin tu dngangs par gyur nas sha rid la sbrang ma 'dus pa lta bu ste/ kun kyang dga' ba'i mdangs dang chas nas gang na ba der 'khod do// sngags bka' stsal
370b4(rgyud): pa nA ga rA dza sa ma ya swA hA/ zhes bka' stsal pas/ kun kyang tshim par gyur to// de dag kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig gis dam tshig gi rim pa phul ba/ dpa' bo chen po khre bo'i bdag
370b5(rgyud): khyod kyi bka' las 'das gyur na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // dum bu ra gas nas rul bar shog/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa TA tsa nA/ bi tsa Ta/ sha tha sha tha/ swa tsa rA tsi te swA hA/ zhes gsol
370b6(rgyud): to dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gdug pa can bka' la btags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang po chen pos gsol pa
370b7(rgyud): kye rdo rje khro bo dag dregs pa can 'di dag shin tu ma rungs par gyur na/ la la dag ni rus pa chag cing grugs/ la la dag ni tshe'i 'du byed mtha' la gtugs su nye/ la la dag ni nam mkha' lding dngu'i
371a1(rgyud): gtsug tor na gnas pas len pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir/ la la dag ni khrag pa skams/ la ya dag ni sen mo dang yan lhag chag ga la la dag ni gaN+DI mug gi gAnyid log/
371a2(rgyud): pas byang chub kyi snying po mi shes/ la la dag ni rtsa dang rgyus pa chad de nang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdungs/ la la dag ni lus kun tsha ba'i nad kyis nyam thag/ la la dag ni rtsi shing ming yang mi
371a3(rgyud): grag/ la la ngag ni nyon mongs pa rgyas te sngon sems bskyed pa rjes su mi dran/ la la ngag ni sems bskyed pa rjes su dran yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mi mthong / la la dag ni yi dgas kyi kham
371a4(rgyud): lha bu ste kha zas kyi skal ba dang mi ldan na/ 'di dag gso ba'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pa las/ lha'i dbang po dag dbang po'i lag pas ni lag pa chud pa sos par 'gyur ro//
371a5(rgyud): chu srin sder mos ni sen mo chag pa sos par 'gyur ro// na ga ge sar gyis ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// na ga puSh+pas ni klu'i gnas me tog gi nags tshal du 'gyur ro//
371a6(rgyud): gu gul gyi dri chen pos ni de ma yin pa thams cad bsregs nas/ klu'i sna la bsnams pa tsam gyis sngon byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dran par 'gyur ro// 'bras yos kyis ni klu'i nad thams
371a7(rgyud): cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thang ka bya rgyus pu shel gyis ni rtsa rgyus chad pa sos par 'gyur ro// ga pur gyis ni rtsa ba'i nad sos nas lus kyi bcud kun tshim par byed do// dar le brgan
371b1(rgyud): gyis ni kA ru Nas 'jigs pa las skyob par byed do// me tshan dang / bye tshan dang / gcer bu dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / sa g.yo ba dang / gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis gnas 'gul ba dang /
371b2(rgyud): phur bus 'debs pa las thar par byed do// mtshal gyis khrag bskams pa sos par byed do// dung gis rus pa chags pa sos par byed do// ras skud dmar pos ni srog 'gags pa
371b3(rgyud): tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par byed do// dkar dang mngar gyis zhal zas ro mchog brgya dang ldan par byed do// de dag kun kyang rin po che'i bum pa 'am/ kham por lta bu mchu lnga par blugs
371b4(rgyud): nas sbas na gang nyams pa de sos par 'gyur ro// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ klu gso ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas lha'i dang
371b5(rgyud): pos gsol pa/ kye rdo rje khro bo chen po/ 'di dag bsdigs na ji ltar bsdigs// grags dag gcad pa ji lta bu// brlag par bya ba ji lta bu// rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa// nyon
371b6(rgyud): dbang po rnam par rgyal// bsdigs par bya ba 'di dag go/ shin tu khros bcas mgo bstan la// mkha' lding kA ru sprul par bya// rdo rje khro bo tshol pa gdon// phyogs bcur rdo rje spro bar/
371b7(rgyud): byang hUM dz+dza dz+dza/ badz+ra tsatA mo sAHnA ga praH prab/ hUM nA ga nA shas paT/ ces bka' stsal pas dregs pa can de dag lus la ga cad gtubs kyi sdug bsngal byung gis dogs te/ 'phral/
372a1(rgyud): nyid du gdug pa can de dag shin tu phreng bar gyur te bka' bzhin du nyan no// shin tu 'jigs spangs nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes gzigs su gsol zhes bka'/
372a2(rgyud): nyan no// de nas gags gcad par 'dod na bsreg bzhin las bya'o// gang na ba der cha bskams la// nag po dri dang ldan par byug/ zur gsum sum brtsegs zur du ngarko// kha khyer thams
372a3(rgyud): cad rdo rje gnag/ dbus su gzhal las rgya gram bri// se skyer gdug pa'i shing dag la// zur gsum khru do'i tshad du rtsig/ logs la rak+ta tshar tshar gtang // tsher can nag po zur gsum shAg/
372a4(rgyud): brag nag skyes pa'i tshe nag shug/ sor ni bdun bdun tshad du bya// ma du zur gsum sor gsum tshad// 'dru chen nag po nag lhar sbyar// ming bya sbyin sreg rab tu spar// brgya rtsa brgyud de nyi shu gcig/
372a5(rgyud): dmigs pa che ge'i ling ga ni// dri ma khu chu khrag dag dang // swa dang rkang rjes gos la sogs// tshegs par sogs la a mo ke/ de la dzaHhUM bai cos dgug/ yi dgas gang gnas mtshon pa bla/
372a6(rgyud): sbrul gdug dmigs pa'i gzugs su bya// gnon par byed pa mtshon byas dzA// snying khar bris la gan kyal mdun// rdzun drab gdab dgas bskor bcas dbul// mA ra la dang bcas pa'o//
372a7(rgyud): nag po'i chas 'go re stan sa// stong g.yogs sngon po pu rung gnag/ g.yang ga ni srid pa'i spyi blugs pago// dgang drugs mchog chen gapar bus bya// kham skyong bur gsum rdzas rnams bsag/
372b1(rgyud): mchod spyon nga dang mgon byed la'o// me yi lha yang nga nyid do// mA ra ya phaT/ suM b+hA ni suM b+hA hUM/ sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba la// nga yi gdung du bsgrub par bya// nang du dgra bo'i brda yang gzhug/
372b2(rgyud): s+ya yang sing ldeng phur bus gzung // mtshams kyang sA lnga'i tshon gyis dbye// de nas de la dmigs pas so// oM badz+ra tsat+ta sA b+hA ba d+harmA d+hA tu a/ oM bidz+ra rat+na pany+tsatraM/ oM badz+ra sa mr-i tA dA Ni swAh+mA/
372b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra A ko Ta ya mud ga ra badz+ra ha na ha na hUM/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da badz+ra b+ha ba ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ oM badz+ra a mr-i te A yu She swA hA/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ bruM ska ni ska/ oM dar+tha/
372b4(rgyud): d+harbA te swA hA/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da pra ma ta na ye swA hA/ tsaN+Da puSh+pe swA hA/ dag pa chen po bde ba'i mchog/ ye shes rdo rje tho bas brdung // de las byin brlabs de la blugs// ye shes tho bas nyon mongs
372b5(rgyud): brdung // dmigs pa dzaHdmar ngag gis dgug/ ma gtun rdo rje rgya gram nyid// gnas nyid lha yi gzhal yas khang // thams cad lha yin bza' ldan// de gzhug bdud dang nyon mongs mnan//
372b6(rgyud): nga nyid du yang gyur par bsam// tsaN+Da puSh+pa ye swA hA/ mtshan dang dpe byad rgyun mi 'chad// dang por sbyor bas mched par bya// ba yis bkru bya spos kyis byug/ shin tu gtsang ma dag gis phyi/
372b7(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa can tshar gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/
373a1(rgyud): gnod 'dul khro bo'i rgyul// dregs pa bsrung ba'i thabs ni gang // bsrung thabs rnam pa du dang ldan// gnod 'dul chen pos bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig dbang ngo //
373a2(rgyud): kun gyi bdag/ sngags rdzas ting 'dzin sus bzhi// dngos te dgongs pa thams cad byed// rdo rje brag dang rin chen tshul// dug dang me bzhin mtshon cha 'dra// dus min 'chi las rab tu bzlog/
373a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu dang ldan// de 'chang dngos grub mchog chen 'thob// dal du kun tu zhugs dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras su dgongs// gang zhig gsang sngags 'di 'chang /
373a4(rgyud): ba/ kun gyis nga dang 'dra bar mthong // gang zhig gsang sngags 'di 'chang ba// nga nyid rgyun du de na gnas// 'jig rten du ni bde ba 'byung // 'das nas sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs//
373a5(rgyud): rtsibs bcu dbus dang bcu gcig la// yig 'bru khyabs bcas brda bri'o// chu 'khyags dag la yungs kar ro// gru char la ni sa zhag mo// gzhan la srad bu sngon po la// mdud pa re la re re'o//
373a6(rgyud): chu 'am yid ni rang la'o// sha ri raM dang mi g+ha ta// gser dang rma bya grum pa'i spu// bal tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la// tsakra bris la mgul dang gtsug/ mo g.yon po g.yas bsrung bar bya// chus ni yams
373a7(rgyud): dang dug las thar// maMs dri dang rak+Sha dang // khu ba chu dag sbyar ram bza'// sangs rgyas lnga 'i dngos grub ste// kun gyis spyad par bya ba yin// mdze dang rlung gi gnod pa sel// tshe ring lus kyang rgyas pa/
373b1(rgyud): rang / byang chub dkar dmar mngangs dang ldan// yams dang mi gtsang dngos po sel// dri li ru yi yon tan ni// klung rkang po log grang ba sel// shin tu zab ste gsang ba'i mchog/ sbrul ldan
373b2(rgyud): rtogs pa rnams kyis spyad pa las// skal med blo dman+da rnams kyi ga la yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u sku
373b3(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can gdug pa can gyi dug bsal ba'i mtshan nyid dang
373b4(rgyud): zhugs sa bstan du gsol/ nyon cig dbang po chen po legs par rab tu yid la zung zhig/ mtshan nyid rnams ni 'di lta ste// rus pa sha dang pags pa dang // rtsa dang khrag dang nang
373b5(rgyud): khrol lo// bcud dang chus te lus kyi stobs// lus kyi rtsi dang mdog dang dbyibs// reg pa chu dang chu ser dang // klad pa lbu ba lus kun la// zhugs sa rnams ni bco brgyad de// 'on kyang
373b6(rgyud): gcig sogs grangs kyis brtag/ rus pa la zhugs pa ni lus skems pa dang / zug gzer che ba dang / na thang nge ba dang / thig ler na ba'o// sha la zhugs pa ni lus bems se 'dug pa dang /
373b7(rgyud): lus lci se 'dug pa dang / mdog gnag pa dang / dri ma ngan pa sngar 'ong ba dang / sha ro 'byung ba'o// pags pa la zhugs pa ni sha 'phrig pa dang mdog skya ba'o// rtsal zhugs pa ni lus spring /
374a1(rgyud): ber ba dang / rtags de ni bzlog dka' ba'o// sbrid lug pa dang / sbrid lci ba dang / tsha ba 'dzag dang tsha rab pa// tsha ker ba dang tsha phreng ba// lus la sogs pa tsha thang ba
374a2(rgyud): tsha pir ba dang yan lag pra// khrag la zhugs pa ni/ sna nas khrag kyang skabs su 'dzag/ cha ber ba dang lci lor ba// gdong pa rtag tu dmar ba dang // 'o ma'i spris ma ltar 'ong ngo // nang khrol
374a3(rgyud): la zhugs pa ni/ glo snying mi bde byug ting ngo // snying 'dir snying yang mi dga' ste// de nas bzlog par dka' ba'o// bcud la zhugs pa la bzhi ste/ sa don mi 'byung / dbang po mi ljang / khung ts+tsha
374a4(rgyud): ma'i mdog tu 'ong / khu ba dngas snyigs phye nas 'ong // chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste/ sbubs kyi chu rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'ong / sna chu rtag tu skya bor 'ong // mig gi chu yang rtag par 'dzag/ du ba ser
374a5(rgyud): bu byung tsam gyis// gzhan pas rab tu myur bar 'dzag/ lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa ni// sgyid lug pa dang sbyi zhum pa// lus kyi rgyu ba nyal nyal 'ong // lus kyi rtsi la zhugs pa ni/ so rtsi la sogs
374a6(rgyud): te lus kyi dri bya'i pags pa bzhin sang gis 'gro ba'o// mdog la zhugs pa ni/ lce ni btsod kyi mdog bzhin 'ong // dbyibs la zhugs pa ni/ lus kyang gnyer chung dag gis khengs// sor mo byi ba'i/
374a7(rgyud): mjug ma 'dra// reg pa la zhugs pa ni/ sna rtse la sogs lag rtse rnams// tsha lams cha ber lus brtse ba/ gala' bar 'ong ba dag yin no// chu ba la zhugs pa ni/ yan lag rengs shing na ba dang /
374b1(rgyud): 'bur ba dang grang sing sing // yan lag tshogs rnams khol ba'o// chu ser la zhugs pa ni chu ser la lnga ste/ ba khol ko la/ za tsag tsag/ tsha ldibs ldi bas/ lus la chu skangs yod pa'o// chu skrangs byung
374b2(rgyud): nas ring du mi lus la/ 'brum rjes sran ma 'dra'o// de ni bzlog par sla ba'o// klad pa la zhugs pa ni/ mgo bo phying phyid skrangs pa dang / 'thom dang bem me ba dag dang / sgra rnams nul gyis byi ba la sogs
374b3(rgyud): pa'o// lha ba la zhugs pa ni/ gdong pa tsha la ma lam 'ong ba dang / grang ser ser 'ong ba'o// de ni bzlog par sla ba'o// lus ring gdong yang thal skya'i mdog/ de ni bzlog par dka' ba'o// shin tu waM
374b4(rgyud): ba'i klu rnams ni/ rtags dang mi ldan thugs kyis 'ong // bzlog dka' rma tshogs mi 'tshe rtags mi ldan// bzlog sla gzhan yang yan lag phra ba dang // sbom dang thung dang rengs la sogs// klu'i mtshan nyid
374b5(rgyud): du shes par bya'o// rtags ni de dag 'ga' zhig ni// nad gzhi gzhan ma las kyang 'byung // 'ga' ni klu yi gdon ma yin// las las 'byung ba dag kyang yod// de dag gi ni mtshan nyid ni// mkhas pas so//
374b6(rgyud): sor shes par bya'o// nad gzhi las byung sman sogs dang // 'phrod pa'i zas ni phan pa yin// nang rnams gzhan ma yun mi rtag/ 'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// shes nas sbyar du brtson 'grus kyis//
374b7(rgyud): sna tshogs thabs la marmongs pas// bzlog pa'i las la 'bad par bya// chu yi thigs pa phra mo yis// dus su byung bas rdob 'bigs// gdug pa'i dbang can 'i ring yang // oM lo dang bral rtsi cig/
375a1(rgyud): sems// rgyun du rdzas bsgom bzlas brjod kyis// gdug pa'i nad las thar par nges// rtsol ba che la som nyi bral// khang bsams de las mi 'grub med// 'khor ba zhes pa'i
375a2(rgyud): phung po srog bcas la// mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur gyis// brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// zhes dpal gtum po chen pos gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mtshan
375a3(rgyud): nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus dag na/ gdug pa can gyi yi dgas rnams/
375a4(rgyud): dug rnams dbyung na ji ltar dbyung // mchod pa'i las rnams ji ltar bya// chos kun bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ mchod pa'i las
375a5(rgyud): dag byed 'dod na// gnyis dgon gtsug lag chu mig 'gram// mtshe'u lteng ka khron pa'i steng // dbyar zla gsum la gnas par bya// dbyibs legs ran mdzes byi dor bya// ba yi rnam lnga spos dang dri//
375a6(rgyud): thig le lnga dang ldan par bya// dbus su hUM bri gsal bar bya// oM pA po pheM pheM/ 'di dag gzhi las rdzogs par bskyed// klu ri rgyal po rgya mtsho ni// lus dkar rin chen sbrul mgo gsum// lag na rin
375a7(rgyud): chen sdong bu'o// klu 'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs// sbrul mgo gnyis pa kha dog ser// rin chen 'bar ba lag na'o// chu lha mgo lnga kha dog dmar// lag na pad+ma 'bar ba'o// klu rgyal shing la bur ka/
375b1(rgyud): lag na sprin phung kha dog ldang // rgyal dang rje dang bram ze dmangs// so so'i rigs kyi rgyal po ste// spra tshil zhi nye bag zan la// gzugs su yang ni mdzes par bya// sems can 'khor gyis bskor/
375b2(rgyud): bar bya// klu sman sna tshogs dkar dang dmar// tshogs par byas la mchod sbyin bya// kham por sbu gumachu lnga par// blugs la kha bcad gnas su sba// gso bar bya ba'i las ni rab// spyan
375b3(rgyud): drangs gdan dang phyag skyabs bstod// smon lam la sogs rgya cher bya// bden pa bdar zhing bsdigs par bya// dug rnams dbyung ba'i las dag ni// raM yaM khaM las byung ba yi// 'khor lo rnam
375b4(rgyud): gsum me rlung chu// sreg gtor bkru bya stong nyid kyis// 'khor lo chen po gnas par bya// hUM las gyur par ldan par bya// bzang skyob pa dang dogs nyes dang // mnyam dang ldan pas mchod
375b5(rgyud): pa bya/ de nang de bzhengs mtshan nas brjod// nya stong dus mchod sri zhus bskor// des ni don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dug dbyung zhing mchod pa
375b6(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thamacad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ dus ngan tha mar gyur pa'i tshe// sdig la mi 'dzen mi dge spyod/
375b7(rgyud): mtshams med byed cing chos dkor 'jig/ mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang // bskams dang zha grum gzhogs phyed na// de'i tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung // nyon cig dbang po 'khor gyi mchog/ log sred gdul
376a1(rgyud): dka' gdol pa can// zhi bas mi 'dul gang zag gi/ gshed du 'khor lo 'di bskos so// kro d+ha rA dza'i gzungs bcas la// rdo rje rgya gram mtha' bskor rdo rje'ir// btsun
376a2(rgyud): 'grus bzhi ldan dbus dang lnga ru de'o// de las rgyas pa dag tu bskor 'dod na// de la khyad par khyams dang yi ge ni// bcu gcig ldan byas mtshon re'i ming rus gcar// khyams gcig hUM dang ming /
376a3(rgyud): rus mang na skrag/ dbus khyams sngags bri mang na de dag skrag/ gcig la rdo rje hUM bar mang na ga car// rkang pa mos ma shigs na po yi las// de ma byung na be mo skrag pa'i las// bsod nams can gyi
376a4(rgyud): skal bzang ma thul na// srid pa'i gtong bzlog 'khor lo dkrugs te bskor// ro ras bri bya khA kha hu lu'i sgro// sbu gu byas la gdan nag yig sden bri// dri dgod shing bsregs bong khrag bong dug
376a5(rgyud): sbyar// dbus dang btson khang bzhi por hUM bar gcad// dgos pa kun byed las rnams thams cad kyi// sngags 'a po dang mor bri bar du gsad// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ po dang mor
376a6(rgyud): bskor rabs chad po mor gzhug/ dbus kyi hUM btags srad bu tshangs bu dbyung // yak+Sha kha phaT phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya// rdo rje rab tu hUM bar de bar gzhag/ dug sna khrag snas ga'u nag por
376a7(rgyud): byug/ gu gul rgya tshil tshil chen ra lug spang ka ni// khu ba nag pos bya bar rab tu shis// bong dri nag po'i rngog ma dri rgod shi skra dang // yugs sa mo yi skra shad skud pas dkri// yugs sa mo yi dor
376b1(rgyud): rgyas zil la sra// pho mo'i thong pa steng 'og rgya bram bri// ri rab mnan byas mtha' gnyis dang po ngani// byang rim sngags bris steng du rgyu mam dgang // rgya zas 'og khung steng du khru do'i tshang // dang /
376b2(rgyud): rim bzhi la sngags 'di sku gsung thugs// nga yi ri rab dag tu mtshon phyir bri// oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha nAM/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da nA zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las
376b3(rgyud): drag po 'khor lo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// de'i tshe de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams kyang g.yos// rab tu g.yos so// 'jig rten gyi
376b4(rgyud): khams thams cad la la ni g.yas su 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so// la la ni g.yon du 'khor ba'i tshul gyis 'khrugs so// la la ni bla 'og dgye dgu'i tshul gyi 'khrugs so// la la ni
376b5(rgyud): mthon dman dang grum pa'i tshul gyis 'khrugs te/ de dag na gnas pa'i gdug pa can thams cad rab tu myos nas kha nas khrag ngan skyugs pa dag bskus te/ thams cad kyang gan ba der thad du
376b6(rgyud): 'dus nas phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu skad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma snga ba ma mthong khro ba dag 'jigs pa'i sku// rab tu grags pa ya mtshan e ma ho// thugs rjes dgongs
376b7(rgyud): shig bdag cag 'bangs su mchi// de las 'gal na dmyal bar lhung bar shog/ ces gsol zhing 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po skos kyi bdag po bdud bye ba 'bum phrag dang bcas pas//
377a1(rgyud): mgrin gcig gis srog gi snying po phul ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di banas su gsol/ oM nag po triT tri Ta tri li tra taha ke Na/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di/
377a2(rgyud): gang na gnas pa der bdud kyis 'gal bar mi bgyid do// gang yid la dgos pa de grub par bgyid do// phas byang sngags dang sbyor ba btang ba'ang phyir bzlog go// de nas gza' rgod chen po ra hu
377a3(rgyud): la 'khor gza' 'bum phrag dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ shu shu rak+Sha tshal pa/ kro d+hau kro le shwa ra/ ra hu la/ tsa ti tsa ti/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na
377a4(rgyud): gnas pa der gza' rnams kyis 'gal bar mi bgyid do// phas btang ba'ang slar de nyid la mchi'o// 'di 'dzin pa la ci 'tshal ba'ang stsol bar bgyid do// de nas dkar po dung gi thor tsugs can la
377a5(rgyud): sogs pa'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag dang bcas pa lhags nas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ pra ma Na pu Did Sha a ban+d+ha rA dzA/ d+ha nA rak+Sha tsit+ta pyang tsit+ta rA tsa phyung / rA dzA
377a6(rgyud): tsi gtubs/ bdag cag gi rig pa 'di gang na mchis pa der yul 'khor dang drapag tshad du 'gal bar mi 'gyed do// pas btang ba'ang de nyid la slar mchi'o// de nas btsan dmar po srog lan/
377a7(rgyud): btsan 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pas mgrin gcig gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ A bi shwa rA dzA trai la~M/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid de//
377b1(rgyud): pas btang bar gyur kyang slar de nyid la mchi'o// de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po sdigs pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu rung rtags srog gi snying po phul ga ya ma rAng lam ci
377b2(rgyud): bdag gi rig pa spyod pa der bdag gi gnod pa mi spobs lags te/ gnod pa'i rgyun spangs nas pas btang ba'ang slar de nyid la mchi'o// de nas ma mo'i rgyal mo mkha' dbyings kyi yum lnga dang /
377b3(rgyud): bdud kyi gshin rje'i sring mo srid pa'i phung byed re ba tri la sogs pa/ ma mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dag gis rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ rag mo mA mA ru lu snying kha rag sha bA la ma ma
377b4(rgyud): b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bdag cag gi gsang ba'i sngags 'di spyod pa der bsrung ba dang bskyab pa bgyid do// 'khor dang bcas te bka' bzhin bgyid do// phas btang ba'ang slar de nyid la mchi'o// de nas
377b5(rgyud): klu 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu rang rtags srog gi snying po phul ba/ nA ga rA dza nA ga ni/ gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po spyod pa der/ bdag klu'i gnod pa'i rgyun spong ngo // pas btang
377b6(rgyud): ba'ang slar de nyid la mchi'o zhes so so nas rang rtags srog gi snying po phul te dam bcas so// de nas dbang po chen pos khro bo'i bdag po chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// srid pa'i
377b7(rgyud): dbang po 'di rnams kun// 'khor los bzlog na ji ltar bzlog/ bzlog thabs khyad par bka' stsol cig/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po khyod// ma ra ya yi btsag dag las//
378a1(rgyud): so so'i man+t+ra 'khor bar bri// byang sngags phyir bzlog de la yang // sa ma ya dang bzlog btags so// mchu gsum snying lpags med pa'i thod pa dang // rony+dza sbrul shugs/
378a2(rgyud): pagazod rnal gri mo// dri rgod srung ka thod chen nang dag tu// rab tu drag tu bskor te 'khor lo gzhug/ 'od 'gro 'phrul srang rgya gram lam dag tu// a dong dru byas rgya sol mi kyi ra//
378a3(rgyud): khrag che khrag nag pos sbyangs la bsku// dbus bcug mtha' bskor mnan pa'i lus dag bya// yang na thun du sngags la khros pas 'phang // zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum
378a4(rgyud): po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pas srog gi snying po phul ba dang / mngon spyod drag po'i las kyis bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// de nas
378a5(rgyud): lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ k+She bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus dag na// thun gyis tshar gcad bstan du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ rdzas dang sngags bcas ting 'dzin
378a6(rgyud): gsum// khros pas zhe sdang bskyed par bya// zhe sdang dran pas gdug rdzas bsag/ yungs kar yungs nag ske che til// gze ma skyed bas pa'i tsher// rdzun sngags 'di bzlas brnags la
378a7(rgyud): thab las me ga ni gtor ma 'am// mtshan dan ka pA la ru gzhug/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Dam hA ro laN hU~M phaT/ mA ra ma thun pob/ dbang po la yang / srog la yang / tsiN+Da la yang / go ro tsan la yang /
378b1(rgyud): gzas pa'i mtshan smos rdo rje'i zlog tu dbag// gang dmigs gzas pa'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul rnams// bdag la bsdu byas rtog pa'i bag chags bkru// sngags 'dir rol cig brjod cing
378b2(rgyud): ba ling dkril// oM ba ling ta ba laM pU dza ar+g+haM pra tIn+ta hoHbadz+ra kro d+ha tsaH/ ba lau khA hi khA hi/ badz+ra kro d+ha tsat+ta ha ha ha/ he hi ha~M/ b+ha Ta swAhA/ sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang chu srin snying // sha rkyem drag
378b3(rgyud): chen longs spyod rnam pa kun// shes rab mchog gi phyag rgya cher bsams la// yaM gtor raM sreg khaM bkrus bdud rtsi'i mchog tu bsgyur// a mri ta dag sngags 'dis sbyang bar bya// oM AHhUM/
378b4(rgyud): sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ badz+ra a mr-i ta/ hUM hri thA/ oM ma hA rak+Sha dz+wa la raM khaM/ khA hi khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ hA hA hA/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa
378b5(rgyud): kun 'phyogs bcu'i zhing khams gang bar rab dmigs la// skye med dang bas nyin mtshan brtson par bya// mi dmigs mnyam gzhag ye shes rab ldan pa/ sku gsung dus gsum sangs rgyas
378b6(rgyud): thams cad dang // sems dpa' sems ma khri bo khro ma'i tshogs// mchod pa chen po de mnyes sbyin bya'i sems can tshim// zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum pa thugs gsang ba'i rgyud
378b7(rgyud): las thun drag mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po la sogs te/ ri rab dang bar snang la sogs pa la gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis
379a1(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / rkyen sna tshogs pa dang / bdug spos dang / sil snyan dang
379a2(rgyud): byug pa dang / sgra sna tshogs pa dang / spos sna tshogs pa thogs nas lpags so// 'jig rten pa de dag kyang rang rang gi mchod pa sna tshogs pa thogs nas lpags te/ zhes dang gus pa byas
379a3(rgyud): thams cad kyang mgrin gcig gi nga ros gsol pa/ dro rgyal sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang // dkar chab mngar che ba spos kyi cha ba// sman chang bdud rtsi'i chab la sogs// khyod kyi sku la khrus
379a4(rgyud): cha ba gsol// a ha ra hUM/ ga pur bzang drug sman gyi dri// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ glu rtsi spos kyi dri la sogs// 'gag pa med pa shangs la 'dul// d+hU pa pU dza me b+ha hUM/ rin chen lnga yi me tog
379a5(rgyud): dang / chu las skyes dang thang las skyes// yid kyis sprul pa'i me tog rnams// rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbul 'bul// puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha hUM/ 'bru yi mar me rtsi yi mar// 'dam du snang gsal rin chen sgon/
379a6(rgyud): spobs pa bcu da len sgron ma rnams// khro bo gtum po'i spyan la 'bul// A lo ke pU dza me g+ha hUM/ rnam lnga'i spos dang sman lngar sbyar// ra sa ya dang a mr-i ta// rdo rje 'dzin la dri mchog 'bul//
379a7(rgyud): gan N+ye pU dza me g+ha hUM/ ri mchog brgya ldan bdud rtsi mchog/ bde bar bzhes te dgyes par dgongs// a mr-i tA b+ha ta hUM/ kun tu grags pa'i sgra rnams ma lus dang // dam chos sgra slog sil snyan/
379b1(rgyud): 'bul// s+pha ra Na khaM zhes mgrin gcig gis gsol nas de nyid du spro ba'i tshul gyis gnas par gyur to// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i 'khor dag gis
379b2(rgyud): sri zhu dang gus pas mchod pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdo rje khro bo des dregs pa'i 'khor de dag la dam tshig chad du spyad pa 'di bka' stsal to// mi
379b3(rgyud): gnas mtha' las 'das pa sems nyid mchog/ sna tshogs cho 'phrul 'byung bas kun gyi gzhi// ma bcos rang bzhin rkyen gyis byas pa med// de la gnas na rang dam bsrungs pa yin// de bzhin
379b4(rgyud): gyur kyang 'od 'gyed ched du blang // nor bu 'bar ba ma mthong ston pa dang // thugs rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyis gdung ba'i nad sel ba// bdud rtsi lta bu'i tshig gis tshim byed pa// kun gzhi'i
379b5(rgyud): yul du nus pa'i dbang ngogs shing // thugs rjes skyob par mdzad pa'i mgon po de// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun pas mnyan pa ste// snying bzhin skyo med rmi lam nang du bsgyur// ngag gi rdo rje
379b6(rgyud): chu bo'i rgyun bzhin drang // skyo med nyin mtshan dus su brtson par bya// rdo rje phrag par mi gseng bsdams la drang // brdzun med tshig gis dam pa de la bstod// bshad pa'i dbang rnams rab tu ma
379b7(rgyud): bstan na// rdo rje'i lce la bdud rtsi 'dzag gyur kyang // gzhan la zer thigs 'ga' yang spro mi bya// gsang 'os gnyer gtad sngags dang mtshan rnams gsang // dus gsum 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku mchod de//
380a1(rgyud): na dang 'chi sogs las kyi rnam smin gang // sdug bsngal mi bzang nyam thag ci byung yang // lhag par dran pas bskyed de rjes su gzung // 'gro nyal 'dugar spyod lam rnam pa bzhir//
380a2(rgyud): mi brjed shes rab dag gis rjes su gzung // slob dpon mtshang dang gsang tshig yi dam lha// srog gi phyir yang rtag tu mi spang ngo // bzhi pa de bzhin de la de mi sems// dran pas rjes su de la gzung
380a3(rgyud): bar bya// sdig chu rgyun bzhin brtul zhugs bya ba bskyed// de las 'gal ba'i brtul zhugs spyad// rdol ning zag 'gyur dug can smad pa'i snod// mu tig bdud rtsi der mi blugs// thabs kyi spyod/
380a4(rgyud): pas dbye bar bya// dpag tshad kun tu rnam par spang // de dag 'gal na rdo rje dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal chu bo rag cing bzod dka' bar// dus gsum rnams dang nga yis brjod mi nus// gzhan nas
380a5(rgyud): gzhan 'phang thar du med// ma nyams rgal dkar gdon mi za// nga dang dus gsum kun kyang de la dgongs// gang la dmigs pa'i 'bras bu tshud mi za// phyogs skyong rnams kyis dam skyong de la srung /
380a6(rgyud): zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sa ma ya bkod pa'i le'u ste ba nu dgu pa'o// de nas 'khor de dag la ched du brjod pa ni brjod do//
380a7(rgyud): nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kum// don dam dbyer med phyogs ma kun dang bral// mi len mi gnas mi spong mi 'gog cing // rang bzhin gnas pa deng 'chos su med// rtog pa'i gnas min phra 'i
380b1(rgyud): spyod yul min// dngos por mi gnas mtshan ma kun dang bral// sgro dang skur pas de la dpag mi dpog/ stong pa ma yin tha snyad de las 'das// mi gnas mi rtog rkyen gyis bskyed pa med// dngos bral/
380b2(rgyud): kun gyi mtha' 'das brjod du med// 'di zhes nges pa de la mtshon du med// dus gsum bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yab yum shul dang kun gyi dngos po yin// sems can 'jig rten
380b3(rgyud): khams kyi rang bzhin dang // bud+d+ha 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin kun// gcig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis de las med// gang yang ma 'gags gcig tu nges pa med// tha snyad brjod bral sangs/
380b4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dngos// de ltar grol ba rnal 'byor mchog gi lam// phra ba'i sgo mo rnams kyis rjes dpag dka'// de la spro dang bsdu ba'i dbang po med// gzugs dang kha dog rnam pa gang du yang //
380b5(rgyud): de nyid ma grub de la gnyen po med// 'byung ba chen po nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// khu rlangs 'ja' tshon na bun sprin la sogs// zan drag lhags rlung la sogs gang byung yang // nam mkha' chen po/
380b6(rgyud): de la g.yo ba med// dang po byung yang de yi ngang las byung // tha mar zhi yang de yi ngang du zhi// de dag de yi nang du 'ub kyis chub// yangs so che 'o nam mkha'i khog par gnas// khams gsum sems
380b7(rgyud): can dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// don dmang yi rang bzhin nga nyid yin// kun kyang dge dang sdig sogs gang byas kyang // rang byung 'phrul ldan de la 'phel 'grib med// rang byung ye shes rgyu rkyen
381a1(rgyud): dngos po med// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis shes rtog gi bu// de la dbye dang ming dang yig tshogs med// ces gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i//
381a2(rgyud): rgyud las/ gzhi byang chub snying po'i rgyu'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas dregs pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas mgrin gcig gis 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis
381a3(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa che// rdo rje sku ste che ba po// mi shes dri ma kun 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun
381a4(rgyud): pas sngar sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus rnams tha dad rnam sprul cing // lus dman pa dag 'jigs par mdzad// lus kyi nges don
381a5(rgyud): gting dpag dka'// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba// 'bar ba'i 'od kyis sdang ba 'joms// rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba// rdo rje'i mtshon chen phyag 'tshal bstod/
381a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje ye shes che// zhal gyi rdo rje snang ba 'bigs// rdo rje mche brnob me// che ba rgya mtsho gsung chen bstod// rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che// thugs nyid sangs rgyas rang byung ba// rdo rje che bathugs kyi mchog/
381a7(rgyud): rdorje rnal 'byor thugs chen bstod// 'jigs byed drag po nag po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed sdang byed pa// sgrub dka' sgrub legs yon tan che// yon tan rdo rje mchog legs bstod// rdo rje khro bo drag po
381b1(rgyud): rme ha la ha la nag po che// rtogs pa'i dus ngan rnam par sbyong // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mngon par bstod do// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor
381b2(rgyud): gyis mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rdo rje khro bo khyod// dus ngan bstan pa mi gnas /
381b3(rgyud): 'jig rten khams su chu 'khyags dbab pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dbang po chen po// 'jig rten phung bar bya na nA ga'i chu 'khyags dbab// gsang ba'i
381b4(rgyud): las rab 'di ni rab tu gnag/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da/ ki li ki li/ tsaN+Da mo ra tsi na/ tsaN+Da tsaN+De/ nA ga ban+d+ha ya phaT/ swA hA/ sor brgyad seng ldeng phur bu gu gul
381b5(rgyud): dang 'tshil chen sme khrag byug cing bdug/ rtsa gzir sngags ga sham gdags pa bca'// thog ma'i gong nas grangs med bzlas pa'i mchog/ klu gnas btab na khyung gis mi thar 'ching // phyogs
381b6(rgyud): btab ldog 'gyur zhing btab bu srin za// ldum ra rta bres gnag ra ra lug gnas// btab nas mi skye ri sIl chu yang ldog/ phal pa'i grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang sgor btab na// phal pa'i grong 'jig rgyal
381b7(rgyud): po'i 'khor gyi mi// 'byer zhing nad kyis thebs 'gyur phyung na thar// nA ga'i gnas btab thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur// nag po gnas su song la las 'di bya// byang bltas chu mig rngom dngangam
382a1(rgyud): skyibs gnag/ mgon rngonag dregs pa chags pa yod// gnas der e nag 'dom bzhi rtse mo lho// dkar nag rdo ba glang dmar ra skyed bya// skam po dum bzhir phyi rol khrag/
382a2(rgyud): tu gnag kar gyi mi yi rak+ta bskol bya ting 'dzin bsam// kA ru'i sprul pa mang po shin tu gces// dkar nag dud pas dran pa skyed dbang du bsdu// de nas khyung bskul ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs
382a3(rgyud): so hri dpag bsam shing las bzhengs pa'i kA ru Na// ye shes gshog pa gser gyi mig/ rdo rje'i mchu sder thogs med lcags kyu can// ri rab rtse nas rgya mtsho'i gting du sle ba// klu rgyal
382a4(rgyud): gdan du 'dings shing klu phrug zas su za// klu rnams bka' la sa ma 'da' chu 'khyags pho ba// brjid gnon man+t+ra mu tras zil gyis mnan// nA ga ra dza puta ta/ stong bzlas ga sham sgrol
382a5(rgyud): ban+d+ha chu mig brda ba// klu gzugs sbrul mgo bdun sngon skyed kar tshig ste gzhag/ mgo la khrag byung 'di nyid rtsa brgyad bzlas// nA ga nA ga la khrag nad mgo la phob// nA ga mgo la khrag thun
382a6(rgyud): rbad/ rtsa brgyad brjod cing thab bya khrag lhag dang // thal 'jim b+han+ta chu mig nang du brdab// thog dang ser ba ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'ong // nA ga'i gzugs ni nag po gal chags che// mi gnas
382a7(rgyud): glog 'gyu kha nas khrag ser 'bab// de ltar bsams na klu 'khrug ser pa 'bebs// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten thog ser gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis
382b1(rgyud): pa'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang pos zhus pa/ mthar thug drag po'i las kyis ji ltar dbab// rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i sbyar thabs gang // snga gnas dus
382b2(rgyud): tshod mdzes pa gang la bgyi// bsrung ba'i go rims bcas pa ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa las/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig skal ldan lha dbang po// rdzas dang sngags bcas drag po'i
382b3(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di'o// mdze sha mdze tshil thod pa tshil chen du do// gzho ba rnams blugs te smra ba'i me dang sprad// yugs sa'i zhabs gril khar nag bcing byas la// chu mig 'gram sar seng ldeng pur
382b4(rgyud): ba bdang // ston zla ra 'bring gza' rgod rgyu dus gtad// skya rengs shar dang nyin phyed nyal gtad// rdzas mchog ma phyung chu 'khyags nyin re 'bab// de nas klu rnams kun gyi gnyen po rak+ta tsa mun Ni
382b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'dis bskul bka' stsal to// hUM sku ni gnam lcags 'bar ba la// dmar ser me yi ral pa can// khams gsum srid gsum khan khyer// srid pa gsum ni ljon 'phyo// ya mkhal
382b6(rgyud): gnam la mamakhal sa// nyi ma'i sman dang spyan nas 'char// zla ba'i sbyin tang zhal nas 'char// ri rab rtse dgu phyag na bsnams// mi bzad 'bur ma gtum chen mo// phyagan rdo rje'i bka' nyanam// 'dus
382b7(rgyud): nga'i gnyen po klu 'dul ma// thugs ras kru bo ban+d+ha 'dren// zas su klu ye sha la ba// klu yi gnas rig dbang du sdud// sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM nA gzhung thung dz+wal dz+wa la ts+tshin rje/ b+hin byin+da/ @#
383a1(rgyud): s+yAt+tha ra las kyi go cha drug ni rab tu gces/ log gnon gyi sngags bka' stsal pa/ nAg ye dus pa la/ ma dom de bku ru dzA dzA/ dza d+d+hod+d+ho/ 'khor lo tshul du lus la'o zhes
383a2(rgyud): gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mthar thug drag po'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas 'khor de dag gis zhus pa/ bcom
383a3(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid kyi mtshams bcad ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang / bka' stsal pa/ 'dul ba'i tshogs nyon cig/ nga'i rang bzhin ni dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs par rtogs par/
383a4(rgyud): byos shig/ nga'i rang bzhin ni skye ba med par rtogs par byos shig/ nga'i rang bzhin ni 'gag pa med par rtogs par byos shig/ nga'i rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid du rtogs par byos shig/ nga gang yin pa
383a5(rgyud): de ni gsang ba'i bdag po'o// nga gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpar rtogs par byos shig/ nga gang yin pa de ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar rtogs par byos shig/ nga gang yin pa de ni gtum po
383a6(rgyud): chen po nyid du rtogs par byos shig/ nga gang yin pa de ni chos so// chos kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes dga' 'o// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs
383a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a ba yu ga ta'i zhal snga nas zhus nas/ nged kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi brtson
383b1(rgyud): 'grus kyis bsgyur nga rdzogs so// rtsa gar skad du/ shrI badz+ranaH miH bur+b+ha tan+t+ra ung+gar/ bod nad du/ dpal rdo rjegatu po drugs pas /
383b2(rgyud): ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bstan pa dam pa'i dbang
383b3(rgyud): ji lta ba'i gsangang dam pa mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang lus ma hA tsaN+Da kro d+hi hUM zhes gsungs pas/ g.yon du khro mo gtum chen mo// mthing
383b4(rgyud): nag chen mo 'jigs tshul can// dadu sgra kham pa gyen brdzes ma// spyan dmar sdang mig bgrad pa'i tshul// mche gtsigs khro gnyer spyan gsum ma// phyag g.yas dril 'dzin gtso la 'khyud// g.yon
383b5(rgyud): pathod khrag gcol steb// zhabs gnyis gco la dgyes tshul 'khrol// hi hi dgyes dang ha la'i sgras// thams cad g.yo zhing rlag par byed// dur khrod rgyan ldan ma dpung nang // srul 'khril
383b6(rgyud): ba'i tshul du bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pas// nyid kyi mkha' la hUM oM ldan// nor bu dang ni rdo rjer ldan// rdo rje'i rtse mo'i srub mar phaT
383b7(rgyud): yum gyi gsang bar pa tra ldan// pad+ma dang ni ze 'brur ldan// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las// yum rnam par 'phrul pa dang mkha' gsang
384a1(rgyud): rab tu ldan pa'i le'u rtse dang po'o// de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bde rdzogs gang lags bshad du gsol zhes
384a2(rgyud): zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das bde rdzogs chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor lo bde rdzogs zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po mchog/ bde skyong
384a3(rgyud): 'khor lo sum cu gnyis// dung dang kun da lha bur gnas// mi shigs hUM ni kha dog bltas// mgrin chen longs spyod 'dab bcu drug/ dbus na gser zhun lha bu maM// ya ba ra la sogs pa kha dog
384a4(rgyud): bzhi phyogs bzhi 'dab ma bzhin gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad de// hUM muM dbus te phyogs mtshams na// oM kro d+hi ha maM laM paM taM/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu bzhi// dbus na oM dkar/
384a5(rgyud): de bzhin du'o// me yi 'khor lo gru gsum re// rlung ni gzhu 'dra ba ngan can// dza nya phaT dang re ldan pa'o// dbab dang bskyil ba'i sbyor ba yis// shin tu snod ldan dam pa la// srin 'theb lces blang
384a6(rgyud): dbugs kyis drang // byin brlabs byas pa'i shes rab ma// rang lus thabs ldan gtad pa dang // bde ba dang ni bde ba che// shin tu bde chen bde mchog yin// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang
384a7(rgyud): ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'khor lo bde rdzogs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can don du byin rlabs mthu/
384b1(rgyud): sngags kyi mthu rnams bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po sngon chad ngal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin par dbang bskur te/ da ltar/
384b2(rgyud): ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// 'di ni klu thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o// nyi ma sa sA la naM/ nA ga kun ni/ tsit+ta mu ling ni/ bzlog byer/ nA ga shig/ nA ka bzlog/ nA gle byer/ nAg
384b3(rgyud): da ha da ha mA ra ya phaT/ nA ga hA na ha na/ mA ra ya phaT/ gsang ba gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa'i// sngags des klu rnams rlag par byed// rdzas su bstan pa 'di lta ste// rtsa ba dang ni skyobs su
384b4(rgyud): bcas// lce pog nag po rgya tshil dang // mgo gnyis I dra ma g+ha d+ha// sa yi dri dang rnam lnga'o// gdug pa thams cad 'jil bar byed// shu dag tshil chen rwa gzho ba dang // dri chen dri chu rma bya'i
384b5(rgyud): mdongs// byug dang bdug par bya ba'o// mu zi gla rtsi dri chen dang // zhun chen dri chu sbyar ba rnams// lhor gtang gdon rnams rang zhir 'gyur// 'dis ni rang nyid srung bar byed// nA ga sha ti/
384b6(rgyud): dun jibs// nA ga tsit+ta na~M/ nA ga ni ra rdud/ shAn ting sha du rtsubs// nA ga u ro log sham+b+has/ nA ga dun dun/ gyen gyen/ nA ga sha ti la ya/ tshungs tshungs du sha rdud/ dpal rdo rje gtum
384b7(rgyud): po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi mi las/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'ching bar
385a1(rgyud): byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'jig rten 'ching byed kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM e ka ya ma/ he ka ya ma/ hri ma ya ma/ sa rtsa tsit+ta gzir thum big
385a2(rgyud): zhes gsungs ma thag tu srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa la thug pa yan chad / sems rnam par myogs te/ lus ri mo bzhin du g.yo ba med par bcings par gyur to// de nas dpung
385a3(rgyud): rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dpung zlog byed kyi gsang sngags gsungs pa/ oM e ka ya ma he dun rag sha he dun/ hUM dzan+tu/ ya ma tsi te sha ma/
385a4(rgyud): sha dzU Sh+TaM ba ya naM d+h+r-i ka rbad/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'khrugs shing dregs pa can thams cad rdza mkhan gyis 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin gyur te myos par gyur to//
385a5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'jig rten bcing bzlog gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khyung rnam par spro ba zhes bya
385a6(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khyud las la gzud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ grang ti tig tig/ pra ta brag shi ta ta ya ta tsa le he du hUM phaT/ de nas yang
385a7(rgyud): hUM b+ha shig pa gsad pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs te/ rdo rje drag po thog 'bab ces bya ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mA ra Na song sod/ mA ra Na byid bying / mA raH
385b1(rgyud): rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na dun dun/ myogs myogs/ bying bying thum ri li li rbad dza dza/ nA ga la sogs sha trUM sbyar zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i
385b2(rgyud): rgyud phyi ma las/ gsad pa sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang lnga'i dbang pos gsol pa/ gdug pa can tshar gcad pa'i las khyad par can bka' stsal
385b3(rgyud): du zhes gsol pas/ kye bcom ldan 'das khyung sgrol byed gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nasarab tu gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM tad+ya thA/ oM Ta kiH/
385b4(rgyud): ti gu r+ya la/ b+hu li/ mi li sha sha b+hU g+h+ya/ shad ti/ be ri ti/ hUM ya hUM ya/ hUM tu ti swA hA/ 'bras dang so ba nas nag dang // a ru ra rnams zhi ba btags te// dgu dang bcu gcig bsgrub par
385b5(rgyud): byamakha' lding sgo nga sngags kyis bskor// 'gram du bzhag la bsgrub par bya// mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra NA bying bying / mA ra Na mugs mugs/ mA ra Na ha na ha na/ mA ra Na du na du na/ ha la ha la/
385b6(rgyud): myos myos/ bying bying / thum ri li li dza dza/ de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya// ba ling ta khA hi khA hi/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma hA rag si pa tau/ sa ma ya swA hA/ gsol ba gdab cing 'phrin las bcol/
385b7(rgyud): kla rtsi shing kun sha chen dang // lce po gnag po sha ri ra// byi gu stag gi sder mo rnams// ras su gtums nas lus la bcang // oM nyi mas sman/ g+hu ne zhi tsingata b+hu lin+da/ tsit+ta mu dra log byer/
386a1(rgyud): tsit+ta b+hA li nAM/ ya khwa nA ga bzlog/ nAg shig/ nA ga mgo la nAM Daha ba sa khri/ rtag tu snyom 'changs gtor mas mchod// zhi bas dug dbyung da kyang dgrol// rtsa ba'i
386a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru// nA ga'i gzugs bris dug can gzhag/ tshon skud sbrul bsgoms bcings pa de// spu gri 'bar bas gtubs shing dbye// ri rab chen po'i phyogs bzhin/
386a3(rgyud): dug bzhi las skyes rigs bzhi'i klu// sa chu me rlung dug bzhi'i bdag / bcings pa dgrol cing dug dbyung phyir// dug thub sgo la khyung bsam phyir// dug bya ba rang rang gnas su gtang //
386a4(rgyud): bden pa 'dar zhing ting 'dzin gsal// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud byi mA las/ rab tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas bcom
386a5(rgyud): ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bdud rtsi mchog bka' stsal pa/ rin chen bum pa tshad ldan la// dri yi rgyal po la sogs lngas/
386a6(rgyud): byugs la pog nag dud pas bdug/ rtsi ldan 'o ma 'bras dang nas// til dkar dang ni a ru ra// ba ru ra dang skyu ru ra// mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs dang // tsan dan la sogs drir sbyar
386a7(rgyud): ba'i chu dga' lcug ma 'o ma can// kha brgyan byas te mgul pa yang // dar ras sngon pos bcings byas la// maN+Dal gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag/ lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yi// gri lcags sru
386b1(rgyud): gur mchu btsugs te// dbugs mang shor bar rab tu bsnag gseng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad dang // sngags kyi mda' mchog la yang bsnag pa bum pa la sngags 'bum tshar re// 'thon nas
386b2(rgyud): snying rje'i yul la bkrug khong du btang na grol bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bdud rtsi bum khrus kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//
386b3(rgyud): de nas yang bdud rtsi bum pa khrol bu la sgrub pa gsungs pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po gtso// ting 'dzin gsang bar sgrub pa ni// dzA ti pa la nas sngon mo// 'bras dang so ba ma
386b4(rgyud): gi ta// ting 'dzin bzhu brtul byas te sgrub// de la rtags byung phye mar sgrub// byugs nas dri chus skyo mar sbyar// zhun chen sbyar te khong du gtang // bum pa'i chu la lcags sdug bsngag
386b5(rgyud): mchod dang ting 'dzin brtson par bya// bum chus khrus bya lde gus byug/ skyo ma zhun chen khong du gtang // dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bum pa khrol bu
386b6(rgyud): bye ma dang / lde gu dang / khong du gtang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po dag/ gdug pa'i
386b7(rgyud): dug la rnam mang yang // bsdus na rnam pa gnyis yod de// mngon sum dug dang rku dug ste// rkun thabs dug ni bzlog par dka'// gdug can nyon mongs gsum ldan te// gti mug che bas/
387a1(rgyud): byol song rigs// 'dod chags che bas dpral bar dka'// shin tu zhe sdang che bas kyang // dug ni rkun thabs dag tu gtong // de phyir slar yang ldog par byed// phrag
387a2(rgyud): dog che bas rang rten la// gzhan gyis gtses na gzhan la gnod// rkun thabs dug gi mtshan nyid kyang // thabs shing gdug pa'i dug klod kyang // bar bar skabs su ldang bar byed//
387a3(rgyud): de bzlog thabs ni shin tu'ang dka'// de yi bzlog thabs dam pa 'di// ngas bstan pa la the tshom du// gang zhig byed par gyur pa de// nam yang grub par mi 'gyur te// grub kyang yal bar gyur pa
387a4(rgyud): yin// de nas lha yi dbang po dag/ the tshom med par nges par byos// tsan dan dmar pos gtsor byas te// nag gi sar ma gi ta// rgya tshil rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang // phag rgod dag gi sha dag ste/
387a5(rgyud): yang na rgya tshil ma b+hi ta// pargod sha dang sbyar byas te// lcags snod nang du lcags kyis phur// 'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen byas nas// sgrub pas dkar gsum gzhan mi rten// 'o ma sol chus

387a7(rgyud): ta nyid 'ba' zhig byug/ thig le re la nyi shu gcig/ de ltar lo gcig bar du bya// gangs ril ni nyi ma bzhin// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i chung phyim las// rkun thabs kyi dug brjon/
387b1(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ kye ma khro bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gdug pa'i dug gi mtshan nyid gang // bzlob dang mi bzlog ji lta bu// khro
387b2(rgyud): bdag chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha yi dbang po dag/ bsnyen dang sgrub pa rtags dang gnod pa rtags// lcags zang
387b3(rgyud): mi dang gcer bu bum pa thogs// ba glang nya lcibs za ba dang // me chen 'bar dang zam pa 'dzugs// bskyed shing 'dzugs dang nyi ma shar// bzang ba'i rtags su shes par bya// nyi ma nub dang
387b4(rgyud): nam sros thur la babs// brtson du bzung nas mi theg khur bskur dang // sgrub pa gzhan gyi yul du 'gro ba ngan pa'i rtags// lung pa dang ni skam nas chu byung dang // nya sbrul sa rlung gsod dang
387b5(rgyud): 'tshed pa dang // ring dang skems pa de dag khri la 'dug/ gcer bu spyi bcings tshogs kyis sems can gsol ba mthong // 'jigs pa'i chu mig bskams dang rtag tu nor bu rgyud// sbrul sbrul zas

387b7(rgyud): lus la za// baglang ma he'i tshogs kyis brdungs nas 'dod pa dang // khyi spyang tshogs kyis gzugs dang 'dam du chud// 'bag seng bu chung la sogs ston pa ngan// gnod rtags gting ring grog
388a1(rgyud): po me shong byin dang slar mi thar// ri thAg dog mo lung ba lugs rdugs dang // lha khang gnas khang hrul por mi shong sgo la 'dzul nas slar mi 'jom// chu ngan mtsho dang lus
388a2(rgyud): nya sbrul sogs// phag pa pa glang ma he la sogs te// shin tu yid du mi 'ong gzugs mang ston// ri gzar mi thar pa dang ce spyang tshogs kyis 'dod// de dag gnod rtags lus kyi nyams myong yang //

388a6(rgyud): sha mthangs bar du sleb pa'i dug/ rtag tu snying yang mi dga' zhing // sha rtsa za zhing 'gul dang 'phrig/ rtag tu 'phrug snying 'dod pa dang // sha yang 'o ma'i spris ma bzhin// sha mdog me lce 'dra ba'o//
388a7(rgyud): skabs su sha mthangs par dag na// chu grang blugs pa snyam byed dang // shu ba ba lhags sha bkra'o// gdug pa dug gis sha la sleb pa ni// 'phrig 'gul sha sbrid ber ba lha// sha ni gnag cing dmar la
388b1(rgyud): bem 'du ba mig tu song bzhin// mig gi mtha' mchu yis gang // mig kyang zlum la smin ma grugs// sprin ma byi zhing mig kyang 'gul// sor mo rnams ni byi mjug 'dra// rtswa dang chu la zhugs pa
388b2(rgyud): nimilus la dri ma nga ba 'byung // chu bur dang ni chu skangs dang // de ni rtsa yi me tog yin// chu ser mdog ni du khu 'dra// chu ser ko rul mnam pa dang // ko ba rul pa'i dri mnam pa'i// chu ser/
388b3(rgyud): ngag ni 'byung ba yin// re snod mi bde blo yang 'degs// spyi yi mtshan nyid 'di dag dang // 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod// me 'od tsha ba 'dra ba 'ong // tsher ma zug pa 'dra ba 'ong // lus po

388b5(rgyud): chung ba 'byung // glang shu ba dang sha bkra 'byung // sha ro sbal mig 'dra ba 'byung // shwa sul thams cad 'gul 'phrig 'byung // dug gis rus par sle gyur na// phyi yi sha rnams kun bskams te/

389a3(rgyud): bya me 'od 'dran spyang dug gtang // tsher ma zug pa lta bu la// ra dug dang ni re lcag go// tshul 'brum pa byung ba ni// bcod dang spang spos gtang bar bya/ ka sha ni kor rtse shu ba la/ kar thug sred
389a4(rgyud): long btol gtang // rma dang ser ka mi 'tshon// khong du sgrub pa'i ma g+hi ta// de nyid grags pa'i sngags kyis gdul// kor tshe tshor ba med pa la// stag sha gser gyi me tog dang // rgya tsha sbyar te

391b1(rgyud): drug/ denas pakor ba'i 'khor mong 'a/ rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la// bu sha'i gzugs pazhag bye cings la// remig pacu pa'i ldan pa la/ rtsibs la gzugs bris bong wA sbyar/ 'amam

392a1(rgyud): kyang rab tu'ang gzir bar bgyid do// kha rlangs kyi dug gis ni rab tu myos shing shin tu'ang lci bar bgyid do// mthong ba'i dug gis ni za zhing 'phrug cing tsha bar byed do// 'phro ba la
392a2(rgyud): rlangs kyi dug can dang / reg pa lus kyi drug rnams kyi gdung ba bsal ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod
392a3(rgyud): sbyin gsang ba'i bdag/ dug gsum dug gi rtsa ba yang // dug gsum las ni byung ba yin// rtsa ba'i dug la rang bzhin med// de ni dug gso sman gyi mchog/ sman nyid rang byung gzhan las min// de nyid rang
392a4(rgyud): dang gzhan las grol// rtsa ba'i dug la rang grol na// dug gsum la sogs gzhan du med// dug lnga las 'phros 'byung lnga'i dug/ kun rdzob tsam du 'byung ba 'joms// de dag rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir//

392a6(rgyud): bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ dug dang drug 'joms byed kyi le'u skye dang po'o// de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos
392a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das drug chen po de dag smin pa la/ gdon pa'i las dag gang gis bgyi// nan tan gyis ni bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
392b1(rgyud): stsal pa / badz+ra sarba Sh+Ta tsit+ta rbad nan/ ma hA kA la tsit+ta rbad nan/ sarba shad+d+ha m+b+ha ra ya rbad nan/ zhag zangs nyi shu gcig tu bya// nam langs nyi ma shar ka ru// sdong tshar re ste de bzhin du// srong dang thongs/
392b2(rgyud): nam gung la// me khrag gsum dang dug sna dang // drag po rdzas rnams dag gis bra ba// nA ga'i gzugs byas rdza yi nang // gzugs nang pu la sngags 'phreng bskor// rdza nang thal chen 'brub khung du'o//
392b3(rgyud): sngags par rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yis// khachod spre gos nag po dgapa// de nas drag po'i sbyin sreg bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ bdug pa srog
392b4(rgyud): gi 'khor lo'i le'u sde gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsungs pa/ nA gA'i gzugs la reg bya ni// sngags kyi 'bru bzhin sngags bkod do// klu rgyal bzhi gzugs mthar bzhag
392b5(rgyud): nas// gdug pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor// dang po'o zhi bzla mar drag/ dang por drag la tham pa ni// thogs gnyis ka ni dang drag/ ni nA ka ra dzes ma hA/ a bayA ma chin dz+wa la ya/ sAm sa swA hA/ nyi shus kyi
392b6(rgyud): gis mthar dadrung ngo // zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i drud bye ma'i phye ma las/ dam tshig srog gi 'khor lo 'jam dang drub pa'i sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//
392b7(rgyud): de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa kyi bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na bstan pa la gnod pa dang / gdug pa can 'dul ba thun mong gi las bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pas/
393a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thun mong phyi ru gsad 'dod na// 'phrin las mi 'gyur 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo gzhug dang gzugs la gdab// gsad pa'i 'khor lo
393a2(rgyud): lho sbyar du// gang dmigs gzugs de khrag tu bri// snying khar ming bri lte ba la// shwa rI ra ste mge bo la// b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha zhes pa dgod// yan lag bzhi la ha na ste// mA ra ya/ brla gnyis dang ni mtshan ma
393a3(rgyud): la'o/ dmigs pa sa nas zag pa'i rdzas// blangs te bong bu'i chus sbrus la// sha trUM gzugs bya yig 'bru rnams// gnas su bkod de sngon dmar bcing // dug rdzas gtum pa'i rdzas kyis gtum/
393a4(rgyud): btson khang bskur te thun rnams dbab// zla ba gcig tu gnag par bya// bdun bdun bskor bya bar bar du// mchod pa'i las bya mtshan thun dpag/ sreg dang mnan pas mtha' brtul bya// zhes
393a5(rgyud): gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ 'phrin las mi 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gnod sbyin gtum pos
393a6(rgyud): gsel pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na/ gdul dka' ba'i gdol pa can rnams kyi lo tog 'joms pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
393a7(rgyud): stsal pa/ me tog 'joms pa'i las byan// nA ga gzir te gzhom par bya// zhes stobs kyi yi ge 'bru bzhi dang / mi 'gyur ba'i yi ge 'bru sum gsungs pa/ oM hU~M badz+ra ma hA nga la/ zhes gtum po stobs
393b1(rgyud): rnon po'i sngags gsungs so// nA ga tsit+ta rbang nan/ zhes klu'i snying gzer drug pa gsungs so// sarba duSh+Ta na zhes thams cad dbang du sdud pa gsungs so// bo shar shar pob/ ces tshul drags/
393b2(rgyud): kyi snying po gsungs so// gcig tu dril zhing brdeg par bya// nA gA'i gzugs bcas sngags bkod nas// yungs kar brdeg cing phur pas gdang// mdze thod nang du klu gzugs gzhug/ khrag chen
393b3(rgyud): btsan dug gla ba'i khrag/ yungs kar yungs nag bsngags shing brdeg/ klu gzugs nim pa'i chu nas dbyung // dang po cho 'phrul che bar 'dod// nyam thag pa na dbab las bya// bsad cing ro ru 'dug pa na/
393b4(rgyud): dus las yol te phebs mi 'gyur// rtags dang ldan par gyur pa na// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// drag po'i sngags kyis klu gzugs gtum// rdzas dang thod pa chu mig mnan// drag po rgyu ba'i dus
393b5(rgyud): dang sbyar// 'jig rten ldog par the tshom med// ces gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ chu la khyags le tog 'joms byed kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
393b6(rgyud): de nas dregs pa thams cad shin tu'ang yi rang bar gyur/ ljon shing la dus kyi rlung drag pos bskyod pa bzhin 'dar bzhin du 'khod de/ bka' bzhin du bgyid do zhes 'dzer cing spyan
393b7(rgyud): sngar 'khod pa las/ gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i slad du las gnang la dbab tu gsol zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
394a1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ bdud rnams las la gzhug pa ni// nga rag nag po khwamA ya nr-i mA ra dzA ma jug dzaH/ btsun rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ A bi shu rag shA tshal pa tshal pa a nr-i dza
394a2(rgyud): dza kru btsan las la gzhug pa ni/ nA ga rA dza shU la a tre dza dza mA ra la nr-i la sod/ rgyal po las la gzhug pa ni/ tro ta ni tro ta ni/ ba tra pa tra/ gU la shU la/ d+ha sha dri nga mA ra ya nA~M dza dzaHrbad/ klu
394a3(rgyud): rnams las la gzhug pa ni/ nA ga bur ling / snying khrag pa ma ru la/ nA ga rar he sa tang rdang / bu dum shri kha la rag sha dzad/ gzhan las la gzug pa ni/ u wa~M la kha dAr sing ga rag kha la ni dun mA ra Na/
394a4(rgyud): dun rbud dzaH/ de dag gi phyag brnyan las la gzud pa ni/ dza la dza l-i ha na rje ma dum/ snying kha la ni dza dza dza ni rbad/ pu kha la rag sha rba da/ ling ga byad gzhug re bas gril// rta nag thod par bcug nas kyang //
394a5(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs kyi drag nag rtsar// 'thun pa'i rdzas dang ming byang brab// rta nag lug nag snying dag dang // lug nag mthing nag dar gyis brgyan// rta na gzod bcug brag rtsar gtad// 'thun pa'i ming bris dug
394a6(rgyud): gis brab// mthing nag dar gril mdze thod gzhug/ pa dmar rta dmar snying dung gzugs// thod par bshos cha dmar por gzhug/ chu mig brag gi rtswa ban// rtsen drag dmar yod par gtad// ming rus bris la
394a7(rgyud): 'og gril// 'dzin mo spre'u'i mgo co ru// rta dang bya dang lug dkar snying // spyan gzigs dkor 'bru ba 'og gril// thod par bcug ste lha khang gi/ them pa'i 'og tu mnan par bya// sha d+hA sA la nag lto bang bri/
394b1(rgyud): blang dar ra rung bcug la grel ci sman 'bru dang rin po che// ba da mar byung rur blugs nas kyang // nA ga gdug pa'i lag tu gtad// mdze rje'i thod par ming byang gzhug/ chu d+ha'i gzugs/
394b2(rgyud): drung rta sngon spyang // thod par bcug sde rgya mtshor bsgyur// tsar dmar po'i thod pa ru// shwad+d+ha mi gzugs dar dmar gril// sngon dmar dog pas dam du bcing // byang mar ra dmar snying dang gzum//
394b3(rgyud): thod par bshos cha dmar po gzhug/ byang phyogs breg dmar rtsa ru mnan// brnag pa'i ming byang bris nas kyang // rtsar sngon mo'i thod par gzhug/ mdze rtol ba glang dre'u'i yang // thod par
394b4(rgyud): bcug ste chu 'gram dang // shing gcig rtsa ru mnan par bya// ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas rnams kyis// rang gi bya ba nan tan byos// zhes gsungs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i
394b5(rgyud): rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ bstan pa la gnod pa rnamal dbab pa'i le'u sngags kyi phong bstan pa ste drug pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gtum pos gsol pa/ kye bcom
394b6(rgyud): ldan 'das spyad ma'i dus na gdug pa can drug bar nA bcas pa'i sbyor ba'i mthu bzlog pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
394b7(rgyud): de nas sbyor ba'i mthu zlog na// rang lus sbas te de dag gi/ mig gi 'bras bu bcar bar bya// rang lus sla bar bya ba ni// skye 'gro mi yi 'bras bu bcar// nas po khwa ta'i 'bras du dang // tsar rog ngo'i 'dras pa/
395a1(rgyud): gnyis// mig la bskus te nor bu btsal// rnyed nas lus bcang ri khrod 'grim// de dag rnyed par mgyur na// gser dang dngul rdo zha nye'i rdo// spra tshil dang ni a ru ma/ kha rur dang pi pi ling //
395a2(rgyud): pho ba ril rnams cha bsnams te// bzhu sgo rdzi drang rlangs la bzab// de dag gzhan gyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gan gzhan la tshe 'gyur na// dregs pa kun gyi 'bras du bcar// lho 'phye'i sha dang sbal 'dra'i sha/
395a3(rgyud): sa chu dag na gnas pa'i mi// glang ma'i sgron shing 'bras bu dang // me ma gtang ba'i du ba dang // nyag gcig pu yi dri chen dang // sems ma chags pa'i sha rnams kun// legs par nan tan byas bcas nas//
395a4(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams kyi// rnam par dag pas mthong mi 'gyur// gdug pa'i klu rnams de las 'gras pa'i gdon// de dag 'bras bur bcar ba ni// phag po rog po'i don snying lnga// lce pog nag po gser lur
395a5(rgyud): dang thA nu'i thangs nyams rnyed gdung ste// lus la bcangs par gyur pa na// sha mig rnam par dag pa yi// klu chen brgyad kyis bltas gyur kyang // mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// zhes gsungs so//
395a6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ lus rnam par slu ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje
395a7(rgyud): gsum po dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dponi lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje stobs po che dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang / de dag pa
395b1(rgyud): sogs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs chen po rnams rab tu'ang yi rangs te/ lan brgya stong du mar mchod cing bskor nas mngon par bstod do// de nas lag na rdo rje bzhil bka' stsal pa/ lagan rdo rje bzhi po dang /
395b2(rgyud): rgyud 'di dag gang ra gnas par khyed kyang rjes su 'drang la/ rgyud 'di 'chang ba dus gsum du mchod cing bskur bar gyis shig/ de'i dgos pa gang ci'ang rung ba ma lus par sgrub shig/ phyi ma'i dus na o tri yul
395b3(rgyud): du rgyas par 'gyur gyis/ der srung bar byos shig ces gsungs nas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la zhugs so// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u
395b4(rgyud): sde brgyad pa'o// dpal rdo rje gtum po thugs gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi slob dngo na ma bi yu ga til dang / 'od kyi lo tsang rma/
395b5(rgyud): ban chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// @rgya bar skad du/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha ma hA ru dra badz+ra a na lajihA
395b6(rgyud): d+han pri d+d+hitan+d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ phyag ni rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad nga dgra gis thos pa dus gcig
395b7(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'byung ba'i yum btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin drag po bye ba phrag bcu dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drag cing ga
396a1(rgyud): pa'i rigs ji snyed pa thams cad dang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po'i skyil mo krung bcas nas g.yas pa nam mkha' la bsgreng / g.yon pa sa yang zad nas spyanang bzlog/
396a2(rgyud): pas phyogs bcur gzigs te/ zhal nas hUM ha zhes pa'i sgra cher byung ngo // de nas 'khor thams cad gtso bo mi snang bas yun ring du brgyal bar gyur to// de'i skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i
396a3(rgyud): gtsug nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba/ sngags rnam gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa/ phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba kha dog sngon po cher grags pa/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/
396a4(rgyud): g.yon pa na nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po drag po thogs pa zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de nas nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa bskyod pas rgya mtshor zhugs te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang 'jog pos rang gi bdag
396a5(rgyud): po'i spyi bor 'dud do// nye dga' bo dang dung skyong gis rna cha byas so// rigs ldan gyis mgul rgyan du byas so// pad+ma dang pad+ma chen pos lag gdu tu byas so// sprin gyi shugs can gyis se ral khar bcings so//
396a6(rgyud): hu lu hu lus ska rags su byas so// 'brug sgra dang bdud 'joms kyis rkang gdub tu byas te/ slar bdag po'i lag pa g.yon par song ngo // de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag bcu dang / drag po'i rigs rnams
396a7(rgyud): brgyal ba las sangs te/ phyogs kun tu bltas pa las/ phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho'i nang du 'dug pa mthong nas/ rings par kye ma a la la bdag cag gi gtso bo nyid bzhugs so zhes brjod nas/
396b1(rgyud): song ba las phyin te bltas pas cher drag pa skad dam pa gyen du 'phags pa/ mig me mngag gi phung po ltar 'bar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce glog ltar 'gyur ba/ gsus brdzing bu ltar 'khyil pa/ rgya mtsho'i
396b2(rgyud): zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor byin pa/ klu'i rgyan cha bdun dang ldan pa/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/ g.yon pa nu num mkha' lding gi rgyal po drag po thogs pa/ u byi
396b3(rgyud): bo la dpag tshad nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa bzhugs so// de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyis gsol pa/ gtso bo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i don drag po rgyas par gsol cig/ bdag cag rnams
396b4(rgyud): kyis zhu bar ma spobs kyis zhes gsol nas/ lag na rdo rje la gos sngon po dar la bai DUR+Ya zhun ma'i nang du bcos pa zhig bla gos su gsol to// stag gi pags pa drug stong gis sham thabs su bcings so//
396b5(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rje rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ mdun du snying po dang ldan pa'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' dang
396b6(rgyud): sa gzhi la gzigs nas khar snang du'ang spyan gyis 'khor bar gzigs so// de nas khaM bru~M sau zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do// de nas lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying khar sbyar te/ bcom
396b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba drag po'i don bdag dang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhun/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ngam zhes
397a1(rgyud): gsol pa dang / ci'ang mi gsung bar bcom ldan 'das gdug pa'i tshogs nges par 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu sreng gsum gyi stong /
397a2(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i gadrug pa can thams cad snying 'dar bar gyur to// de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas lag na rdo rje la gzigs te/ byed pa g.yon pa'i chu shing snying po
397a3(rgyud): nas drangs te bkug pa'o// byed pa skyes pa'i chu shing sgra dang bcas pas brkyang ba byas te gnas so// de nas lag na rdo rje phyag rgya de nyid yang dag par rig ste/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ khyed la
397a4(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'khor dag sa phyogs 'dir ma gnas par phyogs gzhan du dengs shig/ gal te mi 'gro na khyed la sogs pa'i snying 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pas sgra gnas kyi khung bur sgrib byed kyi
397a5(rgyud): tshogs song ste snga ma bzhin du 'khod do// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// thub pa'i sku la 'di
397a6(rgyud): skasmad gsol// gsang ba'i rdo rje drag po'i don// rgyas pas bdag la bshad du gsol// gsang ba'i bdag po legs par yang // nyon la yid la zung zhig khyod// nga yi gsang ba gang yin pa// rdo rje drag po gang
397a7(rgyud): yin pa// ngal mtshan nyid gzhan med de// khyod nyid kyi ni byung dang yang // khyod kyi bya ba'i las bshad bya// skye ba bzhi bsdus sems can rnams// gdug pa can gyis gtses gyur pa// thabs su ldan pa'i
397b1(rgyud): bzlog pa yis// mtshan ma nges par bshang bar bya// ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de// dza ni mi bskyod thub pa'i sku// ra ni rin chen 'byung ldan su// me lce'i yig 'bru gsum po la// dang por gtso bo bshad
397b2(rgyud): bya ba pa ni rdo rje 'joms byed ma// na ni pad+ma 'joms byed ma// dza ni kun 'gro 'joms byed sa// 'og btags gsum po ming mthar sbyar// oM ni kun tu go byed de// ba ni kun tu rten pa nyid// ma ni smin par
397b3(rgyud): byed pa'i las// ya ni yang dag bskyed par bshad// go 'byed gnyis pa'i steng gnas pa'i// sna ldan dag tu shes par bya// de las nges par byung bas na// kun snang gang yin dngos dang sbyar//
397b4(rgyud): bsam pa'i dngos la 'jug rnams kyi// yan lag thags rnams thams cad du// gong du smos nas brjod pa yin// don du gsal bar zlos pa yi// tshig ni rgyas par brjod mi dgos// las
397b5(rgyud): las grub pa'i gzugs rnams la// drag po yongs su ston pa dang // gnod sbyin be con thogs rnams la// gtso bo'i don du bshad pas na// tshig tu nges par yang dag brjod// khyod kyi lung
397b6(rgyud): 'chang rab dag pas// de nyid rigs su byung ba ste// kun kyang drag po'i las la dga'// snang ba dag par mi mthong bzhin// de nyid la ni nges par brjod// gong du bstan pa gang yin pa/
397b7(rgyud): so so dag la gdon mi za// sbyor ba sna tshogs nges bsgrubs na// snang bar 'byor pa sna tshogs pa// mngon du rgyas shing nges par gsal// snang ba chen po bdag med par// rgung pas
398a1(rgyud): yongs su 'grub pa sbyin// kun rdzob gong ma'i tshig lta gyur// dngos po bstan pa lta bur mthong // don dam 'og ma'i sna ma dur// kon mongs kun bsregs rang bzhin
398a2(rgyud): gyis// 'od gsal ba ru gnas pa'i ma/ snying po don dam la 'jug pa// phyi rim kun rdzob la brten bya// dang por sangs rgyas mi gnas shing // snga ma'i bya ba sbyor bar brtson// dbang thob pa la
398a3(rgyud): rlom sems med// bla ma'i man drug nges pa las// bla ma nyid la ni nus kyis// yang dag par ni mchod par bya// rdo rje ngo bo kun 'byung dang // gdug pa thams cad bsreg phyir gang // dngos po la
398a4(rgyud): 'jug gong ma'i sgra// gong ma'i tshig tu brjod pa yin// lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las/ nges tshig gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// gos sngon lag na rdo rje yis/
398a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mgon la 'di skad gsol// gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba yi// thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsung du gsol// rig pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// yang dag don dam dngos gyur na// dkyil
398a6(rgyud): 'khor lha gzugs med pa ste// 'gro ba rtog pa la gnas pas// de yi kun rtog bsal ba'i phyir// lha yi sbyor ba bshad par bya// gang zhig mos par byed pa yis// khru gsum dkyil 'khor phyogs
398a7(rgyud): bzhi pa// nags sam dur khrod khang stong ngam// gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten nam// de dag gnas su nges par brtsam// dang por bsnyen pa rab gnas pas// bu mo bcu drug ston mo byas// bdag
398b1(rgyud): gis nag gsum khrus bya zhing // spyi bo lkog ma snying kha ru// gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge brtag / rams su btsos pa'i gos nyid la// gur kum thig le nges btub ste// de nyid la ni basmon par bya/
398b2(rgyud): zas su dkar gsum sbyin byas shing // skyes pa dang ni phrad mi bya/ snying po 'di nyid 'bum tshad du// rang gis bzlas pas rig pa 'byin// de nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa las// bu mo nyid la tshig
398b3(rgyud): brjod do// ba yi rnam lnga nyid dang yang // rams dang mthing shun kun 'dus su// rin thang mi brtsi nyor bcug ste// de nyid rigs 'thun nang gtums la// gnas gang yin par bdag la gtad/
398b4(rgyud): de yis zhag gsum sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya nges pa nyid dang yang // snying po gong gi sbyor ba yis// dri chu btab la grangs tshad du// phyin par yang dag bzlas par bya// de nas skud pa sngon po ni// bu mos
398b5(rgyud): legs par bkal ba la// sngags kyis dag byas rab mdzes pas// srad bu dgu ru nges par sgril// me tog sngon po'i nang gtums la// seng ldeng phur pa lnga rnams kyis// srang bu yongs su bre bar bya//
398b6(rgyud): rab tu tshad du nges pa yis// phyag rgya ma la ngag brjod pas// de nyid mnyam par bzhag pa yis// dkyil 'khor legs par byas pa yin// 'phang du khru gang tshad byas te// dang por byang shar mtshams
398b7(rgyud): nyid nas// kun rten kha dog rigs 'thun blang // yongs su bsdus byas nges par bya// gnyis pa gnyis pa nyid du nges// gsum pa gcig gi tshad dang ldan// de ltar tshad du ldan pa las// shin tu mtham
399a1(rgyud): par 'thas par bya// de nyid rjes su 'jug pa yis// dang po'i srad bu gang yin pa// kha dog ser po'i thig gdab bya// dkyil 'khor dgu ru nges pa las// 'bru dang sa dang rin/
399a2(rgyud): chen dang // phyi ma nyid du btags pa yis// dkyil du pad+ma bcu drug pa// 'dab mar ldan par bri bar bya// shar dang lho dang nub byung dang // mtshams rnams su yang de bzhin bri// lo che'i pad+ma gang yin pa//
399a3(rgyud): sna tshogs par ni yang dag bshad// mtshams rnams su ni mchod pa yi// lha mo yongs su dgod par bya// sgo bzhi dag tu khro mo bzhi// sbyor bas yang dag dgod par bya// rin chen pha gu 'dod yon dang //
