427b5(rgyud): 'gas pa// do ni klu gdon nges par gsel// skud pa sngon po nyid la ni// rab sngags mdud pa bdun bor ba// mgul du bcings pas skad ngan 'don// gnod sbyin gdon du yin par bshad// chen
427b6(rgyud): po dag ni phrad pa na// sbyor ba 'di yis yang dag sbyor// dur khrod mi gang bsregs pa yis// sna tshogs thal ba blang byas la// chang dang nges par spras byas te// sbrul gyi pags pas gtums byas
427b7(rgyud): la til gyi gang bu grags pa la// 'bum du yang dag bzlas byas te/ bdag nyid gos la yang dag gtum// de nas de dang phrad pa dang // drag po las kyi sbyor ba yis// de nyid la ni phog par gtor/
428a1(rgyud): de yis de la gtor ba yis// de ni nges par rmongs par 'gyur// oM mA nu Sha duSh+Ta staM b+ha na hUM/ sgyu ma dbang du sdud byed na// sbyor ba 'di nyid brtsam par bya// ngos 'jam rdul dang phra
428a2(rgyud): ba dang // bgegs kyi gnyen po'i khu ba dang // sgog chen las kyi khu bas su// byed pa gnyis ka bar smras la// de la mthun pa nyid la ni// yongs su bskul bas sbyin par bya// de nas nges pa dus
428a3(rgyud): btab la// kha sbyor ba yis yang dag bsngags// oM na mo kA ma de ba ya yu ya ka ya ka ka la siny+tsa b+ha g+ha ba par ta na swA hA/ a mu kaM/ 'bum du dang por bsnyen pa yis// sbyor ba nges par spyad par bya//
428a4(rgyud): nor dag sgrub par 'dod pa na// nor 'dzin lha mo yongs su bri// kha dog ser po nyid la ni// phyag bzhi par ni bri ba bya// zhal gcig nu ma 'bur ba la// g.yas kyi dang po ting 'dzin pa// gnyis pa
428a5(rgyud): 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po nyid na ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams// gnyis pas ne'u le'i rkyal pa snams// de lta bu yi gzugs byas la// sna tshogs dri yis yang dag mchod//
428a6(rgyud): mchod pa rnam pa lnga dag dang // na bza' drar la sogs pa yis// yang dag pa ru mchod par bya// zhag grangs brgya rtsa brgyad pa ru// yongs su bsnyen pas sngags bzlas bya// de nas grub par gyur pa'i
428a7(rgyud): rtags// de nyid g.yo bar gyur pa yis// de grub rten ni rnyed par ni// de yis lus ni ston par 'gyur// de nas dbyig ni mi bzad pa'i// bdag por mi de nges par 'gyur// ma rungs pa dag sbyor
428b1(rgyud): gzhug na// sbyor ba 'di dag nges par brtsam// de yis kun grags nyid dang ni// khu chen sa la sogs pa la// sngags 'di yis ni 'bum du bzlas// de nas bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs pas//
428b2(rgyud): yid ches dung la sbu gu can// sor bdun dag la dug blugs te// skud pa sngon pos rab bcings la// nub phyogs dag tu nges par gdags// da ni 'byung bas bskyod pa na// mi de nges par
428b3(rgyud): skyo bar 'gyur// oM ma hA kA lA ya s+t+waM b+ha u na ma ta ya/ a mu kaM sany+tsa la swA hA/ mi rnams nges par mi gsal bas// rdo rje mo ni yongs su sgrub// sa la phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du// re mig
428b4(rgyud): bcu gnyis bris byas la// ma rig la sogs rtags kyi ni// dngos po yang dag bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas rab bsngags la// bsam pa rab tu rdzogs byas la// de nyid dngos po gang yin pas//
428b5(rgyud): bsam pa sbyar bas me tog bor// gang du bab pa der gnas la// shes rab can gyis rnam par dpyad// bzang ngan sbas rnams yongs su bshad// rig pa legs par sbas pa yis// ba yi lci bas
428b6(rgyud): rab gtums la// dang por gnyis su shes par bya// ring du bye brag med pa yis// bcom ldan sngon du bzhag byas te// dang por mchod pas yang dag mchod// smod dag yongs su btsugs pa
428b7(rgyud): yis/ shes rab bcu gsum bdag nyid can// dmar po gos kyis brgyan byas la// khrus dag legs par byas pa dang // dri yis legs par byugs byas la// dpral bar thig le dmar po
429a1(rgyud): ga ba// me tog dri zhim dmar po nyid// de yi lag tu sbyin par bya// de yis de la blang bar bya// de yis dngos po gsal bya skye// bzang ngan lngas su nges par ston// spyir/
429a2(rgyud): nA sna tshogs gdon la ni// 'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas bya// gu gul nag po'i dud pa dag/ de yi sna ru bdug byas la// nyungs kar gu gul me tog dang // de yi snying pos bsreg par bya// de
429a3(rgyud): yis nad pa gang yin pa// bgegs dang nges par bral bar 'gyur// srin lag nyid la skud pa ni// sngon pos yang dag bsdam par bya// spyi bo'i sgra las srad bu gang // bcings pas sngags nings
429a4(rgyud): par bzlas// 'khrugs pa'i sde dag rgyal 'dod ni// khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po yis// 'bum du bzlas pas bsnyen pa bya// de nas a mra'i lo ma las// yung bas yongs su bris byas la// gi'u
429a5(rgyud): thang gis ni rab tu skul// cod pan spyi bor gtums byas la// rang nyid sku ru bsgoms byas la// lag pa g.yas pas nyungs kar dang // ske tshe thal bar sbyar byas la// sngags bzlas sdigs 'dzub
429a6(rgyud): phyar ba yis// yongs su bris par sde rgyal 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis bdag nyid la// 'chi ba ba slu ba yang dag bya// bdag gi rgyud la 'chi lhas ni// phyi nang bcu gnyis yang dag ldan// bdag gi
429a7(rgyud): brang la sha mtshan dag/ dmar po byung bar gyur pa na// sum cu gnyis zhag 'chi 'gyur bas// rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis su// til la sreg blugs stong du ni// tshang bar byas pas de bzlog
429b1(rgyud): 'gyur// de dang cha 'thun gang yin pa// rkan la 'brum bu gsum pa dang // lce yi rtse mor sme ba dang // rdo rje lam nas khrag 'dzag dang // 'dzag gnyis dbugs dag gsum pa dang // ri yi rtse mor/
429b2(rgyud): shu ba byung // nang gi 'chi lhas nges pa ste// stag dang byi ba 'brug dag dang // rtsangs pa bya ga ga nag po ru// yongs su sbyor bas rig pa bzlas// gi'u wa da 'ug pa rus sbal dang // tsam bka/
429b3(rgyud): dang ut+pal dang // seng ldeng pur bu gang yin dang // 'ug pa'i sgro la sbyor ba dang // bya rog mkha' la 'phur ba yi// dkar pos bdag la phog pa ni// phyi yi 'chi lhas yin pas na// gong du
429b4(rgyud): grag pa'i sar song la// rig pa la sogs sbyor ba yis// yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin// mkha' la sna lnga mthong ba dang // chu la mig gzugs mthong gyur na// shin tu sdig pa'i lhas su
429b5(rgyud): bstan// rmi lam la ni stag zhon la// mchod rten nyid la 'dzegs pa dang // seng ge'i khar ni zhugs rmis pa// yongs su sdig pa'i lngas yin pas// logs shig sor mo rtse gsum dang //
429b6(rgyud): bse ru'i phyogs dang kun da'i 'dab// yon tan rgya mtsho mtshan bzang dang // skye mched 'phags la ma chu srin mo// lo gsum zhag bzhi zla ba lngar// mi de nges par 'chi bas na// rig pa'i
429b7(rgyud): rgyal mo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rten 'brel yi ge brgya pa yis// sngags kyis sman la bsrung ba bya// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'jig rten mgon// de dag gi ni snying po yis// stag sogs so
430a1(rgyud): la nges par bzlas// rma bya chen mo'i sngags dag gis// 'ug pa'i sgo sogs nges par bsngags// phyag na rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang // stobs chen khro bo gang dag gis//
430a2(rgyud): sngags kyis seng ldeng 'ug sgro dang // ku sha byi la la sogs dang // gsob la sngags pas yongs su bzlog/ gtor ma sbyin sreg las kyis ni// yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin// shin tu
430a3(rgyud): dpal dang dad par ldan// shes rab che dang thos pa bsags// bla ma la gus gtong bar pod// lhung ba la sogs gtsang ma la// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur nas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo lnga/
430a4(rgyud): byas la// shes rab ldan pa bstan bya ba'i// gsang ba drag po'i rgyud rgyal 'di// gzhan la bshad par bya ba min// gsang ba drag po khyod kyis ni// phan dang gnod bya gang yin pa// rim pa bzhin
430a5(rgyud): du shes pa yis// legs par sgra dang bshad pa ni// gnas skabs du ma dang ldan zhing // kun la nges par zhugs pa yis// rgyud 'di la ni nges par brtag/ rgyud 'di gang na gnas pa na// sa
430a6(rgyud): phyogs de yi gdug pa rnams// ring du bsrings pas gnas mi byed// gal te gnas par byed pa na// de rnams kun gyi rgyud tshig 'gyur// drag po rgyud kyi rgyal po la// gang zhig zhugs par gyur pa
430a7(rgyud): la 'dug gsum sku la rab brgyan nas// btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gnas te// nyon mongs 'khor gyis rab bskor nas// bde ba chen po'i rol pas gnas// lag na rdo rjes de nyid du// skad cig tsam gyis
430b1(rgyud): skor ba ni// 'bum phrag gsum du rab bskor nas// bde bar gshegs la 'di skar gsol// bdag gi rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// nges pa'i don dang rab sbyar gnas// gsang ba nyid du snga bar bgyi//
430b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje ma lce'i rgyud las/ las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// phyag na rdo rje gros sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me lce'i
430b3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po rat+na kIrti dang bod kyi lo tsa ba dge tshul khyung grag kyis bka' drin mnos nas rgyu dpe bong du spyan drangs te
430b4(rgyud): bsgyur ba lags so// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra hri da ya badz+ra dzi hA nA ha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
430b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de na 'khor
430b6(rgyud): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje snying po zhes
430b7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka nas 'od zer rab tu bkye bar gyur te/ 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas/ sems
431a1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi nang dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byas nas/ slar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su zhugs so// de nas drang srong chen po zhes 'dor
431a2(rgyud): langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can thams cad la nang dang / dug dang / rims dang / dgra dang / gdon dang / khyad
431a3(rgyud): snyems dang / zod gtong dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag par gyur na/ de la ji ltar bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
431a4(rgyud): sba bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po nyes 'do nga la rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ des sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
431a5(rgyud): sba bar byed do// de ngas bshad kyi legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis badz+ra badz+ra hUM zhes gsungs pas rdo rje snying po khro zhing gtum pa gdug pa'i cha lugs can 'thon nas
431a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mgrin gcig tu gzungs 'di bka' stsal to// nyi ma nA na/ zla ba nA na/ klad pa nAn/ kun zhi/ tsi ta ku li nA na/ yak+Sha bzlog byer/ de nas
431a7(rgyud): gzung 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs skrag nas kha sbub tu 'gyel te slu bar skyug cing brgyal bar gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas kyang 'jigs skrag nas lus 'dar zhing /
431b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgra dang gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa'i gzungs 'di brjod par bgyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis
431b2(rgyud): brlab tu gsol/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ tsitA mu dz+wa la k+Sha bzlog byer/ de nas gzungs 'di spras ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha sbub tu 'gyel te/ gdon dang log 'dren thams cad
431b3(rgyud): kha sbub tu 'gyel te khrag tu skyug cing dbugs dang bral bar gyur to// de nas yang klu mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
431b4(rgyud): sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi'o// char dus su dbab cing lo tog thams cad bsrung bar bgyi'o// nad dang / dgra dang / gdon
431b5(rgyud): thams cad gnom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa lngar bgyid pa las bzlog par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas khyod
431b6(rgyud): kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa lhar gyis shig/ dam tshig rjes su srungs shig/ ji ltar nga'i bka' bcag na ngan song du lhung dA re/ nga'i ji ltar bsgo ba thams cad gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos rdo rje lce
431b7(rgyud): dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pas 'grub pa drag po rab tu mi bzad pa 'di smras so// badz+ra badz+ra hUM/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ tsi tra mu drA yak+Sha bzlog byer/ nA ga shig/ nA ga byer/ nA ga nan/ nA ga go la nan/ nA ga ha na
432a1(rgyud): ha na mA ra ya rbad nan/ sa gdon nag po sod sod/ phyug ci phaT/ tsi ka phywa phaT/ lce pa ti phaT/ e ba ga ra tse di nA ga 'bar ma ma hA ba la sA ta ye go de sad te nan/ thum ril rbad che ge/
432a2(rgyud): mo mA ra ya/ dzaHrba da nan/ nA ga hril hril/ nA ga pro pr-i/ nA ga pho ba/ badz+ra pra be sha ya sa 'di srungs shig byer ya/ b+h+yor ma mahA a hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ mA ra ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ra sha mA ra ya rbad shig byer
432a3(rgyud): nan nana?/ ha na ha na mA ra ya rbang nan/ de nas gzungs 'di gzungs ma thag tu nam mkha' la gnam lcags drag po'i rdo rje'i thog phab nas dgra dang / gdon dang / me tog ma rungs par byed pa thams
432a4(rgyud): cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur gtubs nas rdul phra rab bzhin du brlag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byi dor
432a5(rgyud): byas nas pa'i rnam lngas byug par bya'o// tsan dan dang rgya spros dri zhim pos byug par bya'o// me tog sil ma dgram mo// bum pa gang ba gzhag go/ mar me bud do// gtor ma bzang po gzhag go// lcags
432a6(rgyud): sam seng ldeng gi phur pa gzugs so// dbus su rdo rje snying po gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun du klu mtha' yas gzhag go/ de nas mchod par 'dod na me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga bya'o// klu mchod
432a7(rgyud): par 'dod na mkhar ba'i snod du 'o ma dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / ci sman sna tshogs kyis bya'o// nad dang dug bsrung bar 'dod na tshil chen dang / gla rtsi dang / skud pa sngon po dang / rma bya'i sgras
432b1(rgyud): bya'o// klu nag po chen po la ni tshil chen dang / gla rtsi dang / tshon skud sna lnga dang / seng ldeng gi pur pas bya'o// 'byung po thams cad la ni phur pa dang nyungs kar gyis bya'o// skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon
432b2(rgyud): la ni phur ba dang / nyungs kar dang / nyungs nag dang / ske tshe dang / thal chen gyis bya'o// 'byung po kun tu rgyu ba la ni phur bu lnga dang thod pas bya'o// gzhan dag gsung bar 'dod na phur pa dang / gzu
432b3(rgyud): dang / thod pas bya'o// mnan par 'dod na thod pa dang / dug dang / nyungs kar gyis bya'o// le tog gzhim par 'dod na thod pa dang / du ba dang // nyungs kar dang / tshil chen dang / khrag sna tshogs
432b4(rgyud): la bya'o// lo tog bsrung bar 'dod na thal chen dang / ske tshe dang / phur bus bya'o// kun tu srung ba zhes bya ba gzhan gyi sdod gtong bzlog par 'dod na mchod rten dang / gzugs dang / thod pa dang /
432b5(rgyud): nyungs kar dang / phur pas bya'o// thams cad zhi bar 'dod na thab khung rnying pa ra tsan dan nam rgya shug la me btang la dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / 'bras dang / til dang / mar dkar la
432b6(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo mA rA ya shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas nA thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gang dag gsad par 'dod na sla nga'i nang du seng ldeng ngam gdug pa'i shing la me btang la/ gdug
432b7(rgyud): pa'i rdzas sna tshogs dang / ske tshe dang / til dang / mar nag dang / tshil chen dang / ming byang spel te sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo ra sha mA ra ya dzad/ ces bzlas na ngagra dang gdon thams cad brlag
433a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar 'dod na rma bya'i mkhris pa dang / kar dang / sa'i bdud rtsi lo lnga brgya lon pas bya'o// klus bdag bsrung bar 'dod na spos dang /
433a2(rgyud): gu gul nag po dang / gla rtsi dang / mu zi dang / ldeng ros dang / dri chen dang / sbrang rtsis bya'o// mchog tu bsrung bar 'dod na 'bras bu gsum dang / bu chung gi rang byung dang / dri chus bya'o// khyad
433a3(rgyud): par dam pa srung ba chen po a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba bcang zhing gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o// shig byer nAn/ 'go nAn/ ha na ha na mA ra rbad nAn/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor 'di yid la rab tu zung
433a4(rgyud): zhig/ sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskya ba dang / sba bar gyis shig/ nga'i bstan pa rjes su srungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang /
433a5(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lU dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sring /
433a6(rgyud): bo rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / 'di dang po ska cog gis bsgyur zhing / phyis gnyan lo tsa ba d+harma grags kyis kyang bsgyur ro//
433a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ gu h+ya badz+ra pA Ni a ba tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud/ dpal 'od zer gsang ba bo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sad/
433b1(rgyud): bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi bo blang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la/ rig sngags kyi lha tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs so// de nas dpa' mo'i/
433b2(rgyud): dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying rjer ldan
433b3(rgyud): zhing shes rab che// bzod dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing // bslab pa gsum la rab tu gnas// des ni dpa' bo yang dag 'grub// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud
433b4(rgyud): las rnga sgrub pa po gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / dpa' mos gsol pa/ dpa' bo 'di sgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/
433b5(rgyud): dben la nyams dga' yid 'ong ba// bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin// dur khrod chen po 'jigs gnas pa// ri gsum rtse 'am shing drung ngam// phug gam lha khang stong pa dang // brag ri sngon po'i
433b6(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba// khro bo'i cha byad 'dra ba'i gnas// der ni dpa' bo sgrub par shis// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / dpa' mos
433b7(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di bskyed pa'i dmigs pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po stong zhing bdag med de// snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun// /
434a1(rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag/ de lta bu yi chos nyid la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// mi skom mi rtog snang ba gsal// mtha' bral mkha' mnyam dbu ma'i don/
434a2(rgyud): sems kyi rang bzhin de lta bu/ de ltar ma rtogs sems can la// sdug bsngal kun dang bral ba yi// thugs rjes phyogs med bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// rang
434a3(rgyud): bzhin sems ni yi ge hUM// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// gzhal yas khang dang lha yi gdan// lha yi sa bon yi ge las// go rims bzhin du bskyed par bya// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las
434a4(rgyud): dmigs pa bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bdag po 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa ji ltar
434a5(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyed pa'i dmigs pa thob nas ni// snying khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar ni// pad+ma 'dab bzhi
434a6(rgyud): rgyu sran tsam// dbus su nyi zla'i gzhal yas khang // gzhal yas khang gi nang du ni// a shad mar me'i rtse lhar bsgom// de la dmigs pa thob nas ni// ci yang bsam par mi bya ste// bsam gyis
434a7(rgyud): mi khyab de bsams pas// de las ye shes thob par 'gyur// gsal la mi rtog rig pa'i sku// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste
434b1(rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di'i 'khor ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo
434b2(rgyud): chen po 'di'i 'khor ni thugs kyi 'khor bzhi'o// gsung gi 'khor brgyud do// sku'i 'khor lnga ru nges so// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
434b3(rgyud): dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i rig pa ni ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT rA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI
434b4(rgyud): lAM bar d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni kro d+ha ma hA tsat+ta ro Sha Na d+hu hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'khor bzhi'i rig pa phul ba ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ sIng tsiSh+Tha kro tsa dun dz+ra/
434b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra trai lo kya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ baM mA ra ya tsit+ta rba da/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nA ga hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya rak+Sha rngubs rngubasarba da/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ku be ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mA ra ya ke tshaM rbad/ dpa' bo'i 'khor lham
434b6(rgyud): srin sde brgyad kyis rig pa phul ba/ ma hA de ba mA ra ya song sod/ ma hA nA ga ma ra ya dza dzaHma hA de ba mA ra ya ha na ha na/ ma hA ma ni mA ra ya gtubs gtubs/ ma hA grub mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA
434b7(rgyud): tri dza mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA ba ni mA ra ya nan nan/ 'khor gos sngon can lnga brgya'i rig pa phul ba/ ma ra ya ru ha ru ta hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las/ rig pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug
435a1(rgyud): pa'o// dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phrin las kyi gzhung sbyin sreg gis bsdu 'tshal lam mi 'tshal ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
435a2(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin sreg ni rnam pa gsum ste/ phyi dang / nang dang / gsang ba gsum mo// re re la ni bzhi bzhi bstan// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / dbang dang drag po'i sbyin sreg go// gsang ba bstan pa'i
435a3(rgyud): rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u sde bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de nas rigs kyi lha tshogs rnams yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
435a4(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / lo tsa ba dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//
435a5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra pA Ni gu h+ya a b+hi de sha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi
435a6(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ sangs rgyas pad+ma'i klung gi bya ma
435a7(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / rig pa'i khro bo'i tshigs dpag tu med pa dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin lnga brgya dang bcas te
435b1(rgyud): thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos
435b2(rgyud): phrag pa gci ga la gzar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin// ting 'dzin rgyal po mi g.yo las// cig car bzhengs te gsang ba'i mchog/ ye shes lnga yi spyod/
435b3(rgyud): yul gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog/ ji ltar sgrub pa'i rim pa dang // las kyi bya ba mdor bsdus te// gang zag ji lta bus sgrub cing // rig pa'i rgyal po mchog gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das
435b4(rgyud): kyis legs par gsungs// zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mnyam par gzhag pa las langs te/ thugs kar ye shes lnga mi byed pa'i rdo rje lan gsum du gsor bas 'jig rten gyi khams
435b5(rgyud): thams cad 'gul ba dang ldeg pa la sogs pa kun tu 'khrugs te/ gdug pa can 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas slar thugs kar thim pa las/ rdo rje lte ba nas yum dpa' mo rdo rje bde ma
435b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba byung sgra rang gi ston pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ phyag byas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ni// gsang ba dam pa gang yin pa/
435b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas legs par gsungs// 'di ni rnyed dka' rgyud chen te// rin chen lha bur 'dod 'byung ba// grangs med tshegs las byung ba 'di// thugs rje'i rang bzhin ston pa las// bcom ldan khyed kyis
436a1(rgyud): bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas byams pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas te/ tshur 'dus nas
436a2(rgyud): rang gi zhal du thim pa dang / dpa' mo rdo rje bde ma khyod// stong pa'i rang bzhin bdag med mas// ji ltar zhus bzhin bshad par bya// gus par nyon la legs par zung // rdo rje 'chang gi sku gsung thugs//
436a3(rgyud): mi phyed stong pa'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje sna tshogs thabs tshul te// 'di ni rab tu rtogs dka' bas// 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa dang // ma 'ongs sangs rgyas spyod yul yin// bsam gyis mi
436a4(rgyud): khyab rnam par dag/ brjod med mi g.yo 'dus ma byas// nam mkha' dri med chos kyi sku// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'i mchog/ 'di la ji ltar bstan du yod// 'on kyang snying rje'i rang bzhin pas/
436a5(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni// gnyis med gnyis kyi thabs tshul rig/ 'di ni gsang ba dam ste// de nyid gzhan la mngon bstan pas// gdul bya tshim 'gyur rgyal po bzhin// rang 'dod 'bras
436a6(rgyud): du 'byung 'gyur bas// gsang ba mngon par bstan pa yi// rgyud chen rgyal po bshad par bya// e ma ho// mi phyed rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ e ma ho// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// sna tshogs
436a7(rgyud): nor bu rgyud chen 'di// rang gi gsang ba dam pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rab tu dga' ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
436b1(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po khyod sgrub pa'i gang zag ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes/
436b2(rgyud): ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i gang zag ni// snying rje ldan
436b3(rgyud): zhing shes rab che// bzod ldan brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs// bslab pa gsum ldan dad pas brgyan// dpa' zhing gsang ba'i spyod pa shes// gus shing g.yo med skyabs gnas gsum
436b4(rgyud): rtag tu mchod cing yangs pa med// lhag pa'i lha la yid ches shing // phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang tho ba la// dam tshig brda don nges par 'dzin// de ltas sgrub pa byas gyur na// yun mi ring ba rang nyid
436b5(rgyud): kyis gsang gsum la ni mkhas 'gyur te// 'bad pas thob pa'i 'bras bu ni// skal ldan de yi snying la gnas// zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par
436b6(rgyud): bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgrub pa po'i gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khyod
436b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la
437a1(rgyud): bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i gnas mchog ni// dur khrod brgyad dam nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod nags kyi nang du ni// ri rtse brag ri sngon po'i mdog/ khros pa'i//
437a2(rgyud): gzugs 'dra byang lbu ba// me tog sngon pos mdzes pa dang // ne'u gsing dang ut+pal nags// dben zhing yid 'ong nyams dga' ba// bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin// lcang lo can dang
437a3(rgyud): ming 'thun pa// sna tshogs sgrub pa'i gnas su shis// tsha sgo chu med u ma'i gnas// rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus dang // nyan thos la sogs 'dug gnas su// nga nyid bsgrub par mi bya'o// smin
437a4(rgyud): pa'i gang zag rnams la ni// gnas sogs brtags pas ci zhig bya// thams cad bde chen sangs rgyas kyi// zhing khams rol pas gnas pa yin// de bas rigs kyis brtag par bya// bcom
437a5(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol
437a6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khyod sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/
437a7(rgyud): bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid sgrub pa'i rim pa ni// snying rje chen po sngon 'gro zhing // gzhan gyi don la bslab par bya// nam mkhar rdo rje can
437b1(rgyud): dmigs la// bde ba chen pos rnam par mchod// chud sbyang sangs rgyas tshogs dag la// 'gyod pa spangs te rjes yi rang // mya ngan 'da' la gsol bar bya// dam pa'i don la skul bya zhing //
437b2(rgyud): rigs kyi sa bon cher bskyed la// kun la khyad byed gzhan don sgrub// bdag gi sdug bsngal mi blta zhing // gzhan dag bde la dgod par bya// me 'obs lta bur gnas pa yis// sems can
437b3(rgyud): kun la snying rje sgom// spros bral gnyis 'dzin spangs pa yi// tshul la yang dag bslab par bya// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing // dpa' bos stong zhing bdag dang bral// snang zhing srid
437b4(rgyud): pa'i chos rnams kun// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par drag/ mtha' bral mkha' 'dra dbu ma'i don// de lta bu yi chos nyid la// sems kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med// ma rtogs log pa'i sems can
437b5(rgyud): lasdug bsngal kun dang bral ba'i phyir// snying rje chen po bsgom par bya// rang gi sems nyid yi ge hUM// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i ma// chu skyes thabs dang shes rab ldan// mtha'
437b6(rgyud): gnyis spangs pa gdan dang bcas// gnyis med rdo rje'i rang bzhin te// snying rjes sbyangs nas gsum pa rdzogs// sku mdog nag po zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin/
437b7(rgyud): bsnun pa'i stobs can rdo rje 'bar// g.yon pas dril bu dkur brten te// sgeg pa'i tshul can nam mkhar gdengs// rin chen chu 'dzin rgyan dang ldan// stag lpags dar gyis sku la brgyan//
438a1(rgyud): g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bdud la brdzis// spyan gsum gdug pa'i mche ba gtsigs// bskal pa'i me 'od nang du bzhugs// yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum po//
438a2(rgyud): lhar byas skye mched byin gyis brlab// gnas su khro bo'i yig 'bru bskyed// sprul pa dpag med phyogs bcur 'gyed// yi ge bzhi yis ye shes dbab// rigs bdag la sogs sangs rgyas kyis//
438a3(rgyud): dbang bskur byin brlabs cod pan bsam// de yi ting nge 'dzin 'byung ba'i rgyu// cho ga gsum pa'i sems dpa' yis// gzhan don rgyun mi 'chad par sgom// yang na gsung gi yig 'brus mtshan//
438a4(rgyud): 'phrin las thogs med rnal 'byor bzlas// 'di ni rnam dag rig pa ste// rtag tu ma nyams 'bras bur ldan// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
438a5(rgyud): las dpa' bo gcig pasgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dpa' me rdo rje badrims gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i thabs
438a6(rgyud): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis
438a7(rgyud): legs par nyon// skad cig ma yis lhar bsam nas// snying khar nyi ma'i rig pa hUM// 'od kyis rang bzhin snod bcud rnams// sbyangs te sangs rgyas sa la gzhag/ 'od zer gnyis pas sangs
438b1(rgyud): byas dang / byang sems dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste// phyag bya las sgyu mo bsam// me tog la sogs pas mchod la// bdad pa mi mchod pa rje// da 'od dpag med lnga po mas// reg
438b2(rgyud): bya tha mi dad pas mchod// sdig pashags rjes su yi rang dang // gsol zhing skyabs 'gro ba dag lus dbul// sems bskyed dge ba bsngo bar bya// rdo rjes dang po byams pa ste// gnyis pa snying
438b3(rgyud): rje gsum pa dga'// kun gyi mtha' la btang snyoms so// sbyang gzhi sngags kyis phyi nang kun// stong par byas te rang lus kyang // dbang po'i gzhu 'dra srid 'dzin gyi// gnas su hUM bsam de 'od
438b4(rgyud): bcas// tsam las byung ba'i 'khor lo ste// rtsibs bcu la ni nyi ma bsam// dbus su hUM las gnod mdzes bskyed// de las hUM 'phros khro bcu yang // rang rang sa la gsal bar bskyed/
438b5(rgyud): sngags pas bgegs med gyis shig par// de la bka' lung bsgo bar bya// zhal bzhi'i gsang sngags dran pa yis// mthe bong sdigs mdzub sbyar nas ni// phyogs bcur brda ni bstan par
438b6(rgyud): byang oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM grah+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga dzI bi d+yA rA dzA ya hUM hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod pas// lus ngag
438b7(rgyud): sems las byung ba yi/ bgegs kun gyi ni mgo stengs su// rdo rje phur pa gzugs par bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta big+h+nAn hU~M hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM Adz+nyA pa ya ti / kA ya
439a1(rgyud): bAka tsiHbadz+ra kI la ya dz+nyA phaT/ rdo rje thobs brdung bya ste/ oM badz+ra mra gar badz+ra kIm+b+ha ma sa k+ShoT la hU~M ban+d+ha/ spyi bor btab pas nges byar brlag/ slar 'dus stsogs mtshams
439a2(rgyud): ma lus par// sa gzhi ra ba dra ba dang // gur bcing ba dang bla bre dang // mda' dang me yi 'od 'bar bsgom// oM badz+ra mo de ni 'dzi b+hA ba badz+ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra prA kA ra hUM bahU~M/ oM badz+ra pa dza ra hUM
439a3(rgyud): hUM oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha raM dz+wa la traM saM traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ rim pas brjod la snying rje yis// bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dod pa// smon lam las byung rdzu 'phrul mchog/
439a4(rgyud): yi las byung ba gzhu 'dra ba// sngon po ba dan ldan pa bsam// de steng raM byung rgod ma'i kha// gru gsum dmar po 'od 'bar ba// baM las skyes pa bzlum po ste// dkar po 'khyil ba'i tshul du bsam/
439a5(rgyud): delas skyes pa dbang chen te// laM skyes ser po rdo rje'i rgyu// gru bzhi 'od zer 'bar ba bsam// de steng tsam las chos kyi 'khor// lte bar bruM las gzhal yas khang // grubazhi sgo dang rta babs
439a6(rgyud): bcas// drab phyed dang drabs bad+d+hAn// 'phreng ba rin chen rdo rje dang // mdzes pa'i ba dan bzlas pa bsam// de nang po las chu skyes ni// gaM sar 'dab mar bcas pa'i steng // nyi ma kA le 'od
439a7(rgyud): 'bar tsha// steng du zla ba A li bsil// kha sbyar bar du hUM dang a// gnag cing dmar ba'i rnam pa la// de las pad+ma rdo rje bsam// slar yang yi ge 'gro ba sbyang // hUM gis mi bskyod thugs
439b1(rgyud): rnams bsdu// a yis 'od dpag gsung bsdus la// gnyis med zhubs sprul pa bsdu// rdo rje las ni khro bo ste// pad+mas khro mo'i rnam par bskyed// khro bo mthing kha zhal gcig pa// ra
439b2(rgyud): 'od las byung phyag gnyis 'khyud// rdo rje dril bu thabs shes rab// g.yas dang g.yon du bsam par bya// dbu rgyan la sogs rin chen ldan// dbu skra khyam ser gyen du 'brar// nag po
439b3(rgyud): sbrul lus klu chen brgyad// sku smad stag gi pags pas dkris// chos gos sngon pos sku snod dkris// mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum dmar// 'dod dgur bsgyur zhing brkyang bskub
439b4(rgyud): zhabs// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i steng du bzhugs// de yum rdo rje bde ma khro// dmar ldang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa thod pa bde ba ste //
439b5(rgyud): gnyis med g.yon gyi phyags nas 'khril// rdo rjes sbyor ba'i sgras bskul te// shar phyogs pad+mar nyi zla las// hUM las khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/
439b6(rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu be con te// khro bo rgyan ldan bsams nas kyang // 'byung po'i nus pa 'joms par byed// lce phyogs nyi ma ro sbrengs su// hUM las byung ba'i legs
439b7(rgyud): ldan gnag/ g.yas pa rmi mug g.yon thong ba// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsrem thod 'phreng ldan// dgra ba gsod po'i las la brtson// nub tu klu 'dul bdud rtsi 'khyil// ldeng khuzha la gcig
440a1(rgyud): phyag bzhi khro// g.yas pa rdo rje bya khyung dang // g.yon pa dbyug to phur bu bsnams// sa 'og klu sogs zas su gsol// byang du kA las rnam thos bu// zhal gcig phyag
440a2(rgyud): gnyis bum stengs su// mdog ser g.yas pa rgyal mtshan bsnams// g.yon pas nor 'dzin gzung ba ste// dbul ba sel ba'i don la brtson// sgo mtshams lha yi rang bzhin la// ye shes
440a3(rgyud): spyan drangs mchod la gzhug/ de ni yi ge bzhi sbyor yin// lus ngag sems la yi ge yi// lha yi mtshan ma gdab par bya// skye mched lhar byas ting 'dzin gyi// nus pa mi shigs lhar
440a4(rgyud): bltas la// ye shes lnga 'dus yi ge bsam// de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i// rigs lnga snyoms 'jug byin rlabs kyis// mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te// gsang ba shes rab
440a5(rgyud): ye shes kyis// rgyas btab rigs la bzhi pa yi// phyag rgya che la rigs med do// 'di ni gsang chen sku grub pa// rim gyis gsal zhing rnam par dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku thob pa// tshe gcig
440a6(rgyud): nyid la 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa sogs 'jig rten ma lus kun// skad cig nyid la dbang du 'gyur// gtsug na rin chen la sogs pa'i// gdug pa can
440a7(rgyud): rnams snying yang 'byin// dga' bo la sogs klu chen rnams// rtag tu de la 'dud par 'gyur// nad kyi rigs kun ma lus 'joms// gnod sbyin ma lus bka' nyan cing //
440b1(rgyud): srin ma lus bran du 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/
440b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje pad mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu
440b3(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis
440b4(rgyud): legs par nyon// gsang ba'i mchog gi gsang ba ste// 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs byed cing // sdug bsngal kun las skyob byed pa'i// A li kA li mnyam sbyor las// thabs dang
440b5(rgyud): shes rab mnyam med pa'i// sngags kyi don ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa dang // 'phrin las sna tshogs rig pa dang // 'khor gyi las kyi rig pa dang // 'byung po dgug dang gsad//
440b6(rgyud): pa dang // gtor ma gtang ba'i rig pa'o// oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ d+hi d+ho pan+na ga a d+hi pa ta ye/
440b7(rgyud): mdzan 'ib rgya pa'i nga/ brdza chitshing ma/ yas kyims pa/ sasul/ sung sna na/ ma'i ma/ tsham brgya baH/ 'ibacu brgyas 'i pa na ni// mab theb
441a1(rgyud): ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA gA hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga marmaN+Di/ bi shIr+yan+tu nA ga sha rI raM/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga na ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM AHhUM phaT/ nA ga bi t+tA ra NA ya hUM phaT nA gota sA da nA ya hUM phaT/
441a2(rgyud): nI la ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn tA rU pa ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ tra sa nA ya phaT/ kuSh+maN+Dota sA da nA ya phaT/ pre ta pa shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya paT/ yak+Sha a pa
441a3(rgyud): s+phA ra binA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ dA ra dA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti/
441a4(rgyud): swA hA/ oM badz+ra trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra trai lo kya bi dza ya b+ha smi swA hA namA ra ya tsit+ta rbad rbad/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA gu Ni hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta kro d+hi duny+dzadzaH/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA
441a5(rgyud): a mr-i ta nA ga hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta ku Ta li si khaM ku ru hUM phaT/ mA ra ya rak+Sha rngubs rngubs/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ku be ra rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ oM Ar+ya dza~M b+ha la dza lo dra ya hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya ke cho mchom/ ma hA de ba mA ra ya sod
441a6(rgyud): sodam hA nA ga mA ra ya dza dza/ ma hA de bi mA ra ya ha na ha na/ ma hA ma nu mA ra ya gtubs gtubs/ ma hA grub pa mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya d+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA gan+d+harba mA ra ya khos khos/ ma hA/
441a7(rgyud): ma ri Ni mA ra ya nAM/ ma hA nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha hUM/ mu ru ta mu ru ta hUM phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying /
441b1(rgyud): mA ra Na thu ma ri la dza dza/ ka ka rak+Sha hUM hUM s+ya b+ho tra kha bA/ te she rak+Sha hUM hUM staM b+hA dzA kha khA/ tsa pa rak+Sha hUM hUM staM b+hU dzA kha khA/ tsa ka rak+Sha hUM hU s+thA b+h+yo dz+wa la khA/ mun du rak+Sha d+hu hUM b+hU b+h+yo drA kha khA/ ka ka rak+Sha sa ma ya dud+d+ha
441b2(rgyud): la s+phu tA ra/ te sha rak+Sha sa ma ya rud+hA ya s+phu ta ra/ tsa pa rak+Sha sa ma dud+d+hA ya sU ta ra/ tsa ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bud+d+ha ya sU tA ra/ mun du rak+Sha sa ma la bud+d+hA ya sU tA ra/ hUM hUM/ khrol hril/ dam dim/ po ba po ga/ shar ba/
441b3(rgyud): di ro da ri/ rbad rbad/ kha thaM kha thaM/ dzus thus/ dza re dza re b+h+yo/ ha sa ha sa/ ta pa te pa/ kri ta ha kri ta ha/ kr-i khug kri khug/ tshal pa tshal ba/ rbad ling zad ling / srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul mar sa rbang/
441b4(rgyud): ra raM dzA la dzA la shi shi/ rdul bun rbad sod/ nA ga mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoHd+har+m+ma ka ka ki ti ra/ d+har+m+ma te sha sa muny+dza/ d+har+m+ma te sha tsa ka ra/ d+har+m+ma te sha sa ma ya/ bud+d+ha ya sU ta ra/ te pa te pa kha khA ra/ te pa te/
441b5(rgyud): pa ka tsa ri/ te pa te pa mun du ri/ te pa te pa pus+t+ra ha ra/ te pa te pa sa mun dza/ tsa ka ra muM du ra khe/ badz+ra tsa ma ran dzA dzA/ de sha raM/ mun du naM/ badz+ra dzu ru dzu ru raM/ dzu ru dzu ru sa muM dza dza hUM/ badz+ra b+he ne khe dza
441b6(rgyud): badz+ra pU ra Ni khe dza/ badz+ra muN+Da re khe dza/ kha dza rA dzA muM du ra khe/ kha dza ra dza muM du ra sa muM khe/ pad+ma ra Ni kha dza rA dza mu du ra khe/ kha dza rA dza muM du ra sa muny+dza ra khe/ dzu dzu dza dza khA hi dza/ oM kA ya bA ka tsit+ta i daM
441b7(rgyud): ba liM/ b+huny+dzadzi g+ha pul+la/ d+hU pa mAM sa se/ sa khan+ti/ khuSh+Ti pe Ta gA da/ oM a mr-i ta pra ti dza ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi/ rak+ta pi pa ta/ ka se ru pU dza khA hi/ d+hU pa/ puSh+pe/ a lo ke/ g+han+d+heH/ ne bi d+ye/ ka sa ka ru
442a1(rgyud): pU dza khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan na twAta/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni rin chen sngags kyi mchog/ ma lus dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpal// gzungs ma
442a2(rgyud): khyod la nyer bshad pas// 'di ni mi 'da'i dam tshig yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
442a3(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa
442a4(rgyud): legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// gang yi 'khor ni bsam mi khyab// 'di tsam grangs ni sangs rgyas kyis//
442a5(rgyud): bskal par bgrangs kyang shes mi 'gyur// de bas nam mkha'i tshad dang mtshungs// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sku yi 'khor ni khro bo bcu// rigs lnga'i ngo bo su gsung rdugs//
442a6(rgyud): 'gyur gdug pa 'dul ba yin// thugs kyi 'khor ni rigs brgya ste// mdor bsdus sprul pa'i sde khro bo bzhi// gsung gi 'khor ni dpag med kyang // rigs drug 'dul ba'i khyung chen yin// sna tshogs
442a7(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gdul bya'i 'khor ni klu chen brgyad// gsung gis de rigs 'dul ba yin// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i tshogs// lnga brgya rigs bsdus sku yis 'dul// thugs kyis lha
442b1(rgyud): srin gdug pa 'dul// byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul// 'di la 'dis 'dul sprul pa'i tshogs// smon lam dbang gis byung ba ste// bsam gyis mi khyab des 'dul ba// rigs la
442b2(rgyud): brjod par ga la nus// mdor bsdus mdzes ma khyod la bstan// bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ 'khor nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
442b3(rgyud): pa'o// / dpa' ni rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi las sgrub pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes
442b4(rgyud): ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'dod pas// rdo rje khyung
442b5(rgyud): chen stobs chen 'dul// nga yi gsung gi sprul pa ste// mche ba rjod pal drag po gtsigs// baM las rgya mtsho ri rab steng // yi ge hUM las byung ba yi// dpa' bo klu 'dul bsgom par bya// sku mdog nag
442b6(rgyud): po zhal dgur ldan// rtsa zhal mthing nag g.yas pa dkar// g.yon pa dmar po de steng du// dbus dmar g.yas pa ldang ba ste// g.yon pa btso ma gser dang 'dra// de steng dbus dkar g.yas pa gnag
442b7(rgyud): g.yon pa bai DUR+Ya ltar sngo// thams cad spyan gsum rdo rje'i mchu// spyi gtsug rin chen rdo rje'i rwa// phyag ni bco brgyad g.yas pa na// rdo rje ral gri dgra sta zhags// mdung dang lcags kyu mda' dang ni//
443a1(rgyud): rtse gsum las kyi bya khyung bsnams// rim bzhin chu bdag mtha' yas dang // nor rgyas stobs rgyu dung skyong dang // pad+ma bad chen rigs ldan dang // 'jog po klu dgu re stong lnga//
443a2(rgyud): thul sbyar gcol rin rten stob// mjugs phrag la dkris mdzad de// kun kyang rang rab 'dog 'dzin// sbrul mgo bdun pa sprin bzhin gtibs// g.yon pa dril bu ba con dang // 'khor la rtsa ma
443a3(rgyud): zothod dbyug che// sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan gzhu dang ni// gtum chung phur dang khyud phur ro// rim bzhin rlung 'byin dga' ma dang // mdzes ldan dpa' mo 'od byed ma// grub ma bstan ma dge ma dang //
443a4(rgyud): gsal byed rim bzhin yab dang 'dra// thal sbyar gtso la pad+ma dbul// gdengs ka gsum gyis 'dud byed ma// g.yon du rim bzhin bsam par bya// zhabs bzhi chu srin rus sbal dang // bag
443a5(rgyud): dang lho 'phye'i steng na bzhugs// gshog pa rigs bzhi'i rdo rje ste// mjug mo ral gri rigs bzhir ldan// sder chen lpags la me 'bar bas// rab tu gtum zhing sa bdag dang // klu rigs ma
443a6(rgyud): lus brlag mdzad pa// 'og min gnas su sleb par bsam// de rjes gnas gsum yigs brgyan// oM AHhUM dkar dmar dang gnag/ sprul pa go cha'i sngags bsam pa// oM hUM tAM hrIHA/ spyi bo mgrin
443a7(rgyud): pa snying kha dang // lte ba gsang gnas bsam par bya// e baM ma yA dpung pa dang // dbyi yi stengs su bsam par bya// hUM sa hrIHsa drang dang ni// sog daphrag lhong mo lte lkog pas ma// dzaHhUM
443b1(rgyud): bzhir bsam// sA dza ya a sprul pa dang // yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab bsam// de nus gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa// las kyi khyung chen drag po'i sngags// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu
443b2(rgyud): bsdus pa// oM badz+ra khrung ka ra khyud kar badz+ra ga ru De tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ sku yi gsang ba'i sngags su bstan// oM badz+ra ga ru Da hUM srog tshig ni rbad/ lus dul nA ga mA ra ya phaT/ raM raM dza la dzal
443b3(rgyud): zhi zhi rdul bun tha dadaT/ gsung gi rig pa dam pa'o// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ga ru Ta hUM mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra pa ti ga ru Da be ge hUM dza dza ri dza pri dza hUM phaT/ thugs gsang rdo rje gtum po'i sngags/
443b4(rgyud): drag byed thams cad rlag par byed// klu rnams snying khrag 'jig pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshigs 'di// rin chen bzhin du rnyed dka' bas// 'di la rtag tu 'bad par bya// mthun pa'i
443b5(rgyud): rdzas kyi gtor ma sbyin// de yi nang du gnod pa dgug/ oM badz+ra shrI ma ma nA ga sa bi tra cho ga khug maM la~M d+haM swA hA/ 'dis ni bkug la lha la dbul// gal te gsad par 'dod pa na// sku gsung
443b6(rgyud): thugs kyi rigs pa las// phur bu gnyis pa'i drag sngags dang // gsad pa spyi yi sham bur gdags// gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab bya// tshangs pa yin yang nges par brlag/ oM badz+ra
443b7(rgyud): tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra kI la ya sar+b+ba big+h+nA na mud ga ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ga ru Ta kI li kI la ya sar+b+ba big+h+nAM mud ga ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ gtum chung pur bus ga dab
444a1(rgyud): pa'i sngags// de rjes gzugs brnyan ma lus pa// drag po'i thab tu bsreg par bya// tsher ma can gyi me sbar la// khyung chen gtum po'i nga rgyal gyis// nA ga b+hU mi
444a2(rgyud): pa ti sar+b+ba kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+rA dz+wa lA na lA rka hUM/ ci rigs sngags kyis bsreg pa dang // thal ba dkar gsum sbyar bya ste// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu la dor// de ltar las kyi sbyor ba de/
444a3(rgyud): lan bdun byas par gyur na ni// klu chen dug gis snying la zin// nges par sos par 'gyur ba yin// gal te mi gtong klu chen gyi// lus dang khang par bcas pa la// mi dang rdo rje'i
444a4(rgyud): char ba yis// skad cig nyid la 'chog par 'gyur// de bas dam tshig mi 'da' bas// las 'di myur bar mi bya'o// las kyi gtum po khyud sgrub pa// mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin// bcom ldan 'das
444a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ las sgrub pa'i lha mo rdo rje gtum po khyung gi sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje dade
444a6(rgyud): mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi sku'i sprul pa pho nya gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med
444a7(rgyud): bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid gnod sbyin nag po 'di// bya ba'i las kun thogs pa med// khyad par drag po'i 'phrin las 'grub
444b1(rgyud): dur khrod brag rdzong nags phug tu// nag po'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas// mthing nag gru gsum me 'od ldan// saM las ri rab steng du hUM// 'od zer 'phro 'dus rdo rje radasam/
444b2(rgyud): de las gnod sbyin nag po ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gsum ldan// g.yas pa 'jigs pa stag gi zhal// g.yon pa stobs chen seng ge ste// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis pa rtse
444b3(rgyud): gsum gsum pa phur// g.yon pa dril chen lcags kyu dang // thod pa khrag gis bkang ba yin// g.yas pa gtum pa'i bdud mo brdzis// g.yon pas bdud po nyid gdong mnan// phur zhabs dmar po ma 'bar
444b4(rgyud): bas gnod byed bgegs kyi mgo la btab// thod 'phreng mi yi pags pa gyon// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan// dbu skra dmar po thur du 'phyang // spyan gsum mche ba rab tu gtsugs// ha ha ra dgod
444b5(rgyud): cing gdug pa 'dul// sprul pa'i gnod sbyin stong dang bcas// rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin sgrub// de yis rig pa phul ba ni// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+Da ni lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
444b6(rgyud): 'bum du bzlas// grub par gyur nas gang dmigs la// rjes su tsha ba'i 'bru dang ni// tshwa las ling gar 'khor lo gzhug/ dmigs pa bstim la 'grub gnas gzhug/ de stangs yungs kar zi ra dang //
444b7(rgyud): dug gi rigs kyis brab par bya// gsang ba drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kA la tsaN+Da nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sar+b+ba sha hUM bi dA ra ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/
445a1(rgyud): bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya phaT/ sarba badz+rA kA ya bkA tsit+ta bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ ji srid ma shi'i bar du prA ba// grub nas rigs med thod par gzhug/ tse ti chen po'i 'og tu sba// steng du 'i rab/
445a2(rgyud): rdo rje yis// mnan pa byas pas nges par brlag/ yang na gnod sbyin chen po de// dur khrod ras la bris byas la// ro yi snying khar sngags 'di bri// e yi nang du chud par ni// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kA la tsar+N+Na sa ma
445a3(rgyud): ma nu sma ra sid+d+hi hUM/ phyag la yak+Sha pa ti li// zhabs la kaM maM b+ha ra bri// de nyid gtor ma chen po la// bcug ste sngon po'i dar gyis dag pa// de steng ras sam lo ma la// gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo ni// lte brtsibs
445a4(rgyud): bcu mu khyud bcas// yang rtsibs bcu dang mu khyud ldan// me 'od ldan pa dris byas te// sngags kyi 'khrul bkod bri nas kyang // las kyi ming dang spel ba bri// 'di ni gnod sbyin srog yin te// mi 'da' bka'
445a5(rgyud): yi das tshig yin// las rnams gang bcol sku yi byed// yang na rgyal rigs thod pa la// gnod sbyin bris la tsha ba'i mar// chang dang bsres la byug bya ste// nyin re gang 'dod las dang sbyar// me tog kha
445a6(rgyud): dog mthun pas brab// bsgo ba'i 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// chu dar sngon po'i gzhi ma lo// gser gyi 'khor lo bri bar bya// lte brtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// phyi ma re mig bcu drug par/
445a7(rgyud): sa bon sngags dang spel bya ste// kun gyi mtha' ru 'phrin las sngags// bris pa mgul du btags pa yis// mi mthun phyogs rnams srung 'gyur te// rung ba me la bya ba bzhin// khyi sha btags pa'i/
445b1(rgyud): ril bu'i nang // dgra yi gzugs bris sngags dang spel// nyi nub bya rog la byin te// sngags bzla sa phyir zhing lan grangs ni// brgya'am stong du byas gyur na// gang yin gnas nas bslad par
445b2(rgyud): 'gyur// khyi 'brel sprul srad bu byas// mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te// sngags re zhing yang gnod sbyin re// 'bras kyi nang du bskur ba na// phub ma 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin khyim du
445b3(rgyud): bcangs pa na// mi phyugs la sogs 'khrug pa na// khyi dang 'dra bar 'brel bar 'gyur// khyi nag snying du gnod sbyin gyi// snying dang sku dang sngags bcug nas// bcangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin
445b4(rgyud): nyid lus dang grib mar 'dra bar 'gyur// skad cig tsam yang sgrub pa po// de yis gtong bar mi byed do// de la sogs pa'i las kyi rim// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// bcom ldan 'das

446a1(rgyud): bsas// de 'i rang bzhin snying nang du// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i thig les brgyan// nyi \u0f88\u0f90'i bar du rgyu sran tshad// de yi nang du gnas pa'i srog/ ya shAd mar me'i rtse lngar snyom//
446a2(rgyud): la dmigs pa bstan pa dang // ci yang bsam par mi bya ste// bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na// de las ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gsal zhing me tog rig pa'i sku// ye shes zhes ni de la bya//
446a3(rgyud): rten med rnam dag gsal ba yin// rtog pa rten can bsgo mo 'dod pas// sku yi gnas su 'khor lo ni// dkar po rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis// mtshan gyi thabs kyis chas brgyan pa// gsung gi gnas su
446a4(rgyud): rtsa 'dab ni// bcu drug dmar po shes rab ste// de la thabs kyis nges par brgyan// thugs kyi gnas su dus sbyor brgyad// gtso bo'i yi ge brgyad gnas pa// 'phrin las byas pa'i gnas dag tu//
446a5(rgyud): dbyug gu'i grangs kyi rtsa gnas pa// shes rab gnyis 'gyur kha dog dmar// de dbus gnyis med g.yas dang g.yon// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dbye// rtog pa sad pa'i 'khor lo ni// thabs la
446a6(rgyud): drug dang shes rangab drug/ tha ma bde ba 'dzin pa'i sa// mi rtog dpa' bo gnas pa yin// yi ge bzhi yis brgyan mdzad do// bde 'dzin 'khor lor yi ge med// brjod pa thams cad spangs pa ste//
446a7(rgyud): 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin mchog/ khu ba khrag dang chu ser gnas// 'di ni lam gsum 'joms byed pa'o// skad cig rlung gi rta yis ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis bskul nas// gnyis med
446b1(rgyud): ye shes skye bar 'gyur// ye shes kyis ni rtog pa sreg/ thal ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur bas// rtags lnga rim par 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas dpal gyi yon tan te// yang nas yang du goms par
446b2(rgyud): bya sde pa bzhi yi longs spyod ni// gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// gnyis med bde ba'i gnas thob nas// skye 'chi la sogs rgyud chad de// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i gnas// thob
446b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// 'di ltar rnam par dag pa na// nyin mtshan cha yis dbye ba yis// dbyug gu chu tshod dus sbyor sog// brtse bas rnal 'byor ngal ba'i rgyu// thams cad gcig tu
446b4(rgyud): bsdoms gyur na// mi rtog mnyam nyid nam mkhar dag/ 'bad med ye shes lhun gyis grub// dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes che// khams gsum thams cad spel mdzad ma// shes rab yum la
446b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// mi gnas spros bral 'dus ma byas// legs rtogs bla ma mchog la 'dud// brjod par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor 'di// mdzes ma khyed la bshad pa yin// dpa' bo brtan par
446b6(rgyud): ma gyur na// yi ge hUM gi sbyor ba yis// 'jig rten khams kun 'jigs par 'gyur// me yis bud shing sreg mdzad de// shing med me yang ji ltar gnas// brtan g.yo nyams par gyur pa na//
