450a4(rgyud): bshad kyis legs par nyon// gdul bya'i rigs su skyes pa yi// gdug pa'i klu chen rnam pa brgyad// rigs bsdus chu bdag pa ru Na// dam tshig la gnas sogs ma med// 'di dag sgrub par 'dod
450a5(rgyud): pas ni// mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam lngas byug/ pad+ma lha snam sgo dang bcas// sgo rgyan ltos 'gros rab tu mdzes// lte bar rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam// mdun du las kyi bka' nyan bskyed// pad+ma
450a6(rgyud): brgyad la klu chen brgyad// gdengs ka bdun ldan thal sbyar bsam// lha snam rigs bzhi'i sa bdag ste// sgo dang gru chad rigs kyi rim// mchod rdzas klu yi rtsi sman bsam// de rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa sam+ba la/
450a7(rgyud): klu chen gnas nas spyan drangs te// e h+ye hi nA ga rA dzas pa ri wa ra sa ma la dza dzaH/ rang rang stan la gzhug par bya// pad+ma'i lte bar chu bdag dang // dam tshig sogs med dka' dang ser// thal sbyar
450b1(rgyud): sbrul gyi zhabs su 'khyil// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang la 'dud// shar phyogs mtha' yas sngon po ste// lho phyogs nor rgyas ser po che// nub phyogs 'jog po kha dog dmar// byang phyogs stobs chu nag po sde/
450b2(rgyud): sher lho pad+ma dung dang 'dra// lho nub pang chen ser ba ste// nub byang dung skyong btsod dang 'dra// byang shar rigs ldan dungur ba'i mdog/ mjugs 'khyil bas gtsol 'dud// sna tshogs gzugs ni
450b3(rgyud): rigs bzhi dang // sa bdag sna tshogs gzugs kyis bskor// de dag sngags kyi rim pa ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ nA ga ya sa mA ti kra ma tha/ ud sA da ne b+hA dweSh+yan+te swA hA/ rdorje
450b4(rgyud): 'chang gis klu dam tshig la gzhag pa'o// oM ba ru d+hA ya hUM puHswA hA/ oM s+phu Ta s+phu TA ma hA nA ga rA dza kro d+ha hUM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi s+pho Ta yA hUM puHswA hA/ oM a nan ta hUM phuHswA hA/ oM ba su ke hUM phuHswA hA/ oM taH
450b5(rgyud): kang+ku grA/ swAhA/ oM k+Shar koT dz+dza phuHswA hA/ oM bad+d+ha hU~M swAt+ma/ oM ma hA pad+ma dz+nyA g+haswAt+ma/ mi shrI kha dwe la hU~M hraHswAd+d+he/ oM ku~M le ka~M d+hA \u0f7fswA hA/ 'di dag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sngags so//
450b6(rgyud): bas mchod cing gso ba bya// mdzes pa'i rgya mtsho'i gtor ma yis// klu rnams tshim pas gdug sems zhi// de rjes bstod pa brjod par bya// hUMng chu bdag sprul pa'i dam tshig can// mtha'
450b7(rgyud): yas nor rgyas la sogs klu dbang rnams// rgya mtsho chu gter zab pa'i 'jing chen gnas// rin chen sna tshogs yid 'ong spras pa yi// gzhal yas 'byor pa phun sum gnas na bzhugs// sprul
451a1(rgyud): mgo'i gdengs ka rab 'bar rin chen gsal// yid 'ong nor bu 'dod pa kun sgrub pa// rang gzhan phun tshogs don rnams ster ba'i dpal/ 'od 'bar sa 'og mun pa/
451a2(rgyud): ma lus sel// du ma'i bskal par yon tan sbyangs pa yis// klu rgyal 'byor pa mchog la mnga' brnyas pa// bsam gyis mi khyab rdzu 'phrul mchog brnyes pa'i// yon tan bsam gyis mi
451a3(rgyud): khyab khyed la bstod// sangs rgyas bka' thob dad pa'i stobs 'phel ba// sangs rgyas sar gnas grub la nan tan byed// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas gzhan don mdzad// bdag gzhan
451a4(rgyud): don sgrub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas te// bstan pa srung zhing 'gro rnams bskyang ba'i phyir// khas blangs mna' phul dam tshig dran gyis la/
451a5(rgyud): 'phrin las don gyis bdag gzhan don sgrub mdzod// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams la// oM mtha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang // nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang //
451a6(rgyud): pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang // rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang // dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che// gzugs che lho 'phye sbrul chen po// klu chen 'khor dang bcas pa la// 'thun pa'i dam rdzas yid 'ong ba// dkar
451a7(rgyud): gsum mngar gsum gso ba'i sman// rin chen dar dang za 'og dang // dpag bsam shing dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// sna tshogs khyed la phul ba yis// klu yi nad rnams med par mdzod// phyis kyang mi byed
451b1(rgyud): dam chos la// so so'i gnas su 'gro bar gyis// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi bka'// 'di las 'das na klu rgyal rnams// snying 'tshig mgo bo 'gas 'gyur te// lus la bskal pa'i me 'bar nas/
451b2(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyur na ma legs pas// dam las 'das par ma byed cig/ nA ga rA dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra tsaN+DA ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT/ klu rnams dam tshig sgrub pa'o// de bzhin byas na
451b3(rgyud): klu nad rnams// skad cig nyid la byang 'gyur te// sgrub po bde bar 'gyur ba yin// de bas 'di la brtson par gyis// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa bzhin// gtan la phab pas rab tu bshad//
451b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/
451b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor klu gdug pa can rnams kyi nad 'byung ba'i rtags ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/
451b6(rgyud): zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// klu la rigs drug la sogs pa// sna tshogs rigs su yong gyur kyang // 'byung ba lnga mi
451b7(rgyud): rang bzhin te// nor rgyas dung skyong rgyal rigs yin te mthong ba'i dug/ ser po sa la dbang ste lci 'thibs lus po sngo// sha babs ra ba bzhi la khyad par na ba yin// bco lnga nyin gung rgyu ba'i dus lan//
452a1(rgyud): nad kyi gnas ni spyi bor nges par 'bab// rlung rtsa babs la sha rus bar du na// skra 'byi blang thabs na ste rna ba glo ba la// 'brel bas sha re glo lu yin// dga' bo rigs ldan braH/
452a2(rgyud): ze yin te bsams pa'i dug/ dmar po me la dbang ste tsha zhing gdung // lus dmar spyi chung thang la mig rtsa lus po bskam// 'bring po babs sa nyi nub dgongs mo na// gnas stong bco lnga rgyu ba'i
452a3(rgyud): dus te de la na// snying khar babs pas snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams// mjug tu mgo dang lus la babs twe na tsha che// sha ro snying la 'ong bas lce yis ro mi tsher// pad+ma 'jog po rje rigs
452a4(rgyud): yin te kha rlangs dug/ dkar po chu la dbang bas grung zhing bsil bar na// lus mdog dkar la pags pa'i spris ma 'chags// tha chung babs pa yin te tshes brgyad bco brgyad na// snga dro tha
452a5(rgyud): rangs mi bde ske dang dpung pa g.yas// brang na tha ma mchin pa babs pa'i sa yin no// bo bas zas mi 'ju zhing mig gis gzugs mi 'dzin// sha sbrusprul tshor ba med de cung zad sha spags dam// pad chen
452a6(rgyud): stobs rgyu dmangs rigs reg pa'i dug/ nag po rlung la dbang bas yang zhing g.yo// lus 'dar sems rgod sha 'phar pu shus 'debs// yan lag tshigs bzhin zhing phol dang bad kan skye// skyugs dang ro//
452a7(rgyud): sto na zhing snga khrag 'byung // 'byang zhing lus ngal dgongs dang srong lan// tha chung zhag la 'bab rtse tshes gsum bcu gsum na// 'di ni 'gong rigs nub pas spro 'bog bcan thabs gsod// tha ma
452b1(rgyud): mkhal mar 'bab ste rna bas sgra mi thos// khu chu nyams pas chu sri sor mo pra// chu lha dam tshig nam mkha' yin pas kun la khyab// gong ma ci rigs 'byung zhing dus med shes pa zhus// lus kyi
452b2(rgyud): shed nyams bral te sna tshogs ston// 'di ni bcos par dka' ste gtan la phebs par bya// khyad par mcher pa na zhing gdong la sme ba 'byung // lus la shig mang ke dri ro gzhob mnam// thur sel
452b3(rgyud): rlung la rul ba'i dri ma bro// 'di ni mtsher bar 'bab ste chu la khrag kyang 'byung // so so'i rtags su mkhas pas shes par gyis// spyir na lnga po gang zhugs kyang // rim pas 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur//
452b4(rgyud): me dang grog po phugs rdugs dang // ri phug dog pa'i sgo dang dong // lha khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs// dud 'gro'i tshogs dang mtshe ri gzar// snying mi dga' zhing 'tshig pa na// dang po 'byung bar shes
452b5(rgyud): par bya// glu len nung mon dang shes pa lci// yan lag mi bde shu ba g.yan pa dang // bas ldogs 'brum tshung dmar sib 'ong // 'khrug cing za 'khrug sha mdog nyams// me ris chu grang blugs ltar grang
452b6(rgyud): sib tsha thig sha bkra che chung byed// sha 'phrig bem dang sbrid cing 'khol// mig zlum tsha shing smin ma 'byi// lag sor sen mo nyams pas pra// lus la dri nga chu bur dang // nya skangs gnag chu rul dri mnam/
452b7(rgyud): stod gzer smad du 'khru bar byed// khyi yi sha bskams mdog nyams dri ma bral// bug pa'i sgo yo bdud rtsi dus med pa// yang cig mdor bsdus bshad pa ni// dbang po gsal ba'i 'bras bu ni// mchin pa'i
453a1(rgyud): sgo yin mig la brtag/ rgyal mo 'khor lo g.yang ra yin// gnas pa rus pa'i 'bras bu ni// mdzes pa so yi mkhar yin pas// kha dog rkang bu nus pa blta// nus pa chu ba'i 'bras
453a2(rgyud): du ni/ zangs mdog sen mo'i tshogs yin pas// skye lugs kha dog rtsa ba brtag/ mangs dang sha yi 'bras bu ni// khyab pa drag pa yin pas na// chags lugs kha dog 'gyur ba blta// drod rten khrag
453a3(rgyud): gi 'bras bu ni// bud med gsang sgo'i chu yin pas// kha dog ku la gzugs la brtag / rkang mar bcud kyi 'bras bu ni// rtsa ba gnas lugs skyes brtag/ de rnams thams cad rtags ldan na// ngas
453a4(rgyud): kyang gso bar ga la nus// gsum bzhi lnga la sogs pa yi// rim pa rnams dang ldan pa na// sngags dang sman gyis gso bar bya// phyi nang 'brel ba'i babra sa yis// legs par brtag te gso bar
453a5(rgyud): bya bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ klu'i nad zhugs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/
453a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi klu nad gso ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med
453a7(rgyud): shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// byol song klu yis zin pa la// 'tsho dang mi 'tshe gnyis yin te// nges pa'i rtags chen drug tshang na// de la mkhas pas ci byar yod// rnam
453b1(rgyud): sprin las las byung ba yin// gzhan rnams gso bar 'dod pa la// dka' dang sla ba gnyis yin te// dang po sngags kyi rim pa yin// gnyis pa rdzas dang 'brel ba yin// dang po sngags kyi sbyor ba ni//
453b2(rgyud): dbang bskur tshogs bsags rgyud spungs la// rigs pa gsum gyis bsnyen pa bya// kha cig de tsam gyis kyang zhi// gal te nus pa che ba na// gsang pa drag po'i sham bu gdags// kha cig de yis
453b3(rgyud): 'tshe ba yin// gal te gnod tshabs che ba na// klu yi rang bshed bzlas pa tsam// nam mkha'i klu yis snying nas gzir// rigs pa gnyis pa gsham du spel// rdo rje lte bar 'khor lo bri// de la dmigs
453b4(rgyud): te bsgrub par bya// dug rigs gsal bar gyur na ni// sa dug ngos zin rdo rje'i nang // dga' bo rigs ldan me yi sngags// bram ze'i 'khrul 'khor shis pa yin// me la chu yi 'khrul 'khor te// de yi sngags
453b5(rgyud): kyis gsad par bya// padad+ma chen stobs rgyu rlung yin pas// sa yi 'khrul 'khor lce bar bca'// pad+ma 'jog po chu yin pas// rlung gi 'khor los gsad par bya// rang rang kha dog gshed du sbyar//
453b6(rgyud): bzhi snying sngags rnams dril la bzlas// gnyen po mi mthun rdzas dang sbyar// gnyen po gang yin lha yi gshed// man ngag bzhin du shes par bya// 'khrul 'khor tshad nas ma bden// rgyal po'i
453b7(rgyud): sdong zla dbye bar bya// dus tshod zhag grangs rim pa ni// rtags dang sbyar la shes par bya// rtags rjes rjes su log pa na// sbyin sreg ci rigs mkhas pas bya// phyi rjes drag pos gcad pa dang /
454a1(rgyud): lha dang rdzas kyis gags kyis gcad// mnan pas las mtha' brtul bar bya// zhi ba drag po'i rim pa ni// mkhas pas rtags la brten par bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag
454a2(rgyud): nardo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ klu'i nang bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi
454a3(rgyud): gtor ma bya ba'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog
454a4(rgyud): khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dkyil 'khor bri dang sbyin sreg dang // bzlas pa thun mtshams rab gnas dang // dbang bskur bsdad cing gsad pa dang // 'byung po khyung dang gnod sbyin
454a5(rgyud): dang klu dang gnas skyong mchod pa na// gtor ma med par gang spyad pa// las de 'bras bu med pa 'am// bar chad nye bar skye 'gyur bas// gtor ma'i cho ga bstan par bya// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa
454a6(rgyud): yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor pa bsag/ gtor ma'i 'og tu rlung lha yi// sa bon las skyes kha dog sngo// g.yo ba'i rlung yab dang bcas pa// de stengs rgod ma'i kha bsams te// dmar po
454a7(rgyud): rlung las skyes pa bsam// gru gsum hUM las rdo rje gsum// sku gsung thugs kyis brtan por bya// de stengs a las pad+ma che// yangs la dkar zhing cung zad dmar// chos dbyings snod kyi gzhal las
454b1(rgyud): yis/ 'de nas sbyang ba'i sa don las// bruM aM dz+r-IM khaM hUM bsam ste// slar yang shwa lnga sbyangs pa las// ma la~M paM traM baM bsams te// yum lnga'i ye shes rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi ye shes rnam dag 'di//
454b2(rgyud): sbrang dang sbar rtogs sbyor ba yi// yi ge gsum gyi sgra ldan pa// bde ba'i ro cher nyi mar gsal// 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje las byung dngul chu'i mdog/ gnyis med thabs dang
454b3(rgyud): shes rab yin// sa bon las byung pad+ma'i gdan// yangs par rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // phyogs spyod la sogs bkug la bstim// mjug mdung gong mo rtse mo sbyor// mthe bong rdo rje bstan par gnas// rang
454b4(rgyud): 'dod dngos grub sar bzhag la// hUM sgra ldan pas sngags 'dis sbyin// oM in+da/ ya ma dza la/ dzak+Sha b+hU ta ba h+ni/ bA u/ rak+Sha/ tsan+da sU dz+nyA/ mA da bap+pa / ta la bA tA le/ an+ta sap+pa swA hA/ i daM ba li b+h+yAM
454b5(rgyud): dza dzaM g+ha pul+la/ d+hU ba/ mAM sa pI ga/ am+b+ha kadz+dza/ sab+d+ha sA d+ha khaN+Di khu Ni pe Ta gA da swAhA/ o a k+Sha ro mu khi sarba d+haprA NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan+d+ha tAHoM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'khor rnams rtogs par bya ba'o//
454b6(rgyud): lhag par khrung tshon mchod pa ni// nya sha b+hang gi la du dang / 'o ma sbrul gyi sha yis mchod// gnod sbyin dag la shi rlon dang // tshang ni ming du mi rung ngo // ra khrag shing thog rnams kyis so// klul dkar
454b7(rgyud): gsum mngar gsum dang // rtsi sman dar zab sna tshogs mchod// rang gi rig pa phul byas la// bstod cing gsol ba gang yin bya// hUM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su 'thun pa'i
455a1(rgyud): dngos grub stsol// rang gi gnas su gshegs nas kyang // slar yang spyan drangs tshen spyon// oM badz+ra sa ma ya muHzhes brjod// mchod sbyin 'di dang ma bral na// zhi sogs
455a2(rgyud): grub pa brgyad gang yin// mchog gi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba las/ gtor ma'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u
455a3(rgyud): ste bco lnga pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang la zhu ba gsol ba/ bdag gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma
455a4(rgyud): khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i ma// rdo rje bde
455a5(rgyud): chen stong pa nyid// khyod kyi sgrub pa bzang po ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// da ltar byung ba'ang de 'chad de// ma 'ongs rnams kyang 'chad 'gyur la// nga yis kyang ni 'dir
455a6(rgyud): bshad de// byang chub sems ldan gang zag gis// rab dben pa yi sa yi char// mchod cing bstan dga' bsnyen byas la// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod bya// rim pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi
455a7(rgyud): bsgom// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bsgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ brjod med ye shes dag par bsgom// srung zhing gzhal
455b1(rgyud): pas khang pa der// mdzes pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa// chos 'byung rnam dag po brang du// nyi ma zla ba rnam dag dpal// baM las byung ba'i lha mo ni// sku mdog dmar ldang zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis//
455b2(rgyud): gri gug thod pa 'dzin// gar stabs rgyan gyis mdzes ma ste// thod pa skam po'i 'phreng bas brgyan// shar du mA ma kI bsam ste// sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod
455b3(rgyud): pa g.yas su sangs rgyas spyan ser te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na// rin chen g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin// g.yon du dam tshig sgrol ma ldang // g.yas pa ut+pal thod pa 'dzin//
455b4(rgyud): rgyab tu gos dkar dmar ser to// pad+ma thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag/ kun kyang khro zhing gar stabs bzhugs// rus pa rin chen rgyun dang ldan// mchog sgrub nang rnams sbyang ba dang // srung zhing
455b5(rgyud): 'dod pa zhi rgyas dang // rang gi srog 'dzin 'phrin las dbang // rtag tu ye shes pa yang mchod// rig pa nges par bstan pa ni// oM badz+ra su kA bud+d+ha sar+b+ba ba sha~M ku ru su ra kA hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM shaM kar
455b6(rgyud): shI ti ka re/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ta/ ti ni g+hA ta ya/ g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Ta kA Te ka ro Ta bIr+ya swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma ma a
455b7(rgyud): pu Sha swA hA/ rang rang las dang 'brel pa ni// 'bum 'gyur sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// las gzhan dngos grub ma bsgrubs par// lha mo khyod kyis byed pa yin// 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste//
456a1(rgyud): ches gsung bas kyang mchog yin no// de bas mdzes ma khyod la bshad// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjegasang nga mngon par bskrun pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sum sna ba rnas/
456a2(rgyud): bar phye ba'i le'u sde bcu drug pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje dems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi las sna tshogs bsgrub pa je lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' snang pa// mdzes ma
456a3(rgyud): khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// sgrub po phun sum tshogs 'dod pas// nga nyid thog mar ma nyes bya ste// 'dod
456a4(rgyud): ba'i rjes la 'khor lo bri// de yi nang du chud pa yi// longs spyod ming dang spel bris nas// bkug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas// oMnaHma hA ro Sha Na/ ta d+ya tha/ o tsa la pra tsa la/ la lA lu te yA/ de ba ka ma hA/
456a5(rgyud): kA la a na tsa ra ya bi s+t+rai swA hA/ khri bzlas pas rang ci 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gong bu dgug pa'o// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin pasams la/ ha la'i lom la ri rab kyi 'khor lo byas te/ zur du dz+nyA dang dz+r-i/
456a6(rgyud): bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bri'o// lte bar sngags bri/ rtsibs la'ang sngags bris te/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan cing / oM nat+ta ma hA ro Sha Na tsa mud+d+hi d+hu ma ke shi hriH/ ha na ha na hriH/ pa tsa pa tsa hriH/ de ba daN+Da
456a7(rgyud): che ge mo mo pa shi ri swA hA/ zhes khri bzlas pas rkang pa dgug pa'o// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ga ga a ri ga ga pi ta ri swA hA/ sngags 'di bzlas la kha bkrus la/ khyu mchog gi lci ba dang ldong ros bsres la
456b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/ lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la dgra'i sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// bklags pas 'grub 'gyur nus pa 'di// rdo rje 'dzin par rab zhugs nas// rdza mkhan lag nga'i 'dag
456b2(rgyud): pa lang rdo rje'i rnam par 'khrul 'khor bca'// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo mu kha ti b+hU tI sa/ g+ha tshan ti/ g+haM daM taM/ la~M g+ha la~M g+h+r-i/ mu tra mu rA She Na che ge mo dan+ta mi swA hA/ sngags 'di khri bzlas khang par mnan// nges
456b3(rgyud): par bshags las rgyal bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra tsat+tA ma hA re Sha Na ma ni kha bai rA ya/ tsi ritsA ri/ ka ta ru tu ba na mu Shi/ tu te bi d+ha si ri kha la~M swA hA/ rdo rje la ni khrag gis hri/ gang gi phyogs mtshams sbas pa na// byi ba la
456b4(rgyud): ni 'ching ba yin// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na naM tu na te si ri si ri/ kha li khi li swA hA/ stag gi pags pa la bris te// gang la btags pa'i spyang kaM srung // oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma rak+Sha to// nA sha ka rA ya swA hA/ shing thog/
456b5(rgyud): la bzla sa ra bar sbas// spre'u gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sar+b+ba staM b+ha ya du b+he swA hA/ sbrang rtsi bu ram khu ba la// 'di bzlas byugs pas dom 'bros so// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na bA rA ha d+hi naM/
456b6(rgyud): dru dru d+he swA hA/ dug dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang // yungs kar la phug sa bon dang // da du ra dang ka la bi dang // ma he phag dang lce spyang khrag/ sbrul la rdo rje brgyad byas la// phyogs mtshams sngas na gnod pazhi/
456b7(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa yi dam pa yin// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na b+hi d+ha hi na~M kaM d+he swAhA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// srung ba'i yang mtshams gcad pa yin// oM bi ti pi na tri/ d+h+r-i bi Ta bi Ta dz+dza trUM swA hA/
457a1(rgyud): sa 'ad ga min rgya sa/ nas rnas pa // nga dus rgyas par thas/ sa la gag sa dru smra
457a2(rgyud): kyis dris pa'i khros/ bapra/ su Te/ bcan drug/ bragul/ ge'u yang / spre'u'i sgras gtu dus la/ oM badz+ra na d+han d+ha ro Sha \u0f7fga ru ba tsa le bdud tra mA ra ya/ dAdza d+ha ti ga rba T+Ta ga d+hA ri dri nA ga ra gyur
457a3(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ sngags khri bzlas te lus la bcangs na klu thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro// oM pad+ma k+Sha pad+ma k+Sha ba ru Ne hUM phaT swA hA/ chu gtsang ma la bzlas te mig dkrus na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar
457a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sug spel dang / dzA ti dang / na ga ge sar dang / a sho ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams la sngags 'di bzlas te da pral bar shu kras thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra
457a5(rgyud): tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na dza~M d+he me he hri swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// byis pa gsar btsas srung ba na// kham por nang du rdo rgyus kyis// rdo rje rgya gram lte ba'i nang // oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo laraH/
457a6(rgyud): rak+Sha swA hA/ hUM baT bris te lha bstim la// mchod sbyin gtor ma sbyin byas te// dri'i steng du sbyang bar bya// lus lA bur bum chus bris pa'i// 'khor lo gnyis pas bsrung bar du// oM badz+ra
457a7(rgyud): tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ba sa ha do lA yI swA hA/ ma do yA sA bo tsi na mo ha yi swA hA/ e sa ba dzi hA yai na ma~M ta yai swA hA/ sngags 'di me tog dang / gos dang / zas dang / rgyan la mngon par bsngags te byin na bang
457b1(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na na ma sa ra na mA tad+ya b+hU/ d+ha ra ma hA d+ha d+ha d+ha Te du Te de swA hA bye ma dang thal chen la bsngags te/ zhing la gtor na srog chags kyis za bar mi 'gyur ro// sau badz+ra sa
457b2(rgyud): kha de bi shud+d+ha al+li da ra tsu li tsi ra sa ga gan+d+ha sA pa mi ha pan+d+ha li swA hA/ sngags 'di rdo rje'i shing dang / da la si dang / arba gsum la lan dun bdun bzlas te/ rna ba'i 'og tu bcug martsa rab thams
457b3(rgyud): cad kyis gnod par bya bar mi nus so// mi rus la byas phur bu ni// bgegs kyi lus can zhal gcig pa// phyag bzhi tho ba zhags pa dang // dgra sta rtse gsum bsnams pa ste// dug khrag lan tshwa ske
457b4(rgyud): tshe dang // rgya tshwa mar nag nang du btso// spobs chen sngags bris ras mas gtums// khyim sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+hA ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa di d+hA na sa ya ud sA d+ya ya mA ra ya dz+ra par+tha/
457b5(rgyud): sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i thod pa ra khyi sbron pa'i lcel dgra'i ling ba bris te rta'i dag pa'i 'og tu bcug la sngags 'di bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas na bskrad pa'am spro bar 'gyur ro// mo badz+ra tsaN+Dan hA ro 'a
457b6(rgyud): che ge mo mu pa ta ya phaT/ ces khri bzlas so// shing li dang skrag pa la rdo rje'i rnam par byas la lte bar las kyi rig pa bcug/ dpa' ngo ga dul du shi ba'i sgra'i the gus rked par btags la klad la bskor na
457b7(rgyud): bgegs 'bros par 'gyur ro// gro ga'i 'dab ma la rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lte bar sku gsung thugs kyi sngags dang bsrung bya bri/ de'i mtha' mar las rab 'byam dri/ de'i nye bar bstan pa'i 'khor gyi snga
458a1(rgyud): dri/ de'i mtha' mar shes rab kyi sngags bri/ de'i mtha' mur me'i tshogs bris te dril lus la bcangs na gdon thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// byi khung shar bsdus sa/
458a2(rgyud): dang na// dub chung rus pa lang ka'i rtsa// sgo lcags khung bur blugs byas te// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na kur tri sa nA kar+Ni tshums dang phuT phuT swA hA/ sngags de ngargya dang brgyad dazlas na// smyug mas
458a3(rgyud): yang yang dkrog pa ni// sgo lcags 'bye bar the tshom med// dur khrod sol bas bsregs pas ni// slar yang snga ma dag tu 'gyur// rgya gram nang du chud pa yi// dmag gi gtso bo bri bya ste// sngags dang sbal
458a4(rgyud): nas snying kha ru// seng ldeng ngur pa btab pa ni// nges par de nyid rengs par 'gyur// byi ba nag po'i drug pa dang // sha can ra yi rA dang ni// khyi nag spu ngag bsregs gyur na// 'bru yi rnam par 'phel
458a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de sogs las kyi rim pa ni// bsam gyis mi khyab ji snyed pa// khyod la bstan par mi nus pas// sngags grub de yis rtogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon
458a6(rgyud): par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u sde bcu bdun pa'o// dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi char dbab pa'i cho ga ji la
458a7(rgyud): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// chu
458b1(rgyud): ngadag gnas pa'i sa'i char// dkyil 'khor badra brgya pa la// lho dang na babs sbrul gyis brgyan/ me tog mchod pas mnyes drug khrum de'i thod pa gtsang ma gnyis// rlung dag dab cig tu'i
458b2(rgyud): bzugs// gur kum bzang pos dri bar bya// kha sbyar bar du rdo rje 'dzin// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// bai DUR+Ya ltar gnas pa ni// chu dar yang na ras la bri// rtsa ba khro g.yas g.yon rgyub// dka
458b3(rgyud): dmar de bzhin ljang khu ste// rtsa ba khyud chen zil gyis gnon// g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa ltar// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // lcags kyu rigs ldan pad+ma dang // pad chen dung skyong yum dang bcas// g.yon pa dral/
458b4(rgyud): bu rtse gsum dang // phur bu sprin gyi zhags pa ste// mtha' yas nor rgyas 'jog po dang // stongs rgyu yum gyis bcings pa ni// thams cad gtso la thal sbyar te// sbrul mgo sprin chen bzhin du gtibs// 'dab
458b5(rgyud): mar klu chen brgyad bskyed la// spyan drangs mchod pa byas nas kyang // char gyi rgyun chen 'bab par bsam// klu chen rtsa ba'i sngags rnams la// b+ha ri sha yA btags te bzlas// nges par char rgyun 'angab par 'gyur//
458b6(rgyud): gal te 'bab par ma gyur na// gu gul dud pas gzir byas nas// 'drin las sngags kyis srog kyang g.yo// gal te mabab na rdo rje 'dzin pa phyung la tsha ba'i mar nag gis blugs la sngags bzlas na 'dang par 'gyur ro//
458b7(rgyud): yang ma kham por la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i khrag dang shas sngar ltar byas la skyer ba'i sol ba'i me la sngar ltar bsro bar bya ste// des nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// yang na gtum pa'i 'bras bu la// sngags kyis
459a1(rgyud): btab ste klu 'i khyim// sbyin sreg byas pas 'bab par 'gyur// des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na// yungs kar ske tshe sbrang rgod dang // gra ma'i me tog phye mar byas// ra li 'o mas ril du sbyar/
459a2(rgyud): sngags bzlas mtshe 'am chu mig tu// brgya dang brgyad du bsgyur na 'ang ba// des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na// rta ru'i khu bas ril bu byas// mtshor bsgyur nges par 'bab pa yin// gal te des kyang ma nga ba na// pad+ma ut+pal
459a3(rgyud): sngon po dang // yungs kar zangs phye ba bla dang // dbang po lag pargya stegs shing // bu ram ra yi 'o mas bsdus// rgya shug 'dru tsam ril bu la// lan bdun bsngags te mtsher bsgyur na// nAr rgyun mtshungs
459a4(rgyud): ba med par 'dang // mi 'bebs klu rnams mgogs te// lus ni bskams te 'tshig par 'gyur// nga yi bka' las gang 'da' ba// skad cig nyid la brlab par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyis na rdo rje gsang ba mngon
459a5(rgyud): par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ char dngab pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje dadems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji lta du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
459a6(rgyud): ka' stsal pa// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// thab dang rdzas dang lha dang ni// sngags kyi rim pa phan yon
459a7(rgyud): rnams// rim pas mdzes ma khyod la bstan// sbyang ba'i las ni sngon 'gro ngas// sor ni nyi shu brgyad pa dang // bcu drug bcu bzhi bcu gnyis dang // bcu dang brgyad las chung ba spang // rim bzhin nang rnams ni zhing nor 'phel
459b1(rgyud): dnga' rims rnams zhi zhing zhing las 'grub// dbang du bsdu dang rgyas pa dang // gsod pa'i thabs su shes par bya// thur ba rko sum gnyis kha khyer brgyad cha mtho// rim bzhin phyed phyed rdo rjes mtshan// dkar ser/
459b2(rgyud): dmar nag ljang khu ste// las dang 'brel bar shes par bya// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yum shing dang // dur ba la sogs pa sreg pa'i rdzas// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pa'i na// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed/
459b3(rgyud): rgyas la dga' dang zhal zhi// dngang la chags pa khro la gas // gzhan rngub bskra pa la sogs yin// dmar pa me phyogs gdud pa'i las// bslad pa rlung ste ma nan pa ni// bden bral dbang dang dbun pa dang // lha'i
459b4(rgyud): phyogs su blta ba yin// gsang dang dbye ba'ang de bzhin te// shar zhi byang phyogs rgyas pa yin// hUM las bskyed pa kha dog dmar// mdzes pa'i zhal gdangs nung bang gnag/ dbyug gu ril nga spyi thugs dang //
459b5(rgyud): bgrang 'phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam// ral pa'i cod pan gsum pa che// rgyan dang ldan pa bsams la bstim// bsang gtor 'thor 'thung mchod yon dang // zhabs bsil la sogs dngul bar bya//
459b6(rgyud): me tog la sogs rim pa ste// gzer du gnyis kyi dgrang thugs dngul/ oM sak+Sh+ma ye sad+he/ de rjes me'i mtshan ma brtag/ mdog dang sgra dang dri dong // dbyibs dang kha dog bsdu bar bya// mni rtsi gcig 'bar
459b7(rgyud): rgyang na/ bsam pa thams cad 'thung bar rtsom// gnyis 'bar rtse gsum me mayin// 'bar ba'i 'bras bu thams cad 'dzin/ rtse bzhi mamam cid brtan pa ste// rgyas pa'i las la 'bras du 'ong / wa'
460a1(rgyud): snum la dri ma med// du ba med cing be DUr 'dra// nad med rigs rnams rgyas par byed// chu shel nor bu spungs pa dang // pad+ma rAg gsal ba ni// sdig pa ma las zad par 'gyur/
460a2(rgyud): dmar ser pud+d+ha ri ka dang // ban du kha dog gsal ba ni// rgyal srid dpal rnams 'byor pa yin// ut+pa la ma li u sha'i dri// tsam pa ka dang sig kar dri// ga pur a ka ru yi dris// dge zhing tsha ring
460a3(rgyud): dpal gyi gnas// zab pa'i skad dang dung dang ni// rdza rnga pi wang Ta ma ru// de yi sgras ni bde ba 'phel// dpal be'u bkra shis gzugs su 'char// rgyal mtshan rnga yab phyag mtshan rnams// rin chen gzug
460a4(rgyud): kyi dbyibs su 'char// dge ba mi yi dbyibs su bstan// ngan pa de las ci rigs bzlog/ de rjes rdzas kyi rim pa ni// oM ag+na ye a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ sreg blugs so// oM bo d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swA hA/
460a5(rgyud): a shwad tha'i 'o// oM badz+ra la tA ya swA hA/ p+lag sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swA hA/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi'o// oM badz+ra shaM dz+wa lA ya swA hA/ u dum ba ra'i'o// oM sar+b+ba pA ba daM ha na badz+rA swA hA/ til gyi'o// oM
460a6(rgyud): badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i'o// oM badz+ra saM pa de swA hA/ ni dang zan gyi'o// oM badz+ra A mu She swAhA/ dUr ba'i'o// oM badz+ra pr-i ta ha ta badz+rA ya swA hA/ ku sha'i 'o// rdzas rnams rang sngags ci rigs
460a7(rgyud): dngug// bstod cing gsol pa'i las bya ste// me yi snying khar dkyil 'khor mchod// gsang la sogs pa rim pa bzhin// sngar bstan pa las shes par bya// de rjes lcagams ci rigs mchod/
460b1(rgyud): zhu ba la sogs rdzas rnams ni// lha yi zhal du mchod par bya// yam shing ku sha la sogs pa// 'od la mchod par bya ba yin// phyag tu zhal bas 'thor 'thung dbul// me tog bdug pa dbu
460b2(rgyud): dang 'od// thig le snying kha bsang gtor yang // sru la phul te zhabs bsil zhabs// mar me la sogs rim bzhin gnas// dkyil 'khor bsdu shegs rim pa rnams// mkhas pas nye bar
460b3(rgyud): brtags te bya// dkyil 'khor lhas ni mchog sbyar la// me yis 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed// lag pan gyis ni bde ba 'byin// 'o ma sbrang rtsis rig pa 'phel// gro dang sran ma sa nad kun sal//
460b4(rgyud): dur bas srog ni 'dzin par byed// nas kyis brtson 'grus la dbang ste// stobs 'phel ma sha ka yin no// 'bru 'phel so ba'i las yin te// sdig pa 'dag pa tIl yin no// 'bras kyis nus
460b5(rgyud): pa 'phel byed pa// zhi la yungs kar ku shas bsrung // dpal bskyed pa ni bud shing ste// yam shing gzi byin skyer bar byed// 'byor pa 'phel ba mar yin no// sbyin bdag bkra shis thab
460b6(rgyud): yin te// dngos grub kun ster mchod pa'i rdzas// thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste// bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa// mchod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// 'di ni mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis//
460b7(rgyud): gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u rtse bcu dgu pa'o//
461a1(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan nyi shu gcig gi bskyod pa ji lta bu la gus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mdzes
461a2(rgyud): ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga yi ming ni nyi shu gcig/ dus gsum sangs rgyas
461a3(rgyud): rnams kyi gsang // mi 'gyur g.yung drung dbang bskur te// 'di dag mdzes ma khyod la bstan// na mo nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo b+ha dza kaN+Do b+h+yo tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHsu b+hU Sha ni sa d+d+ho tsaN+Da badz+ra/
461a4(rgyud): na mo rat+na kuN+Tha ka ra si tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo b+ha kr-i pradz+nyA d+ha si ra tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHAr+ya g+ho Sha san+ni tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHpra sa rA yi to sI tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo badz+ra la a ra tsi shi sI tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHsa rU pa no pa la tsaN+Da
461a5(rgyud): badz+ra na mo dur dA na ta da ma kam pa raHtsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo b+hai ra ba bi b+ha ta sa rU pi b+hiHtsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo gro mo d+ha bi gra ha rU pi d+hiHtsaN+DA badz+ra/ na maHtsa tur smA ra r-i Shi sin+na tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo ma hA ba la ra kra ma tsaN+Da badz+ra/
461a6(rgyud): namo nai rarAt+na sa~M ha ni rat+na tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo a mo g+ha dza ga dan+ta kr-ita tsaN+DA badz+ra/ na mo dA shA ki bai shA nir mA NAM tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo ha hA satwa so nir g+ho Sha tsaN+Da badz+ra/ nA maHa tsa lo haM ka dzad to tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHpany+tsa bud+d+ha ta ma mu ku Ta tsaH/
461a7(rgyud): badz+ra dran mo badz+ra ma hA be sha yud d+ha rod tsat+ta badz+ra/ rdo rje gtum po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / glags
461b1(rgyud): bam du byas te 'chang ba la ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro// srung bar 'gyur ro// sbed par 'gyur ro// skyob par 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di rnams 'dzin pa de mtshams/
461b2(rgyud): med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'o// ngan 'gro gzhan yang spangs pa yin no// tshe rabs
461b3(rgyud): thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang lnga brgya'ang rtag tu mtshan 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo // gdug pa can gyi klu rnams kyis mi 'tshe zhing slar longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin no// 'chi ba'i dus
461b4(rgyud): su'ang bai DUR+Ya lta bu'i sku lus bstan te rang gi gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lhung lo can dang mtshungs pa yin no// mi ma yin pa gdug pa can rnams kyis nam yang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur
461b5(rgyud): ro grub pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas kyang ster bar byed na/ gzhan lha'ang ci smos te/ mtshan 'di dag rin po che dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// ched du brjod pa rin po che
461b6(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel ba yin// 'phrin las sgo rnams thog pa med// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas// nyin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yi// phyi bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed//
461b7(rgyud): nad dang gdon rnams kun las thar// sman chen nyes pa thams cad 'joms// 'byung po kun gyis bkur ba ste// mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// su 'chang lag na dpal gnas/
462a1(rgyud): te rtag tu mtshan 'di brjod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjegasang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ mtshan nyi shurtsa gcig gis bskyod pa'i le'u sa nyi/
462a2(rgyud): pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa dang / sba ba dang / ji ltar gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
462a3(rgyud): mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// phyi ma'i dus su nga yi rgyud// gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi
462a4(rgyud): gter// bla mang rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di// byang chub sems ldan snying rje che// thos mang shes rab mchog tu gsal// dad pa che zhing lha la gus// bla ma bstan cing dbang bskur thob// dam tshig sdom pa
462a5(rgyud): ma lus ldan// brtson 'grus che la gzhan don dpa'// 'jig rten bde la ma chags pas// rgyud 'di mnyan dang bshad par bya// de las bzlog pa'i gang zag la// ming tsam bstan par mi bya'o//
462a6(rgyud): gal te bstan par gyur pa na// sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur te// nad gdon 'byung po ma lus pas// nye bar gtses te 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas mnar med sdug bsngal ni// grangs med 'dus
462a7(rgyud): kyang thar mi 'gyur// de bas gsang bsku gsung thugs// snying po ngam pa 'di dag la// rgya yis btab ste mchod pa dang // bskyod cing sbab byas gyur na// yid le re ba kun rdzogs shing // 'jig
462b1(rgyud): rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur// glegs bam sor ni bcu drug la// rim bdun rgyu yis btang nas kyang // rtag tu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung // 'di dang bral bar ma gyur na// bsnyen pa de yin sgrub
462b2(rgyud): pa de/ sgrub pa chen po'ang de yin te// sngags kyang de yin lha yang de// bla ma dri yin slob dpon yang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge bdun yang // de'i na bskyed dang rdzogs pa de// ma lus dbang yang dri
462b3(rgyud): yin te// 'jig rten bya ba kun spangs nas// 'di la mchod par gyur pa ni// tshogs gzhan ci yin rmongs pa'i rgyu// ci phyir 'di la 'bad mi byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te// dum la rjes
462b4(rgyud): su gtad pa'i don bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rdo rje bde ma bde ster ma// rtog pa gcod mdzad yum khyod la// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // gzungs ma yid 'ong rgyal

462b6(rgyud): bde gshegs ma lus pa'i// thugs kyi sras po sde dpon che// 'jig rten thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum po dpa' bo 'jigs par byed// klu 'dul gzhan gyis
462b7(rgyud): mi thub pa// drag po 'jigs par byed pa'i lha// rdo rje gtum po khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes bstod nas phyag dang skor bas mnyes par byas nas/ slar yab kyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte bar thim par gyur to//
463a1(rgyud): de nas 'khor thams cad kyis mchod pas mchod cing bstod de// gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs pa legs so legs so zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu/
